original: GREETING
translation: 问好

original: Howdy pardner! Welcome to the Vikki and Vance Casino and Museum.
translation: 你好啊伙计！欢迎来到“维姬与万斯”赌场及博物馆。

original: A tribe called the Great Khans has joined us. They'd better be good fighters.
translation: 一个叫做大汗帮的部落加入了我们。他们最好都是些优秀的战士。

original: Thank goodness you're here. My squad needs help.
translation: 感谢上帝你来了。我的小队需要帮助。

original: Got some fresh grub coming in from Goodsprings.
translation: 清泉镇又送了些新鲜的吃食过来。

original: You shouldn't have crossed the Powder Gangers! Now you're going to pay!
translation: 你不该和炸药帮结梁子！现在你得付出代价！

original: I have a present for you from the Powder Gangers... I hope you like dynamite!
translation: 我带来了炸药帮给你的礼物……希望你喜欢炸药！

original: You'll pay for what you did to the Powder Gangers!
translation: 你对炸药帮如此残暴，你会付出代价的！

original: Nobody screws with the Powder Gangers and lives!
translation: 敢惹炸药帮的人必死无疑！

original: Here he is, boys! Let's show him what happens when you cross the Powder Gangers!
translation: 他在这儿，小伙子们！让他看看招惹炸药帮是什么下场！

original: A pleasure to meet you! I'm Dr. Thomas Hildern, Director of Operations, OSI East. I presume you're here about Vault 22?
translation: 很高兴见到你！我是托马斯·希尔丹博士，东部科工部的项目总管。我想你来这是为了22号避难所的事吧？

original: This is a restricted area. Step away immediately.
translation: 这是禁区。请马上离开。

original: <groan>
translation: <呻吟>

original: <grunt>
translation: <咕噜声>

original: Fiends... cracked-out junkies. All those chems make them a real bitch to take down.
translation: 恶魔帮……脑子进水的垃圾。恰恰就是他们嗑的这些药，让他们变得特别难对付。

original: You're here for the money. I told the Omertas I was good for it! I just need more time!
translation: 你是来讨钱的吧。我跟黑手党说了，钱没有问题！只要再给我点时间就行了！

original: You're not part of my unit... no, you're here for the money! I told the Omertas I was good for it!
translation: 你不是我们的人……不，你是来讨钱的！我跟黑手党说过了，钱没有问题！

original: Gotta wonder what the hell a civilian is doing here.
translation: 我想知道一个平民在这做什么。

original: You from Camp Golf or McCarran? Never mind. Don't really care.
translation: 你从哪来？高尔夫还是麦卡伦？算了，反正我也不是真的在乎。

original: Damn muties. Wasteland is better off without 'em.
translation: 该死的变种佬。简直是废土毒瘤。

original: Can't wait to get the rest of our pay for this job.
translation: 我等不及要领剩下的报酬了。

original: Wish the muties would make a move. Getting sick of waiting.
translation: 但愿那些变种佬赶紧滚蛋。我已经等恶心了。

original: It's much cooler up here. I love it.
translation: 这上面凉快多了。我喜欢。

original: Muties aren't so tough if you've got the firepower.
translation: 如果你火力强大，那些变种佬也不算个事。

original: I can't believe it. Caesar's Legion attacks in force, and I actually survived!
translation: 我真不敢相信。凯撒军团发动了猛攻，而我居然活下来了！

original: Ya got any change, man? I've got five kids to feed.
translation: 你有零钱吗，老兄？我有五个孩子要养活。

original: You're a crazy son of a bitch, you hear me! The Tops!? Ha! Crazy.
translation: 你是个疯杂种，疯杂种！九重天！？哈！彻底疯了。

original: Ya got any change, man? I've got five kids to feed.
translation: 你有零钱吗，老兄？我有五个孩子要养活。

original: Yeah I saw Benny running through here! He had the fear of the devil in him!
translation: 没错，我看见本尼跑过去了！像是被鬼追一样！

original: You killed ol' cheeser!? They said he was a God! Ha, who ever heard of a God of cheese?
translation: 你杀了老干酪！？他们说他是神！哈，谁听说过干酪之神？

original: Cheeser's dead!? They said he was a God! Ha, who ever heard of a God of cheese?
translation: 老干酪死了！？他们说他是神！哈，谁听说过干酪之神？

original: There are many good things in life, but peeing is definitely the best.
translation: 生命中美好的事很多，撒尿绝对是其中最美好的。

original: Hey! Don't poke me!
translation: 嘿！别戳我！

original: Ow! Why are you poking me!
translation: 哎呦！干嘛老戳我！

original: You've got to keep your bitches in line!
translation: 管好你的那些婊子！

original: You've got to keep your bitches in line!
translation: 管好你的那些婊子！

original: Go bother someone else.
translation: 去烦别人去。

original: A man is never drunk if he can lie on the floor without holding on.
translation: 只要没人扶还能在地板上躺稳，就不算醉。

original: Woooooo!
Where'd The Kings go?
translation: 猫王帮去哪了？

original: Hey doc! You got any Fixer?! I've got a bender planned that would make a hobo cry.
translation: 嘿，医生！你那儿还有瘾头解吗？我想到了一个整蛊流浪汉的好方法。

original: I think your friend wants to eat me! Please don't let him!
translation: 我觉得你朋友想要吃我！求你管好他！

original: Is there anything more beautiful than a beautiful busty brahmin riding a caravaneer off into the sunset... Wait I don't think that came out right.
translation: 有比丰满的双头牛骑着商队成员消失在落日里更美的景象吗……等等，好像哪有点不对。

original: I'll give you five caps for the robot!
translation: 我愿意出5个瓶盖买那个机器人！

original: Your Ghoul friend looks shifty. Watch your pockets, buddy!
translation: 你的尸鬼朋友看起来鬼鬼祟祟的。看好你的口袋，伙计！

original: What happened to your buddy's face?
translation: 你朋友的脸怎么了？

original: I am not an alcoholic, sir. I'm a drunk! There's a difference!
translation: 我不是酒鬼，先生。我是喝醉了！这是两码事！

original: I am not an alcoholic, ma'am. I'm a drunk! There's a difference!
translation: 我不是酒鬼，女士。我是喝醉了！这是两码事！

original: The problem with some people is when they're not drunk, they're sober.
translation: 有些人最大的问题就是，没醉的时候太清醒了。

original: People ask me how much it takes me to get drunk. I don't know. I usually can't remember numbers, let alone where I am the next morning.
translation: 有人问我要喝多少才会醉。我不知道。我通常都记不住数字，更别说第二天早晨起来在哪了。

original: Hey! Watch your back! There be a pack of ol' ladies runnin' round here somewhere! Don't let them catch you unawares!
translation: 嘿！当心点！附近有一群老太太在乱窜！别被她们偷袭了！

original: What the fuck just happened?
translation: 他妈的发生了什么事？

original: The Caesar has marked you for death... and the Legion obeys. Ready yourself for battle.
translation: 凯撒已经对你下了格杀令……而军团永远服从他的命令。准备战斗吧。

original: Now you will serve as an example to all who dare oppose Caesar's Legion. Defend yourself!
translation: 我们要杀了你，让那些胆敢和凯撒军团作对的人知道他们的下场！拿起武器吧！

original: You have defied Caesar for the last time! Your life ends now!
translation: 你居然敢和凯撒作对！受死吧！

original: Oh, thank God! I didn't think I'd ever see another human face down here.
translation: 噢，谢天谢地！没想到我居然还能在这儿见到活人。

original: Please, buddy, you've got to help me. I don't know how much longer I'm going to last with my leg like this.
translation: 求你了，伙计，你得救救我。我腿都这样了，不知道还能撑多久。

original: Come on man, my leg is killing me.
translation: 拜托，老兄，我的腿疼死了。

original: Is it safe to leave yet?
translation: 现在可以安全离开了么？

original: You come to the wrong place, traveler. Primm's dying. If you got any sense, you'll be moving on.
translation: 你来错地方了，旅行者。普瑞姆现在已经是个死城了。如果你够聪明，就快点走吧。

original: Quite a town we got here. Sheriff gets murdered, and Deputy Beagle dragged off for ransom to the Bison Steve. That should bring back the tourists.
translation: 瞧瞧我们这小镇。警长死了，副警长比格尔也被拖进野牛史蒂夫旅店做了人质。这副光景说不定还真能招揽到一些游客呢。

original: Rather be left alone to my misery, if you don't mind.
translation: 如果你不介意的话，我想一个人静静。

original: Before the Powder Gangers came to town, Johnson Nash ran the local store and the Mojave Express station.
translation: 在炸药帮进城以前，约翰逊·纳什负责运营本地商店和莫哈维快递中转站。

original: Hoi! White Legs don't leave survivors often. You're some kind of lucky, let me tell you.
translation: 嚯！白腿部落通常不会留下任何幸存者。我得跟你说，你很幸运。

original: You came from outside, didn't you? From the civilized lands? Wow... Joshua will want to hear about this.
translation: 你来自外面的世界，对吧？来自文明的土地？哇哦...约书亚一定对此很感兴趣。

original: Hoi! What you doing? There's still White Legs back there!
translation: 嚯！你在干什么？白腿部落的人还在后面！

original: Wait - you came from outside, didn't you? From the civilized lands? Wow... Joshua will want to hear about this.
translation: 等等...你是从外面来的，对吧？来自文明的土地？哇哦...约书亚一定对此很感兴趣。

original: Yah ah tahg! I saw you at the southern passage - you... um... you do know there were still White Legs alive when you ran off, right?
translation: 你好！我之前在南部通道那儿看见你了。你...你该知道当你跑掉时那里还有很多白腿部落的人，对吧？

original: Hello. I'm Rose of Sharon Cassidy.
translation: 你好。我是罗撒香·盖西迪。

original: Any word on Station Charlie?
translation: 关于查理驻站有什么消息吗？

original: Well howdy, pardner! Good to see you again. Boss is waiting for ya upstairs, so get a move on!
translation: 你好啊，朋友！再次看到你真是太好了。老板正在楼上等你呢，快上去吧！

original: Die, NCR filth!
translation: 死吧，NCR渣滓！

original: Thank you for your advice. You've helped me see more clearly.
translation: 谢谢你的建议。你让我看得更清楚了。

original: If it isn't the courier who's done everything he can to defy the will of mighty Caesar!
translation: 这不就是那个拼尽全力跟伟大的凯撒作对的邮差吗！

original: If it isn't the courier who's done everything she can to defy the will of mighty Caesar!
translation: 这不就是那个拼尽全力跟伟大的凯撒作对的邮差吗！

original: The Legion holds Nelson, Profligate! This is where you'll die. Brothers, attack!
translation: 军团已经掌控了纳尔逊，荒淫之人！这里就是你的葬身之处。兄弟们，进攻！

original: Dammit, I didn't want you to kill him, just find me some evidence!
translation: 该死，我不是让你杀了他，只要给我找些证据来就可以了！

original: This job's boring enough without talking to you. Go see Alexander.
translation: 就算不和你聊天，这工作也是无聊透顶。去见亚历山大吧。

original: Alexander doesn't pay me to talk.
translation: 亚历山大付钱给我，不是让我聊天的。

original: We're just muscle. Alexander's the man to talk to.
translation: 我们只是马仔，亚历山大才是管事儿的。

original: Oh, you here to work? I think I have an extra shovel around here somewhere.
translation: 哦，你是来干活的？这儿倒是还多一把铲子。

original: Sorry, I don't have time to talk right now. Talk to Trent, he might be able to help you out.
translation: 抱歉，我现在没时间聊天。去跟特伦特说吧，也许他能帮你。

original: Greetings! Pardon my enthusiasm. I'm not accustomed to meeting so many new people, but I find you fascinating.
translation: 你好啊！请原谅我的热情。本来我是不习惯见到这么多生面孔的，但我觉得你人不错。

original: I've tried to learn as much as possible about the surface world since our community left our home.
translation: 自从离开家园之后，我就一直在适应地面的生活。

original: Hello again, outlander.
translation: 又见面了，外乡人。

original: Why are the outlanders killing each other? Why do they treat us like machines? I wish we had remained in the safety, and sanity, of our Vault.
translation: 那些外乡人为什么要自相残杀？为什么他们把我们当机器对待？早知道我们就应该待在安全又平静的避难所里。

original: Hello, outlander.
translation: 你好，外乡人。

original: It's good making your acquaintance.
translation: 能和你结识真是太好了。

original: Excuse me, I'm... not from around here.
translation: 很抱歉，我……不是本地的。

original: Horowitz is our leader.
translation: 霍洛维茨是我们的领头。

original: You're the one who saved us! Thank you.
translation: 是你救了我们！谢谢你。

original: I heard you talking to Horowitz, and can't thank you enough for what you've done for us.
translation: 我听到你跟霍洛维茨说的话了，你为我们做了这么多，真不知道怎么谢谢你。

original: I hope everyone on the surface is like you.
translation: 希望地面上的每个人都能像你这样。

original: We're in your debt. Thank you, outlander.
translation: 我们都欠你一份情。谢谢你，外乡人。

original: I wish we were back at our Vault.
translation: 我想回我们的避难所去。

original: The surface world is a cruel place.
translation: 地上的世界太可怕了。

original: Why are you people treating us like this?
translation: 你们为什么要这样对待我们？

original: We're heading back home. I hope our troops do the same. This land can't be saved.
translation: 我们要回家了。希望我们的军队也能一起回去。这片土地没救了。

original: Trying to grow crops in this heat, with so little water, is bad enough, but now we've got radiation seeping into the farmlands east of New Vegas.
translation: 在这种又热又缺水的地方种庄稼已经够糟了，现在我们在新维加斯以东的农田又受了辐射污染。

original: We're done. Let the people of this hell-hole deal with their problems, I say.
translation: 我们受够了。要我说，就让这鬼地方的人去自生自灭吧。

original: <says nothing>
translation: <沉默>

original: Sorry, friend, you've crossed the NCR one too many times - you've been marked for death... and we're here to take care of that.
translation: 对不起，朋友，你跟NCR作对太多次了，他们要取你的项上人头……而我们就是替他们办事的。

original: Nothing personal - orders - you know how it is. Well, let's get to it.
translation: 无关私人恩怨，只是公事公办而已，希望你理解。那么，咱们动手吧。

original: Well, you ain't the fittest horse that ever ran a race, but you don't appear in immediate danger of keeling over. I can patch you up if you want.
translation: 好吧，你不算是最强健的，但也不会就这样倒下。只要你愿意，我就能治好你。

original: We should have given you a better welcome on your first visit to Zion, but from what I hear, the White Legs beat us to it.
translation: 我们本应该热烈欢迎你第一次光临锡安，但可惜的是，白腿部落抢先了一步。

original: White Legs seem to be the only visitors we have these days, and I wouldn't have expected anyone from the Mojave to come looking for us.
translation: 白腿部落似乎是近一段时间内我们唯一的访客，我也没想到还会有人从莫哈维来这个地方找我们。

original: And you're a courier, no less. Not the one I was expecting, but I suppose he wouldn't have come with a caravan.
translation: 而你还是个邮差。不是我期待的那个人，但我想他也不会带着一整支商队来的。

original: I don't know if you were close to the other members of your group, but you have my sympathy.
translation: 我不知道你和商队里其他成员关系怎么样，但我还是要对你表示同情。

original: I pray for the safety of all good people who come to Zion, even Gentiles, but we can't expect God to do all the work.
translation: 我为每一位来到锡安的善良平民祈祷他们一切平安，即使他们是异教徒我也不会区别对待。但我们不能指望上帝做所有的工作。

original: You made it. Good. I'm getting tired of waiting for you - and Elijah. Surprised? Yeah... I made it here, just like you did.
translation: 你来了，很好。我实在是不想再等你，也不想再等以利亚了。很惊讶吗？没错…我和你一样，也来到了这里。

original: You made it. Good... <Coughs> ugh... Hurts to talk. I'll keep this quick in case my... voice goes out.
translation: 你来了，很好…… <咳嗽>呃……发出声音都难受，我会说得快一些，免得待会又哑了。

original: Well, now, if it isn't my ball, chain, and dog collar rolled all into one.
translation: 哎呀，这不是那位老喜欢折腾和使唤我的大人物吗？

original: You have that sad, questioning look in your eye. Not sure talking to me's going to make it any better.
translation: 你满脸都是悲伤而疑惑的表情，感觉我也没法让你喜笑颜开。

original: Can you hear me...? Damn transceivers... let me link the collars to the speaker in the tower... then... there.
translation: 能听清我说话吗…？该死的收发器……我得把项圈和塔上的扩音器连起来…好了…行了。

original: I hear you took care of Motor-Runner. I could have handled that on my own.
translation: 我听说你已经料理了轰鸣恶煞。我本可以自己解决的。

original: Thanks for the help back at Vault 3. I couldn't have gotten out of there without the assist.
translation: 谢谢你在3号避难所帮了我。要是没有你，我肯定出不来。

original: What do you need? I have a job to do.
translation: 你有什么事？我还有活要干。

original: I'm ready to take out Motor-Runner when you are.
translation: 我已经准备好去干掉轰鸣恶煞了，就等你一句话。

original: How the hell did you get in here? And who the hell are you?
translation: 你他妈到底怎么进来的？还有你他妈到底是谁？

original: What are you doing here, soldier? I didn't call for any support.
translation: 你在这里干什么，士兵？ 我没有呼叫增援啊。

original: Rick is dead, but I'd still welcome my freedom!
translation: 虽然瑞克死了，但我还是很高兴能获得自由！

original: Are you going to free me or what?
translation: 你到底要不要放了我啊？

original: What the fuck are you doing here?
translation: 你他妈的在这里干什么？

original: Man, are you turned around. Motor-Runner is on the other side of the complex.
translation: 老兄，你迷路了吧。轰鸣恶煞在这迷宫的另一边。

original: Sorry, but I don't have time to talk right now. I'm going back to the ranch.
translation: 抱歉，我现在没时间聊天。我得回牧场去了。

original: Stupid Bighorners were making noise all night again.
translation: 傻逼大角羊又在一整夜制造噪音了。

original: I like it up here. Nice and cool.
translation: 我喜欢这地方。凉爽怡人。

original: Better watch out. Lily's been babbling about her grandkids again.
translation: 咱们最好小心点。莉莉又开始念叨她的孙子孙女了。

original: Some days, I miss being in the Master's army.
translation: 有时候我真的很怀念在主教军队里的日子。

original: Can't grow crops if they don't give us the water.
translation: 他们不给我们水，没法种庄稼。

original: Howdy. Something I could help you with?
translation: 你好。有什么我能帮忙的？

original: You showed up just in time to say goodbye. Me and a couple of the others are packing it in and heading back to California.
translation: 你来得正巧，刚好跟你道个别。我和其他几个人正准备收拾铺盖卷回加利福尼亚了。

original: The water ration's still a problem, and the NCR doesn't look like it's going to do anything about it anytime soon.
translation: 用水额度问题依然没解决，NCR看来短期内也不打算采取什么措施了。

original: Something else you need before I go?
translation: 我走之前你还有什么想说的？

original: There's too much light. Why is there always too much light?
translation: 太亮了。为什么那里总是那么亮？

original: Have you heard the news? Caesar's agents assassinated President Kimball - it'll be war for sure, now.
translation: 你听说了吗？凯撒的刺客刺杀了金博尔总统——这下肯定要爆发战争了。

original: Have you found out what happened to those missing refugees?
translation: 发现失踪难民的线索了吗？

original: Good to see you - something else I can do for you?
translation: 很高兴见到你——还有什么事要我帮忙的吗？

original: Back again? What can I do for you?
translation: 又回来了？我能为你做些什么？

original: You're back. Have you changed your mind about helping out?
translation: 你回来了。改变主意想要帮忙了吗？

original: First Recon is a top-notch unit. They're always buying sniper rifles from us.
translation: 第一侦察营是顶级精锐。他们只买我们这里生产的狙击枪。

original: That Eyebot looks like it's gone through hell.
translation: 那个眼球机器人看起来已经饱经沧桑了。

original: I had no idea there was such a thing as a friendly Nightkin. Look at that thing.
translation: 这世上居然还有友好的夜行族。你看看那家伙。

original: I've never seen a dog like that. Who thinks up these things?
translation: 我从没见过这样的狗。都是谁想出来要造这种玩意的？

original: Mr. House finally wised up and said he'd join the NCR in a year or something like that. Good news all around.
translation: 豪斯先生最终还是开窍了，据说他准备在一年后加入NCR。到处都是好消息。

original: Have you seen what one of those anti-materiel rifles can do to a Deathclaw?
translation: 你见过那些反器材步枪能把死亡爪打成什么样吗？

original: Demand for Gun Runner weapons is high, so don't expect them to stay in stock for very long.
translation: 军火贩子的武器供不应求，错过了可就没有了。

original: Well, well, it looks like we've cleared them out, damn inbred mutant freaks. Think I'll start heading back to California now.
translation: 哎呀，哎呀，看来我们把这些恶心的变种怪物都杀光了。我要启程返回加州了。

original: There have been way too many catastrophic NCR foul-ups around here for me to risk my life by sticking around.
translation: NCR在这地方惹出来的乱子实在太多了，我再继续待下去怕是有生命危险。

original: You'll get the hang of that takedown. I had trouble learning it at first, too.
translation: 你会掌握击倒的窍门的。我刚开始学的时候也是一样乱七八糟。

original: What's new?
translation: 有什么新鲜事吗？

original: You seen Alice? Ain't like her to be gone this long.
translation: 你见到爱丽丝了吗？出门这么久不是她的风格啊。

original: Find anything?
translation: 有什么发现吗？

original: Did you see all the commotion at REPCONN? I hope that doesn't mean trouble for our town.
translation: 你瞧见瑞普康的那一通乱子了吗？希望不会给我们的镇子带来麻烦。

original: I could've sworn we were under attack. Did you see those rockets?
translation: 我敢肯定我们受到攻击了。你看见那些火箭没？

original: I really hope that incident at REPCONN doesn't drive people away. Novac was starting to do well!
translation: 真心希望瑞普康的事故不会把客人都吓跑。诺瓦克才刚开始有点起色！

original: All the noise at REPCONN scared the hell out of me.
translation: 瑞普康的动静可是把我给吓坏了。

original: Don't listen to a word No-bark says. I don't think he ever sleeps, so it's no wonder he spouts nothing but nonsense.
translation: 疯嘴说的话也能信？我觉得他是太长时间没睡觉了，所以才满嘴疯言疯语的。

original: Good thing none of those rockets crashed into Novac.
translation: 幸好那些火箭没有一头栽进诺瓦克。

original: Those rockets over at REPCONN were the NCR's doing. Trying to keep us scared so they can stick around to "protect" us.
translation: 那些从瑞普康头上飞过去的火箭准是NCR干的好事。他们就是想吓唬我们，好继续赖在这儿"保护"我们。

original: I don't remember getting informed about any new transfers to this post.
translation: 我不记得有通知说有人要调到这个哨站来。

original: This is a military post. You sure you're in the right place?
translation: 这里是军事驻地，你确定你没走错地方？

original: Is there something you need from me?
translation: 我能帮你什么？

original: You hear some crumb tried to kill the president of the NCR? Gutsy, baby. Real gutsy.
translation: 听说有些小混混想要暗杀NCR的总统？有种，宝贝。太有种了。

original: Don't get too close to Mr. Benny.
translation: 别往本尼先生身边凑。

original: No sudden moves around the boss, got it?
translation: 在老板身旁的时候老实点，懂了？

original: I got my eye on you, so no funny business.
translation: 我会盯着你的，别动歪脑筋。

original: Keep those hands where I can see 'em.
translation: 把手放在我能看见的地方。

original: I thought Benny was a stand up guy - hard to believe he was a fink all along.
translation: 我还以为本尼是个光明磊落的人——想不到他居然一直在密谋造反。

original: You hear some crazy crumb killed the president of the NCR? Gutsy, baby. Real gutsy.
translation: 你听说没，有个疯子杀了NCR的总统！有种啊，宝贝。太有种了。

original: Baby, you couldn't pay me enough to step off the Strip these days. Legion cats are out there thick as fleas on a dog, and they ain't no bums, neither.
translation: 宝贝儿，现在就算你倒贴钱给我，我也不会离开长街。外面的军团多得就跟狗身上的跳蚤一样，而且他们也不是什么等闲之辈。

original: House selling out to the NCR? Who woulda figured him for a fink?
translation: 豪斯把我们卖给NCR了？谁能想到他居然是叛徒？

original: No run-ins with the Great Khans, I hope? They've been more restless than usual.
translation: 没和大汗帮发生冲突吧？最近他们比以前更嚣张了。

original: This area isn't safe for civilians. You don't want to get caught by the Great Khans.
translation: 对平民来说，这个地区可不太平。小心别被大汗帮给撞见。

original: You're new here aren't you? Don't tell me we're actually going to get reinforcements.
translation: 你是新来的吧？可别告诉我你就是我们等待的援军。

original: Player wipes out Legion at Nelson
translation: 玩家在纳尔逊消灭了军团

original: Player wipes out NCR at Forlorn Hope
translation: 玩家在飘零希望消灭了NCR

original: Player wipes out both locations
translation: 玩家消灭了双方势力

original: 1st Recon transferred to Forlorn Hope
translation: 第一侦察营转移到了飘零希望

original: Ranger Station Charlie
translation: 游骑兵查理驻站

original: Boulder City Khans killed by NCR
translation: 巨石城的大汗帮被NCR杀了

original: Player killed Boulder City Khans
translation: 玩家杀了巨石城的大汗帮

original: The Khans escaped alive
translation: 大汗帮活着逃跑了

original: Primm led by new Sheriff
translation: 普瑞姆被新的治安官领导

original: Primm accepts NCR rule
translation: 普瑞姆接受了NCR的统治

original: Legion's dogs killed
translation: 军团的狗被杀

original: Rumors of Black Armor Rangers coming
translation: 黑甲游骑兵到来的谣言

original: Black Armor Rangers arrive
translation: 黑甲游骑兵抵达

original: Legion Veterans arrive
translation: 军团老兵抵达

original: Player has made a splash on the Strip
translation: 玩家在长街引起了轰动

original: Middle Game has begun
translation: 游戏到达了中期

original: Late game has begun
translation: 游戏到达了后期

original: Battle for Hoover dam available
translation: 胡佛水坝之战可用

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam
translation: 玩家赢得了胡佛水坝之战

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam, for the NCR
translation: 玩家帮助NCR赢得了胡佛水坝之战

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam, for Caesar's Legion
translation: 玩家帮助凯撒军团赢得了胡佛水坝之战

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam, for Mr. House
translation: 玩家帮助豪斯先生赢得了胡佛水坝之战

original: Player won Battle for Hoover Dam, for Independent Vegas with Securitrons
translation: 玩家赢得了胡佛水坝之战，利用安保机器人让维加斯独立了

original: Player assaulted The Tops Casino.
translation: 玩家攻击了九重天赌场。

original: Player killed Benny at The Tops.
translation: 玩家在九重天杀死了本尼。

original: Player caused Benny to flee the Strip.
translation: 玩家吓得本尼逃往长街。

original: Player survived Benny's ambush.
translation: 玩家中了本尼的埋伏，但是活了下来。

original: Player foiled RACKET.
translation: 玩家识破了骗局。

original: Player enters Lucky 38.
translation: 玩家进入了幸运38。

original: Securitrons on the Strip upgraded.
translation: 长街的安保机器人升级了。

original: Mr. House unplugged.
translation: 豪斯先生的导管被拔了。

original: Mr. House killed.
translation: 豪斯先生被杀死了。

original: Player has Mark of Caesar.
translation: 玩家拥有凯撒的徽记。

original: Caesar cured.
translation: 凯撒痊愈了。

original: Player known to have killed Caesar.
translation: 人们知道玩家杀了凯撒。

original: Caesar dies during operation.
translation: 凯撒死在手术台上了。

original: Caesar killed by lieutenants.
translation: 凯撒被上尉杀死了。

original: Player upgraded Securitron Army.
translation: 玩家升级了安保机器人军队。

original: Player destroyed Securitron Army.
translation: 玩家摧毁了安保机器人军队。

original: Monorail at McCarran destroyed, no NCR troops on Strip for 3 days
translation: 麦卡伦的列车被毁，长街3天都不会有NCR士兵

original: Monorail at McCarran destroyed, NCR troops start visiting again
translation: 麦卡伦的列车被毁，NCR士兵再次开始出现

original: Player frees Silas from McCarran
translation: 玩家从麦卡伦释放了西拉斯

original: Player saves President Kimball
translation: 玩家救下了金博尔总统

original: Player fails to kill President Kimball
translation: 玩家没能杀死金博尔总统

original: Player kills President Kimball
translation: 玩家杀了金博尔总统

original: President Kimball assassinated (player not a suspect)
translation: 金博尔总统被刺（玩家不是嫌疑犯）

original: Chief Hanlon dead, treason unexposed
translation: 军士长汉隆死了，叛国罪行未败露

original: Chief Hanlon dead, treason exposed
translation: 军士长汉隆死了，叛国罪行败露

original: Motor-Runner killed
translation: 轰鸣恶煞被杀

original: Fiend bosses killed
translation: 恶魔帮大佬被杀

original: Legion attacks Bitter Springs camp
translation: 军团进攻了苦泉营地

original: Great Khans join Caesar
translation: 大汗帮加入了军团

original: Great Khans sign treaty with NCR
translation: 大汗帮和NCR签订了协议

original: Great Khans leave the Mojave
translation: 大汗帮离开了莫哈维

original: Great Khans wiped out
translation: 大汗帮被消灭了

original: Kings wiped out (probably by NCR)
translation: 猫王帮被消灭了 (可能是NCR所为)

original: Kings resolve differences with NCR
translation: 猫王帮与NCR消除了分歧

original: You're not a part of this post as far as I know. What do you want?
translation: 据我所知，你并不是我们的人。你想要干什么？

original: You looking to join the Kings?
translation: 你想加入猫王帮？

original: Word on the street is that the leader of the Legion bought it. Too bad, someone was finally going to do something about all the NCR around here.
translation: 据说军团的首领死了。太糟了，我还指望有人能收拾这里的NCR呢。

original: You hear how Mr. House said "uncle?" Vegas is gonna join the NCR. So much for Freeside.
translation: 你听见豪斯先生是怎么"认输"的没有？维加斯就要加入NCR了。自由城离那一天也不远了。

original: I can't believe someone stopped the NCR president from getting killed. If anyone deserves it, it's that jerk.
translation: 不敢相信居然有人阻止了针对NCR总统的暗杀行动。依我看，那家伙最该死了。

original: Someone took a shot at the NCR president, but the lucky bastard got away. Oh well, it was a good try.
translation: 有人朝着NCR总统来了一枪，但那家伙狗屎运，躲开了。好吧，吓吓他也挺不错。

original: Hey, did you hear the NCR president got whacked? Good for whoever did it, I say. Couldn't have happened to a nicer guy.
translation: 嘿，你听说NCR总统遇袭的事没有？活该，这就是报应。不管是谁干的，我要为他叫声好。

original: There's mutterings from the NCR people around here that some local hero of theirs died. Whatever.
translation: 据附近NCR的人说，他们有个平民英雄死了。管他呢。

original: Turns out some military hero the Squatters admired was actually a slimeball. An NCR soldier who's actually a dick? Who would've thought?
translation: 没想到那帮流民崇拜的英雄居然是个混蛋。谁想得到哟？NCR军队内部竟然还能出败类？

original: Great, just when you think the NCR can't possibly sink their claws deeper, the town of Primm signs up to join the Republic.
translation: 棒极了，本以为NCR的爪子不会再伸长，谁知一转眼普瑞姆就加入了共和国。

original: Word is those tough guy rangers are here. I ain't seen them myself, but how scary can they be?
translation: 据说那些凶悍的游骑兵已经到了。我还没亲眼看见他们，不过他们能恐怖到哪去呢？

original: Hey, isn't that the King's dog?
translation: 嘿，这不是猫王的狗吗？

original: Heya Rex, how you doing boy?
translation: 你好呀，雷克斯，你还好吗？

original: I see you've hired a Follower doctor. Smart move, Freeside being what it is.
translation: 我看见你雇的天启追随者医生了。明智之举，自由城人就该帮自由城人...

original: That friend of yours NCR? He looks like he's NCR.
translation: 你那个朋友是NCR的吗？他看着就像NCR的。

original: Hellooo, cowgirl! You mind if I talk to your lady friend a bit instead of you?
translation: 噫呀，牛仔姑娘！介意我和你的美女朋友聊两句吗？

original: Huh. Nice robot. You with the Followers or something?
translation: 呵。这机器人挺不错呀。你是天启追随者的人？

original: Whoa. That's a whole lotta mutant you got with you there. Still, long as it doesn't cause trouble it's all good.
translation: 哇哦，你身边居然跟了一个这么高大的变种人。算了，只要它别惹麻烦就没问题。

original: Nice to see a human palling around with a Ghoul. I see a lot of people around here avoid them.
translation: 人类与尸鬼和睦相处，这场面真温馨。我们这儿的多数人对他们可是避之不及呢。

original: Your girl's kinda cute, but not my type at all. I don't go for smart chicks.
translation: 你马子还挺可爱的，可惜不是我中意的类型。我不喜欢太精明的姑娘。

original: Thank god the Followers are here. I'd probably be dead now if it weren't for their doctors.
translation: 感谢上帝，这儿还有天启追随者。要不是他们的医生，我早就死了。

original: What the hell? You're that courier Benny wasted back in Goodsprings. You're supposed to be dead.
translation: 活见鬼了！你是那个在清泉镇吃了本尼枪子的邮差。你不是应该死了吗？

original: I'm getting real tired of talking.
translation: 我现在真的没心情和别人说话。

original: How are the negotiations with the Great Khans going?
translation: 你和大汗帮谈得怎么样了？

original: The Great Khans can go, just as we agreed.
translation: 大汗帮的人可以走了，就按商量好的条件。

original: Thanks for getting both of my people out of there.
translation: 感谢你把我的两个人都救了出来。

original: I'm sorry that you couldn't get both hostages out alive, but that's how it goes sometimes. Thanks for your help.
translation: 很遗憾你没能把两个人质都救出来，但有时候现实就是这样。谢谢你的帮助。

original: I'm sorry you couldn't get either hostage out alive, but that's how it goes sometimes. Thanks for your help.
translation: 很遗憾你没能把人质救出来，但有时候现实就是这样。谢谢你的帮助。

original: I really don't have time to chatter right now.
translation: 我现在真的没空和你闲聊。

original: Dawes said he let somebody in. So, you going to give me a reason not to kill you and throw your body back outside?
translation: 道斯说他放了个人进来。你最好能给我个理由，不然我就宰了你，再把尸体扔出去。

original: You're the one Cobb mentioned. Maybe you feel like helping us out around here.
translation: 你就是科布提起过的那个人。也许你会愿意帮助我们脱离险境。

original: I've been thinking that since you've been good to us, we can be good to you.
translation: 我一直在想，既然你对我们好，我们也应该对你好。

original: We've got plenty of spare powder and dynamite around. Say the word and we can give you some of it every couple days.
translation: 我们这附近的火药和炸药管够。只要你说话，我们每隔几天就能送一些给你。

original: Hey, I've been sent to tell you that, while you're not exactly a friend, we know you've helped us out some all the same.
translation: 嗨，有人让我给你带个话，虽然你不能算是朋友，但我们一直记着你帮了我们。

original: We figure some kind of truce is in order. As long as you don't come too close to any of our camps, we'll let you pass without trying to kill you.
translation: 看来咱们应该暂时休战。只要你别太靠近我们的营地，我们可以让你安全通过。

original: Of course, the truce is off once we know you're an enemy.
translation: 当然，如果你表现出敌意，那就别怪我们动手了。

original: Got nothing else to say to you.
translation: 没什么和你说的。

original: What the hell are you doing here? Civilians shouldn't be here.
translation: 你他妈到这来干什么？好市民不该在这里出现。

original: You should go topside.
translation: 你该回上面去。

original: Hello there! Welcome to the Crimson Caravan Company. How can I help you today?
translation: 你好！欢迎来到深红商队公司。有什么能为你效劳的吗？

original: I hope you're not planning on visiting the Strip.
translation: 希望你不是打算要去长街。

original: Humph... I see a lot of folks come and go, but none fit your type. Where you come from, stranger?
translation: 嗯……我见过形形色色的人，不过你倒是个异类。你从哪里来，陌生人？

original: You again? Get outta here, smoothface.
translation: 又是你？滚出去，滑皮肤。

original: What... what have I done!? Mother...
translation: 我……我都干了什么！？妈妈……

original: NCR, no better than common thieves. Where do they get off stealing our armor?
translation: NCR，跟小偷没什么区别。他们什么时候才能不再偷我们的护甲 ?

original: Caesar on the cross, been a long time since I've seen the kind of work you've laid down today... a damn long time.
translation: 凯撒兵败身死，我已经好久没见过有人能像你今天这样……立下卓越的战功。

original: And the screams of those Legion bastards as they kicked dirt running East... like a choir of angels to my ears.
translation: 听听那些军团渣滓们仓皇逃回老家时的哀嚎吧……对我来说简直就像天籁。

original: Speaking of - that crazy lightshow over the Fort, what the fuck was that, some kind of thumb of God you called down? Amazing, fucking amazing.
translation: 说到这个，城堡上的那场烟火秀到底是他妈怎么回事，难道连上帝都被你招来显灵了？漂亮，太他妈漂亮了。

original: Could use a hundred of you, just scatter you over the East like jacks, give those plumed fucks the what-for.
translation: 要是能给我一百个像你这样的士兵，把你们全派到东部去，岂不是能把他们翻个底朝天。

original: As if I didn't have enough to worry about, one of our facilities was recently broken into and its power diverted.
translation: 估计老天爷嫌我的烦心事还不够多，最近我们有一间设施遭到入侵，电力也被截流了。

original: Have you seen that damned tower in the Strip, all aglow? Of course you've seen it. Everyone's seen it.
translation: 你看到长街那座该死的塔了么，就是灯火通明的那座？你肯定看到了。谁都看得到。

original: That was our power that did that, and I will find out who did it. Did you have something to report?
translation: 我们的电就是被送到那儿去了，我一定会查出来是谁干的好事。你有什么要报告的？

original: Have you discovered what the Omertas are up to?
translation: 你搞清楚黑手党到底在打什么主意了吗？

original: You are the courier Lord Caesar has spoken of. The slaughter begins, then.
translation: 你就是凯撒大人提到的那个邮差了。看来屠杀可以开始了。

original: We are executing your commands.
translation: 我们正在执行你的命令。

original: An envoy of Vegas, yet you carry yourself for battle. If so, you cannot *truly* be of that city of cowards.
translation: 一位维加斯的使节，但你依然勇敢地投身战场。这样看来，你与城里那帮懦夫截然不同。

original: And who are you to come before me... you don't bear the mark of the Bear, yet you are ready for battle.
translation: 站在我跟前的这位又是何人……你身上虽然没有狗熊的标志，可你却也做好了与我们决一死战的准备。

original: What is this Brahmin shit? I'm not getting the feeling we're all about to sing kumbaya here.
translation: 这他娘又唱的哪出。我有种不详的预感，这帮家伙肯定不是来和我们搞联欢的。

original: Should have known, Greeks and gifts. That, and next time, shoot the messenger.
translation: 我就知道，黄鼠狼给鸡拜年。下次，见到送信的就直接打死。

original: I think those Nightkin are going to cause a lot of trouble, but I guess giving them the specs was better than killing them.
translation: 虽然我也认为那些夜行族是烫手的山芋，不过把实验型设备给他们总比杀了他们强。

original: I did get a lot of useful data from the experiment, and I'm much closer to a cure than I was before.
translation: 通过实验我获得了大量的有效数据，我感觉自己就快要成功了。

original: It's occurred to me that this brief test might not yield a cure any time soon. However, if Lily were to continue to wear the prototype...
translation: 我早就知道这样的简单实验难以在短时间内帮助我们找出有效的治疗手段。但如果莉莉能继续穿着原型机的话…

original: Hi there. Welcome to the Westside Co-op. I'm Clayton Etienne. Let me know if you have any questions.
translation: 你好。欢迎来到西区合作社。我是克莱顿·埃迪尼。如果你有什么不清楚的，尽管问我。

original: Welcome back. How can I help you?
translation: 欢迎回来。需要点什么？

original: Uh... hi.
translation: 呃……嗨。

original: Cooke left the vault, good thing too, he was going to get us all killed.
translation: 库克离开了避难所，这真是个好消息，我们不会被他全害死了。

original: Cooke is going to get us all killed.
translation: 库克会把我们全害死。

original: Lem wants to run back to the NCR and turn himself in, spineless bastard.
translation: 莱姆打算找NCR自首，软骨头的废物。

original: Hadn't heard there were women Powder Gangers, but a bounty's a bounty. The NCR will probably pay up either way.
translation: 虽然没听说过炸药帮里还有女的，不过悬赏就是悬赏。NCR不管男女都会照付。

original: I'm kind of busy, what do you want?
translation: 我有点忙，你有什么事？

original: If you're looking for Ambassador Crocker, he's not here. He was removed from office and sent home.
translation: 如果你想找克罗克大使，他不在。他已经被革职回家了。

original: I guess they disagreed with how he handled some of the events out here. It's unfortunate. He was a good man.
translation: 我想上级可能对他在部分事务上的做法有些不满。可惜了，他人还挺不错的。

original: Keep your nose clean on the Strip, soldier.
translation: 别在长街惹是非，士兵。

original: Aren't you the guy that was shooting up The Tops?
translation: 你就是大闹九重天的那个家伙吧？

original: Guess you must have some special deal with House to be able to do that and not get in trouble.
translation: 你肯定是跟豪斯签了什么特别协议，不然你闯了那么大的祸，怎么可能安然无恙。

original: Holy shit, did you hear about the Monorail being destroyed? How the fuck did that happen?
translation: 妈的，你是来调查铁路被炸毁的事的吗？这他妈到底是怎么回事？

original: I'm just glad to be safe over here on the Strip.
translation: 还好我一直在长街，这里很安全。

original: I don't want any trouble, mister. What do you want?
translation: 别惹麻烦，先生。你有什么事？

original: Don't miss The Lonesome Drifter, LIVE at the Aces Theater!
translation: 别错过《寂寞流浪汉》，王牌剧场正在上演！

original: Songs so sad and lonesome, audience members of the opposite sex will be fighting over who gets to go back to the room with you - guaranteed!
translation: 歌声惆怅寂寥，所有异性观众听了都会为和你同房而互不相让——我敢打包票！

original: Ready to tap your toes and snap your fingers? Don't miss Bruce Isaac, LIVE at the Ace Theater!
translation: 想跟着节拍摇摆吗？别错过《布鲁斯·艾萨克》，王牌剧场正在上演！

original: "Fuck off, ass-breath!" You've already heard my spiel - you really gotta go see Hadrian!
translation: "滚开，臭嘴！"——既然你听见我吆喝了，那你就该去看哈德良的演出！

original: "Pull my finger, please!"
translation: "来，臭屁来袭！"

original: See Billy Knight, King of the One-Liners - LIVE at the Aces Theater! If you miss it, you'll "Take your life, please!"
translation: 段子王比利·奈特，就在王牌剧场！错过一下子，后悔"一辈子！"

original: "I bet you could stop gambling!" See Billy Knight, King of the One-Liners, LIVE at the Aces Theater! "I had amnesia once - I think!"
translation: "我打赌你能戒赌！"段子王比利·奈特，就在王牌剧场！"我得过一次失忆症——我记得可清楚啦！"

original: It's good to see such an outstanding citizen of the NCR. What can I do for you, my friend?
translation: NCR能涌现出你这样的英雄，真是太好了。我能为你做些什么，朋友？

original: I bet it feels real nice to be carrying those weapons around on the Strip.
translation: 我敢打赌，能带着武器在长街转悠，那感觉肯定很棒。

original: That damn Mr. House has forbid any NCR military personnel from carrying any sort of firearms on the Strip. Well, except for Captain Pappas.
translation: 该死的豪斯先生禁止NCR的军事人员携带任何武器进入长街。呃，除了帕帕斯队长。

original: Mr. House still doesn't trust the NCR. A word of advice, the Securitrons won't put up with any funny stuff out there, so don't do anything stupid.
translation: 豪斯先生还是不信任NCR。给你个建议：那些电子保安可不是摆设，千万别干傻事。

original: This your first time on the Strip?
translation: 你是第一次来长街吗？

original: Hello. Did you need something?
translation: 你好。需要什么？

original: What do you want?
translation: 你想要什么？

original: Don't talk to me, rookie!
translation: 别跟我说话，菜鸟！

original: They're all dead. Guy must've had some kind of explosive on him, set off all the ordnance in this place at once.
translation: 他们都死了。那个家伙肯定在身上绑了炸药，一下把这里全炸开了花。

original: Congratulations, rookie. You just cost me my job. Don't think I don't appreciate it.
translation: 祝贺你，菜鸟。你帮我省了不少事。我还是要感谢你的。

original: I was just telling Gloria about your performance. Hell of a first day, huh?
translation: 我刚还在和格罗利亚说你的表现呢。第一天就吃了不少苦头啊？

original: As I live and breathe, Rose of Sharon Cassidy. The late Rose of Sharon Cassidy. Was hoping you were on that caravan I massacred, but...
translation: 真是百闻不如一见啊，罗撒香·盖西迪。凋谢的罗撒香·盖西迪。我本以为会在商队的尸体堆里见到你，但……

original: Crimson Caravan and Van Graffs won't need to worry about you anymore, Mojave's ours, and we're shutting you down for good.
translation: 深红商队和范·格拉夫家族不必再担心你了，莫哈维是我们的，今天就是你的死期。

original: Ah, just the person I was looking for. Your name came up in a discussion we had recently.
translation: 啊，真是巧了，我们刚才还聊到你了。

original: My sister is very impressed with you so far, but I'm not. I don't think you have what it takes to work for this family.
translation: 迄今为止我妹妹对你的印象都不错，但我却相反。我觉得你缺少一种为我们家族工作所需要的品质。

original: Luckily for you, I'm going to give you the chance to prove me wrong. What do you say? Want to make some real money?
translation: 不过你很走运，我打算给你一个机会来证明自己。你怎么说？想不想赚点正经钱？

original: Eh? You want something?
translation: 嗯？你要干什么？

original: Well, looks like you came through after all. She's not half bad looking, is she? It's almost a shame...
translation: 哎呀，看来你还是走到这一步了。她长得挺俊的，不是么？可惜了……

original: Crimson Caravan and Van Graffs won't need to worry about you anymore, Mojave's ours, we're shutting you down for good.
translation: 深红商队和范·格拉夫家族不必再担心你了，莫哈维是我们的，今天就是你的死期。

original: I don't understand - the machine was supposed to cure Caesar. You did this - his blood is on your hands.
translation: 我不理解，这台机器能本该治好凯撒的。是你干的——你手上沾满了他的血。

original: It is a great honor for anyone outside the Legion to get an audience with Caesar.
translation: 作为一名外人，能够得到凯撒的接见，真是莫大的荣幸啊。

original: You've proven yourself to be a true friend of the Legion. We have a safehouse available to our agents in the Mojave - here's the key.
translation: 你已经证明了你是军团真正的朋友。莫哈维有座安全屋是专为我们的特工准备的，这是钥匙。

original: It's an excellent place to rest and store extra equipment. In addition, one of our veterans, Atticus, visits the house every few days.
translation: 你可以在那里放心休息，存放多余的装备。另外，阿提卡斯，我们的一位老兵，每隔几天就会去那里一趟。

original: While he's there, you can acquire items useful for stealthy operations against our enemies from him.
translation: 他去的时候，你可以在他那里获取执行隐秘行动所需要的物资。

original: The mechanical dog you have with you - where did you get it?
translation: 你的那只机械狗，是从哪搞来的？

original: A woman actually proved useful for once. Caesar was bold to put his life in your hands.
translation: 终于有个女人证明自己的价值了。凯撒敢把自己的性命交到你手里，也真是胆大。

original: The eyes of the mighty Caesar are upon you. He appreciates your service, and bestows upon you the exceptional gift of his Mark.
translation: 伟大的凯撒始终注视着你。他感谢你一直以来尽忠职守，因而决定将他的徽记赐予你作为赠礼。

original: My Lord requires your presence at his camp, at Fortification Hill. His Mark will guarantee your safe-conduct through our lands.
translation: 我的主人想请你去他在堡垒山的营地一叙。他的徽记将确保你在我们的领地内畅通无阻。

original: The eyes of the mighty Caesar are upon you. He admires your accomplishments, and bestows upon you the exceptional gift of his Mark.
translation: 伟大的凯撒一直在注视着你。他很赞赏你所取得的成就，因而决定将他的徽记赐予你作为赠礼。

original: Any crimes you may have perpetrated against the Legion are hereby forgiven. Caesar will not extend this mercy a second time.
translation: 你对军团犯下的所有罪行都将在此被宽恕。凯撒的仁慈只会展现一次。

original: My Lord requires your presence at his camp, at Fortification Hill. His Mark will guarantee your safe-conduct through our lands.
translation: 我的主人想请你去他在堡垒山的营地一叙。他的徽记将确保你在我们的领地内畅通无阻。

original: You may go.
translation: 你可以走了。

original: Let's get going, we have a battle to win.
translation: 咱们动身吧，还有一场胜利在等着我们呢。

original: If I had any idea Moreno was capable of doing something like that, I'd have warned you. I'm sorry it played out like this.
translation: 要是我知道莫雷诺会做这种事，肯定会提醒你的。事情闹到这一步真的很抱歉。

original: I'm not sure helping the Legion is the right idea. But, I'm going along with it.
translation: 不知道帮助军团是不是正确的选择。不过我会服从命令的。

original: Keep your head down - could be snipers around.
translation: 别抬头——附近可能有狙击手。

original: I admire your bravery, but coming down here after what you've done is just foolish. So be it, Legion dog!
translation: 我敬佩你的勇气，但你干了坏事之后还敢来这里，简直是愚蠢。来吧，军团狗！

original: We're watching you... stranger!
translation: 我们会盯着你的……陌生人！

original: Don't fuck with the caged beasts.
translation: 别去挑逗笼子里的那些野兽。

original: Follow the rules of The Thorn.
translation: 遵守荆棘街的规矩。

original: Don't feed the creatures.
translation: 别喂那些动物。

original: Nowhere else will you find something like The Thorn.
translation: 你在别处是绝对找不到荆棘街这样的地方的。

original: Take advice. Don't break the rules. And we won't kill you.
translation: 记住：别破坏规矩。否则我们就要你的命。

original: Come to see the fights, or Red Lucy?
translation: 是来观战的，还是来找血手露西的？

original: Enjoy the show, and don't give us a reason to shoot you, okay?
translation: 好好欣赏表演，别给我们开枪的理由，好吗？

original: Be advised, NCR President Aaron Kimball was struck down in a cowardly attack at Hoover Dam.
translation: 请注意, NCR总统亚伦·金博尔在胡佛水坝遭暴徒袭击后不幸身亡。

original: The Strip offers many fine cocktail lounges where grieving persons may drown their sorrows.
translation: 长街各家鸡尾酒沙龙皆可供诸位伤心人共寄哀思。

original: Welcome to Vegas. Don't make trouble.
translation: 欢迎光临维加斯。请遵纪守法。

original: Thanks for freeing the deputy. A bit, anyway.
translation: 感谢你救出了副警长。虽然也没什么好谢的。

original: Thanks for freeing Deputy Beagle. He's better than nothing. Maybe.
translation: 感谢你救出了副警长比格尔。有他总比没有强。也许吧。

original: I hear you're going to help find Primm a new sheriff. Mighty kind of you to take an interest.
translation: 听说你正在帮普瑞姆物色新警长。真是非常感谢你的好意。

original: So you're the one's going to bring the law back to Primm? I'll believe it when I see it.
translation: 你会给普瑞姆找个新执法官？我只能说眼见才为实。

original: Thanks for bringing the NCR to town, stranger. Things're finally looking up for Primm.
translation: 感谢你让NCR来管理城镇，陌生人。普瑞姆的情况终于开始好转了。

original: Thanks to you I got a mess of soldiers watching every move I make, plus I got to pay taxes for the privilege!
translation: 托你的福，现在无论我想干点什么事，都会有一堆士兵盯着我，而我还得为这个特权缴税！

original: This new Sheriff Meyers you brought to us is a lawman through and through. Primm's looking up, stranger.
translation: 你带回来的这个新警长迈尔斯是个刚正不阿的执法官。普瑞姆的情况开始好转了，陌生人。

original: Thanks for convincing Meyers to come sheriff for us. First time I feel safe in a long time.
translation: 谢谢你说服迈尔斯来给我们担任警长。这么久以来，我第一次有了安全感。

original: You're back. Do you need medical attention?
translation: 你回来了。需要医疗服务吗？

original: If you're looking for supplies, Chet over at the general store can help you out.
translation: 如果你要买东西，杂货店的切特能帮上你。

original: My gang's here, but we'll still need a plan before we rush the town. I don't want to embarrass myself and get beat by a bunch of townies.
translation: 我的人到齐了，不过在进攻这个小镇之前我们还是得先想出个计划。我可不想冲进去被居民一顿暴打，那多丢面子啊。

original: We ain't got much in the way of supplies, so if you could shake down the old doctor and the store owner for some stuff, we'd be in good shape.
translation: 我们的补给有限，所以如果能敲上那个老医生和店主人一笔，我们的情况应该会大有改观。

original: Once you're done with that stuff - or none of it - say the word and we'll make our move.
translation: 这些事情，不管你最后搞定还是没搞定，都告诉我一声，我们就开始行动。

original: So, you're planning on taking on Joe Cobb's gang. It's a big risk, but I suppose you have to do what you think is right.
translation: 好吧，看来你是打定主意要和乔·科布的人动手了。这么做的风险可不小，但想必你也有自己的理由吧。

original: I hope you didn't just bring a heap of trouble down on Goodsprings by killing Joe Cobb like that.
translation: 希望你不会因为杀了乔·科布而给清泉镇带来麻烦。

original: His friends might come looking for him, and I don't think they're going to care who was involved in his death or not.
translation: 他的朋友可能会来找他，依我之见，他们可不会在乎这儿的人与他的死究竟有没有关系。

original: Well, what's done is done. So, uh, what can I do for you?
translation: 好吧，反正木已成舟。那么，呃，你想要点什么？

original: I'm glad that business is over. I like it when Goodsprings is nice and quiet.
translation: 很高兴事情都了结了。我喜欢安详美丽的清泉镇。

original: Can't do business now! There's a gunfight!
translation: 现在不做生意！有枪战 !

original: Thank you!
translation: 谢谢你！

original: We showed them a thing or two.
translation: 我们好好教训了他们一顿。

original: A little payback feels real good.
translation: 报仇的感觉真好。

original: These bastards got what they deserved.
translation: 这些混蛋活该。

original: This has been a long time coming. The rest of the Legion better watch out.
translation: 这一刻终于来了。军团剩下的人最好都小心点。

original: It's hard to stay awake on watch with only a few hours of sleep. I wish we actually had some time to rest around here.
translation: 只有几小时睡眠时间，还要保持清醒放哨，太难受了。我真的希望我们有时间休息。

original: Private Sexton was thinking of having a contest to see who can kill the most Legion. I wonder if he ever got that going.
translation: 列兵塞克斯顿想举办一场军团猎杀比赛。也不知道他办起来没有。

original: I heard you won Private Sexton's Legion killing contest. Nice job, that'll teach those Legion bastards!
translation: 听说你赢下了列兵塞克斯顿举办的军团猎杀比赛。干得好，你给那些军团杂种好好上了一课！

original: Holy shit! Did you hear that Caesar is dead? Maybe we actually have a fighting chance now.
translation: 我的天！你听说凯撒已经死了吗？也许我们现在有翻身的机会了。

original: I hear we got reinforced by the troops that were in Boulder City. It's good to have some extra support around here.
translation: 听说巨石城的增援已经到了。能有帮手真好。

original: I hear more troops are gathering at Hoover Dam. Things are probably going to get pretty messy over there real soon.
translation: 听说还有更多部队再往胡佛水坝集结。看来很快就会爆发一场血战的。

original: The Legion is torturing captive troopers in Nelson. I'd rather die fighting than be captured.
translation: 军团正在折磨纳尔逊被俘的士兵。我宁愿战死也不想被俘。

original: Quartermaster Mayes was yelling at us about rationing again. Where does the guy get the energy to yell so much while on rations?
translation: 军需官迈厄斯又在冲着我们吼什么定量配给。你说都定量配给了，那家伙哪来那么大力气吼人？

original: I got bit by one of those dirty dogs the Legion has. I wonder if they've got rabies... maybe I should see Dr. Richards.
translation: 我被军团的那些脏狗给咬了。不会得狂犬病吧……我得找理查兹医生给看看。

original: Major Polatli is putting everyone on double shifts to make up for recent losses to the Legion. That guy never gives up.
translation: 波拉特里少校给所有人都排了双班岗，以弥补最近我们在与军团作战中损失的人力。那家伙真是不饶人啊。

original: I can't wait for General Oliver to get out here. He could turn this place around.
translation: 我真希望奥利弗将军能早点来。他肯定能扭转乾坤。

original: I don't know how we're going to hold off the Legion here and at Hoover Dam, we just don't have the manpower.
translation: 真不知道该怎么在这里和胡佛水坝挡住军团，我们人手真的不够。

original: I heard Private Stone was caught stealing medical supplies. I always hated that guy.
translation: 听说列兵斯通在偷医疗用品时被抓了个正着。我一直都很讨厌那家伙。

original: Don't listen to a word No-bark says. He spouts nothing but nonsense.
translation: 疯嘴说的话一个字都不能信，他只会满嘴胡说八道。

original: Good thing none of those rockets crashed into Novac.
translation: 好消息是没有一枚火箭在诺瓦克坠毁。

original: Hell of a thing for Boone to kill Ranger Andy like that.
translation: 布恩怎么把游骑兵安迪给杀了。

original: The McBrides think some mysterious creature is shooting up their Brahmin. Gotta be somebody in town doing it.
translation: 麦克布莱德家的人总觉得有什么神秘生物在袭击他们家的双头牛。肯定是镇上的人干的。

original: Perimeter's been quiet since you left. The Fiends are running scared. I doubt they'll give us any more trouble, not for a long while.
translation: 你离开以后周边都还算太平。恶魔帮都被吓跑了。我猜他们得有一段时间不敢露面了。

original: I haven't got any more bounties for you. It's been quiet and calm since you last reported in. Just how I like it.
translation: 我再没有其他悬赏任务可以给你了。自从你上次向我报告之后，一切都很太平。我就喜欢这样。

original: I heard you killed Driver Nephi. My team would've liked to get a shot at him... but we're still glad he's dead.
translation: 我听说你干掉了球杆尼法。虽然我的手下很想亲自给他来一枪……不过我们还是很高兴他已经死了。

original: K-killing some Fiends? Shit, yeah! It's about t-t-time!
translation: 你弄、弄死了恶魔帮的杂碎？操，就是这样！也该、该是时候了！

original: Shit. I didn't even get a shot at that Nephi b-b-bastard before he went down.
translation: 操、操了。我一下都没打中尼法那个混、混、混蛋。

original: Right here, Fiends! This is what payback looks like! First Recon, hooah!
translation: 就是这样，恶魔帮的杂碎们！这才是真正的复仇！第一侦察营，万岁！

original: What a pointless trip. Here I thought I'd get a shot at that junkie bastard.
translation: 真是白跑一趟。我还以为能给那个杂碎来一枪呢。

original: I've been seeing Usanagi, and things are better. I'm not so angry all the time, you know? And, uh, I'm not trying to jump every woman in camp.
translation: 我已经去见过宇佐木了，情况好些了。其实我也不爱老发脾气，你懂吗？此外，呃，我以后再也不会对营地里的女性下手了。

original: Well, not all the time, anyway.
translation: 嗯，当然不是绝对。

original: Took some skills to bring down that Fiend. You done good.
translation: 三两下就把那个恶魔帮的杂碎干掉了。干得漂亮。

original: Wish I'd gotten a bullet in that Fiend...
translation: 真希望是我一枪崩了那个恶魔帮的杂碎……

original: Never lost a CO before. It doesn't feel right.
translation: 我以前从来没失去过长官。这真让人不舒服。

original: Yes? What is it?
translation: 是吗？什么事？

original: Look, this isn't a great ti- oh, what the hell, it's not like we're making any progress. I'm Ibsen, and I hope your day is going better than mine is.
translation: 听着，现在可不是什——嘿，搞什么鬼，看来我们根本没取得什么进展。我是易卜生，希望你今天不会像我过得一样糟。

original: Welcome to the range. Feel free to use any open lane.
translation: 欢迎来到靶场。你可以随意使用空的射击位。

original: The lockdown is lifted! The patrols are going to start up again! Do you know what this means? I'll actually be able to get into a real fight!
translation: 封锁解除了！巡逻队又要出发啦！你知道这意味着什么吗？我终于可以真刀真枪地干一场啦！

original: I wonder what it'll be against? Raiders? Radscorpions? Deathclaws? Oh, I can't wait. So what's up?
translation: 不知道在外面都会碰到些什么？掠夺者？辐射蝎？还是死亡爪？噢，我都等不及啦。对了，你有什么事？

original: Hey, so Hardin becoming Elder was because of you, huh? Good job. Now that the lockdown is lifted, I may get a chance to get into a real fight!
translation: 嘿，原来哈丁是仰仗你才当上长老的啊？干得好。现在只要封锁一解除，我就有机会来一次实战了！

original: I wonder what it'll be against? Raiders? Radscorpions? Deathclaws? Oh, I can't wait. So what's up?
translation: 不知道在外面都会碰到些什么？掠夺者？辐射蝎？还是死亡爪？噢，我都等不及啦。对了，什么事？

original: Yeah?
translation: 嗯？

original: Listen up. I'm in charge of security around here, and I can't say I'm too happy about having an outsider waltzing around.
translation: 听好了。我负责这里的安保工作，有个外来者在附近晃来晃去的我可高兴不起来。

original: But since you came in with Veronica, I'm inclined to cut you a little slack. Just behave yourself and we won't have any problems, okay?
translation: 不过既然你是和维罗尼卡一起来的，我可以对你稍微网开一面。管好你自己，这样大家都轻松，明白吗？

original: Oh, and the Elder's going to want to talk to you. He's on the second level. Just take a right once you get down there.
translation: 噢，还有，长老想和你谈谈。他在二层。你下楼梯后右转就到。

original: My office is right here in case you need anything. Just ask for Ramos.
translation: 如果你有什么需要找我的，我的办公室就在这儿。说找拉莫斯就行。

original: Your presence here... Let's just say it's highly irregular.
translation: 你的出现……只能说非常地不寻常。

original: Outsiders aren't even allowed to know that our bunker's here, let alone come and go freely.
translation: 外来者甚至都不可能知道我们的地堡在这儿，更别说来去自如了。

original: You impressed Elder McNamara, obviously. He must believe that you'd be very useful.
translation: 显然你让麦克纳马拉长老印象深刻啊。他肯定是觉得你会派上大用场。

original: Shhh. I thought I heard something up by the entrance.
translation: 嘘。我好像听见门口有动静。

original: Powder Ganger scum! Hands up or die!
translation: 炸药帮的杂碎！快投降！否则格杀勿论！

original: Thought you'd sneak up on me, you filthy Powder Ganger?
translation: 你以为靠偷袭就能干得了我吗，炸药帮的贱狗？

original: Sorry, outsider, but I'm not allowed to sell you anything without the Elder's say so.
translation: 对不起，外来者，没有长老的允许，我不能卖东西给你。

original: Besides, I'm a little busy right now.
translation: 况且，我眼下有点忙。

original: At least with the lockdown lifted I'll be able to resupply my store more often. So what are you here for?
translation: 真不敢相信哈丁现在居然成了长老。但至少解除封锁以后我的货源更广了。那么，你想买点什么？

original: Have you heard the news? Elder McNamara has lifted the lockdown! Good news for this store, let me tell you. I can't wait to start getting more goods.
translation: 你听说没有？麦克纳马拉长老解除了封锁！要我说，这对我的小店来说真是好消息！我都等不及要去搞些更好的货品来了。

original: So what are you here for?
translation: 那么，你想买点什么？

original: The word came down from the Elder that I'm to offer you some of our lesser wares, as if I didn't have other matters on my mind.
translation: 长老发话说我可以向你提供一些小型商品，可我手头上的事情还多着呢。

original: Hello, you must be the outsider everyone's talking about. I'm Linda Schuler. If you ever need medical attention, this is the place to come.
translation: 你好，你肯定就是那个大家都在谈论的外来者吧。我是琳达·舒勒。如果你需要医护，可以随时来找我。

original: Hey, stranger! Where ya been, uh? I missed you!
translation: 嘿，陌生人！你去哪了，嗯？我想你了！

original: Well, well! If it isn't the Vault explorer himself! Welcome back.
translation: 哎呀！这不是我们的避难所探险家么！欢迎回来。

original: Well, well! If it isn't the Vault explorer herself! Welcome back.
translation: 哎呀！这不是我们的避难所探险家么！欢迎回来。

original: What are you doing here!? I don't want to be near you ever again! Leave, leave... just leave, okay!?
translation: 你在这干什么？！我不想再见到你！走开，走开……快走开，行不行？！

original: Behave, and don't give me a reason to kick you out.
translation: 守规矩，别让我把你轰出去。

original: Wow... I've never seen anyone go into the Lucky 38 before.
translation: 哇哦……我还真没见过有谁能进入幸运38的。

original: Don't mind me. I was just passing by.
translation: 不用理我。我就路过。

original: I bet everyone's going to hear about you going into the 38.
translation: 我打赌你进入幸运38的事很快就会传开。

original: My pals said nobody has ever been inside the Lucky 38.
translation: 我的哥们都说从来没有人进过幸运38。

original: Hey, sexy, come by the Tops later. I'd love to hear your story.
translation: 嘿，性感美人，等会来九重天吧。我很想听听你的故事。

original: We've got nothing left to talk about.
translation: 我们没什么好谈的。

original: Well look at that! You aren't a Powder Ganger after all. I'd suggest against wearing that outfit around the townsfolk. You may get shot by accident.
translation: 嗨呀，瞧啊！原来你不是炸药帮的人。我建议你平时在镇上还是不要穿着这身衣服了，你可能会莫名挨枪子的。

original: I don't suppose you came here to rescue me?
translation: 我想你不是来这儿救我的吧？

original: What is it?
translation: 这是什么？

original: Well, if there was any question on whether I should leave, I guess there's my answer.
translation: 如果对于我是否应该离开还有什么疑问，我想这就是我的答案。

original: Why did you do that? They were going to let us walk away. Why did you attack them?
translation: 你为什么要那样做？他们都要放我们走了。你为什么要攻击他们？

original: I don't care that they started it. What you did was inexcusable. You need to go.
translation: 不管是谁先动的手，你做的事都是无法原谅的。你走吧。

original: Clearly you're determined to fight the Brotherhood. Well, you can add my name to your hit list because you're on your own.
translation: 显然你是决定和兄弟会为敌了。很好，把我的名字也加进你的黑名单里吧，从今往后你就自己干。

original: Pretty addictive, right? You do it once, it just makes you want to do it more.
translation: 看吧？相当过瘾，对吧？你只要做过第一次就会想做第二次。

original: You can't help but notice that the Brotherhood barely exist to these people out here. We're like an urban myth. No real presence on the Outside.
translation: 你肯定察觉到了，兄弟会对这里的人来说几乎是不存在的。我们像都市传说一样。外界根本察觉不到我们的存在。

original: We just don't adapt like we should. Used to be that all you needed to get your way was a suit of power armor and a laser rifle.
translation: 我们本该与时俱进的，但我们没有。我们习惯了穿着动力装甲，拿着激光步枪，以为这样就能摆平一切。

original: Now... people are armed and organized. They're not afraid. But we still stick to our old approach, because it's all we know.
translation: 可如今……人人都有枪有组织。他们已经不再害怕了。可我们还在用老办法解决问题，因为我们作茧自缚太久了。

original: Wow, Mr. House is looking for you, huh? What do you think he wants? Bowling partner?
translation: 哇，豪斯先生在找你啊？你猜他会找你干什么？一起去打保龄球？

original: Caesar may be dead, but I think the toga is here to stay. You simply can't buy better thigh accentuation.
translation: 凯撒是死了，但我想他们那种长袍风格会继续流行下去。毕竟你找不到更能突出大腿的服饰了。

original: You mustn't ask why we wear our masks. We are forbidden to speak of it.
translation: 你绝对不要问我们为什么要戴面具。这个话题是禁忌。

original: If Mr. House is going to lower his standards, we'll just have to raise ours!
translation: 既然豪斯先生要降低他的标准，那我们就得提高我们的！

original: You're a killer. Go away.
translation: 你这个凶手。走开。

original: We're being held here against our will! I beg you, help us!
translation: 我们是被人关到这里的！求你了，帮帮我们！

original: Are you going to free us, or what?
translation: 你是准备放了我们吗？

original: Oh, it's just awful here. Can't you help us?
translation: 喔，这地方太糟糕了。你就不能帮帮我们吗？

original: You're still gonna free us, aren't you?
translation: 你还是会放我们出去的，对吧？

original: Caesar may have deemed you worthy to bear his mark, but your reputation preceeds you.
translation: 或许凯撒认为你配得上他的徽记，但你的坏名声早就人尽皆知了。

original: Your presence will be tolerated, but you are not welcome here. Lucullus awaits you on the docks.
translation: 我们可以容忍你在这里走动，但这不代表我们欢迎你。卢库勒斯正在码头上等你。

original: Do not make Caesar wait! Lucullus awaits you on the dock.
translation: 别让凯撒等你！卢库勒斯正在码头上等你。

original: A Profligate bearing the Mark of Caesar? What is the world coming to?
translation: 一个荒淫之人居然戴着凯撒的徽记？这个世界怎么了？

original: Cursor Lucullus is waiting for you with the barge at the docks. He will take you to The Fort to speak with Caesar.
translation: 库瑟·卢库勒斯正在码头边的驳船上等你。他会带你去城堡觐见凯撒。

original: Get moving, Profligate! Do not make Caesar wait!
translation: 快走，荒淫之人！别让凯撒等你！

original: I warned them about that truck weeks ago. Always be prepared for any hazardous radiation I said.
translation: 我几个星期前就警告过他们货车的事。我当时就说了要做好受到超量辐射的准备。

original: Those headstrong fools should have listened...
translation: 那些死脑筋的笨蛋为什么就是不肯听我的……

original: Are you ready to head upriver?
translation: 你准备好朝上游进发了吗？

original: You're the one Lucullus said would come? You'll find him waiting for you, down at the docks.
translation: 你就是卢库勒斯说的那个人？你去下面码头就能找到他，他在等你。

original: What are you doing standing around, whelp? {KAI-zar)Caesar awaits!
translation: 你还在这瞎转悠什么，小崽子？{KAI-zar)凯撒正等着你呢！

original: You're the one Lucullus said would come. You'll find him waiting for you, down at the docks.
translation: 你就是卢库勒斯说的那个人吧。你去下面码头就能找到他，他在等你。

original: Caesar does not like to be kept waiting. I would find Cursor Lucullus quickly and travel to The Fort, if I were you.
translation: 凯撒不喜欢等人。如果我是你，我会马上去找库瑟·卢库勒斯，让他带我前往城堡。

original: He should still be waiting at the docks.
translation: 他应该还在码头等着。

original: Ave. Have you come to sell or trade for captures?
translation: 致敬。你是来买卖俘虏的吗？

original: NCR Trooper, reporting for duty!
translation: NCR突击兵，向您报道！

original: Trooper, ready to fight!
translation: 突击兵，准备完毕！

original: You called for a Trooper?
translation: 是你呼叫突击兵支援的？

original: You called for an extra gun?
translation: 是你呼叫额外人手的？

original: I got your call and came running.
translation: 我收到你的呼叫就赶来了。

original: Guns and gear - at your service.
translation: 整装待发，为您效劳。

original: Someone said you needed backup? I'm it.
translation: 听说你需要增援？我就是增援。

original: You called for backup?
translation: 你呼叫了增援？

original: Where's the fight, sir?
translation: 敌人在哪儿，长官？

original: For the Republic!
translation: 为了共和国！

original: Ranger at the ready!
translation: 游骑兵准备就绪！

original: NCR Ranger, reporting for duty!
translation: NCR游骑兵，向您报道！

original: Here we are, you just point and we'll shoot.
translation: 我们来了，全听您指挥。

original: Here I am, just point at what needs killing.
translation: 我来了，你只要告诉目标在哪儿就行。

original: One riot, one ranger... let's get this done.
translation: 哪里有骚乱，哪里就有游骑兵……动身吧。

original: Heard you were in a spot of trouble, friend. Let's fix that.
translation: 我听说你遇到了麻烦，朋友。让我们来搞定它。

original: For the Republic!
translation: 为了共和国！

original: You called for an extra gun?
translation: 是你呼叫援军？

original: You're lucky I happened to be nearby.
translation: 你真幸运，我恰好就在附近。

original: I got your flank - you just shoot what's in front of you!
translation: 我来掩护你的侧翼——你只管射击前方的目标！

original: Ranger here - where's the fight?
translation: 游骑兵就位，敌人在哪儿？

original: So, Mr. House doesn't care that one of Caesar's most notorious Legion spies is walking around on the Strip.
translation: 看来，豪斯先生并不介意凯撒手下最臭名昭著的间谍在长街上招摇过市。

original: Either that or his Securitrons' AI is too primitive to recognize the threat. Neither answer is particularly comforting.
translation: 要不然，就是他的电子保安还不够智能，根本没有检测到风险。不管哪个答案，都无法让人特别放心呀。

original: I've read about REPCONN. I think they did some work with the... the government before the war. Rockets and some energy weapon prototypes, I think.
translation: 我读过瑞普康的资料。我想他们曾经跟……战前政府有过合作。包括火箭啊，能量武器原型机啊什么的。

original: Interesting way of handling things. Very sub rosa.
translation: 你处理问题的方式很有趣。简直瞒天过海。

original: I don't know if the Scorpions deserve to be wiped out for something they didn't do, but that's one less problem Westside has to deal with.
translation: 我不知道毒蝎帮该不该因为自己没做过的事而落得个被全灭的下场，但西区确实少了一个麻烦。

original: I shouldn't be surprised at what happened with Moreno. I hoped that after all this time, he could put his anger behind him.
translation: 莫雷诺变成这样，我并不奇怪。我曾希望时间能让他放下心中的仇恨。

original: Maybe everything good in Orion Moreno died at Navarro, and it was foolish to think there was anything in him left to salvage.
translation: 但那个善良的厄里翁·莫雷诺也许早就已经死在纳瓦罗了，指望他心里还残留着一点良心，真是太蠢了。

original: In case it's not obvious, I think you should redirect the power to Freeside and Outer Vegas.
translation: 该怎么选是明摆着的，你应该把电力送到自由城和维加斯外围去。

original: I'm not exactly a mercenary, but taking out scumbags of this magnitude wouldn't cause me to lose any sleep.
translation: 虽然我算不上什么雇佣兵，但解决这种级别的人渣并不会让人心生愧疚。

original: Head voices don't *like* you, squishy man!
translation: 脑子里的声音不*喜欢*你，软软人！

original: New guy, eh? The more the merrier around here!
translation: 新来的小子吗？人越多越热闹啊！

original: New gal, eh? The more the merrier around here!
translation: 新来的小丫头吗？人越多越热闹啊！

original: Hey there. The name's Sexton. Private James Sexton. Welcome to Forlorn Hope.
translation: 你好。我叫塞克斯顿。列兵詹姆斯·塞克斯顿。欢迎来到飘零希望营地。

original: You must be new around here. Something I can do for you?
translation: 你肯定是新来的吧。需要点什么？

original: You're new, aren't you? What can I do for you?
translation: 你是新来的，对吧？想要点什么？

original: I've heard of you. Just remember whose side you're on out there.
translation: 我听说过你。你最好记好自己是哪边的。

original: I don't know if you know, but since Jeannie May passed, I've been keeping an eye on her properties for her.
translation: 不知你是否知道，珍妮·梅走了以后，我一直在帮她看管财产。

original: I think it's time we gave everything back to you, so take this key and make yourself at home at our motel.
translation: 我想是时候报答你了，拿着这把钥匙，这座旅店永远为你敞开大门。

original: It'll open the room on the second floor, closest to the lobby. Hope it suits you.
translation: 你的房间在二楼，离门廊最近的那间。希望你喜欢。

original: Hey, thanks for all the hard work back there. I'm going to run a tight ship here, don't you worry.
translation: 嘿，感谢你所做的一切。我会多加注意的，不用担心。

original: It's time for the meeting with the bosses. We can't chit chat right now.
translation: 该去见老板们了。我们可没时间在这瞎扯。

original: Have you found out anything to help me?
translation: 你想到帮我的办法了吗？

original: Man, thanks for finding out that shit. Fuck Big Sal.
translation: 老兄，谢谢你找到那个人渣，该死的大萨尔。

original: Good to see you again. I hope you're winning some money in here.
translation: 很高兴又见面了，希望你能赢钱。

original: I'm happy to see you again. Carlitos and I have been living here since our escape. We'll never forget what you've done for us.
translation: 很高兴再次见到你。自从逃跑之后，卡利托斯和我就一直住在这里。我们永远不会忘记你为我们所做的一切。

original: Are you fucking kidding me?
translation: 你他妈在逗我？

original: First I get my legs smashed, and then in walks the Powder Gangers' Grim fucking Reaper? What the fuck have you got against us, man?
translation: 先是我的腿废了，然后我们又一头撞进了炸药帮的死对头怀里？我们到底跟你有什么仇啊，老兄？

original: Jesus fucking Christ, if you want me dead just gimme 15 Med-X and I'll fucking O.D. for ya, okay? Fuck!
translation: 狗日的，你要是想让我死，给我15支吗啡针-X，我马上就嗑药死给你看，好不好？操！

original: Are you fucking kidding me?
translation: 你他妈在逗我呢？

original: First I get my legs smashed, and then in walks the Powder Gangers' Grim fucking Reaper? What the fuck have you got against us, bitch?
translation: 先是我的腿废了，然后我们又一头撞进了炸药帮的死对头怀里？我们到底跟你有什么仇啊，老兄？

original: Jesus fucking Christ, if you want me dead just gimme 15 Med-X and I'll fucking O.D. for ya, okay? Fuck!
translation: 狗日的，你要是想让我死，给我15支吗啡针-X，我马上就嗑药死给你看，好不好？操！

original: Well, isn't this a surprise. I was just finishing up here. To think that we might have missed each other!
translation: 喔，真是惊喜。我这刚完事。要不是你来得巧，我们差点就见不着了！

original: It's fitting you got to see how I punished this town, for such is your fate. You will die for your crimes against the Legion!
translation: 你真该看看我是怎么惩罚这个镇子的，因为你的下场也将如此。为你对抗军团的罪行偿命吧！

original: I was just finishing up making an example of this town, teaching a lesson, if you will.
translation: 我刚把这座镇子树立成了反抗军团下场的典型。如果你愿意的话，就用这个去为军团布道吧。

original: When you move on, teach everyone you meet the lessons Caesar's Legion taught here. Especially any NCR troops you run across.
translation: 你离开以后，去西边的莫哈维沙漠前哨站，告诉那些荒淫之人你在这里都看到了什么。

original: Hah! And we were just finishing up here. To think that we might have missed you!
translation: 哈！我们这刚完事。要不是你来得巧，我们差点就见不着了！

original: If anyone belongs on a cross, it's you! For your crimes against the Legion, you will die!
translation: 如果有谁最该被钉上十字架，那就是你！你对军团犯下了不可饶恕的罪行，受死吧！

original: Me and Carmine - that's my repeater here - will do our best to cover you from this ridge. Good luck.
translation: 我会和卡迈恩——那是我的连发枪——会尽力从山崖上提供掩护的。祝你好运。

original: You're always welcome around the Hope, Courier - least as far as I'm concerned.
translation: 飘零希望永远欢迎你，邮差——至少我管事的时候都是这样。

original: I can still hear our boys screaming down there.
translation: 我现在都能听见我们的小伙子在下面的惨叫。

original: They've got our guys down there.
translation: 我们的人还被他们扣在下面。

original: Wish we could do something for the troopers down there.
translation: 真希望我们能为下面的士兵做点什么。

original: Thanks for the help with the hostages!
translation: 谢谢你救了人质！

original: I can't believe you broke into the mine and saved those miners.
translation: 真不敢相信你居然杀进了矿洞，还救出了矿工。

original: The hostages are safe. We owe you.
translation: 人质安全了。我们都欠你的情。

original: I see you reached your destination safely. Shall we get to work?
translation: 我看到你安全抵达了目的地。我们可以开始了吗？

original: Do you have the slightest idea of what you've done, of what you've destroyed?
translation: 你到底知不知道你干了什么，你摧毁的是什么？

original: You've doomed Vegas to be ruled by corrupt bureaucrats or fanatical savages.
translation: 你的行为将使维加斯沦陷到官僚主义或者狂热野蛮的统治之中。

original: Singlehandedly, you've brought mankind's best hopes of forward progress crashing down. No punishment would be too severe.
translation: 你只手毁掉了人类前进的最佳希望。任何惩罚都无法弥补你犯下的滔天罪行。

original: Benny is dead, and yet you don't appear to be carrying the Platinum Chip.
translation: 本尼死了，而你依然没有得到白金筹码。

original: I don't suppose you forgot to search his body?
translation: 我想你该不会是忘记搜他的尸体了吧？

original: You've been a busy courier, haven't you? You take your obligation to deliver a package very seriously - an ethic for which I am grateful.
translation: 你可真是个勤奋的邮差啊，不是吗？你以十分负责的态度履行了邮递物品的义务——我很赞赏你的职业素养。

original: I will admit, when you ignored my invitation, I predicted... negative outcomes. But - you have a way of exceeding expectations, don't you?
translation: 我得承认，当你无视我的邀请时，我就已经预料到了…不好的结果。不过——你总能出人意料，不是吗？

original: Well, enough. Let's have the Chip, then.
translation: 好了。还是把筹码交给我吧。

original: Have you considered the terms of my offer? There's little else for us to discuss until you have.
translation: 你是否考虑了我提出的条件？如果还没有，那我们就没什么好谈的。

original: Your next assignment won't take you far. It concerns the Omertas and their den of vice, Gomorrah.
translation: 下一个任务不需要你跑远路。它跟黑手党及其罪恶巢穴——蛾摩拉有关。

original: As the decisive encounter between the bull and the bear looms close, my concerns about the Omertas have grown.
translation: 随着牛与熊之间的决战日益临近，我对黑手党的担忧也与日俱增。

original: I've never expected loyalty, mind you. A reliably underhanded tribe is just as constant to deal with as one that always runs true.
translation: 实话告诉你，我从没指望过什么忠诚。一个可靠的秘密团体就算时不时闹些小动静，也实属正常。

original: But that's just it - lately the Omertas' cooperative silence has been deafening. Not a single complaint? They're up to something.
translation: 可问题就在这里——黑手党最近太安静了。难道他们一丝抱怨都没有吗？肯定在背地里盘算些什么。

original: As I said before, I need you to investigate the Omertas, to see what they're up to.
translation: 就像我此前说过的，我要你去调查黑手党，看看他们到底在盘算些什么。

original: Your next assignment is to locate and destroy remnants of the Mojave chapter of the Brotherhood of Steel.
translation: 你的下一个任务是找到并消灭钢铁兄弟会莫哈维分会的残余力量。

original: The NCR nearly did the job at HELIOS One a few years ago, but there seem to have been survivors, unfortunately.
translation: 几年前NCR在太阳神一号几乎将他们全歼，但不幸的是，现在看来他们似乎还有幸存者。

original: Given the Brotherhood's fanatical views on technology, they can be counted on to oppose my regime.
translation: 鉴于兄弟会对技术的狂热，他们完全有能力反对我的政权。

original: Please - put them out of my misery.
translation: 请你——让他们从我的眼前消失吧。

original: Your reputation with the NCR isn't exactly stellar, so I'll have to vouch for you. It'll make a scene, but it's worth it.
translation: 你跟NCR的交情实在是马马虎虎，所以我得给你好好包装一番。可能会出些洋相，但绝对值得。

original: Kimball is dead - what a mess you've made!
translation: 金博尔死了——看看你干的好事！

original: I'm glad to see a fellow trooper. My squad is in trouble.
translation: 真高兴能在这儿遇到战友。我的小队有麻烦了。

original: Confound it, Cheyenne, why'd you have to go running in like that? You were supposed to stay.
translation: 该死，夏安，你为什么要冲进去？你应该呆在我身边的。

original: I'm sorry, you shouldn't have to see me like this. I'm not gonna be very good company right now.
translation: 抱歉，不该让你看到我这个样子。我现在情绪不太稳定。

original: I did have another thing to teach, but I'll understand if you'd rather I just pay you so you can be on your way.
translation: 虽然我还可以教你些别的东西，但如果你现在就想拿了钱立刻上路的话，我也完全理解。

original: Ah, hell's bells. There's not a day passes by I don't tell people not to come here by themselves.
translation: 啊，见鬼！我每天都在警告人们不要孤身来这里。

original: Some people, your word just isn't good enough for them. Then this happens.
translation: 有些人就是不把别人的忠告当回事，结果就落得这个下场。

original: Well, it's a part of life out here. Best to accept it.
translation: 唉，这种事在外头也算常有了，你最好习惯它。

original: But you did what you promised, staying out here with me. Here's my end of the deal.
translation: 不过你确实遵守承诺，陪我跑了这么一趟。这是说好的酬劳。

original: Everything all right?
translation: 一切都还好吗？

original: Hnh. Heard your footsteps coming up the ramp, didn't sound like a trooper or one of the merchants.
translation: 呵——我听见你上来的脚步声了，不过你看起来不像是士兵或者商人。

original: You check out the Nipton Town Hall yet? Smoke trail's not getting any shorter.
translation: 你去尼普顿市政厅看过了吗？浓烟还没散呢。

original: You a courier? If so, this might be your lucky day... if you don't mind walking a bit and your eyes are good.
translation: 你是个邮差？那说不定今天是你的幸运日呢……只要你愿意跑腿，眼神也够好。

original: Okay, that's that. No more games for you. Go rob the Tops. You're done here.
translation: 好了，到此为止。你别再玩了，要抢去抢九重天，这里不会再让你玩了。

original: Have some drinks, talk to some dancers but you are done at my tables.
translation: 你可以去喝点东西，也可以和舞女聊聊天，但赌桌是不会再让你上了。

original: You know what, what happened to my caravan - not the first time I've heard about an attack like that.
translation: 你知道吗，像我商队这样的遭遇，我可不是头一回听说。

original: One of our caravans got hit a few months back, and the caravan'd been burned, too, along with the cargo.
translation: 还有个商队在几个月前也被袭击，连人带货都化成了灰。

original: I wonder if he made the same mistake, and that other caravan got hit with energy weapons too.
translation: 我在想他是不是犯了同样的错误，而且那支商队也是被能量武器袭击的。

original: What's that? Looks like a map - got the route along the West of Vegas, and...
translation: 这是什么？看着像是一张地图——画着维加斯西边的道路，然后……

original: ...they've marked another spot. Over here, along this stretch. That's fucked up - middle of nowhere.
translation: ……他们标记了另外一个位置。就在这里，沿着这条直线。可这他妈——哪儿都不是啊。

original: That does it, that's all I need to know.
translation: 够了，我想事情已经很清楚了。

original: Crimson Caravan and the Van Graffs... they were behind burning these caravans, and they've got to answer for them.
translation: 深红商队和范格拉夫家族……他们就是袭击这些商队的幕后黑手，我要找他们讨个说法。

original: I'm going to get some extra ammo, a few bottles of whiskey, and then show them how Cassidys settle accounts.
translation: 我去补充点弹药，带上几瓶威士忌，然后我要让他们见识见识盖西迪家族的人是如何找人算帐的。

original: Keep your voice down, we got movement out there.
translation: 别出声，那边有动静。

original: Ready to leave yet? This place puts my teeth on edge.
translation: 还不准备走吗？这地方让我牙齿打颤。

original: Just trimmed the Van Graff family tree, I think Freeside'll breathe a little easier now.
translation: 修剪了范格拉夫家这颗歪树，我想自由城的空气会清新不少。

original: And that's it for the Crimson Caravan.
translation: 这就是深红商队的下场。

original: You find any "evidence" yet? I'm not going to wait forever.
translation: 你找到什么证据了吗？我可没耐心永远等下去。

original: Never thought I'd pass the Vegas wall. Never seen so many lights in one place before.
translation: 真没想到我也能穿过维加斯的高墙。更没想到居然还有这么灯火通明的地方。

original: Not sure who this friend of yours is, but if he's looking down on Vegas, he's either God or the moon.
translation: 虽然不确定你这个朋友到底是谁，但如果他正在俯视维加斯，他不是天神就是月亮。

original: So... you talked to a big movie screen? Feeling like I'm walking down a yellow brick road, and there's bad news at the end.
translation: 所以……你去和那个大屏幕说话了？感觉我是走在了黄砖路上，只不过终点还有个坏消息在等着我。

original: First Vegas, now NCR and Legion? You're being courted more than a Redding widow.
translation: 先是维加斯，现在是NCR和军团？你简直比浓妆艳抹的寡妇还抢手。

original: Hope you can answer them politely, or there's no safe place in the Mojave for you.
translation: 希望你能和他们好好打交道，要不就算莫哈维再大，也没有你能容身的地方了。

original: Mojave's almost buzzing like a Cazador now... must be all the blood Legion and NCR are spilling over the Colorado.
translation: 莫哈维现在的局势就像猎蜂振翅一样让人烦躁……肯定是因为军团和莫哈维在科罗拉多河两岸大打出手。

original: Guess there's no turning back now, it's war. If Hoover Dam's where it's going to go down, better make it count.
translation: 看来没有什么回头路了，战争已经爆发了。如果胡佛水坝就是终点，但愿我们能死得其所。

original: Oh, you look like you got something else to say besides ordering me around.
translation: 噢，看来除了把我来回使唤之外，你终于有点别的话要说了。

original: Let's hear it, you look all serious.
translation: 有什么话就说吧，你看起来很严肃。

original: Something to say to me other than guns, distance, and stimming?
translation: 终于有话要说了？不是枪啦，距离啦，吃药之类的话题了？

original: Whoa, why you leaning in all of a sudden?
translation: 哇，你突然靠这么近干什么？

original: You and me, we're done traveling together. I want nothing more to do with you.
translation: 我不想再和你结伴旅行了。我不想再和你扯上更多关系了。

original: I thought there was a chance you'd change - not any longer, being a fucker is who you are.
translation: 我还以为你能改呢——但我不再这么想了，你就是个彻头彻尾的混蛋。

original: Always good to see you, pardner! Anything I can help you with?
translation: 见到你总是那么高兴，伙计！有什么我可以帮你的吗？

original: There's nothing here for you, human, though it is always good to see you.
translation: 这儿已经不再需要你了，人类，不过我们随时欢迎你回来。

original: I don't even remember where we were going, but it'll be good to travel around with Rhonda again.
translation: 我都记不得我本来要去哪里，但能再次和朗达一起旅行真是太好了。

original: Where did the rest of my kin go? All alone now...
translation: 我其他的同类都去哪里了？现在就剩我一个了……

original: Come and get it, you big dumb -
translation: 放马过来啊，你这个傻大个——

original: Hey! You're not one of those things out there. Who the hell are you?
translation: 嘿！你跟外面那些不是一伙儿的。你到底是谁？

original: Colonel Hsu really knows what he's doing. Now if only someone'd explain that to ol' General Wait-and-See Oliver...
translation: 许上校的计划非常有可行性。现在要是有谁能向那位整天只懂得观望的奥利弗将军解释一下就好了……

original: I pity anyone who crosses Boyd. That woman is relentless.
translation: 我很同情那些得罪了博伊德的人。那女人根本不讲情面。

original: We still haven't gotten Ranger Morales' body back from the Fiends. Sure doesn't inspire confidence in the guys you're serving with.
translation: 我们依然没从恶魔帮手里夺回游骑兵莫拉莱斯的遗体。显然这件事并不会对士兵们有什么激励作用。

original: Contreras is holding out on me. I know he's got more to sell.
translation: 孔特雷拉斯一定藏了东西。我知道他手上还有更多的货。

original: Man, Doc Kemp really fixed me up right the last time I got shot. He's the man to see if you need some fixin'.
translation: 老兄，我上次中枪以后就是肯普医生把我治好的。你要是需要治疗就该去找他。

original: Farber is doing the best with what he's got, but man could I go for a nice cut of brahmin steak.
translation: 条件艰苦，法伯已经尽力了，但我还是想尝尝双头牛肉排。

original: You look like someone in need of a reliable supplier.
translation: 你看起来需要一个可靠的物资供应商。

original: So you're back.
translation: 你回来了。

original: What did Contreras say?
translation: 孔特雷拉斯怎么说的？

original: Be careful out there. We already lost Jackson doing what you're trying to do.
translation: 千万要小心。杰克逊就是因为这个死的。

original: You again? What do you need?
translation: 又是你？要点什么？

original: Howdy, looking for chow?
translation: 你好，想吃点什么吗？

original: Even that old House bastard gave in to the NCR. We're the only ones to make a stand!
translation: 就算豪斯那个老混蛋向NCR投降了，我们也要抵抗到底！

original: What are we going to do now that Papa's dead?
translation: 老爷子死了，我们该怎么办？

original: Your friend's cute - is she single?
translation: 你朋友真可爱——她单身吗？

original: I hope Papa knew what he was doing when he left you in charge.
translation: 我希望父汗让你当老大的决定是正确的。

original: A robot dog? Never seen one of those before.
translation: 机器狗？以前从没见过呢。

original: Your pal's one ugly motherfucker.
translation: 你的朋友真他妈逼丑。

original: Holy hell, is that a Nightkin?
translation: 我的妈，那是个夜行族？

original: Nice robot.
translation: 机器人不错嘛。

original: You know you're traveling with a fucking murderer?
translation: 你知道你是在和一个他妈的杀人凶手同行吗？

original: Haven't seen a Follower around here in years.
translation: 有年头没在这儿见过天启追随者了。

original: I ought to bleed you.
translation: 我就该给你放点血。

original: Fuck off and die.
translation: 滚你妈的，去死吧。

original: Like we don't have enough problems.
translation: 还嫌我们麻烦不够多啊。

original: Just get the fuck out of here.
translation: 马上给老子滚蛋。

original: What the fuck are you doing showing your face here?
translation: 你他妈的还敢在这出现？

original: Why are you even here?
translation: 你来干什么？

original: Crazy-ass mother fucker.
translation: 狗娘养的疯子。

original: You been dosing on too many of Jack's chems?
translation: 你是不是嗑多了杰克做的药？

original: You're almost as crazy as some Fiends I know.
translation: 你怎么和那些恶魔帮一样疯疯癫癫的。

original: Oh great, just who I wanted to see.
translation: 哎哟，真是想谁来谁啊。

original: You going to fuck shit up again?
translation: 你又想干他妈的什么？

original: What do you want this time?
translation: 这次你想干什么？

original: You should have been with us in our glory days. You'd have loved it.
translation: 你真该跟我们一起经历那些光辉岁月。你会爱上那一切的。

original: Share a whiskey with me sometime?
translation: 有空一起喝两杯？

original: I wish there were more like you.
translation: 真希望能有更多像你这样的人。

original: I like you, stranger. You've stood by us when not many would.
translation: 我喜欢你，陌生人。在众人离弃我们的时候，你选择了和我们站在一起。

original: Good to see you again.
translation: 很高兴又见到你。

original: Why'd you come here?
translation: 你来这儿干嘛？

original: Come to gawk at the Great Khans, have you? Fuck off.
translation: 又来大汗帮盯梢了？快滚蛋。

original: What do you want?
translation: 你想要什么？

original: So you've been sucked into the decadence of the Strip as well, have you?
translation: 看来你也跟着长街一起堕落了嘛？

original: NCR spreads its infection to another town, I hear.
translation: 我听说另一个镇子也中了NCR的流毒。

original: I'm glad our brothers have returned home from Boulder City.
translation: 我很高兴弟兄们能从巨石城平安归来。

original: Why did you kill our brothers in Boulder City?
translation: 你为什么要在巨石城杀我们的弟兄？

original: More Khan brothers cut down by NCR in Boulder City. We should kill a hundred of them in response!
translation: 又有弟兄在巨石城惨遭NCR毒手。我们应该百倍奉还！

original: The 1st Recon butchers are in the field again. I'd love to head down to Forlorn Hope and show them we haven't forgotten.
translation: 第一侦察营的屠夫又出动了。我真想马上到飘零希望营地去让他们尝尝厉害。
