original: Diane's going nuts trying to find a new contact in the Fiends now that Motor-Runner's dead.
translation: 现在轰鸣恶煞死了，黛安像发疯一样地在恶魔帮里找新联络人。

original: So, the big bad chief ranger couldn't take the pressure, huh? Good.
translation: 看来那个牛逼哄哄的游骑兵头头顶不住压力了，是吧？很好。

original: If you're going to assassinate the president of the NCR, you could at least do it right.
translation: 如果你要去刺杀NCR的总统，那你至少下手要利落。

original: Why the hell would you stop someone from killing Kimball?
translation: 你他妈为什么阻止别人杀金博尔？

original: If you ask me, a true warrior wouldn't let himself be captured at all - but busting that Legionnaire out of McCarran was an impressive stunt.
translation: 要我说，真正的战士根本就不会被俘，不过那军团士兵居然能从麦卡伦脱身，也是叫人佩服。

original: Not many get the favor of Caesar - even Papa hasn't been to the Fort.
translation: 很少有人能得到凯撒的青睐——就算是父汗也没去过城堡。

original: Mr. House isn't a man to be trusted. Watch yourself.
translation: 豪斯先生不是能相信的那种人。你自己小心。

original: You're the one who killed Kimball! If we had a bar here, I'd buy you a drink!
translation: 你杀了金博尔！如果这里有酒吧，我一定请你喝一杯！

original: I apologize, wanderer, but I must go tend to my flock!
translation: 我很抱歉，流浪者，但我必须去照看我的同胞！

original: You looking for a good time?
translation: 你想找乐子吗？

original: If I wasn't working right now, I'd show you a real nice time.
translation: 要不是我现在正在工作，我真想好好疼爱你一番。

original: Enjoying the show?
translation: 喜欢这场表演吗？

original: I wouldn't mind taking a bite of you.
translation: 我真想咬你一口。

original: Damn, you're looking tasty.
translation: 该死的，你看上去真好吃。

original: So Mr. House sells Vegas out to the NCR, eh? I always knew that freak was a rat.
translation: 这么说，豪斯先生把维加斯卖给了NCR，是吗？我就知道那个怪胎是奸细。

original: I got kicked outta Ultra-Luxe the other day. Man, that place gives me the fucking freaks.
translation: 我前几天才被从奢华殿堂里赶出来。老兄，那地方真他妈吓人。

original: Business is good. All the Families got money. Of course Gomorrah is where the action is.
translation: 生意不错。每个家族都赚到了钱。当然人气最旺的还是要数蛾摩拉。

original: I think there is something wrong with that dog.
translation: 我觉得那条狗有点不对劲。

original: Uh, I don't think we allow her kind in here. I'll let it go this time though.
translation: 啊，我觉得她这样的人应该是不得入内的。不过这次就算了吧。

original: What the fuck is that thing?
translation: 那他妈是什么玩意？

original: Big tough ranger better not start any trouble in here.
translation: 就算是最强的游骑兵，在这里最好也别惹麻烦。

original: Let me know if the pretty lady with you is looking for some work.
translation: 如果你身边这位美丽的女士正在找工作，请务必告诉我。

original: That Follower fucker is going to have some trouble if he tries to liberate any of our employees.
translation: 那个天启追随者杂碎要是敢在这里搞他解放劳工的那一套，老子要他吃不了兜着走。

original: Khans finally got what they had coming. Glad we won't have to worry about them again.
translation: 大汗帮自作自受。很高兴我们不用再担心他们了。

original: Kimball managed to get himself knocked off. Serves him right.
translation: 金博尔管天管地，终于把自己管死了。这就叫报应。

original: Did Benny beg before you burned his sorry ass?
translation: 你点燃本尼屁股的时候，他有没有求饶？

original: Nice work at the Tops, buddy.
translation: 你在九重天干得不错，伙计。

original: Your Ghoul wants to have some fun he can, we don't discriminate.
translation: 如果你的尸鬼也想找乐子，我们不会歧视的。

original: The most important POW we've ever taken and he gets away. He must've had help.
translation: 最重要的那个战俘跑掉了。他肯定得到了某人的帮助。

original: I'm glad those nighttime raids have stopped. I was getting worried.
translation: 我很高兴那些夜袭终于停了。本来我真是有些担心了。

original: Doc seems to be doing all right patching people up, at least.
translation: 至少医生在尽心尽力地救治伤员。

original: I never thought they'd actually send us reinforcements.
translation: 我从没想过他们真的会派增援来。

original: Not enough food, not enough medicine, and definitely not enough sleep.
translation: 食物不足，药物不足，甚至连睡眠都不足。

original: This is the worst detail in the Mojave.
translation: 这是莫哈维最糟糕的地方。

original: Can't believe the Legion hit us in such numbers. They're stronger than we think.
translation: 难以相信军团会派出这么多人攻击我们。他们比我们想象的要强大。

original: I swear I saw somebody sneaking out of the graveyard the other night.
translation: 我发誓那天晚上我看见有人偷偷溜出了墓地。

original: Lieutenant Markland always looks like he's afraid the kids are gonna bite him.
translation: 马克兰中尉好像总是害怕孩子们会咬他。

original: Markland seems to be getting better with his bedside manner.
translation: 看来马克兰对病人的态度正在改善。

original: Doc's gotten real handy with the kids these days.
translation: 这些天医生真的很用心地在帮助孩子们。

original: Hope the Doc can give me some meds this week.
translation: 希望这周医生能给我些药。

original: Nice to see more guards on patrol. Maybe Caesar won't murder us all.
translation: 很高兴巡逻队的人手多了起来。也许凯撒不会那么轻易杀了我们。

original: Legion just came out of nowhere.
translation: 军团不知从哪儿就冒出来了。

original: The man with the spiky hat comes into camp at night!
translation: 戴尖帽子的人晚上在营地出没！

original: The "great" republic couldn't find enough soldiers to liberate this camp, so they sent you? Pathetic.
translation: "堂堂"共和国居然无人可用，只好派你来送死？真是可悲。

original: Ave. Why have you come to Nelson?
translation: 致敬。你来纳尔逊干什么？

original: The Followers are always on the look out for new friends like yourself.
translation: 天启追随者一直在寻求你这样的新朋友。

original: I didn't know the Brotherhood had any people out here.
translation: 没想到兄弟会在外面还有人啊。

original: Look at that - a cyber-dog. There can't be many of those left.
translation: 看呐——一只机械狗。这玩意可是挺稀罕的。

original: Look at that - a friendly Nightkin. What's it doing here?
translation: 看呐——一个友善的夜行族。它在这儿干啥？

original: That is one battered Eyebot. It's a miracle it's still functioning.
translation: 这个眼球机器人可够破的。它还能运转可真是奇迹。

original: Isn't that Cass? I heard she'd gotten out of the caravan business.
translation: 那不是卡丝吗？我听说她不再跑商队了。

original: That's a First Recon beret. They're the best marksmen in the NCR military.
translation: 那是第一侦察营的贝雷帽。他们是NCR军队里最顶尖的神枪手。

original: I'll never get used to the sight of Ghouls.
translation: 我就是不习惯见到尸鬼。

original: Don't let anything happen to Arcade, all right?
translation: 别让阿卡德出事，好吗？

original: Excuse me.
translation: 借光。

original: My feet are killing me.
translation: 我的脚痛死了。

original: The Great Khans tribe went mad. During the battle at the Dam, they attacked both the Legion and the NCR.
translation: 大汗帮真是疯了。他们居然在大坝之战中同时攻击军团和NCR。

original: How disgusting. You can see that strange mechanical mongrel's brain.
translation: 真恶心。那野狗的脑袋居然就这样露在外面。

original: Ugh. One of the burned people walks in our camp.
translation: 啊。有个被烧伤的家伙跑到我们的营地来啦。

original: What a strange floating robot. Is it useful for anything?
translation: 这个浮空机器人可真奇怪。它能有啥用？

original: What is that thing? I've never seen a blue mutant.
translation: 那是什么东西？我从没见过蓝色的变种人。

original: I hear the Legion's fixing to attack Hoover Dam. Good thing I ain't there.
translation: 听说军团正策划进攻胡佛水坝。幸好我不在那儿。

original: I hear the Great Khans just packed up and left Red Rock Canyon. Always thought the NCR and them would fight it out again.
translation: 听说大汗帮卷铺盖离开了红岩峡谷。我一直以为他们会和NCR再打一仗呢。

original: That President Kimball nearly got killed at Hoover Dam. Now he knows how we feel about the NCR around here.
translation: 金博尔总统差点在胡佛水坝被杀。这下他该明白我们对NCR的感觉了吧。

original: That tower on the Strip, the one you can see for miles? I hear it ain't sealed up no more.
translation: 长街那座高塔，就是好几里外都能看到的那座，我听说它终于开放了。

original: Some Khans got cornered in the ruins of Boulder City and the NCR killed them. It's like Bitter Springs all over again.
translation: 大汗帮的人被困在巨石城的废墟里，最后全被NCR杀了。简直是苦泉的翻版。

original: Someone finally put down that sick Motor-Runner sonofabitch. Good riddance.
translation: 终于有人把轰鸣恶煞那个狗日的干掉了。死得好啊。

original: The same robots on the Strip, I seen one or two of them roll past town time to time. Well, the face on them looked meaner.
translation: 长街上那种机器人，我时不时能看见它们有一两个从这儿路过。它们的嘴脸比以前更难看了。

original: Who cares if Caesar's dead? Don't affect our town one bit.
translation: 谁关心的凯撒死活啊？跟我们镇子又没半点关系。

original: So much for the might of the NCR! Their President got killed over at Hoover Dam!
translation: NCR的实力也就那么回事！他们的总统死在了胡佛水坝！

original: You hear how the President of the NCR got killed? Gonna be hard to score chems around here for a while...
translation: 你听说了NCR总统被人谋杀了吗？看来这阵子很难再搞到药品了……

original: How's the NCR gonna protect Vegas if it can't even protect its own President?
translation: 如果NCR连自己的总统都保护不了，他们凭什么来保护维加斯？

original: The NCR's top Ranger, Chief Hanlon, put a gun in his mouth. Think he would've done that if the NCR stood a chance at beating the Legion?
translation: NCR的王牌游骑兵军士长汉隆，饮弹自尽了。你想想，如果NCR有一丝打败军团的希望，他会这么做吗？

original: Have you seen that tower on the Strip all lit up? You can see it for miles!
translation: 长街那座塔完全点亮了，你看见没？几英里外都能看见啊！

original: The Great Khans up and left Red Rock Canyon. Who's gonna brew fresh chems now?
translation: 大汗帮离开了红岩峡谷。我们以后去找谁做药？

original: I hear the Great Khans got massacred again. No survivors this time, though.
translation: 听说大汗帮又被屠杀了。不过这次没有幸存者了。

original: There was some kind of massacre at one of the Ranger Stations. I don't know which one.
translation: 某个游骑兵驻站发生了屠杀。具体是哪个就不知道了。

original: Some Khans got cornered in the ruins of Boulder City, but the NCR let them go. That's unusual.
translation: 大汗帮的人被困在巨石城的废墟里，但NCR最后居然放了他们。这太不正常了。

original: You ever seen one of those Rangers in black armor? I wouldn't want to make one of those mad!
translation: 你见过那些穿黑色盔甲的游骑兵吗？我可不想惹到他们！

original: Goddamn that Mr. House for selling Vegas out to the NCR! The whole Mojave will have to join up.
translation: 该死的豪斯先生把维加斯整个卖给了NCR！全莫哈维必须联合起来了。

original: Kimball's dead, I wonder how long until the Legion's at our walls.
translation: 金博尔死了，不知道军团兵临城下还需要多久。

original: A Ranger, here in the Strip? Fine company, sir!
translation: 游骑兵，在长街？这可是好伙伴啊，先生！

original: Good riddance, Caesar! We can finally enjoy some R&R without worrying about a Legion attack at McCarran.
translation: 凯撒死得好啊！我们终于可以真正休个好假，而不必担心军团进攻麦卡伦了。

original: What's a mutant doing in the Strip?
translation: 变种人跑到长街来干什么？

original: I bet dirty business is going on at Gomorrah.
translation: 我敢打赌蛾摩拉现在正进行着什么肮脏的交易。

original: I bet dirty business is going on at Gomorrah.
translation: 我敢打赌蛾摩拉现在正进行着什么肮脏的交易。

original: Wish I could've seen what's inside the 38.
translation: 真希望我能见识见识幸运38里面里面是什么样。

original: If you're looking to join up, head on by the Embassy.
translation: 如果你想加入我们，请去大使馆。

original: Look, "friend," don't get near me - you're too well respected for my business.
translation: 你看， "朋友，"你可以离我远一点——你这样好名声的人，和我的生意可不太搭。

original: I'm glad Ringo's back. Got a good story to tell, too.
translation: 很高兴林戈回来了。他一定有很多故事要说。

original: Colonel Moore survived four tours against the Brotherhood back west. If anyone can help take on the Legion, it's her.
translation: 莫尔上校在西部的时候，曾经历过与兄弟会的四次大战。如果说还有谁能对付军团的话，那肯定就是她。

original: You hear that rumor that Colonel Moore was kicked out of Gomorrah a while back? I heard she's had it in for the Omertas ever since.
translation: 你听过莫尔上校前不久被蛾摩拉赶出来的传言吗？我听说从那以后她就和黑手党结下了梁子。

original: I'm really surprised Colonel Moore accepted the Brotherhood's help. I heard she lost a lot of men in war with them back west.
translation: 真不敢相信莫尔上校居然会接受兄弟会的帮助。要知道在西部的时候，她很多弟兄都死在兄弟会枪下。

original: Man, I'm exhausted. Moore's got us running drills non-stop.
translation: 老兄，我受够了。莫尔根本把不拿我们当人。

original: Just between us, Colonel Moore scares me sometimes.
translation: 别跟旁人说啊，我好几次都被莫尔上校吓到了。

original: Oliver's head is as good as mine!
translation: 奥利弗可不比我笨！

original: Is it true the fighting outside has stopped already?
translation: 外面的战斗真的已经结束了吗？

original: Upstairs, or down? If I were a coward, where would I hide?
translation: 楼上，还是楼下？如果我是胆小鬼的话，我会躲在哪呢？

original: Make good use of cover. The time to strike is when they reload.
translation: 好好利用掩体。他们换弹夹的时候就是最好的进攻时机。

original: Their guns aren't quite as effective in these close quarters.
translation: 他们的武器在近距离作战时发挥不出最佳效果。

original: Soon this place will belong to the Legion.
translation: 这地方很快就会属于军团。

original: I've added eight notches to my belt already. How many for you?
translation: 我已经干掉八个了。你干掉了几个？

original: I hope the Legion doesn't get in here.
translation: 希望军团别攻到这里来。

original: Sorry, but I'm busy with patients right now.
translation: 对不起，我现在得料理伤员。

original: Julie Farkas wasn't kidding when she said we would be needed here.
translation: 朱莉·法卡斯从不拿“这里需要我们”开玩笑。

original: All this bloodshed. Such a waste of human life.
translation: 流了这么多血。真是草菅人命。

original: Please don't hurt me!
translation: 请不要伤害我！

original: I'm just a medic! Please don't hurt me!
translation: 我只是个医疗兵！请别伤害我！

original: Damn, that was some light show out there.
translation: 那地方怎么他妈怎么亮。

original: This place is off-limits to civilians. You don't like it, take it up with Lieutenant Haggerty.
translation: 此地不许平民进入，你要是有意见，去找哈格蒂中尉。

original: Hey man, when in Rome.
translation: 嘿，老兄，入乡随俗。

original: We've got a lot to do to prepare for the President's visit and not much time.
translation: 总统要来视察，太多事情要准备，但我们时间太少。

original: Is there a problem here?
translation: 有什么问题？

original: You again. What's your problem?
translation: 又是你。怎么了？

original: Make it quick. We don't have much time.
translation: 快点。我们时间不多。

original: It's unlikely the Legion will try anything, but we'll be prepared for it anyway.
translation: 军团搞小动作的可能性不大，但我们也不能掉以轻心。

original: I'm so excited about the President visiting. This is going to be great!
translation: 总统来视察让我非常兴奋。这真是伟大的一刻！

original: The Legion is attacking! Run for your lives!
translation: 军团打过来了！赶紧逃命吧！

original: I'm too young to die!
translation: 我还年轻，不想死！

original: Quiet, I'm trying to listen to the speech.
translation: 安静，我在听演讲。

original: Not right now. President Kimball is giving his speech.
translation: 别说话。金博尔总统正演讲呢。

original: Shh! I want to hear what is going on.
translation: 嘘！我在认真听呢。

original: President Kimball is really well-spoken.
translation: 金博尔总统讲得真好。

original: It was such an honor to be here today. I'm so lucky.
translation: 今天能到这里真的很荣幸。我真的很幸运。

original: That's a nice suit President Kimball had.
translation: 金博尔总统的西装真帅气。

original: Nothing is going to happen to the President on my watch.
translation: 有我保护总统，不会发生任何事的。

original: Welcome to the Crimson Caravan Company, New Vegas branch. What may I do for you?
translation: 欢迎来到深红商队公司新维加斯分部。我能为你做些什么？

original: Jimmy? Little Jimmy - my, how you're grown up. So good of you to come visit your grandma.
translation: 吉米？小吉米——天啊，你都长这么大了。你能来看望奶奶真是太好了。

original: My word, but that was a lot of chopping at that casino, dear.
translation: 我说，亲爱的，你刚在赌场里闹得也太凶了吧。

original: Naughty children run from their punishment, but we'll find Benny, won't we, Leo?
translation: 坏小孩就该被打屁股，我们会找到本尼的。是吧，利奥 ?

original: Heavens to Betsy, but Mr. Benny met a nasty end. I hope you've realized, pumpkin, that crime doesn't pay.
translation: 我的老天哟，本尼先生终于得到了应有的惩罚。希望你能从他身上学到教训，小南瓜，恶有恶报。

original: My, but that Lucky 38 is a large building. And so fancy!
translation: 天啊，幸运38真够大的。真豪华！

original: Leo doesn't like that you left that House man alive, dearie. He thinks you should have let us chop him.
translation: 利奥不喜欢你让那个叫豪斯的家伙活着，小宝贝。他觉得我们应该剁了他。

original: You should have heard Leo, sweetie. He laughed and laughed when that old man in the box exploded.
translation: 你真该听听利奥的反应，小甜心。那个盒子里的老头爆炸时，他笑得可高兴了。

original: Leo thinks there will be lots more chopping to do now that Caesar is dead. I do hope you'll be careful, pumpkin.
translation: 利奥觉得，凯撒死了以后，咱们要砍的人就多了。小南瓜，希望你能小心点。

original: Grandma's so proud of her little pumpkin, rescuing the President like that!
translation: 奶奶真骄傲，她的小南瓜救下了总统！

original: Now sweetie, if at first you don't succeed, try, try again. That goes for learning to ride bikes and killing Presidents!
translation: 小甜心，如果第一次没成功，那就再试一次。学骑单车是这样，杀总统也是这样！

original: Grandma's so proud of her little pumpkin, assassinating the President like that!
translation: 奶奶真骄傲，她的小南瓜利落地干掉了总统！

original: Leo's very grumpy, pumpkin. He wanted to chop the President!
translation: 利奥发飙了，小南瓜。他想要剁了总统！

original: Look at you, sweetness! Blowing up a robot army all by yourself, isn't that precious?
translation: 瞧瞧你啊，甜心！你一个人就把整支机器人大军都炸翻了，多了不起啊？

original: Grandma's so worried about her little baby! It's getting dangerous out there in the Wasteland!
translation: 奶奶太担心她的小宝贝了！废土越来越危险了！

original: Leo's getting more and more agitated, sweetie. I think he can smell the fight coming.
translation: 利奥越来越焦躁了，小甜心。我猜他是感觉到大战要来临了。

original: I hope you're not thinking about rushing off to that big dam, pumpkin! It's sure to be very dangerous!
translation: 希望你没打算跑到那座大坝上去，小南瓜！那里太危险了！

original: Penthouse floor!
translation: 顶楼！

original: High-Roller Suite!
translation: 高档套房！

original: B2! Physical Plant!
translation: B2！机械工厂！

original: Yes? Something else you needed?
translation: 嗯？你还有什么事？

original: I received a pleasant call from Dr. Keely. It seems we have you to thank for keeping her alive. Very charitable of you.
translation: 我刚接到了一通来自基利博士热情洋溢的电话。看来我们得谢谢你让她活了下来。你可真是善良哟。

original: Ah! I was just wondering what had become of you.
translation: 啊！我还在想你怎样了呢。

original: What are you doing in my office? You're not welcome here, get out!
translation: 你在我的办公室里干什么？这里不欢迎你，出去！

original: Little busy at the moment. But I can talk.
translation: 我现在有些忙，不过还是能聊两句。

original: If you can find Keely and keep her safe, I'll pay you what I can. I gave my word, and I meant it.
translation: 如果你能找到基利并且保证她的安全，我会尽我所能报答你。说话算话。

original: Keely just called in. You should have heard the Director. "But I-" "Wait a-" "Now look here-"
translation: 基利刚刚打电话来了。你真该听听总管是怎么说的："但是我——""等等——""听我说——"

original: She wouldn't let him finish a sentence. Just reamed him out for sending all those people to the Vault. I've never seen his face so red and twitchy.
translation: 她连一句完整的话都没让他说完，反倒是他骂得狗血淋头，因为他派了那么多人去避难所。我从没见过他脸红成那样，整张脸都扭曲了。

original: Thanks for keeping her safe. Here's the caps I promised. I knew I had a good feeling about you.
translation: 谢谢你救了她。这是我答应给你的瓶盖。我就知道我没看错你。

original: Did you find Keely? You haven't been back for a while, so I was hoping...
translation: 你找到基利了吗？ 你有段时间没有回来了，所以我想……

original: Oh! Good to see you again.
translation: 噢！再次见到你真是太高兴了。

original: You're new? I'm Angela. Williams. Were you just looking around, or...
translation: 你是新来的？我是安吉拉·威廉姆斯。你是随便逛逛呢，还是……

original: This Vault-Tec machinery is so fragile. I had to jury-rig this elevator a few days... and it's on the fritz again already.
translation: 这些避难所科技的机器太容易坏了。几天前我才把这电梯勉强修好，现在它又坏了。

original: Ah, that's got it. See you upstairs.
translation: 啊，搞定了。楼上见。

original: I suppose you have questions. Hurry up and ask them.
translation: 我想你肯定有疑问。快点儿，有问题就赶紧问。

original: Ah, good. You survived. I was beginning to think you hadn't. You'll be pleased to know that the spores should no longer be a problem.
translation: 啊，很好。你活了下来。我还在想你没准活不成了。我得告诉你个好消息，孢子问题终于解决了。

original: Now all that's left is to ensure that none of this ever happens again. The research that led to these abominations must be erased.
translation: 剩下要做的就是杜绝这种事再次发生。所以引发这次事故的所有研究资料都必须销毁。

original: The Legate is expecting you.
translation: 特使正在等你。

original: It is important that you go see the Legate.
translation: 你必须尽快去见特使。

original: The Legate would have my head if I were to let you pass.
translation: 如果我放你过去的话，特使会要了我的命。

original: I haven't fed them in days. The Legate wants them hungry for the battle to come.
translation: 我已经好几天没有给它们喂吃的了。为了即将到来的战斗，特使希望它们饿着。

original: Somebody whacked the NCR president. Got what was coming to him.
translation: 有人除掉了NCR的总统。他终于遭报应了。

original: Best to lay low. The NCR and the Legion are about to have it out.
translation: 最好低调点。NCR和军团的大战一触即发。

original: Fuck you.
translation: 去你妈的。

original: You're back. What's the word from Papa Khan?
translation: 你回来了，从父汗那里带回了什么消息 ?

original: Somebody whacked the NCR president. Got what was coming to him.
translation: 有人除掉了NCR的总统。他终于遭报应了。

original: Someone took out the Legion's boss. Doubt it'll stop them for long, though.
translation: 有人干掉了军团的老大。但我认为这并不会延缓他们扩张的脚步。

original: Lot more troops on the road these days. Wonder what's up.
translation: 最近往来的部队增加了不少，不知发生了什么事情。

original: Best to lay low. The NCR and the Legion are about to have it out.
translation: 最好低调点。NCR和军团的大战一触即发。

original: This has been a dream come true to work on the Lady. I don't think I've seen Loyal this frisky in years.
translation: 能够再见到淑女，简直是美梦成真。我已经很多年没有见到罗亚尔这样手舞足蹈了。

original: Have you seen her? The redhead of my dreams?
translation: 你见到她了吗？我梦中的那位红发女郎？

original: Hi! I can't believe I'm going to meet my red-headed lady soon! I'm really nervous about it!
translation: 嗨！真不敢相信我马上就要见到红发女郎了！我现在还真有点紧张！

original: You're a terrible person! I loved her! And you let her run right into our killzone. Why didn't you stop her?
translation: 你这该死的东西！我爱她！而你居然眼睁睁地看着她去送死。你为什么没有阻止她？

original: Go to hell, outsider. Stay away from me.
translation: 去死吧，外来者。离我远点儿。

original: Hey there. Back for more?
translation: 你好。又回来了？

original: That was pretty incredible. I've never seen anyone come out of the Boomers' rain of death alive before.
translation: 真是相当不得了。我以前从没见过有人能从大炮族的火力压制下活着走出来。

original: Hey there lady! Can you help me find Mister Cuddles?
translation: 你好，女士！你能帮我找抱抱先生吗？

original: Hey there mister! Can you help me find Mister Cuddles?
translation: 你好，先生！你能帮我找抱抱先生吗？

original: Hi again! Have you found Mister Cuddles?
translation: 嗨！你找到抱抱先生了吗？

original: Pearl sent word saying it's all right to tell you about the Lady in the water.
translation: 珀尔让我给你带个话，她说现在可以告诉你关于水中淑女的事情了。

original: It's going to be a dream come true once you've raised that bomber from Lake Mead!
translation: 如果你能把轰炸机从米德湖里捞出来，那才真是梦想成真！

original: I hope Pearl knows what she's doing, letting you wander around Nellis as you please.
translation: 真不知道珀尔在做什么，居然会允许你随心所欲地在内利斯乱逛。

original: What is it, Outsider?
translation: 什么事，外来者？

original: Hey! Do you have any toys outside of here? I sure could use something fun.
translation: 嘿。外面有没有玩具？我肯定有些很有意思的东西。

original: I've heard about what you've done around here, and I have nothing to say to you, outsider.
translation: 我听说过你的事迹了，我没什么好和你说的，外来者。

original: Hold it right there! Don't you move!
translation: 站住！不要动！

original: How the hell did you survive that bombardment?
translation: 你他妈怎么从炮击里活下来的？

original: Yes, Outsider?
translation: 是，外来者？

original: I told you I wouldn't work against the NCR. I meant it.
translation: 我跟你说了我不会和NCR作对。我是认真的。

original: I'm out of here.
translation: 我要走了。

original: Still helping the Legion. You're gonna get what's coming to you. I promise you that.
translation: 你还在帮军团做事。我敢打包票，你不会落得什么好下场的。

original: We're through working together.
translation: 我们不会再一起共事了。

original: No offense, but I need to focus on getting more rest when I'm off duty. I'm not sleeping so good. So now's not a good time.
translation: 我没别的意思，但我需要在不当班的时候好好休息。我睡得不好。所以现在不是聊天的时候。

original: If you want to talk, catch me when I'm on duty. I'm up in the dinosaur after 9 pm.
translation: 如果你真有话要说，那就等我当班的时候来找我吧。我早上9点以后都在恐龙嘴里执勤。

original: Let's get out of this first.
translation: 让我们先把这事解决了。

original: Pisses me off that Legion slavers can just operate on NCR turf like that.
translation: 军团的奴隶贩子在NCR的地盘上还敢那么明目张胆，真是气死我了。

original: If we hadn't caught up to them they'd probably have a clear path to the river. No one to stop them.
translation: 如果我们没追上他们，他们搞不好已经轻松抵达河对岸了。这一路上都没人阻止他们。

original: There should be patrols. Checkpoints. We got greedy, overstretched. Now our own territory isn't secure.
translation: 本来是应该有巡逻队和哨站的。我们太贪心，把战线拉得太长，结果现在连我们自己的地盘都不安全了。

original: Hey. I want to thank you for bringing me to Bitter Springs. Things seem... clearer now.
translation: 嘿，我要谢谢你带我来苦泉。事情现在……似乎明朗多了。

original: Like I said, I won't run out on you, but I can't let my people get dragged through the mud for this.
translation: 我说过，我不会对你不利，但我也不能因为这件事而让我的部下蒙羞。

original: You did good and you did it well. Work a ranger would be proud of. I'll handle the rest from here.
translation: 你做得很对，也很出色。即便是游骑兵，也会感到光荣。剩下的事就交给我自己处理吧。

original: I can spot a Brotherhood spy from a thousand yards. Even the cute ones.
translation: 我能在一千码就发现兄弟会的间谍。就算是个美女都瞒不过我。

original: I've never seen a Ghoul up close. Not sure I wanted to.
translation: 我从没近距离看过尸鬼。还是别看的好。

original: That thing is housebroken, right?
translation: 这东西受过管教吧？

original: I like you big mutants. You're easy to sight.
translation: 我就喜欢你们这些大个子变种人。目标大，容易看见。

original: Did you know you have a robot following you?
translation: 你知道有个机器人跟着你吗？

original: Whatever you're selling, we have plenty.
translation: 不管你要卖什么，我们都不缺。

original: Keep your distance, soldier.
translation: 士兵，保持距离。

original: A doctor? Who's your supplier?
translation: 医生？谁给你供药？

original: I actually got to fly Pearl for a little bit during that bombing run. Hot damn, what an honor.
translation: 事实上，我在那次轰炸中稍微驾驶了一下珀尔。干他妈，真是太光荣了。

original: I can't believe we may see the superfortress built in my lifetime.
translation: 真不敢相信，居然能在我有生之年看到超级堡垒建成。

original: Really? So we may see our dream of flight soon?
translation: 真的？我们很快就能看到梦想中的飞机了？

original: Nice work with the assassination attempt! If my troops were half as dedicated as you, we'd win the war in a week!
translation: 你成功阻止了刺杀！要是我的人能有你一半用心，没准我们一个礼拜就能打赢战争了！

original: Thanks for your help, I feel like we can take on the world!
translation: 感谢你的帮助，我觉得我们可以拿下全世界了！

original: Haven't seen you around before, soldier.
translation: 以前没见过你，士兵。

original: Not very often we see civilians on-base. What's your story?
translation: 我们很少在营地见到平民。你是什么来头？

original: I hear Caesar's dead. Maybe that means the war will be over soon.
translation: 我听说凯撒死了。也许战争很快就会结束了。

original: Razz said the candy he got us was special! I wonder what he- Gnaaah, kill, kill, rip and kill! -meant by that?
translation: 拉兹说他给我们的糖果很特殊！我很好奇他说的——啊呀，杀，杀，冲啊，杀呀！-到底是什么意思？

original: Y'all sure are a big ol' hero. I gotta write my mama and tell her I met you!
translation: 你就是传说中的大英雄。我要写信告诉妈妈我见到你了！

original: Ever since consuming those "illicit rations" Razz offered us, I have felt a steadily-increasing desire to kill.
translation: 自从吸了拉兹给我们的那些"违禁品"，我感觉自己的杀戮欲望越来越强烈。

original: You've done an excellent job ingratiating yourself to the top brass. I assume this is some sort of strategem?
translation: 你的成绩很出色，上级长官都对你青睐有加。你是不是耍了什么小聪明？

original: Ha ha, fuck me, Jack's shit is still the best!
translation: 哈哈，我操，还是杰克的货最正！

original: So I finally get to meet the courier who's caused so much trouble for the New California Republic.
translation: 终于见到这位给新加州共和国造成无数麻烦的邮差了。

original: So I finally get to meet the courier who's accomplished so much in so little time. That's why I summoned you here, right?
translation: 终于见到那位声名鹊起的邮差了。不过也是因为这样我才召见你的，不是吗？

original: I mean, a man nearly kills you, and your response is to track him across the breadth of the Mojave?
translation: 你为了报复那个差点杀了你的人，居然追着他横穿了整片莫哈维沙漠？

original: There are rewards for doing as I command. Today, your reward is vengeance. You get to decide how Benny dies.
translation: 服从我的人，都能得到奖赏。今天，你的奖赏就是复仇：我允许你来决定本尼的死法。

original: Go to Benny, let him know what you've decided. My Praetorians will perform the execution - unless you want to perform it yourself.
translation: 去找本尼，亲自向他下达你的判决。我的禁卫军会遵照执行——除非你想自己动手。

original: I want you to forge an alliance between Caesar's Legion and the White Glove Society.
translation: 我要你代表凯撒军团去和白手套社团结盟。

original: They used to be cannibals. I expect that information can be used to manipulate them. Go to -
translation: 他们以前是食人族。希望这则情报能有助于你说服他们。快去——

original: Ehhhh! Goddammit!
translation: 呃啊啊啊！该死！

original: Have you been successful in your efforts to recruit the White Glove Society?
translation: 你成功征募白手套社团了吗？

original: All right, let's state the obvious. There's something wrong with me.
translation: 很好，我们就开门见山吧。我的身体有些不对劲。

original: The headaches started a couple of months ago. They weren't too bad at first... but now they come frequently and they're... debilitating.
translation: 几个月前就开始头痛了。起先并不厉害……可现在越来越频繁了，而且……病痛让我变得非常虚弱。

original: For the past two weeks, my left leg has been dragging. It's stiffer, hard to move. And you've seen me blank out.
translation: 过去的两周，我的左腿一直是瘸的。现在它变得更加僵硬，几乎不听使唤。你也看到了我昏厥的样子。

original: Lucius says I stare into space, blink a few times, then keep talking like nothing happened. So what's the diagnosis?
translation: 卢修斯说我有时会突然两眼放空，眨巴几下之后又若无其事地继续说话。你觉得我这究竟是什么症状？

original: My forces are in a position to assault the Dam. Legatus Lanius has assumed command.
translation: 我的部队已经就位，随时准备突袭水坝。战斗将由副帅兰尼乌斯指挥。

original: Are you ready to go to him? To tell him to begin the assault?
translation: 你准备好去找他了吗？告诉他开始进攻？

original: How much ass did you have to kick to get Papa Khan to like you so much?
translation: 你到底是做了什么不得了的事，会让父汗这么喜欢你？

original: I understand you've been invited to meet with Caesar. You should be aware of the honor you've been granted.
translation: 我知道你已受邀觐见凯撒。你应该清楚自己获得了怎样的荣耀。

original: Greetings in the name of Caesar.
translation: 以以凯撒之名，向您致意。

original: Thanks again for saving my ass.
translation: 多谢你救了我的小命。

original: Any luck finding Anders?
translation: 找到安德斯了么？

original: You're not one of my regulars. What do you want?
translation: 你好像不是我的老主顾呀。你想要什么？

original: Did you make that delivery yet?
translation: 你的货送到了吗？

original: Hey, what's up?
translation: 嘿，怎么了？

original: Well, well, well, if it ain't the best-loved cat on the Strip in my theater! What can Tommy do for you, baby?
translation: 哎呀，哎呀，瞧瞧又有贵客上门了，这不是长街上最受人喜爱的小猫咪么！不知汤米能为你做些什么呀，宝贝？

original: Now baby, you know I welcome everybody here at the Aces, but I gotta ask you to keep any mayhem to a minimum, you dig?
translation: 听我说，宝贝，虽然王牌剧场来者不拒，但我真的得麻烦您，别在我们这儿惹事，明白吗？

original: I got to hand it to you, baby, you did an 18-karat job on this one. My schedule's so full I couldn't put on new acts if I wanted to!
translation: 我得跟你说实话，宝贝，你干得太漂亮了，简直和18克拉钻石一样。现在我的节目表满当当的，新场子都安排不过来了！

original: Hey, come on, pal, I'm trying to put on a show here, you're welcome!
translation: 嘿，拜托，老兄，我在演出啊！

original: I just can't believe it... the President's dead. It doesn't even feel real.
translation: 我没法相信……总统死了。我真的无法相信。

original: I'll give you this, you've got a lot of guts walking in here like this.
translation: 不得不说，你居然敢大摇大摆地出现在这儿，真是胆量十足。

original: I really appreciate those books. They've already been a huge help.
translation: 我真的很喜欢那些书。它们令我受益匪浅。

original: Been doing a lot of good work out there, setting an example for the others - I know Ranger Jackson appreciates it.
translation: 你坚持行善，为他人树立了榜样——游骑兵杰克逊肯定会感激你的。

original: Back 'round? Just my luck... what'll it be this time?
translation: 回来了？瞧我这运气……这次你又有什么事 ?

original: Excuse me, but I'm busy.
translation: 抱歉，我在忙。

original: Don't worry boss, I'm sure Caesar just wants to invite you over for coffee or something. That's all.
translation: 老大，别担心，我敢肯定凯撒只是想请你去喝杯咖啡之类的。仅此而已。

original: I'm glad you decided to off one of the most powerful men in the Mojave. Life was getting boring anyway. Really.
translation: 我很高兴你决定把莫哈维沙漠中最有权势的人之一置于死地。反正生活也很乏味。真的。

original: Did blowing up that vault serve any purpose, or do you just like explosions?
translation: 把那个避难所炸飞有什么意义吗，还是你只是单纯地喜欢看爆炸？

original: Just to be clear, we're not planning to visit any NCR facilities, right boss? Like, ever again?
translation: 就是确认一下，咱们并没有打算访问NCR的任何设施，对吧，老大？永远不会有？

original: Well, the President's dead, but don't worry. History has shown that that sort of thing almost never leads to massive destabilizations or world wars.
translation: 好了，总统已经死了，不过别担心。历史已经一再证明，这种事情从来就不会导致大规模动乱或者世界大战。

original: I hope Red Lucy gives us the *big* monsters, next.
translation: 希望血手露西下次能派真正的*大*家伙上场。

original: What the hell? Is that a half-robot dog?
translation: 什么东西？那是一条半机械狗吗 ?

original: You better control that thing. Bots can't be trusted.
translation: 你最好能管住那东西。机器人都不可信。

original: A Follower is always welcome among our people.
translation: 天启追随者在这里是非常受欢迎的。

original: Keep the Ranger on a leash around here.
translation: 把你的游骑兵拴好。

original: Another Super Mutant roaming outer New Vegas, huh?
translation: 怎么又来一个在新维加斯外围闲逛的超级变种人 ?

original: All humans are welcome here, even Ghouls.
translation: 这里欢迎任何人，包括尸鬼。

original: Even Presidents die, huh? Good.
translation: 就连总统都死了？很好。

original: Caesar's death don't change shit down here.
translation: 凯撒的死能对这里有个屁的影响。

original: That Legion boss would've never taken the city, but I'm glad he's a goner.
translation: 那个军团老大根本夺取不了这座城市，不过他死了是最好的。

original: If there's war in the end, it won't affect our city.
translation: 就算以后真打仗，也影响不到我们的城市。

original: Rumors of imminent war have made it all the way down here.
translation: 这里谣言四起，都说战争要打响了。

original: Going to stay down here until all the trouble outside blows over.
translation: 在外面的麻烦事结束前，我还是躲在这里比较好。

original: Looks like the entire region's going straight where we are - knee-deep in shit.
translation: 感觉这地方的人就快和我们差不多了，都一脚踩进膝盖深的屎里。

original: Only one bad thing about The Thorn, it brings all the idiots, assholes and topsiders down here.
translation: 荆棘街唯一的问题就是，它把所有的白痴、杂种和上面的人都集中到这下面来了。

original: I can't wait to hit The Thorn. I wouldn't mind hitting on Red Lucy either, but she's outta my league.
translation: 我等不及要去荆棘街了。虽然我不介意和血手露西来一发，但她应该看不上我。

original: One of these days, Red Lucy's going to show off her Deathclaws.
translation: 过不了几天，血手露西就该让她的死亡爪出场了。

original: Good to see you respect the Followers.
translation: 很高兴你能尊重天启追随者。

original: Make sure the NCR dog behaves, you're in the Mojave now.
translation: 管好你身边那条NCR的狗，你现在是在莫哈维。

original: Your merchant friend is always welcome among us.
translation: 非常欢迎你的商人朋友。

original: That bot of yours don't look like anything I've seen in the Mojave.
translation: 你这个机器人和我在莫哈维见过的东西都不一样。

original: Your friend's not from the desert, is she?
translation: 你的那个朋友不是从沙漠里来的吧？

original: You've made it! Thanks so much for your help. I owe you more than- Wait! What's that?
translation: 你成功了！非常感谢你的帮助。我欠你——等等！怎么回事？

original: Just talk to Big Beard next to me, pal. Whoever's got the biggest whiskers, does the talking...
translation: 有话就去和我边上的大胡子说吧，伙计。这地方，只有胡子最密的人才有发言权……

original: I don't know how we pulled this off. For a minute there, I thought we were not going to make it.
translation: 我都不知道我们是怎么逃出来的，有那么一分钟我真的以为我们都完了。

original: Without you, we'd have been in the losing end. Thank you so much for your help, friend.
translation: 没有你的话，我们早就死无葬身之地了。非常感谢你的帮助，朋友。

original: Hey, friend! It's good to see you again.
translation: 嘿，朋友！能再次看到你真是太好了。

original: This place doesn't have the glitter of the Strip, but I've got Joana - that's all I'll ever need.
translation: 这地方没有长街那样光彩夺目，但是我有琼娜——这就足够了。

original: I kinda like being a farmer.
translation: 我有点向往农夫的生活了。

original: Crops aren't getting as much water lately.
translation: 最近都没有足够的水来灌溉庄稼了。

original: We're better off with those slaver bastards Saint James and Dermot.
translation: 没有圣詹姆斯和德莫特那两个杂种奴隶贩子，我们的日子好过多了。

original: That Sweetie sure is something.
translation: 那个小甜甜本事不错。

original: I'm gonna miss having Anderson around.
translation: 我会想念有安德森在的日子的。

original: I've still got guns and ammo, if you need them.
translation: 如果你需要的话，我这儿还有枪支和弹药。

original: Can you spare some caps, mister?
translation: 能给几个瓶盖吗，先生？

original: Can you spare some caps, ma'am?
translation: 能给几个瓶盖吗，女士？

original: I lost everything I had at The Tops, but if you gave me 500 caps, I'd head straight back. Sick, huh?
translation: 我在九重天输得精光，但如果你给我500瓶盖，我还是会直接回去。中毒不浅，对吧？

original: Go East! they say. Scrap lying in the sun for you to grab. Yeah, right.
translation: 去东部！他们说的，满地废品等你捡。好吧，也没错。

original: I don't work for freelancers. So move along.
translation: 我可不为自由职业者工作。请你走开。

original: Stay out of my way and I'll stay out of yours, got it?
translation: 你别挡我的道，我也不挡你的道，明白了？

original: It's quiet out here. We like to keep it that way.
translation: 这里很平静，我们就喜欢这样。

original: Back for more?
translation: 又来买东西了？

original: I'm going to assume you had reason to kill Dermot and his pet. Always had a bad feeling about them. But everyone else here is hands-off.
translation: 我想你应该也是有什么仇怨才会杀了德莫特和他的跟班吧。他们确实让人生厌，但这里的人从来都不会去过问。

original: You can just talk to the whores, you know. You and me, we don't need to talk unless there's trouble.
translation: 你可以去和那些妓女聊天。除非有什么麻烦，否则你我之间没什么可说的。

original: When I talk to a girl, I start the conversation! And I didn't start no conversation with you.
translation: 每次和姑娘说话，都是我先开口！而我还没和你开口说话呢。

original: Hey, baby. What say you and me get acquainted?
translation: 嘿，宝贝。来和我玩玩？

original: Welcome to Casa Madrid - cheapest, cleanest whores in all New Vegas. If you want to know the rates for poon, talk to the whores.
translation: 欢迎来到卡萨·马德里——新维加斯最便宜、最干净的妓女都在这里。如果你想谈价钱，就和你中意的姑娘说话吧。

original: House is dead, wonder if Motor-Runner will let us hit the Strip now.
translation: 豪斯死了，不知道轰鸣恶煞现在会不会让我们杀进长街。

original: Your pet Ghoul smells like ass.
translation: 你这宠物尸鬼闻起来跟屎一样。

original: Is that Mean Sonofabitch? They all look the same to me.
translation: 那是无耻杂种吗？我看他们都长一个样。

original: A flying robot? Man, I must be fucked up.
translation: 会飞的机器人？伙计，我一定是疯了。

original: I wouldn't mind hitting that. She put out?
translation: 我不介意和她干一炮，她能撩吗？

original: Someone is targeting us, I'm gonna kill that fucker when I find out who did it.
translation: 有人想干我们。等我揪出那个狗日的，一定要宰了他。

original: Fuck, where are we gonna get our shit from now that the Khans are all buddy buddy with the NCR?
translation: 操，大汗帮都和NCR称兄道弟了，我们以后从哪儿搞药啊？

original: Motor-Runner dead? Who the fuck gonna run the show now?
translation: 轰鸣恶煞死了？那现在他妈的是谁说了算 ?

original: Gotta wonder why the NCR hasn't come for us.
translation: NCR的人怎么还不来。

original: We sure showed those bastards in the NCR.
translation: 我们给那些NCR的杂种好好上了一课。

original: Haven't seen Meyers around. Did he run off or something?
translation: 最近都没见迈尔斯，他是逃了还是怎么的？

original: Scrambler's crazier than usual. Watch yourself.
translation: 爬行者比平时更疯狂了。你自己小心。

original: I hear that woman can kill with her eyes! Stay away from me!
translation: 我听说那个女人可以用眼神杀人！离我远点！

original: Your lady friend needs to lighten up.
translation: 你那个女性朋友应该阳光一点。

original: Better watch out, I hear Rex likes to eat his owners. Why do you think the King was so eager to give him away?
translation: 你最好小心点，我听说雷克斯喜欢吃他的主人。要不猫王干嘛那么急着把它送人？

original: Good to see Rex still around and kicking.
translation: 见到雷克斯还这么鲜活的真好。

original: That's one ragged Ghoul you've got with you. Seems like a good guy, though.
translation: 跟着你的尸鬼还真是破衣烂衫的。不过看起来是个好人。

original: That Ghoul with you looks like he's older than the war! My the things he must have seen.
translation: 跟你一起的那个尸鬼看起来像是战前出生的！他肯定见识过许多事。

original: Oh no, I hear those things eat people! Stay back, freak!
translation: 哦，不，我听说那些玩意会吃人！退后，怪物！

original: Odd company you keep. I thought all Super Mutants were crazed cannibals.
translation: 你那跟班真奇怪。我还以为所有的超级变种人都是丧心病狂的食人族呢。

original: Weird robot. I don't think I've ever seen one of those before.
translation: 奇怪的机器人，我好像从没见过这型号的。

original: That looks like one of those spybots I hear House has been secretly releasing at night.
translation: 据说豪斯会在晚上偷偷放些监视机器人出来，这个机器人好像就是其中之一。

original: Business and luck don't often go hand-in-hand in the Mojave. Watch your back.
translation: 在莫哈维可不能光靠运气。你最好多加小心。

original: Check out the Wrangler if she needs booze.
translation: 她如果想要烈酒，就去原子牛仔看看。

original: Keep your guns to yourself and there won't be any trouble.
translation: 你把枪收好，就不会有麻烦。

original: You're not doing yourself a favor by having him tag along. NCR aren't welcome here.
translation: 你让他跟着你可不是什么好事。NCR在这里不受欢迎。

original: I hear that guy has hundreds of kills, not all of them deserving of death.
translation: 我听说那家伙杀了几百人，其中不少是无辜的平民。

original: I always thought there was more to Arcade than met the eye. I bet he'll do great things without the Followers holding him back.
translation: 我一直都认为阿卡德没有发挥出他真正的实力。要不是天启追随者扯后腿，我打赌他能成大事。

original: I'm surprised to see Arcade venturing out of the Old Mormon Fort. I thought science types preferred to stay indoors.
translation: 看到阿卡德走出旧摩门教要塞，我很吃惊，我还以为这种科学人才都足不出户呢。

original: Witch! Witch! You should be burned for all the people you've turned into newts!
translation: 巫师！巫师！应该把你烧死，为那些被你变成蜥蜴的人报仇！

original: Some say you like to trip old ladies crossing the street. Others say you regularly string up thugs.
translation: 有人说你喜欢把过街的老太太放倒。其他人则说你经常收拾暴徒。

original: People just don't know what to think of you.
translation: 大家都不知道你到底在想什么。

original: Hmm?
translation: 嗯？

original: Yeah?
translation: 嗯？

original: What's up?
translation: 怎么了？

original: I hear the Kings were wiped out by some kind of Super Mutant ninja assassin paid by the NCR! Who else could have taken them down?!
translation: 我听说猫王帮被NCR雇的超级变种忍者刺客消灭了！不然还能有谁这么厉害呢？！

original: Some people are saying the Great Khans got drugged up out of their minds and attacked the dam.
translation: 据说大汗帮的人嗑药嗑到丧失理智，进攻了水坝。

original: I heard the Khans went wild at Hoover Dam. I suppose they were looking for one last blaze of glory.
translation: 我听说大汗帮在水坝发狂了。估计他们是要追寻最后的荣耀。

original: I hear the Great Khans staged their own deaths to trick the NCR.
translation: 我听说大汗帮至死都在和NCR作对。

original: People say the Khans got wiped out at Red Rock. That's one less bunch of crazies to worry about.
translation: 都说大汗帮在红岩峡谷被一锅端了。又少了一伙让人担心的疯子。

original: The Great Khans aren't gone. They're just hiding, biding their time...
translation: 大汗帮并没有消失。他们只是藏在暗处，等待时机……

original: The Great Khans moved out? One less mob of degenerates to worry about, if you ask me.
translation: 大汗帮离开了？要我说，又少了一伙需要担心的暴徒。

original: I heard Motor-Runner got taken down. Maybe the Fiends will finally destroy themselves now that he's gone.
translation: 我听说轰鸣恶煞被干掉了。没了他，恶魔帮最终可能会自我毁灭吧。

original: I hear Hanlon was working for the aliens and NCR found out.
translation: 我听说汉隆其实是为外星人服务的，而且被NCR发现了。

original: Chief Hanlon is dead? I hear that guy couldn't order himself out of a cardboard box, let alone command troops.
translation: 军士长汉隆死了？我听说那家伙连指挥自己从纸箱里爬出来都做不到，还怎么率领部队啊。

original: My friends say you're working for the Illuminati, and that's why you killed Kimball. Watch your back. They have listening devices everywhere!
translation: 我朋友都说你为光明会工作，所以你才要杀金博尔。小心点，他们到处都安了监听器！

original: Killing Kimball is going to make a mess of things around here. The troopers coming through here are mean enough already.
translation: 金博尔一死，这里的局势更混乱了。不断增加的部队已经证明了这点。

original: You freed that Silus guy from McCarran? Guess you've got your reasons for helping the Legion.
translation: 你把那个叫希鲁斯的家伙从麦卡伦给放了？我想你肯定有自己的理由才帮军团的。

original: Rumor has it Mr. House joined the NCR on account of some secret love child he never even knew he had.
translation: 传言说豪斯先生之所以加入NCR，是因为他有个自己都不知道的私生子在NCR手里。

original: House must have special plans for you to get into the Lucky 38 and come out alive.
translation: 豪斯让你活着进出幸运38，肯定是有什么特别的目的。

original: Howdy, doc. Strange to see you wandering around.
translation: 你好啊，医生。在这儿见到你还真是稀奇。

original: I admire a woman who can hold her liquor. Cute to boot.
translation: 我就喜欢泼辣女人。特别过瘾。

original: She looks like she knows how to handle herself in a fight.
translation: 她看起来很能打。

original: I hope you programmed that thing to be friendly to Freesiders.
translation: 希望你已经把那东西的程序设置成对自由城友善了。

original: Super Mutant? You don't look so super to me.
translation: 超级变种人？我看也没那么超级啊。

original: How's it hangin', old man? Oh, sorry.
translation: 最近怎么样啊，老头？哦，抱歉。

original: Hey, Rex. I see your new master is keeping you polished up. Good for you.
translation: 嘿，雷克斯。你的新主人把你打扮得锃光瓦亮的嘛。挺好。

original: Cheer up, lady. You've still got your youth.
translation: 高兴点，女士。你还很年轻呢。

original: With their leader gone, the Legion will likely tear itself apart. It's what most violent tribal societies do.
translation: 既然他们的领袖死了，军团很可能会四分五裂。大多数依靠暴力组织起的部落社会，最后都是这个结果。

original: Someone blew up the monorail the NCR uses to travel to the Strip and back. We should use this time to strike!
translation: 有人把NCR用于往返长街的单轨铁路炸了。我们应该抓住这个时机进攻！

original: There's a rumor going around that you saved the NCR president's life. I'm surprised you have the stones to show your face around here.
translation: 有传言说就是你救了NCR总统的狗命。我真好奇你怎么还有胆子到这里来。

original: There was an attempt on the NCR president's life recently. Too bad it didn't succeed.
translation: 最近有一起针对NCR总统的刺杀行动。可惜没有成功。

original: Were you the one who killed the NCR president? I'd like to shake your hand!
translation: 你就是宰了NCR总统的那个人？我想和你握握手！

original: Did you hear? Someone actually managed to assassinate the NCR's president! And we just sit here!
translation: 你听说了么？真的有人成功刺杀了NCR总统！可我们却还坐在这儿！

original: The other day I heard some bigwig in the NCR military died. Hopefully it disrupts their chain of command some.
translation: 前几天我听说NCR军方的某个大人物死了。希望这能打乱他们的指挥系统。

original: Did you hear about that NCR higher up that died? That he was trying to sabotage them? Hope he wasn't the only one.
translation: 你听说过NCR那个死了的高层吗？他居然一直在暗中搞破坏？希望这么干的不止他一个。

original: We just had word that the town of Primm is now part of the NCR. At this rate, they'll be running the whole region soon.
translation: 我们刚刚才听说普瑞姆现在已经归顺NCR了。这样下去，他们很快就会控制这一整片地区。

original: It's the quiet before the storm up top. For once, I'm almost glad we're down here.
translation: 这只是暴风雨前的宁静。我第一次觉得我们待在这下面真好。

original: Keep an eye on Veronica here. She's a sharp one.
translation: 多留心维罗妮卡。她可不是省油的灯。

original: Try to keep Veronica out of trouble, would you?
translation: 别让维罗妮卡受委屈，好吗？

original: If you're planning to take Veronica with you, be sure to have a good pair of earplugs with you. I'm kidding, Veronica! Put the power fist down!
translation: 要是你准备带上维罗妮卡同行，那你一定要准备一副好耳塞。我开玩笑的，维罗妮卡！把动力拳套放下！

original: What a fascinating animal. I'm sure the scribes will want to take a look at him.
translation: 多奇妙的动物啊。我肯定学士们会想研究一下他的。

original: Is that a Mk. III Support Model you have with you? I've seen references to them, but never with my own eyes. I imagine he makes a great pet.
translation: 你带的那个是III型支援模组？我在一些资料上看到过类似记载，但从没亲眼见过。他做宠物肯定很听话吧。

original: Where did you get that Eyebot? I've never seen one modified quite like that.
translation: 你从哪搞来的这个眼球机器人？我从没见过这样的改装。

original: Keep that mutant in line, or we'll put it down.
translation: 管好你的变种人，不要让我们来帮你管。

original: Oh good, now I have to put up with the stench of rotting Ghoul as well. I hope the air filters are working.
translation: 妙极了，现在我还要忍受腐烂尸鬼身上的味道。希望空气净化器没出毛病。

original: I've heard that your friend there can put some of the senior scribes to shame.
translation: 听说你的朋友知识渊博，连不少高阶学士也相形见绌。

original: Why is your friend there glaring at me like that? Did I bump into him or something?
translation: 为什么你的朋友这样打量我？我是撞着他了还是怎么着？

original: Does Ramos know you're walking around without a guard?
translation: 你怎么在这乱晃，也没个警卫跟着，拉莫斯知道吗？

original: Are you adjusting to the bunker, outsider?
translation: 你适应地堡里的生活了吗？外来者？

original: Just between you and me, I'm glad you're here. This place needed a fresh face.
translation: 私下跟你说，我很高兴你能来。这地方需要新面孔。

original: So you're one of us now, eh? Truly it is a rare honor.
translation: 这么说你现在是我们的一员了，嗯？真是少有的荣誉。

original: How long before we resume normal patrols?
translation: 还有多久我们才能恢复正常巡逻？

original: After the battle at HELIOS One, some people were worried about the NCR coming after us, but this bunker is secure.
translation: 太阳神一号之战后，有人担心NCR会追杀我们，但地堡是绝对安全的。

original: Hardin will be Elder soon, mark my words.
translation: 记住我的话，哈丁过不了多久就会当上长老。

original: Why are we hiding down here? We should be avenging our fallen brothers!
translation: 为什么我们要躲在地底下呢？我们应该为牺牲的兄弟报仇！

original: When are these night missions going to end?
translation: 这些夜间任务什么时候才到头？

original: Ugh, more VR training. Maybe I'll hit the shooting range instead.
translation: 呃，又是VR模拟训练。我宁愿去靶场练习射击。

original: After this, I have some weapons to repair.
translation: 这事完了之后，我还得去修理武器。

original: You've been outside. Is the NCR really still hunting us?
translation: 你在外面呆过。NCR真的还在追杀我们吗？

original: Hardin owes his life to McNamara. That's why he won't challenge him outright.
translation: 哈丁欠麦克纳马拉一条命，所以他不敢公开挑战他。

original: The Lucky 38's reactor has been restarted... it can be seen from miles away.
translation: 幸运38的反应堆重启了……几英里外都能看到。

original: The food here is to die for. No one cooks Brahmin like Philippe.
translation: 能尝到这里的佳肴，真是死了都不亏。菲利普做的双头牛肉无与伦比。

original: You ain't heard anything about my boy, have you?
translation: 你有没有我儿子的消息？

original: You double-crossing snake! I have nothing to say to someone so lowly and ill-mannered.
translation: 你这两面派！我跟你这样的卑鄙小人无话可说。

original: I wanted Mr. Gunderson out of the way, not slaughtered in my hotel! Our business is concluded. Good day!
translation: 我是想让冈德森先生别再和我们作对，不是想让他死在我的酒店里！咱们这桩生意没得做了。再见！

original: Ah, you're back. You're always a welcome guest here.
translation: 啊，你回来了。这里永远欢迎你。

original: Why are you standing still? Do you think the world waits for you while you stand there drooling? Get back out there and get to work!
translation: 你还傻愣着干什么？你是不是以为自己站着发愣的时候全世界都会停下来等你？赶紧滚回去干活！

original: Why are you standing still? Do you think the world waits for you while you stand there drooling? Get back out there and get to work!
translation: 你还傻愣着干什么？你是不是以为自己站着发愣的时候全世界都会停下来等你？赶紧滚回去干活！

original: You! What do you think you're doing?
translation: 你！你以为你在干什么？

original: Now it can truly be said that not only do we dress better than anyone, we eat better as well.
translation: 现在终于可以毋庸置疑地说，我们不光穿的比别人好，吃的也比别人好。

original: Did you see Heck Gunderson the brahmin baron at the bar? He may be a wastelander, but his taste clearly befits his status.
translation: 看到吧台边的赫克·冈德森了吗，就是那个双头牛大亨？虽然他来自废土，但他的品位彰显了他的格调。

original: Our executive chef Philippe is the toast of New Vegas. His Brahmin Wellington is absolutely sublime.
translation: 我们的行政主厨菲利普是新维加斯最棒的大厨。他做的惠灵顿牛排是人间一绝。

original: You watch yourself around Mr. Gunderson.
translation: 在冈德森先生身边时注意点。

original: Keep your distance. Who are you, and what do you want?
translation: 站那儿别动。你是谁，你想干什么？

original: That a pretty gal! Want to share? Ha ha ha!
translation: 哎呀，漂亮妹子啊！要不有福同享啊？哈哈哈 !

original: A veteran Ranger inspires awe. Stick around for when they get here, you'll see. If I live to earn the Black Armor, I can die a happy woman.
translation: 精英游骑兵会让人肃然起敬。等过一阵子他们来了，你就明白了。要是能穿上那样一套黑色盔甲，我这辈子也值了。

original: Don't get many chances to catch a legionary alive. Burns me up that we botched ours.
translation: 活捉军团士兵的机会本来就少。好不容易抓到一个却被我们自己给弄死了，真让人窝火。

original: Wish I had a First Recon guy looking after me.
translation: 真希望能有个第一侦察营的家伙来掩护我。

original: I heard we captured a live Centurion and then let him get away. That never would've happened if I was in charge.
translation: 听说我们活捉了一名百夫长，又让他跑了。这事让我来办，是绝不可能搞砸的。

original: Sounds like we're running Primm now. I'd still rather take my leave at the Strip.
translation: 听说普瑞姆现在归我们管了。但我还是宁愿去长街。

original: First Recon's at Camp Forlorn Hope. Now we've got a chance to hold it.
translation: 第一侦察营已经进驻飘零希望营地。这下我们守住的机会就大了。

original: Did you hear about that Legion POW escape? I don't like our chances of taking him alive twice.
translation: 你听说军团战俘逃跑的事情了吗？我想再次活捉他的希望不大。

original: That POW escape presents some real security concerns. That was our base camp, for crying out loud.
translation: 战俘逃亡暴露出来的是实实在在的安保隐患。搞什么鬼，那可是我们的大本营。

original: Can't believe Hanlon was working against us.
translation: 没想到汉隆居然暗中和我们作对。

original: The NCR's all over Primm. Steer clear.
translation: 现在普瑞姆到处是NCR的人。躲远点吧。

original: Somebody whacked the NCR president. Got what was coming to him.
translation: 有人干掉了NCR的总统。我就知道他会是这下场。

original: Holy fuck. Never seen a mutant like that before.
translation: 我的妈呀。从没见过那样的变种人。

original: Didn't know they still had robo-dogs around.
translation: 原来现在还有机器狗啊，我都不知道。

original: Wouldn't want to live forever if I had to look like a Ghoul.
translation: 要是变成尸鬼那样，我宁愿不要长生不死。

original: That guy's got cold eyes. Definitely ex-military.
translation: 这家伙眼神冰冷，绝对在部队里混过。

original: Now there's a fine-looking woman. Just needs to ditch the robe.
translation: 这女人挺漂亮。要是能脱掉袍子就更好了。

original: Tough-looking woman. Something tells me she aims for the crotch.
translation: 挺彪悍的女人。我估计她瞄人都是直接瞄裤裆的。

original: We bought and sold guys like Four-Eyes over there like property back in the prison.
translation: 当年关牢里的时候，我们可是把这些四眼田鸡当东西卖的。

original: No way I'm going back to prison.
translation: 我绝对不回监狱。

original: Holy fuck. Never seen a mutant like that before.
translation: 我的妈呀。从没见过那样的变种人。

original: That guy's got cold eyes. Definitely ex-military.
translation: 这家伙眼神冰冷，绝对在部队里混过。

original: Tough-looking woman. Something tells me she aims for the crotch.
translation: 这女人挺漂亮。要是能脱掉袍子就更好了。

original: Never gets old when something blows up.
translation: 炸东西玩永远不会腻。

original: Wouldn't mind having one of those little flying robots myself.
translation: 我倒是不介意能有一个会飞的小机器人。

original: I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: 我见过那些畜生的真面目，真不懂你怎么能相信他们。

original: I always knew House would give in! Sixth state of the union, here we come!
translation: 我就知道豪斯会屈服的！联邦的第六个州，马上要成立了！

original: Bitter Springs... a name like that could've only brought bad luck.
translation: 苦泉……这样的名字只会招来厄运。

original: Everywhere I go, people are talking about our President's assassination.
translation: 不管我走到哪里，人们总在谈论总统遇刺的事。

original: With House out of the way, I hope someone opens the Lucky 38.
translation: 豪斯已经不在了，我希望有人能打开幸运38的大门。

original: I see you prefer the company of anarchic cultists to civilized peoples.
translation: 比起文明人，我想你更喜欢和无政府主义的邪教徒们打交道。

original: This is it. War's almost upon us.
translation: 快了。大战就要来了。

original: Did you hear about Hanlon? What a blow!
translation: 你听说汉隆的事了吗？真是个打击！

original: You killed him! What have we done to you?
translation: 你杀了他！我们没把你怎么样啊？

original: I hear some asshole freed our enemy from McCarran.
translation: 我听说有傻逼从麦卡伦营地放走了我们的敌人。

original: With Mr. House dead and gone, Vegas can finally join the NCR!
translation: 豪斯先生死了，维加斯也终于可以加入NCR了！

original: Your robot looks worth quite a few caps.
translation: 你的机器人看起来值不少瓶盖啊。

original: I hope the Fiends stop their raids now that their boss is gone.
translation: 我希望这些恶魔帮别再出来打劫了，他们的老大都挂了。

original: Bad weather ahead, I tell you. The death of our President's just the start.
translation: 要变天了，我跟你说。总统的死只是个开始。

original: Don't dump your Ghoul here, we've already got enough shit around us.
translation: 别把你的尸鬼扔这儿，我们周围的破事已经够多了。

original: People of my trade respect the merchants of these territories.
translation: 干我们这行的都很尊敬这片地区的商人。

original: House was the only thing keeping Vegas from joining the NCR!
translation: 豪斯是阻止维加斯加入NCR的唯一障碍！

original: Our guys put the Monorail back to work!
translation: 我们的人修好了列车！

original: Our own President, murdered! Things aren't looking good.
translation: 我们的总统被谋杀了！大事不妙。

original: Hanlon was a brave soldier, what could've driven him to despair?
translation: 汉隆曾是一位勇敢的士兵，是什么事情把他逼上绝路？

original: I knew those Khans couldn't be trusted!
translation: 我就知道大汗帮的那些人信不得！

original: Civilizing Primm will show what we can do for everyone else in these territories.
translation: 普瑞姆的开化会向这片土地上的所有人展示我们的实力。

original: I've seen Followers of the Apocalypse in my travels before.
translation: 我之前在旅途中见过天启追随者。

original: NCR Rangers deserve all my praise.
translation: 我所有的赞美都归于NCR游骑兵。

original: Is your friend one of those elite troops we've been hearing about?
translation: 你的朋友就是那支传说中的精英部队的一员？

original: Your merchant friend would make a fine NCR woman.
translation: 你的商人朋友会成为NCR的优秀女性公民。

original: I've never seen a robot like that before.
translation: 我之前从未见过这种机器人。

original: The Super Mutant's under control, I hope.
translation: 我希望你能管好那个超级变种人。

original: I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: 我了解那些畜生的本性，我不知道你怎么会信任他们。

original: I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: 我了解那些畜生的本性，我不知道你怎么会信任他们。

original: I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: 我了解那些畜生的本性，我不知道你怎么会信任他们。

original: I've seen what those creatures do, and I don't know how you trust them.
translation: 我了解那些畜生的本性，我不知道你怎么会信任他们。

original: Your Ghoul friend better not be radioactive.
translation: 你的尸鬼朋友最好身上没有辐射。

original: What on earth is *that* creature?
translation: *那个*生物到底是什么？

original: Your lady friend seems out of place here.
translation: 你的女性朋友看起来和这个地方不太搭。

original: Your friend seems too civilized for a place like this.
translation: 你的朋友太文明了，跟这地方一点都不搭。

original: I should kill you myself for what you did to Kimball, and fuck the law!
translation: 我就该亲手杀掉你这个谋害总统的人，去他妈的法律！

original: I bet I'd get a reward for bringing your head to the authorities, assassin!
translation: 如果把你的脑袋交给政府，我敢打赌一定会拿到一笔赏金，刺客！

original: Kimball's luck ran out.
translation: 金博尔的好运到头了。

original: It's good to hear that Primm has accepted our law.
translation: 很高兴普瑞姆接受了我们的法律。

original: What's up?
translation: 最近如何 ?

original: Hey.
translation: 嘿。

original: Never seen a guardian dog like that before.
translation: 我以前从没见过那样的警卫犬。

original: NCR will civilize all this Wasteland, Primm is only the beginning.
translation: NCR会将文明传播到废土的每一个角落，普瑞姆只是个开始。

original: Despite our strength, the Legion army looks fierce enough to make me waver.
translation: 虽说我们也有实力，但看军团部队的阵势，真让我有些心虚。

original: Imagine, a Follower brave enough to leave Freeside.
translation: 想不到啊，天启追随者居然还有人敢离开自由城。

original: The dog is part-machine... but its brain is flesh.
translation: 这只狗一半是机器……但大脑还是狗的大脑。

original: What a revolting sight. To call that a friend?
translation: 真恶心。你和那玩意做朋友？

original: That machine looks like a floating eye. I don't like it.
translation: 那台机器好像一个会飞的眼睛。我不喜欢它。

original: How does one get that blue monster to obey?
translation: 你是怎么让那个蓝色怪物听话的？

original: I've heard the stories of how you assassinated Kimball. It's all my Legionaries will talk about.
translation: 我听说了你刺杀金博尔的事。这正是我们军团的目标。

original: Kimball's assassin is always welcome here.
translation: 刺杀金博尔的人在这里是永远受欢迎的。

original: The Centurion Silus will be punished for letting himself be captured. Coward.
translation: The 百夫长希鲁斯居然甘当俘虏，他会受到严惩的。懦夫。

original: The Mark of Caesar protects you.
translation: 凯撒的徽记庇护你。

original: Never once did I believe that Caesar was near death. I have friends in high places.
translation: 我从来都不相信凯撒快死了。我在高层有朋友。

original: Why is your degeneracy tolerated?
translation: 为什么你的堕落得到了容忍？

original: Kimball's assassin. Nicely done.
translation: 刺杀金博尔，干得漂亮。

original: Snuffles' leg seems to have gotten better.
translation: 鼻涕虫的腿看起来好多了。

original: Poor Snuffles. Wish somebody could do something about his leg.
translation: 可怜的鼻涕虫。但愿有人能帮他治好腿。

original: Hey, doll, how's my favorite girl? Got a kiss for me?
translation: 嘿，我心爱的小美女，最近过得还好吗？愿意赏我一个吻吗？

original: Couldn't stay away, huh baby? Shoulda known. What can I do for you?
translation: 舍不得走是吗，宝贝？我就知道。需要我做点什么？

original: This is neat! From this console I could've routed the dam's power input over to the Fort and activated that dormant army of Securitrons!
translation: 真是太漂亮了！我可以通过这个控制台把水坝的电力转移到城堡，并且激活休眠状态下的电子保安大军！

original: So go ahead and blow up the dam's generators! And when that's done, head back upside and finish off the Legion and the NCR.
translation: 去把水坝的发电机炸上天吧！然后我们再回上面去解决军团和NCR。

original: Don't you just love that Platinum Chip? Buzzes with power and possibilities, doesn't it?
translation: 那白金筹码难道不让你着迷吗？它蕴含着无限的力量和可能，不是吗？

original: If I were you, I'd almost want to deliver the Chip to Mr. House just to learn all its tricks!
translation: 如果换做我，肯定会立马把筹码给豪斯送去，好一谈其中的奥秘！

original: That is, unless you want to bring the NCR or Caesar's Legion to power! I wouldn't want to tell you what to do!
translation: 但如果你是想把力量留给NCR或者凯撒军团的话，那就另当别论了！我是不会干涉你的决定的！

original: Wow, you really blew up all those Securitrons at the Fort! Great! No problem!
translation: 哇哦，你真的把城堡里的电子保安全都炸上天了！厉害！没问题！

original: The Securitrons at the Fort are on standby... I see a status log here confirming that the Mark II OS upgrade installed correctly...
translation: 城堡的电子保安已经就位……我看到日志文件上说II型操作系统的升级程序已经安装完毕……

original: They'll be all set to go once we boost my transmitting power and bring them online with the network! But we'll worry about that later!
translation: 只要我们把电力输送过来，并联上网，它们就可以启动了！不过这个问题我们过后再考虑吧！

original: I can't believe Caesar is dead. What will we do now?
translation: 不敢相信凯撒居然死了。我们现在怎么办？

original: Caesar has been seen walking among the troops. A good omen.
translation: 有人看到凯撒徒步检阅部队了。这是个好兆头。

original: Haven't had any reports from Station Charlie in a while - hope everything's okay.
translation: 有一段时间没收到查理驻站的报告了——希望那边没出什么事。

original: Don't tell the troopers, but the grub here is way better than the mess tent.
translation: 你可别跟士兵们说啊，这儿的伙食要比下面的大锅饭好多了。

original: You should talk to Chief Hanlon if you have any questions. He's usually up on the balcony.
translation: 如果你有问题就去找汉隆军士长吧。他通常在二楼阳台上。

original: We're all impressed with the work you've done for us. I thought you might be able to make use of this.
translation: 你为我们做的事让我们非常感动。我想你可能用得上这玩意。

original: It's a key to a little hideaway south of here. We've used it as a place for Rangers to rest and resupply. I thought you might get good use out of it.
translation: 这是南边一个小藏身处的钥匙。游骑兵偶尔会在那里休息和补给。我想对你应该能派得上用场。

original: I know who you are. I'm a patient man, but you'd better have a damn good reason to be standing here right now. Spit it out.
translation: 我知道你是谁。虽然我很有耐心，但你最好还是赶快把来这地方的理由说清楚。快说。

original: Look who it is. I haven't had the privilege, but I'm told you've been an angel on our shoulder. What can we do for you at Camp McCarran?
translation: 看看是谁来了。能亲眼见到你真是三生有幸，大家都说你是我们的守护天使。不知您来麦卡伦营地有什么事？

original: I'm glad we could finally meet. My sources tell me you've done some good work for us. What brings you to Camp McCarran?
translation: 很好，很高兴我们终于见面了。我的手下说你为我们立下了不少功劳。是什么风把你吹到麦卡伦营地来的？

original: What are you doing here? You don't have clearance.
translation: 你在这干什么？你还没获准进入。

original: Well?
translation: 嗯？

original: Man, am I bored.
translation: 老兄，我好无聊。

original: You weren't supposed to kill him! Goddamn it. Not only did we not get any information, but now you've ended his suffering, too.
translation: 你怎么把他杀了！妈的。我们本来可以从他嘴里套点情报出来的，这下好了，你倒是帮他解脱了。

original: Shit, guess I can forget about a promotion this decade. Thanks a lot, asshole.
translation: 娘的，看来我这十年之内都别指望升官了。真是感谢你啊，蠢货。

original: Fuck. What am I going to tell the colonel?
translation: 操他妈。这下我怎么跟上校交代？

original: Poor guy. He's all tuckered out. Well, I guess we'll have to pick up where we left off tomorrow. Good work.
translation: 可怜的家伙，他完全崩溃了。我看还是明天再继续吧。干得好。

original: I'm sure he'll have had enough after a few days of this. Or if we're lucky, a few months.
translation: 我敢说未来几天他都会消停了。要是我们运气好，说不定是几个月。

original: I'll get someone in here to clean up the mess he made. You can head out for the day. Let's let him sleep.
translation: 我会叫人来收拾他的烂摊子，你可以走了，让他睡一觉吧。

original: Hey, have you been able to bug Mr. House's network yet?
translation: 嘿，你把木马装进豪斯先生的系统了没有？

original: Oh, hi. Thanks again for helping us with that data. I mean the feed only lasted about thirty seconds and it's not that useful, but... well, we tried.
translation: 哦，嗨。数据的事多谢你帮忙了。虽说传输只持续了30秒，没什么太大的用处……但至少我们尽力了。

original: Thanks again for helping with Mr. House's data network. Come see me at the Old Mormon Fort if you get a chance.
translation: 豪斯先生数据网的事，再次感谢你。有空就来旧摩门教要塞找我吧。

original: One of these days I'll save up enough to get out of here. One of these days...
translation: 总有一天等我攒够了钱，就要离开这里。总有一天……

original: Hey stranger, if you're hungry, there's a man around here somewhere telling people where to get free food and water.
translation: 嗨，陌生人，如果你饿了，这附近有个人可以告诉你从哪里有免费的食物和水。

original: This man's prices are steep, but I hear he's worth it.
translation: 这人开出的价格是高了些，但我听说物超所值。

original: Thanks, mister!
translation: 谢谢，先生！

original: Thanks, lady!
translation: 谢谢，女士！

original: Something you need, kid?
translation: 需要什么吗，孩子？

original: Hey man, can you spare a few caps?
translation: 嗨，伙计，能给我几个瓶盖吗？

original: How are you today? Santiago is fabulous!
translation: 你今天好吗？圣地亚哥过得很好！

original: Ah... I wasn't expecting you to return.
translation: 啊……我没想到你会回来。

original: Hello. Lovely to meet you.
translation: 你好。很高兴见到你。

original: I have nothing more to give. Leave me be.
translation: 我没东西能给你了。快走开。

original: You seen Dixon around? He said he'd be back today.
translation: 你见到迪克森没有？他说今天就回来的。

original: The King just sent a messenger over, saying these guys are off-limits. He's probably already heard about what you did here.
translation: 猫王刚捎来口信，不许我们再和这些家伙有任何瓜葛。估计他已经听说你在这里的所作所为了。

original: Looks like you get to be a hero. Enjoy it while it lasts.
translation: 看来你成了一名英雄。尽情享受这点威风吧。

original: Why Rexie, you look all better, boy! Good as new! Did my Rexie get a new brain?
translation: 雷克斯，你看上去精神多了，好孩子！像重生了一样！我的雷克斯换了新脑子没有？

original: Things have been a lot better since you helped with those soldier boys. Thanks again. So, what can I do for you?
translation: 你摆平了那些阿兵哥以后，情况改观了不少。再次感谢你。所以，有什么我能帮忙的？

original: Hold up. What's the password?
translation: 站住。口令。

original: I wish I'd never gotten involved with the Omertas. All of this bloodshed...
translation: 我真希望自己从没和黑手党帮扯上关系。瞧瞧死了这么多人……

original: One of these days, those bastards will get what's coming to them. In the meantime, I'll be sure to be more careful with my sales.
translation: 总有一天那些混蛋会遭报应的。不过从今往后，我也得更小心地选择生意对象了。

original: Anyway, is there anything I can get you?
translation: 好了，你要买什么？

original: That was a real mess the Omertas were looking to create. Glad you could get all that sorted.
translation: 黑手党的人就是来搞破坏的。还好你把他们都摆平了。

original: May have cost me some business, but at least we avoided a shitstorm.
translation: 虽然我可能会少挣一点，但至少我们逃过了一劫。

original: Anything I can get you?
translation: 要来点什么？

original: All of the scumbags are coming out of the woodwork now that the Kings are keeping everyone in line.
translation: 自从猫王帮开始维持秩序，各种三教九流的家伙都冒出来了。

original: At least gun sales are better than ever. Now what can I get you?
translation: 好在枪比以前好卖多了。你想来点什么？

original: People say Mr. House hasn't been heard from in a while. Good riddance.
translation: 大家都在说有段时间没听到豪斯先生的音讯了。这家伙终于滚蛋了。

original: Now what can I get for you?
translation: 你想买点什么？

original: Welcome back, buddy!
translation: 欢迎回来，哥们！你想要点什么？

original: If you're looking for guns, talk to Mick. Otherwise, I've got a nice selection of general supplies.
translation: 如果你要买枪，去找米克谈。如果不是，我这里还有不少精选的货物与其他服务。

original: Man, Jacob's Absinthe is phenomenal stuff. I don't think I've slept this well in ages...
translation: 老兄，雅各布的苦艾酒真是不一般。我已经有好几百年没睡过那么香了……

original: If you haven't tried it yet, he's been supplying the Wrangler with the stuff. So, what can I get you?
translation: 如果你还没尝过，那在原子牛仔就有卖的。好了，你想买点什么？

original: So, Ambassador Fancypants has graced us with his presence! I apologize if you're looking for Pre-War pipes and smoking jackets, I'm clean out.
translation: 瞧瞧，咱们光彩照人的花裤子大使驾到了！如果你想买战前烟斗或者浴袍，那不好意思，都卖完了。

original: Hey, what can I get you?
translation: 嘿，来点什么？

original: The only rule in Freeside is don't mess with the Kings.
translation: 自由城唯一的规矩就是：不要招惹猫王帮。

original: Watch yourself around here.
translation: 自己小心一点。

original: If you're heading to the Strip, just go through the gate there.
translation: 如果你要去长街，可以从那边的大门进去。

original: Freeside is the Kings' turf. Remember that.
translation: 自由城是猫王帮的地盘。记好了。

original: Great, another one come in from the wastes. Like this place isn't crowded enough.
translation: 真棒，又来了一个废土游民。好像这地方还不够挤似的。

original: I don't care how you get your work done, but you keep your nose clean in Freeside.
translation: 我不知道你平时行事风格怎样，但是在自由城，你就得守规矩。

original: People are getting nervous about the Legion amassing on the other side of the river. I hope the NCR can hold against another attack.
translation: 军团在河对扎营搞得大家人心惶惶。希望NCR可以再次击退军团的进攻。

original: One of my aides said you got into the Lucky 38. If you see someone by the name of Emily near there, we would like you to work for us.
translation: 我听一个助手说你进入了幸运38。如果你在那附近见到一个叫艾米丽的人，希望你能跟她合作。

original: So, last day on Earth, huh? Getting your affairs in order? Or are you still trying to work on that bad reputation of yours?
translation: 那么，终于到最后一天了，嗯？把该办的都办完了吗？还是说你仍在努力改善你的坏名声？

original: The NCR just wants to be friends, but you don't seem to want to play nice. See you tomorrow.
translation: NCR只是想交个朋友，可你似乎却不那么上道啊。明天见了。

original: What in the goddamn...?
translation: 这他妈怎么……？

original: Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves, like smooth little babies...
translation: 咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: What in the goddamn...?
translation: 这他妈怎么……？

original: Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves. Smooth...
translation: 咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: Hello! That broad everyone saw go in the Lucky 38, that was you? Oh shit.
translation: 你好啊！那个大摇大摆走进幸运38的人就是你吗？哦，见鬼。

original: What in the goddamn...?
translation: 这他妈怎么……？

original: Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves. Smooth...
translation: 咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: Hello! It was you, wiped out the Khans down in Boulder City? You did that? Oh shit.
translation: 你好啊！就是你把巨石城里的大汗帮给一锅端了吧？哦，见鬼。

original: What in the goddamn...?
translation: 这他妈怎么……？

original: Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves. Smooth...
translation: 咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: Hello! It was you, set the Khans free down in Boulder City? You did that? Oh shit.
translation: 你好啊！就是你把巨石城里的大汗帮给放了吧？哦，见鬼。

original: What in the goddamn...?
translation: 这他妈怎么……？

original: Let's keep this in the groove, hey? Smooth moves. Smooth...
translation: 咱们有话好商量，行吗？冷静一点，别冲动……

original: Hello! The gasser everyone's been talking about, making a splash on the Strip. That's been you? Oh shit.
translation: 你好啊！大伙都在谈论你，那个近来在长街声名鹊起的家伙就是你吧？哦，见鬼。

original: I comped you the prez so we can talk there, hey? No need to keep tugging at my sleeve.
translation: 我带你去总统套房，咱们可以在那儿谈，怎么样？没必要在这儿揪着我领子。

original: Wait until we get to the Presidential, pally. I don't need you tugging at my sleeve.
translation: 等到了总统套房再说吧，亲爱的。我可不喜欢你拽着我的领子。

original: Like I said, once the Chairmen are running Vegas, you'll get a percentage. Until then I'll pay you a retainer and bonuses for "special missions."
translation: 我说了，等董事会控制了维加斯，你就会拿到分红。在那之前，我会先预付给你一笔定金，以及执行"特殊任务"的奖金。

original: Last we spoke, you were leaning in a more merciful direction...?
translation: 记得上次我们谈的时候，你好像更倾向于仁慈的方法……？

original: I'm going to make my way to that little town we talked about.
translation: 我准备到我们之前聊到的那个小镇上去。

original: All right, smoothskin, I'm letting you in. You better watch yourself. I'll sure as hell be watching you.
translation: 好吧，滑皮肤。我让你进来。但你最好注意点，我会盯着你的。

original: It is almost time for the Great Journey!
translation: 伟大旅程就要起航了！

original: It is almost time for the Great Journey!
translation: 伟大旅程就要起航了！

original: Nice enough speech, I guess.
translation: 讲话还挺精彩。

original: Well, it's up to you to go launch the rockets. There's a small mission control room all the way back upstairs. Should be as easy as pressing a button.
translation: 好吧，发射火箭的任务就交给你了。原路返回楼上，那里有个小型"任务控制"室。应该只要按下按钮就行，非常简单。

original: It seems my work here is done, so I'll be on my way to Novac. We'll see how that works out.
translation: 看来我在这里的工作已经完成了，我准备去诺瓦克了。接下来就看这事情怎么收场吧。

original: Did you hear him? As though some fancy speech can make what they did to me less of a crime?
translation: 你听见他的那番话了吗？好像只要发表一些高论，就能减轻他们对我犯下的罪行？

original: Go launch the rockets! There's a cramped little "mission control" room all the way back upstairs. Should be as easy as pushing a button.
translation: 好吧，发射火箭的任务就交给你了。原路返回楼上，那里有个小型"任务控制"室。应该只要按下按钮就行，非常简单。

original: Enjoy the view. I hear the "Great Journey" is going to be shorter than they expected. Sweeter, too.
translation: 好好欣赏吧。我估计"伟大旅程"会比他们预计的要短。也更美妙。

original: Leave me alone.
translation: 离我远点。

original: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
translation: 玩家扔手雷

original: Watch the blast!
translation: 小心爆炸！

original: Explosive!
translation: 爆炸！

original: Be advised, a grenade has been thrown.
translation: 小心，手雷扔出去了。

original: Be advised, an explosive has been thrown.
translation: 小心，炸药扔出去了。

original: Explosive!
translation: 要爆炸啦！

original: Clearing the chamber?
translation: 清空房间？

original: Better off saving ammo.
translation: 最好省点弹药。

original: Whoa! Are you like... some kind of crazy person?
translation: 哇！你是...你就像...某种疯子？

original: Do that again!
translation: 再来一次！

original: Cool. Can I try?
translation: 酷。我能试试吗？

original: Do that someplace else!
translation: 去别的地方找靶子吧！

original: You tryin' to get me killed?
translation: 你想打死我吗？

original: Holster that. And be quick about it.
translation: 把枪收好。快点。

original: Holster your iron, pardner!
translation: 收起枪，哥们！

original: Quit it!
translation: 死！

original: Stop that!
translation: 别这么做！

original: Hey! Do that somewhere else.
translation: 嗨！要开枪就去别的地方。

original: Be careful!
translation: 当心！

original: What in tarnation?
translation: 搞什么鬼？

original: What in blazes?
translation: 搞毛啊？

original: Ammo costs money, you know!
translation: 你要知道，买弹药是要花钱的！

original: What's wrong with you?
translation: 你什么毛病？

original: Knock it off!
translation: 别弄了！

original: Quit fuckin' around!
translation: 别他妈再捣乱了！

original: What's your problem?
translation: 你有什么问题？

original: Let me aim that for you next time.
translation: 下次我来给你示范下该怎么瞄准吧。

original: Am I gonna have to take that away from you?
translation: 要我把你那东西收起来吗？

original: Uh, hate to criticize boss, but I'm not actually immortal. Just old.
translation: 呃，我不是有意要找茬啊，老大，但你可别把我当成活神仙。我只是年纪大了而已。

original: Come on, boss, I know I'm ugly, but I am on your side.
translation: 得了吧，老大，我知道我很丑，但我……可是你这边的啊。

original: If you want me to split, you could just say so.
translation: 如果你想让我走人，说一声就好了嘛。

original: <growl>
translation: <咆哮>

original: Would you keep it down?
translation: 就不能把那东西放下吗？

original: Waste of ammo.
translation: 浪费弹药。

original: What, you see a scorpion?
translation: 怎么，你看到蝎子了？

original: If you can't control it, keep it in your holster.
translation: 如果你玩不转那东西，那就让它待在枪套里面吧。

original: You'll put someone's eye out with that, dearie!
translation: 小亲亲，那东西会打到别人的眼睛的！

original: It's not nice to do things like that, dear!
translation: 亲爱的！这样做可不礼貌。

original: This noise is making Leo get antsy!
translation: 这些噪音会让利奥发疯的！

original: Stop doing that, please.
translation: 请不要再这样做了。

original: I'm not sure if you're trying to hit me or trying to miss me. Either way, stop it. Thanks.
translation: 我不知道你是想开枪打我还是故意射偏。无论如何，别这样做了，谢谢。

original: Keep that up, human…
translation: 没完了，人类？

original: Whoa, someone's just come from the Wrangler.
translation: 哇哦，有人刚从原子牛仔跑出来了。

original: Keep it down, would ya? I already got a splitting headache.
translation: 放下它，好吗？我快头疼死了。

original: Whatever. Knock yourself out, for all I care.
translation: 随你便。要是你走火伤了自己，我才不在乎呢。

original: Weapons use is discouraged. Thank you for your cooperation.
translation: 禁止使用武器，谢谢合作。

original: Please do not use your weapons. Thank you.
translation: 请勿使用武器，谢谢。

original: Whoo! Bang bang!
translation: 哇哦！嘣，嘣！

original: A pulled trigger's a happy trigger!
translation: 扣扳机不长眼才过瘾！

original: Yeah! Shoot it again!
translation: 哈哈！再开枪啊！

original: Cut it out, will you?
translation: 别闹了，好吗？

original: Whoa, whoa! Careful!
translation: 哇哦，哇哦！小心点！

original: Put that away!
translation: 把那东西拿开！

original: Mind your weapon!
translation: 收好你的武器！

original: Keep that shit away from me.
translation: 把那狗屁玩意收走。

original: What the fuck do you think you're doing?
translation: 你他妈的以为你在干嘛？

original: Stow that weapon, Outsider.
translation: 收好你的武器，外来者。

original: Drop that weapon.
translation: 放下武器。

original: Deha ruido!
translation: 别炒了！

original: No discarge armoos!
translation: 别凯枪！

original: A tactic of the Bear.
translation: 熊的战术。

original: Worthy of Hanlon.
translation: 配得上汉隆。

original: Analyzing. This behavior is not on file.
translation: 分析中。这种行为没有记录在案。

original: This behavior is not on file.
translation: 这种行为没有记录在案。

original: <Makes beeping sounds>
translation: <发出哔哔声>

original: Do'an poin aiti ay me!
translation: 别拿舞气纸着我！

original: Subai thah, tsahh.
translation: 停停。

original: Me no heranu a katu.
translation: 我妹有桑害你。

original: Baje ka armoo.
translation: 把舞气放下。

original: No tsaig tuh beh dah a hih jih gahni a meer.
translation: 别拿舞气纸着我。

original: Stahp dahs pleez.
translation: 请憋炸样。

original: You're not the first to have tried.
translation: 你不是第一个来试的。

original: Make the first shot count. You won't get a second.
translation: 一击必中，没有第二次机会。

original: Don't be ridiculous - point that somewhere else, will you?
translation: 少跟我开玩笑，你能不能别拿这玩意指着我？

original: [Christine frowns, points at your collar, then hers.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱了皱眉，指了指你的项圈，又指了指她的。]

original: I didn't take you for suicidal.
translation: 你该不会是想找死吧？

original: Don't shoot. Bullets hurt.
translation: 别开枪。子弹打到会很痛。

original: You're going to make this easy.
translation: 别自讨苦吃。

original: Drop that weapon, Outsider.
translation: 放下武器，外来者。

original: Who the fuck do you think you are?
translation: 你他妈的认为自己是谁？

original: Point that shit somewhere else.
translation: 把那鬼东西拿开。

original: You think I don't see that?
translation: 你觉得我瞎了么？

original: Don't tempt me.
translation: 别惹我。

original: By Caesar, you're walking a fine line.
translation: 以凯撒的名义警告你，小心玩火自焚。

original: If you need to shoot me, I won't complain!
translation: 如果你非要对我开枪的话，我不会有半句怨言！

original: Hello! Look what's pointed at me!
translation: 喂！看看你在用什么指着我呢！

original: Don't worry about me! You can shoot if you want!
translation: 别在乎我！你要是想开枪，随便就是了！

original: Be advised, assaulting an officer of the law will not be tolerated.
translation: 请注意，攻击执法者是不可容忍的。

original: Be advised, assaulting an officer of the law is a serious offense.
translation: 请注意，攻击执法者是严重违法行为。

original: You want to be getting that gun out of my face right now.
translation: 你最好马上把那把枪从我面前拿开。

original: That's not funny.
translation: 这可不好笑。

original: Quit screwing around!
translation: 别乱来！

original: I wouldn't.
translation: 我可不会这样。

original: I don't think so.
translation: 这可不好。

original: How about I aim my gun at you for a while, see how you like it?
translation: 要是我用枪死死瞄着你的脑袋，你会有什么感觉？

original: You looking for trouble?
translation: 你想找麻烦吗？

original: I assure you, you look extremely virile. Now, would you mind pointing that somewhere else? Thanks.
translation: 我知道你厉害，你确实挺有气概的。所以，不介意的话，把枪指向别处如何？谢谢了。

original: Uh... what's up?
translation: 呃…怎么了？

original: Why do we always hurt the ones we care about the most?
translation: 人们为什么总是会伤害自己最在意的人呢？

original: You, uhh, you want to point that someplace else, boss? I got enough holes in me.
translation: 你，呃，可以把枪指向别处么，老大？我身上的窟窿眼已经够多了。

original: Boss, why are you looking at me that way?
translation: 老大，为什么这样看着我啊？

original: I wouldn't mind this so much if it weren't for that maniacal gleam in your eye.
translation: 如果我没看到你眼中的那种疯狂，我也许还不会介意。

original: <growl>
translation: <咆哮>

original: Pull that trigger, you'll wish you hadn't.
translation: 扣下扳机的话，你会后悔一辈子。

original: Don't like no one drawing a bead on me.
translation: 我可不喜欢有人用枪对着我。

original: Better be rocksalt in that, or you're asking for an asskicking.
translation: 里面的子弹要是真家伙，你就死定了。

original: Don't make me take that away.
translation: 别逼我。

original: Are you drunk?
translation: 你喝多了？

original: Pumpkin, don't point that at grandma, there's a dear.
translation: 小淘气，别把那东西对着奶奶。

original: Leo doesn't like that, dearie. You should stop.
translation: 利奥不喜欢这样，宝贝。你最好别这么做。

original: How about you line that up on a tin can instead?
translation: 要不你找一个罐头盒试试？

original: Don't even kid about that.
translation: 这可不好笑。

original: You're lookin' at a heap of trouble if you want it.
translation: 要是你想惹麻烦，那你尽管来。

original: If you think you want trouble, then let fly.
translation: 要是你想找事，那就放马过来吧。

original: Don't even joke like that.
translation: 别开这种玩笑。

original: Point that somewhere else!
translation: 别拿枪头对着我！

original: That safety better be on.
translation: 这枪的保险最好打开了。

original: Point that somewhere else.
translation: 把枪头拿开。

original: For pete's sake...
translation: 我的天……

original: No respect.
translation: 真没教养。

original: Stop that. I mean it!
translation: 说真的。住手！

original: Quit it. You're making me nervous.
translation: 枪放下。你让我很紧张。

original: Go ahead. Try me.
translation: 来吧。你有种试试。

original: Think you're tough, huh?
translation: 是不是觉得你自己很行，啊？

original: You're not going to shoot me, are you?
translation: 你不会对我开枪的，对吧？

original: Is that loaded? Let me try it!
translation: 上膛了吗？让我试试！

original: Hey, I can almost see right down the barrel!
translation: 嘿，我几乎可以直接看到桶里的东西了！
