translation: 那里的守卫会在每天的9点和18点换班。到时候会有一个很短的空档，无人看守火车。

original: And you have something in mind for me?
translation: 那你有什么要让我做的？

original: I told you, I think they're starting to suspect me. You're going to help me cast away those suspicions.
translation: 我说过，我觉得他们开始怀疑我了。所以你得帮我消除这些怀疑。

original: You're going to put the bomb on that train.
translation: 我要你去把炸弹安到火车上。

original: I'll be sure to be in the presence of several reliable eyewitnesses when it happens. Then we're going to pin this on a scapegoat.
translation: 我会确保爆炸发生时有几个可靠的目击者能证明我当时不在现场。然后我们再找一个替罪羊就行了。

original: I'd planned on disappearing after this operation. It'd be a matter of time before they traced it to me. Figured out I was a frumentarius.
translation: 我本来已经计划好了，等这次行动得手，就马上走人。他们迟早会查出我是军团特工，这只是时间问题。

original: But with your help, maybe I can stay on after all. Make plans for something... grander.
translation: 但如果你能帮忙，也许我还可以继续留下，做些更……宏伟的规划。

original: I have a lead. There's been someone sneaking into the control tower at night.
translation: 我找到了一条线索。有人在深夜里潜进了控制塔。

original: Is that right? No one has any business being in there after dusk. I wonder...
translation: 真的吗？天黑以后应该就不会有人到那儿去了才对。也许……

original: There's a lot of communications equipment up there. He could be using it to touch base with whoever sent him.
translation: 那儿有很多通讯设备。他可能是在用这些设备与派他来的人进行联络。

original: You've already done us a lot of good, but I'm afraid to move on this myself. We've tried catching this guy before and he can always smell a trap.
translation: 你已经帮了我们许多忙，但恐怕这一条我是无法亲自调查了。我们尝试过抓捕他，每次都被他觉察。

original: But he may not know about you. I need you to follow him into the tower. See if you can discover his identity. Report back and I'll have him arrested.
translation: 可他应该不认识你。你得跟着他进入控制塔，想办法确认他的身份，再回来向我报告，我会派人逮捕他的。

original: Report back when you've got it and I'll have him arrested.
translation: 等你完成任务就来向我报告吧，我会派人逮捕他的。

original: I know who you are. I'm working for the Legion, too.
translation: 我知道你是谁。我也在为军团效力。

original: Christ, keep it down! You want to blow the whole thing? We've worked years for this.
translation: 天呐，小点儿声！你想让整件计划都败露吗？我们已经为此密谋了好多年了。

original: But maybe it's good for you here. Hsu knows about the leaks, and I'm supposed to find the spy for him.
translation: 不过你能来说不定是件好事。许上校早就知道有人泄密，调查间谍的任务也是他交代给我的。

original: At first I couldn't believe my luck. But since I haven't produced results - for obvious reasons - I feel him looking at me differently now.
translation: 刚开始我简直不敢相信自己的运气。但出于显而易见的原因，我的调查一直没有进展，现在他看我的眼神都有些不一样了。

original: Maybe he's just thinking about putting someone else in charge, maybe he's starting to suspect. Either way it's bad for me.
translation: 可能他只想换个人来接手调查，也可能他已经开始怀疑我了。无论哪一种情况，对我来说都不是好事。

original: Especially once this next part goes down.
translation: 尤其会阻碍到下一步计划的实施。

original: You mentioned your husband works for the caravans?
translation: 你说你丈夫曾在商队里工作？

original: Yes, he's an account manager for the Crimson Caravan Company. He works such long hours to provide for our daughter and me.
translation: 是的，他是深红商队的一名客户经理。为了养活我们母女俩，他每天都早出晚归。

original: You should speak to him if you get the chance - he's always saying how badly understaffed they are.
translation: 有机会的话，你可以和他谈谈——他总是抱怨缺人手。

original: What parts are needed to fix the food processor?
translation: 你需要哪些零件来修理食品加工机？

original: Here's the list. We've been scrapping together quick-fixes to keep it running for months. I think it finally crapped out and needs a full overhaul.
translation: 我列了张单子。之前我们都只是简单维修，好不容易让它撑了几个月。现在这玩意应该是彻底坏了，所以需要全面检修。

original: It's the goofy machine behind the counter in the corner next to the stove. I'd be much obliged if you could take a look at it and get it fixed up.
translation: 这台破机器就在角落的柜台后面，紧挨着炉子。如果你能帮忙瞅一眼，顺带把它修好，我一定会好好感谢你的。

original: Where might I find these parts?
translation: 我上哪去弄到这些零件？

original: I don't know. Try the various traders around the wastes, or the pawn shop in Westside might have some parts.
translation: 不知道，向废土各地的商人打听一下吧，或者西边的典当行里可能有些零件。

original: Oh, I've heard of a place called House Tools you could check out! It's an old factory on the north side of Vegas.
translation: {噢，我听说有个叫豪斯五金工具厂的地方，你可以去那儿看看！那是座旧工厂，位于维加斯北面。

original: Just a word of warning, though. I hear no one who goes in there comes back out. Could be traps, crazy robots, or who knows what's in that place.
translation: 不过，还是得给你提个醒。我听说去那儿的人没一个回来的。可能里头有陷阱、发疯的机器人，或是别的什么可怕的东西。

original: Where should I look for spices?
translation: 我上哪儿去找调味料？

original: The Crimson Caravan would probably be able to arrange a regular shipment, but I don't know of any spices known to improve mood.
translation: 深红商队应该能进到货，但我不知道哪种调味料能让人心情变好。

original: Hell, we have a whole research department. One guy's even set up in the main terminal building. They're the ones who oughtta be looking into it.
translation: 妈的，我们明明都设了个研究部门。其中一个家伙还在候机厅里安了窝。这种事本该由他们来研究才对。

original: I can handle myself pretty well. I found you didn't I?
translation: 我当然能独自搞定。我不就独自找到你了？

original: You look tough enough at least. I'm not sure how long it'll take this leg to heal up.
translation: 我想也可能是这样。你至少看起来很能打。就是不知道这条腿还要多久才能好。

original: Come on. It's time for us to go take care of Motor-Runner.
translation: 来吧。是时候去干掉轰鸣恶煞了。

original: Roger that shit. Let's go.
translation: 就等你这句话。我们走。

original: What can you tell me about Vault 3?
translation: 能和我说说3号避难所的事吗？

original: The inhabitants of the Vault were simple traders. They made a good living for themselves before they were all killed by the Fiends.
translation: 这座避难所的居民基本都是商人。在被恶魔帮杀光之前，日子过得还挺不错。

original: I could use your help taking care of Motor-Runner.
translation: 你可以帮着我干掉轰鸣恶煞。

original: Okay, I'll follow you down to Motor-Runner. Here, take the key to the maintenance wing.
translation: 行，我和你一起去对付轰鸣恶煞。给，这是维修区的钥匙。

original: I could use your help taking care of Motor-Runner.
translation: 你可以帮着我干掉轰鸣恶煞。

original: Okay, I'll follow you down to Motor-Runner. Here, take the key to the maintenance wing.
translation: 行，我和你一起去对付轰鸣恶煞。给，这是维修区的钥匙。

original: Not right now, just making sure you are okay. I'll be back later.
translation: 没事，就是确认一下你的情况。我晚点回来的。

original: Follow me, let's go take care of Motor-Runner.
translation: 跟上，我们去干掉轰鸣恶煞。

original: Okay, let's get him.
translation: 好的，开始行动。

original: Got any more open bounties?
translation: 还有公开悬赏么？

original: Damn right I do. Who do you think you can take down?
translation: 当然有了。你想要干掉谁？

original: All right. I'll do it.
translation: 好吧，我干。

original: That's the best damn thing I've heard all day. Finally somebody around here with some goddamn ambition.
translation: 这是我今天听到的最让人高兴的事了。终于他妈碰上个有种的家伙了。

original: There's two psycho-bastards left. Which one will it be?
translation: 还剩下两个疯子。下一个选谁？

original: I want to claim a bounty.
translation: 我是来领赏金的。

original: That right? You killed one of the psychopaths on my shitlist? Let me see the scumbag's head...
translation: 赏金是吗？你取了名单上哪个疯子的性命？让我看看那家伙的脑袋……

original: You killed another one? Let me have a look at the head...
translation: 你又杀了一个？让我看看人头……

original: If that's true, that'd be the last of them...
translation: 如果这是真的，这应该就是最后一个了……

original: Goddammit. That's Violet, all right. You've made me one happy son of a bitch, you know that?
translation: 老天爷啊。这确实是维奥莱特。你可让我找得好辛苦啊，你知道吗？

original: Here. This is the bounty I put on her head. It's yours.
translation: 给。这是对她的悬赏。归你了。

original: Well, that could be Violet, or it could be someone else entirely. I'll take your word for it, but I can't give you a full reward.
translation: 好吧，这可能是维奥莱特，但也可能是其他人。我相信你，但我不能给你全额赏金。

original: Well, well, well. Driver Nephi. Nothing to say, you son of a bitch? No tips on my golf swing?
translation: 哎呀，哎呀，球杆尼法。怎么不吭声了，狗娘养的？我还等着你教我如何挥杆呢？

original: Lost a lot of good men to this psychopath. Morale's going to be better, now that he's gone. Here's the bounty I promised.
translation: 为了逮着这疯子，不知道死了多少人。现在他总算玩完了，士气应该能提升一些。这是我答应给你的赏金。

original: I guess we can send 1st Recon down to Camp Forlorn Hope. They need all the help they can get there.
translation: 我想现在应该能把第一侦察营派去飘零希望营地了。他们那边正缺人手。

original: Well, well, well. Driver Nephi. Nothing to say, you son of a bitch? No tips on my golf swing?
translation: 哎呀，哎呀，球杆尼法。怎么不吭声了，狗娘养的？我还等着你教我如何挥杆呢？

original: Lost a lot of good men to this psychopath. Morale's going to be better, now that he's gone. Here's the bounty I promised.
translation: 为了逮着这疯子，不知道死了多少人。现在他总算玩完了，士气应该能提升。这是我答应给你的赏金。

original: Now that's over with, I'd send 1st Recon down to Camp Forlorn Hope, but I heard it's overrun by the Legion. Bastards.
translation: 本来这件事解决后，我打算把第一侦察营派去飘零希望营地的。但我听说那里已经被军团占领了，妈的。

original: That's supposed to be Driver Nephi? The head's in really bad shape, so I can't authorize a full reward. If he really is dead, we're all better off.
translation: 这应该是球杆尼法吧？脑袋都面目全非了，所以我不能给你全额赏金。希望他是真的死了，那样我们都好过。

original: I guess we can send 1st Recon down to Camp Forlorn Hope. They need all the help they can get there.
translation: 我想现在应该能把第一侦察营派去飘零希望营地了。他们那边正缺人手。

original: That's supposed to be Driver Nephi? The head's in really bad shape, so a full reward is out of the question.
translation: 这应该是球杆尼法吧？脑袋都面目全非了，所以全额赏金恐怕是没戏了。

original: Now that's over with, I'd send 1st Recon down to Camp Forlorn Hope, but I heard it's overrun by the Legion. Bastards.
translation: 本来这件事解决后，我打算把第一侦察营派去飘零希望营地的。但我听说那里已经被军团占领了，妈的。

original: Yeah... that's Cook-Cook. Did he always smell like this? Even before he was dead? And the Fiends let this guy touch their food?
translation: 对……这是大厨库克。他身上一直都是这股臭味吗？连生前也是？那恶魔帮是怎么吞得下他做的菜的？

original: Well... this is payback for at least one of my troopers. She'll be glad to know he's dead. Here's your caps.
translation: 好吧……至少你替我那位部下报了仇。她知道了一定会很高兴的。这是你的赏金。

original: This is Cook-Cook? You sure did a number on his face. I'm not allowed to give you the full reward, but thanks for taking this guy down.
translation: 这是大厨库克？你还真是把他给毁容了啊。我没法给你全额赏金了，但谢谢你干掉了这个人渣。

original: It's payback for at least one of my troopers. She'll be glad to know he's dead. Here's your caps.
translation: 至少你替我那位部下报了仇。她知道了一定会很高兴的。这是你的赏金。

original: Think you can take down another one of these scumbags? Up to you. But I can trust you to do the job, and I'd hate to see you walk away.
translation: 你觉得自己有本事再替我除掉一个人渣吗？由你来定夺吧，不过我相信你能行，我也不希望你半途而废。

original: Anything else I need to know?
translation: 还有什么注意事项吗？

original: One more thing. If you want the full reward, you need to bring me a recognizable head. My superiors need proof they're gone.
translation: 有一条。如果你想要全额赏金，那带来的首级必须要能分辨得出面部特征。我的上司需要看到他们完蛋的证据。

original: That means no headshots. No decapitations 'til after they're dead. And no damage to the face. If you want to be safe, aim for the chest.
translation: 所以不要爆头，也别往脑袋上砍，除非你在取首级。脸部绝不能有破损。为了保险起见，建议你打胸口。

original: You bring me a head that looks like a rotten tomato, people will be doubting, and I won't be authorized to pay the entire bounty.
translation: 如果你给我提来一个像烂番茄一样的人头，那是没办法服众的，我交不了差，自然也无法付给你全额赏金了。

original: Good luck to you. And don't get careless.
translation: 祝你好运。千万要多加小心。

original: You've gone after the Fiends before - I don't have to tell you to keep alert. Good luck.
translation: 你已经对付过恶魔帮了——不用我再提醒你要小心了吧。祝你好运。

original: Just bring me back that last head. And don't lose your own.
translation: 把最后一个人头带给我就行。别把自己的弄丢了。

original: Cook-Cook.
translation: 大厨库克。

original: One thing I should tell you about Cook-Cook. The piece of shit is pure animal. He raped one of my snipers, and that makes this personal.
translation: 关于大厨库克，我有句话必须要说。这混蛋完全是个禽兽。他强奸了我手下一个狙击手，这个仇我必须报。

original: Also... he's got a flamethrower, and he's damn good with it. From what I hear, he either rapes or burns every living thing he gets his hands on.
translation: 另外……他有一把喷火器，用得还挺熟练。我听说，只要是他眼前出现的活物，要么被他强奸，要么就被他烧死。

original: Only one man's gotten close to killing him, and that's Little Buster. So he says, anyway. Maybe it's bullshit, but I'd still ask him about it.
translation: 只有一个人险些取走他的狗命，那就是小巴斯特。反正他是这么说的，谁知道呢，也许他在吹牛，不过还是要仔细问问他。

original: Driver Nephi.
translation: 球杆尼法。

original: You've got some guts, I'll give you that. Nephi is one tough son of a bitch. You let him get close, and he'll take your head off.
translation: 你很有胆量嘛，我佩服你。尼法是个难缠的王八羔子。你要是让他近了身，那就等着脑袋落地吧。

original: My advice is this. Talk to Lieutenant Gorobets. He's in charge of Alpha Team, 1st Recon. Snipers.
translation: 我给你个建议。去找格罗别茨中尉。他负责指挥第一侦察营的阿尔法小队，全队都是狙击手。

original: If you're lucky, you can lure Nephi into the open, and the sharpshooters can bring him down. You bring me the head, you'll still get the bounty.
translation: 如果你命够硬，可以把尼法引到开阔地带，这样神射手们就能干掉他。只要你把他的首级带给我，赏金依然算你的。

original: It's a better bet than trying to take Nephi one-on-one, but it's your call.
translation: 这样至少比跟他一对一单挑更有胜算，不过全看你的意思了。

original: Might be. Give me their names.
translation: 也许吧。告诉我他们的名字。

original: First one calls herself Violet. God knows why - the name is the prettiest thing about her. Spends most of her time with a pack of vicious dogs.
translation: 第一个，自称维奥莱特。天知道她为啥叫这个名字。除了这名字还有点光鲜以外，她简直丑陋无比。大部分时间，她都和她手下的那群恶狗待在一起。

original: Then there's Driver Nephi. He's fast and he's brutal. Killed about a dozen of my men with a goddamn driver iron. Hence his name.
translation: 还有球杆尼法。他身手敏捷，体格健壮。用他那根球杆杀了我手下不少人。这就是他名字的由来。

original: And finally... Cook-Cook. Rapist. Pyromaniac. And damn good chef, if you believe the Fiends we've captured. Probably the craziest of the lot.
translation: 最后……大厨库克，强奸犯，纵火狂，还是个好厨师。至少我们抓到的那些恶魔帮都这么说。他也许是这伙人里最疯狂的。

original: I'm not going to feed you any bullshit. These aren't your common Vegas trash. They've all killed good NCR men, and plenty of mercs, too.
translation: 我不和你废话了，他们和你在维加斯遇到的那些小混混可不一样。他们杀过不少NCR的士兵，也有许多雇佣兵死在他们手下。

original: You go after them - any of them - you're in for a hell of a fight. So... which one is it going to be?
translation: 只要你缠上他们——随便哪一个——都是块硬骨头。所以……你想先从谁开始下手？

original: You're having trouble with the Fiends?
translation: 你们和恶魔帮有过节？

original: Damn right I am. And I'm paying bounties.
translation: 说对了。而且我正在悬赏他们的首级。

original: What do you know about the Fiends?
translation: 关于恶魔帮你知道多少？

original: Pack of drugged-out killers. They're addicted to every stim, every pill, every psychoactive enema on this fucked-up earth.
translation: 一群嗑了药的杀人狂。他们喜欢这蛮荒星球上的所有刺激，任何药物，任何毒品，任何神经刺激物，都能令他们格外兴奋。

original: McCarran could work out a regular exchange of fresh vegetables and clean water.
translation: 麦卡伦可以用新鲜蔬菜和干净淡水与你定期交换。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Rations do get tight from time-to-time and it would be nice to keep a regular stock of goods.
translation: 口粮配给确实偶尔会捉襟见肘，如果货物能保持定期供应也挺好的。

original: If I get a big delivery brought in, I'll be sure to send a good chunk of it off to McCarran right away.
translation: 只要有大单子进来，我一定会立刻把当中最好的部分送到麦卡伦去。

original: Tell Farber I'll try and have the first shipment sorted in a week or two.
translation: 告诉法伯，我最快会在一到两周内安排第一次发货。

original: They have tons of vegetables and water. How about expanding your business?
translation: 他们那儿可有不少蔬菜和淡水。就不想拓展一下你的业务吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Expanding isn't a bad idea. Maybe I could open up a small cafe restaurant with the more diverse inventory...
translation: 拓展业务这个主意不错，有了这么多种类的货物，我看开一个小餐厅都绰绰有余了……

original: If I get a big delivery brought in, I'll be sure to send a good chunk of it off to McCarran right away.
translation: 只要有大单子进来，我一定会立刻把当中最好的部分送到麦卡伦去。

original: Tell Farber I'll try and have the first shipment sorted in a week or two.
translation: 告诉法伯，我最快会在一到两周内安排第一次发货。

original: Corporal Farber said they can pay you the going market price in caps.
translation: 法伯上校说，他会按市价以现金付款。

original: Hey, that sounds good to me. No more wasted meat just laying around to rot. I can keep my stock fresh and keep the caps flowing.
translation: 嘿，听起来不错。以后就不会再有多余的肉堆到一旁腐烂了。不仅能随时进新货，还能赚到一大笔瓶盖。

original: If I get a big delivery brought in, I'll be sure to send a good chunk of it off to McCarran right away.
translation: 只要有大单子进来，我一定会立刻把当中最好的部分送到麦卡伦去。

original: Tell Farber I'll try and have the first shipment sorted in a week or two.
translation: 告诉法伯，我最快会在一到两周内安排第一次发货。

original: McCarran is looking for a regular delivery of meat from local merchants.
translation: 麦卡伦正在物色一名能定期派送肉类的本地商人。

original: Really? Well, I obviously couldn't supply enough to feed the entire camp, but I'm game. What kind of caps are we talking here?
translation: 真的？嗯，很明显我这儿的物资不足以喂饱整个营地，但我看好这桩买卖。打算用什么方式付款 ?

original: This spore pod extract from Keely should help with morale.
translation: 这是从基利那儿弄来的孢子豆荚，可以帮助提高士气。

original: No shit? The stuff actually does all that, huh?
translation: 不是吧？这玩意真的能有用？

original: I'll have to start testing this out immediately. This will really help keep the guys focused.
translation: 我得赶紧试一下。这下弟兄们可有办法提神醒脑了。

original: I fixed the food processor.
translation: 我修好了食品加工机。

original: Amazing. I thought that thing was done for. That'll help me transform what I can offer the troops.
translation: 漂亮。我还以为这东西报废了呢。如此一来我就能改善部队的伙食了。

original: I'll give you a little extra discount the next time you buy food from me. Thanks again.
translation: 如果下次你想从我这儿买吃的，我会给你打折的。再次谢谢你。

original: I found a merchant named Fitz who agreed to sell meat to McCarran.
translation: 我找到了个叫菲茨的商人，他愿意卖肉给麦卡伦。

original: Good, that should help diversify things. It may be a bit gamey, but I can use it for stews and kabobs.
translation: 很好，这样我们的伙食就能丰富一些了。虽然肉有些变味，不过我可以用它们来做炖汤和烤肉串。

original: Great! What he sells might be a bit gamey, but I can use it for stews and kabobs.
translation: 好极了！他卖的肉可能有点变味，不过我可以用它们来做炖肉和烤肉串。

original: Blake at the Crimson Caravan agreed to sell meat and spices.
translation: 深红商队的布莱克同意卖肉和调料给我们。

original: Good to hear. That should cover the majority of the supply.
translation: 真是个好消息。这应该能极大改善我们的补给问题。

original: That should help balance our stock of food more reasonably and save us a ton of caps. Good work!
translation: 这样不但能让我们的库存粮食种类更加均衡，还能省下一大笔钱呢。干得好！

original: The Crimson Caravan agreed to trade meat and spices for vegetables and water.
translation: 深红商队同意用肉和调料跟我们交换蔬菜和水。

original: You managed to swing us a discount and cover the majority of the meat supply we need? Good work!
translation: 你解决了我们的肉类供给问题，还让他们给我们打了折？干得好！

original: The Crimson Caravan agreed to trade meat and spices at a generous discount.
translation: 深红商队同意以折扣价卖给我们肉和调料。

original: Mrs. Nash agreed to trade with McCarran.
translation: 纳什夫人同意跟麦卡伦营地进行贸易。

original: Great! Small price to pay in caps for a little variety in our weekly menu.
translation: 好极了！这样只需很少的钱就能丰富我们的食谱了。

original: That'll save us some caps and help offload a bit of our overstock.
translation: 棒极了！不用花钱，还能帮我们处理多余的库存。

original: Mrs. Nash agreed to trade snacks for vegetables and water.
translation: 纳什夫人同意用小吃来交换蔬菜和水。

original: I've got proof of what I've said.
translation: 我有证据可以证明我所言非虚。

original: I don't want to talk about this, didn't you hear? Now, get lost before I run you off the hard way.
translation: 我不想聊这些，你没听清楚吗？早点给我滚，别逼我动粗。

original: Is there any work to be had here?
translation: 这儿有什么工作可做吗？

original: You know, hiring isn't really my department. You should talk to Ms. McLafferty about work for hire.
translation: 你要知道，我可不是负责招工的。你应该去找麦克拉弗蒂女士看看有没有工作。

original: Like I said, talk to Alice McLafferty, she's in charge here.
translation: 我刚说过，去和爱丽丝·麦克拉弗蒂谈吧，这里她说了算。

original: Who did you say I should ask about work?
translation: 你说谁能提供工作？

original: Hsu won't trust me enough to let me investigate.
translation: 许上校还不信任我，他没有让我来调查。

original: Yeah, you haven't exactly kept a low profile. That narrows our options somewhat. They're not gonna believe your accusations.
translation: 是啊，你行事的确不怎么低调。这样一来咱们的手段也少了，即便你检举了别人，他们也不会信的。

original: But you can still create an alibi for me. I could make sure people know I haven't been near the monorail all day while you're busy blowing it up.
translation: 不过你可以帮我制造不在场证明。我会让人们相信单轨列车被炸与我毫无关系，因为炸掉它的人是你。

original: It'll be better with a scapegoat, but it'll at least deflect some suspicion.
translation: 如果能找个替罪羊就更好了，但让你来至少能抵消一些怀疑。

original: No! Queenie! Hahaha! I'm gonna burn the world for ya, Queenie!
translation: 不，奎尼！哈哈！我要为你烧了这个世界，奎尼！

original: That sounds good to me. What do you need done?
translation: 对我来说真是个好消息，你要我做什么 ?

original: What do you know about Driver Nephi and Cook-Cook?
translation: 你对球杆尼法和大厨库克了解多少？

original: Don't fuck with Fiends. Driver Nephi'll brain your skull in! Cook-Cook... don't even know what he'll do.
translation: 别招惹恶魔帮。尼法会敲碎你的脑袋，而库克……我都不敢想像他会怎么对你。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Who wants to know? You here for my dogs? Can't have my dogs. Here for meat? You can't have my meat. Meat's for dogs.
translation: 谁关心这个，你来是要抢我的狗吗？我才不给你……又或者你想要肉吃？也不给！肉都是给狗吃的。

original: I'm Violet. Dogs are mine. Meat is mine.
translation: 我就是维奥莱特，狗是我的，肉也都是我的。

original: <Draw Weapon> Nevermind. I think killing you will keep things simple.
translation: <掏出武器> 不用了，我认为杀死你会更简单一些。

original: Leave him alone and he'll share contact information.
translation: 放过他，他会把交易的情报通报给你们。

original: [SUCCEEDED] He has himself a deal. However, If he tries to run or he continues to deal strategic assets with enemies, he's a dead man.
translation: [成功] 就按照他说的做吧。不过，如果他想逃跑，或者继续向敌人倒卖战略物资，那他就死定了。

original: Tell Contreras to expect to see me around more often. He better have a new bit of information when I stop in or I'm reporting his ass to Boyd.
translation: 告诉孔特雷拉斯，以后我会经常登门拜访。我来的时候，他最好能把新鲜的情报给我准备好，不然我就把他那些烂事全都捅给博伊德。

original: Contreras would like to work with you.
translation: 孔特雷拉斯会乐意和你合作的。

original: Really now? We had our suspicions about that man, but he's got so many shipments going so many different directions it's been hard to track.
translation: 真的吗？我们曾经怀疑过那个人，但是从他那儿经过的货物流向四面八方，真的很难去追踪。

original: What exactly is his offer? Does he realize bribing a Ranger is a hanging offense?
translation: 他开的条件是什么？他不知道贿赂游骑兵是死罪吗？

original: Can you remember anything else?
translation: 你还能想起来其他什么事情么？

original: Seem to recall a lot of them did business with those scavengers over on the West Side - Dermot and Saint James.
translation: 我隐约记得他们当中有不少人都和住在城西的那两个拾荒者打过交道——德莫特和圣詹姆斯。

original: Sounds like a chaotic place. Is there any way I can help?
translation: 听起来有些手忙脚乱啊。我能帮什么忙吗？

original: Well, I am a little short-staffed. Maybe you could give me a hand.
translation: 是啊，我现在人手有点紧缺。或许你能够帮我一把。

original: Some people have gone missing from the camp lately. Haven't seen any signs of violence or heard about any feuds, they just up and vanished.
translation: 最近营地里有人失踪了。现场没有发现搏斗的痕迹，也没听到任何动静，就这么凭空消失了。

original: I've also got Keith and his gambling to deal with - I know that skunk's cheating folk out of their savings, I just can't prove it.
translation: 此外，我还要对付那个赌徒基斯——虽然我知道那个流氓在出老千，但苦于没有证据。

original: I found this teddy bear in Saint James' room. Look familiar?
translation: 我在圣詹姆斯的房间里找到了这个泰迪熊。眼熟吗？

original: I found this ledger in Dermot's room.
translation: 我在德莫特的房间里找到了这个账本。

original: Tell me about those disappearances again.
translation: 和我说说那些失踪人口的情况吧。

original: Some people have gone missing from the camp lately. Haven't seen any signs of violence or heard about any feuds, they just... up and left.
translation: 最近营地里有人失踪。没有任何挣扎或反抗的迹象，他们就这么……消失了。

original: I remember hearing some of the missing folks were doing business with Dermot and Saint James - a couple of scavengers from Westside.
translation: 我记得有些失踪的人曾经跟德莫特和圣詹姆斯有过生意往来——他们俩来自西区，都是拾荒者。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Captain Parker. I'm in charge of this camp.
translation: 我是帕克上尉。我负责管理这个营地。

original: Would you sell me one?
translation: 能卖一个给我吗？

original: Sell?! My dogs! What part don't you get? Mine! Lucky they don't eat you alive for that!
translation: 卖？卖？！宝贝！你没听明白吗？他们是我的！你没被他们生吃，已经算你走运了！

original: Who's the merchandise?
translation: 这里有谁卖身？

original: Three flavors to choose from - Sweetie, Maude, and Jimmy. Sweetie's the house favorite, for reasons that should be obvious.
translation: 有三种口味任君选择——小甜甜、莫德、还有吉米。小甜甜是家常口味，原因显而易见。

original: Maude is what you might call the discount rack. She's what a customer wears if he doesn't have the caps to afford Sweetie - or just likes them old.
translation: 莫德就是所谓的打折商品。她适合那些兜里没几个铜板，请不起小甜甜，或者对老货情有独钟的客人。

original: Jimmy's more of a "specialist." I only hear good things.
translation: 吉米则更像是个"专家"。口碑相当不错。

original: All right, then. Looks like I need to talk slow and use small words. There's Sweetie, Maude, and Jimmy.
translation: 那么好吧。看来我要说得慢点、简单点。总共有小甜甜、莫德和吉米三个人。

original: I heard about what happened to Corporal Betsy.
translation: 我知道贝茜下士的事了。

original: The LT t-t-told you about that? Shit. Man, that's sh-sh-shit.
translation: 中尉跟你说起这件事了？该死，真是该、该死。

original: Th-this again?
translation: 又、又来了？

original: What do you do around here?
translation: 你在这儿是做什么的？

original: Kickin' ass. Mostly kickin' ass. See, we're watching the perimeter right now. Looking for those F-f-fiends to come back.
translation: 消灭敌人啊，多数时候都在消灭敌人。你看，我们现在监视着整片区域。等着那些恶、恶、恶魔帮杀回来。

original: When they show their faces, that's when we go to work. One shot, one k-k-kill. That's the First Recon way.
translation: 一旦他们出现在我的瞄准镜里，我们就有活干了。一枪一个、个准。我们第一侦察营就是干这事的。

original: You're right. I'm sorry.
translation: 说的对。抱歉。

original: Nah... it's no p-problem. Everybody likes to have a little fun with me. You don't rib somebody you don't like.
translation: 啊……没、没关系的。每个人都爱跟我开、开玩笑。说明他们喜、喜欢我。如果你不喜欢某个人，就不会跟他开玩笑了。

original: Here, maybe you'd better step out for a moment. You've upset him.
translation: 这样，也许你先出去走走，你惹到他了。

original: I found this ledger in Dermot's room.
translation: 我是在德莫特的房间里找到这本账簿的。

original: You got his book? Dermot, this bastard got your book! He got your book!
translation: 你拿了他的账簿？德莫特，这个混蛋拿了你的账簿！他拿了你的账簿！

original: You got his book? Dermot, this bitch got your book! She got your book!
translation: 你拿了他的账簿？德莫特，这个婊子拿了你的账簿！她拿了你的账簿！

original: Oh. You've got a little pet. How sweet.
translation: 噢，你有个小宠物。它多可爱啊。

original: Yes, you are! Yes, that's right!
translation: 你是！是的，没错！

original: Boy... I sure could use some drugs. You know anybody that sells drugs?
translation: 小子……我觉得自己想嗑点药。你知道有谁卖这个的吗？

original: [FAILED] What? Are you some kind of idiot? Why, uh... why would I know that?
translation: [失败] 什么？你是白痴吗？凭什么……呃，你凭什么觉得我会知道？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, I getcha. Lookin for a slightly more chemical thrill?
translation: [成功] 哦，我懂了。想来一点化学刺激么？

original: Okay, I tell you what - I happen to keep some Jet around for emergencies. 35 caps and it's yours.
translation: 好的，我告诉你——我正好储存了一些杰特以备不时之需。给我35个瓶盖，它就是你的了。

original: Gambling's not my scene. Maybe you could hook me up with something "medicinal?"
translation: 赌博不是我的专长。也许你能给我弄些"药品"？

original: From what I hear, your players are pretty unlucky. What's your secret?
translation: 据我说知，你的对手似乎都不大走运。你有什么秘密？

original: [FAILED] I guess Lady Luck just smiles on me, that's all. Nothing special about it.
translation: [失败] 只不过是幸运女神眷顾我了。没什么特别的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You know how they say you make your own luck? Well, let's just say I make mine with a little extra ink on the cards.
translation: [成功] 他们不是说过，所谓运气都是自己争取来的吗？其实很简单，我在每张牌上都用墨水做了一点点标记。

original: I've run some cons in my day - one clever bastard to another, what's your trick?
translation: 我当年也出过不少老千——同行不相欺，你玩的是哪一手？

original: Sure, I'm in. Why not?
translation: 好的，我加入。为什么不呢？

original: Glad to have you. Let's go. Just stick close and follow my lead. Keith's a cowardly son of a bitch, but he might try something if he's desperate.
translation: 很高兴你能加入。走吧。我带路，跟紧我就行了。基斯是个胆小的杂种，不过他狗急了也要跳墙的。

original: Tell me about Keith again.
translation: 再跟我说说基斯吧。

original: Marked cards, huh? I suppose it's obvious, really. Here, you've earned this.
translation: 在扑克牌做手脚？要我说，明眼人都看得出来。拿着，这是你的报酬。

original: I'm going to go take Keith into custody. If you're interested in a little extra pay, I wouldn't mind back-up.
translation: 我要拘捕基斯。如果你还想再赚点外快的话，我不介意抓他的时候有人给我殿后。

original: I've got evidence - Keith has a set of marked cards he uses to cheat.
translation: 我已经得到证据——基斯打牌出老千，他在扑克牌上做了手脚。

original: Son of a bitch - I knew he was involved with drugs. Thanks - this gives me the evidence I need. Here - you've earned this.
translation: 狗娘养的——我就知道他在捣腾毒品。谢谢你帮我找到了需要的证据。拿着——这是你应得的。

original: I'm going to go take Keith into custody. If you're interested in a little extra pay, I wouldn't mind back-up.
translation: 我要拘捕基斯。如果你还想再赚点外快，我不介意有人给我殿后。

original: I've got evidence - Keith is selling drugs to the locals.
translation: 我已经得到了证据——基斯正在向本地人售卖毒品。

original: Drugs and crooked gambling? Can't say I'm surprised. Here, you've earned this.
translation: 贩毒和出老千？我一点也不意外。这是你应得的报酬。

original: I'm going to go take Keith into custody. If you're interested in a little extra pay, I wouldn't mind back-up.
translation: 我要拘捕基斯。如果你还想再赚点外快，我不介意有人给我殿后。

original: I've got proof that Keith is selling drugs and using marked cards.
translation: 我得到的证据表明，基斯不仅贩卖毒品，打牌还出老千。

original: Tell me about this "Keith."
translation: 说说这个"基斯。"

original: Keith's a two-bit hustler, he runs a gambling operation out of his shack. Ask me, he wins way too often to be playing fair.
translation: 基斯是个小混混。他在自己的小破屋外开设赌局。要我说，他赢得太多了，肯定有猫腻。

original: I suspect he's running drugs, too, I just can't prove it. Maybe you can find something - talk to him, poke around his shack, something.
translation: 我怀疑他同时也在贩毒。只是没有证据。也许你能帮上忙，去套他的话，或者在他的小破屋里搜刮一下。

original: First I've heard about conscience in a while.
translation: 这么久我头一回听人说到良心。

original: Yeah, doesn't sound like me at all, right? But it happens.
translation: 是啊，听起来一点也不像我，是吗？可就是这样。

original: Some cute little junkie bitch, so fucked-up she doesn't even know that she's the bad guy. And I've got to headshot her. Makes me think.
translation: 之前，有个吸毒成瘾的小骚货，太自以为是了，甚至不知道自己有多坏。我只能爆了她的脑袋，让我有点难以释怀。

original: Might just be sex, though. I see some cute little number, and I'd rather get in her pants. So maybe I'm a stone-cold bitch, after all.
translation: 也许是因为我喜欢她。只要我见到漂亮姑娘，就忍不住想往她身上钻。说到底，可能我也只是个冷血的臭婊子罢了。

original: Have you seen any serious combat here?
translation: 最近有没有什么比较激烈的战斗？

original: Not unless you count the Fiends as serious. Gorobets keeps us inside the fence, most of the time. Doesn't matter to me, I just shoot bad guys.
translation: 没有，除非你觉得剿灭恶魔帮也能算“激烈”。大部分时间格罗别茨只把我们关在军营里。我无所谓，反正我只负责杀敌。

original: Sooner or later, they'll move us out to the Dam, though. That's when the shit gets nasty.
translation: 早晚他们会把我们调到大坝去的。不过那时候事情可就真的麻烦了。

original: So snipers work in pairs?
translation: 这么说狙击手都是两人一组执行任务。

original: Yeah. We spot for each other, watch each other's backs. Usually works pretty well, unless you get paired up with an asshole.
translation: 是的，我们互相掩护，互相照应。通常合作得很好，除非你的队友是个废物。

original: Thing is, there's a lot of assholes in the army. Now if they paired me up with somebody who looks like you...
translation: 问题是，现在这支军队偏偏不缺废物。要是他们能让我和你这样的家伙一组的话……

original: Lot of downtime in the army. Nobody around but you and your partner. Plenty of time for... whatever we want.
translation: 在军队里实在是憋得慌。很多时候周围除了你和你搭档，一个人也没有。当然这样我们就能有……独处的时光了。

original: Yeah. We spot for each other, watch each other's backs. Usually works pretty well, unless you get paired up with an asshole.
translation: 是的，我们互相掩护，互相照应。通常合作得很好，除非你的队友是个废物。

original: Thing is, there's a lot of assholes in the army. I keep hoping they'll pair me up with some hot blonde, like you see on those old pinups.
translation: 问题是，现在这支军队偏偏不缺废物。我真希望他们能把我安排和一位热辣的金发美女一组，类似招贴画上的那些。

original: Shit, I don't even care if she can shoot straight. Can't have everything.
translation: 妈的，我甚至都不要求她枪法准。人不能十全十美嘛。

original: I thought you should know. Cook-Cook is dead.
translation: 我想还是告诉你比较好。大厨库克已经死了。

original: You killed him? Well, shit. Here I'd dreamed up this whole elaborate revenge fantasy.
translation: 你杀了他？好吧，我还整天在琢磨怎样才能把他大卸八块呢。

original: Didn't really think I'd do it, but as long as the tubby bastard was actually alive, I could pretend like I would.
translation: 我没有真想那么干，但只要那下流坯子还活着，我就会一直琢磨。

original: Here. I owe you. Take it and get out of here, before I indulge my inner bitch and spoil the moment.
translation: 给你，算我欠你的。拿上就赶紧走人吧，免得我泼妇脾气发作，破坏了这美好的气氛。

original: I heard you were raped by Cook-Cook.
translation: 我听说你被大厨库克强奸了。

original: Motor-Runner is dead. I brought his helmet as proof.
translation: 轰鸣恶煞死了。我有他的头盔为证。

original: What's going on in Westside?
translation: 西区怎么了？

original: I try to keep my people out of Westside. Apart from trying to stay on good terms with the Khans, who do business there... there's Mean Sonofabitch.
translation: 我一直想让我的人远离西区。毕竟我要和大汗帮搞好关系，因为他们在那儿有生意要做。还有一个叫无耻杂种的家伙。

original: That fucking mutant is more trouble to kill than to avoid. Having someplace for my people to sleep reduces the chances of drifting into Westside.
translation: 那混蛋变种人就是死不了，惹不起躲得起。至少有了能睡觉的地方，我的人也不至于成天去西区晃悠。

original: Well, keep moving.
translation: 给我走开。

original: Why did you move the Fiends into this Vault?
translation: 你为什么要带恶魔帮进这座避难所？

original: We needed some place to put down roots. I was having trouble keeping my people out of Westside.
translation: 我们需要一个地方安营扎寨。以前我的人老是往西区钻，让我很是头疼。

original: How long have you been stationed here?
translation: 你在这里驻扎多长时间了？

original: Going on six months, now. But I reckon we'll be moving out, soon enough. Can't talk about the details.
translation: 到现在快六个月了，不过我想很快我们就会转移的。细节不便告诉你。

original: 'Til then, we'll man the towers and keep an eye on the Fiends. We've had more than our share of trouble from their direction.
translation: 在那之前，我们的任务主要还是驻守控制塔，监视附近的恶魔帮。他们造成的麻烦还是相当大的。

original: Whole thing smells of Caesar to me. 'Course, that's just guesswork, but I'd still bet a few caps he's stirring up the locals against us.
translation: 我觉得这整件事情都是凯撒在背后捣鬼。当然，这只是猜测，但我敢打赌，他肯定在暗地里挑唆本地人反对我们。

original: Thanks for the information.
translation: 谢谢你告诉我这些。

original: No trouble at all. Might be nothing. Couple frisky young folks looking for a quiet place to snuggle up.
translation: 没什么。可能啥事都没有。也许只是两个小兔崽子想找个没人的地方打野炮。

original: That light is mighty consistent. Always there at 1 AM. Might be worth a look.
translation: 不过说起来……那亮光出现得也太频繁了。总是在凌晨一点钟。也许值得调查一番。

original: Have you seen anything suspicious around here?
translation: 这儿附近有什么可疑情况么？

original: As a matter of fact... it's funny that you'd ask. Couple nights back, I was on watch in the yard...
translation: 说实在的……你这么问很有趣。几天前的一个晚上，我在营地里放哨。

original: Got myself a habit of looking all around - not just where I'd expect to find trouble. Old habit, but it's saved my hide, on occasion.
translation: 我有个习惯，就是爱转悠——不光是有可能出事的地方，几乎哪儿都去。老习惯了，但有几次，这招还真救了我的命。

original: Round about one in the morning, I spied some lights in the control tower. Now that's the third time I've spied those lights, mind you.
translation: 大约凌晨一点钟的时候，我发现控制塔里有亮光。那是我第三次发现那儿有亮光，真的。

original: And every time I ask about it, they tell me the place was empty. I'm just saying... it didn't look empty to me.
translation: 可我每次问起来，他们都说那里根本没人。要我说……那儿肯定有人。

original: Interesting rifle you have there. Lever-action, right?
translation: 你这把来复枪挺不错的啊。是杠杆枪机，对吧？

original: I call her La Longue Carabine. Didn't always have the scope - I added that myself.
translation: 我叫她长舌卡宾枪。以前没有固定瞄准镜，这是我自己加上的。

original: Been shooting with her so long... couldn't bring myself to toss her away. Would have felt guilty to part with the old girl.
translation: 这个老姑娘跟了我很长时间……一直都舍不得扔。要是和她分开，我会很内疚的。

original: The other snipers use bolt-action, but Gorobets reckoned it didn't matter none if I was different, so long as I can hit my targets.
translation: 其他狙击手都用弹簧枪，可格罗别茨认为，只要我能打中目标，与众不同一点也没关系。

original: Why did you leave the Rangers?
translation: 你为什么不干游骑兵了？

original: Well... that wasn't really a matter of choice. Got myself caught by Legionaries, up near Malpais.
translation: 唉……我也不是自愿放弃的啊。我在马尔佩斯附近被军团的人俘虏了。

original: They had themselves some fun with me... mangled my hands and feet pretty good.
translation: 他们折磨我，拿我取乐……弄断了我的手脚。

original: Wasn't much good with a pistol after that. Wasn't gonna be trekking across the waste on any more long scouts, either.
translation: 从那以后，我连手枪都握不牢了。更没办法长途跋涉做侦察了。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Always a pleasure. Keep yourself safe.
translation: 不胜荣幸，在外小心点。

original: It's true. I've got a memorable face.
translation: 没错，因为我这张美丽的面孔实在太好记了。

original: You're a fine-looking woman, no doubt about that. But I'm looking a little deeper than skin, if you take my meaning.
translation: 你是个很漂亮的女人，毫无疑问。可我并不止在乎外表，希望你明白我的意思。

original: Can you heal me?
translation: 你能治好我吗？

original: I would be happy to, should you require it. You seem to be in fine health now.
translation: 只要你有需要，我很乐意帮忙。不过看样子你现在的状态挺好的。

original: I would be happy to. What I can do isn't much, but I give it freely.
translation: 乐意效劳。虽然我会的并不多，但我从不收钱。

original: Wait a minute - why didn't they take you, too?
translation: 等一下，他们为什么不把你也一起带走？

original: I... God help me, I ran! I abandoned my family to those butchers. Not a day goes by I don't hate myself for that.
translation: 我……上帝救了我，我逃掉了！我把家人丢给了那些刽子手。从那之后，我没有一天不是在悔恨中度过的。

original: I'm so sorry. Can I help?
translation: 真是对不起。我能帮你吗？

original: You'd do that for a complete stranger? Thank you, my friend. The army says they don't have the available manpower, as if this city is more important.
translation: 你愿为一个陌生人做这些？谢谢你，朋友。军队说他们腾不出人手，好像这座城市比人命还重要似的。

original: From what I've gathered from NCR rangers, they were most likely taken to Cottonwood Cove. You might start there.
translation: 我从NCR游骑兵那儿打听到了一点消息，他们最有可能被带到了棉白杨湾。你可以从那里开始找。

original: See you later.
translation: 回头见。

original: Get it done.
translation: 把事情做完。

original: The guy claiming to stand in for Price is dead.
translation: 那个家伙声称是普莱斯的代理人，他死了。

original: Good to hear.
translation: 很好。

original: Well, I'd say you're officially invited to the big kids' table now. My stash is your stash.
translation: 好吧，要我说，你现在就算正式入伙了。从今往后，我的货就是你的货。

original: Oh, and I think you might get more use out of this rifle than I ever will. Enjoy.
translation: 哦，还有，我觉得这支来复枪让你来用也许更合适，请笑纳。

original: I convinced the Ranger to work with you. You're safe, but be careful.
translation: 我说服那个游骑兵和你合作。你安全了，不过要小心。

original: Price wasn't there. I fought some guy claiming to be his replacement.
translation: 普莱斯不在。有个自称是他代理人的家伙，我和他干了一架。

original: Well, it sounds like you screwed the pooch. Give me the package back.
translation: 好吧，看来这桩生意是砸了。把包裹还给我。

original: Price works alone. If someone has replaced him, it's either some scumbag trying to hijack goods from his suppliers, or worse...
translation: 普莱斯一直是单干的，如果有人代替了他，那说明要么有混蛋想劫他的货，要么更糟……

original: It could be someone more dangerous. You need to kill him, whoever he is.
translation: 那家伙也许来头不小。无论他是谁，你都必须干掉他。

original: Some guy is standing in for Price. I didn't inquire further.
translation: 有个人替代了普莱斯，我没有细问。

original: Huh. Not good. Price works alone. Chat him up and see what's going on.
translation: 啊，这可不妙，普莱斯向来是单干的。和他谈谈，搞清楚到底发生了什么事。

original: Don't give him any details and do not give him the package. There's a chance he actually knows Price, but I doubt it.
translation: 不要向他透露任何内情，另外别给他包裹。他可能只是碰巧认识普莱斯，但我对此深表怀疑。

original: Why is the door to the entrance locked?
translation: 为什么通往入口的门被锁住了？

original: Are you kidding me? This place is under quarantine! We can't let a single spore get out of this place if we can help it.
translation: 你在开玩笑吗？这里必须被隔离！我们绝对不能让孢子跑到外面去。

original: What were you doing down in that cave?
translation: 你当时在那个洞里干什么呢？

original: The mantises and spore plants virtually ignored me for most of the time I've been here.
translation: 我踏入避难所后，那些螳螂和孢子植物多数时候都无视我。

original: It was only once I began to investigate the fifth level that my presence began to agitate them. I guess I was a little too close to home for them.
translation: 但是当我开始调查第五层时，我似乎刺激到了它们。我猜可能是因为我离它们的巢穴太近了。

original: A few days ago, I was attacked by a large number of mantises and was knocked unconscious. When I woke up, I was in that cave.
translation: 几天之前，我被一大群螳螂攻击，失去了知觉。当我醒来的时候，就躺在那个洞里了。

original: The mantises seem to feed some of their prey to the plants. Fortunately for me, it appears the plants are disinclined to eat Ghoul meat.
translation: 那些螳螂似乎会给孢子植物喂食猎物。不过我挺走运，那些植物好像不愿意吃尸鬼肉。

original: How did you get this whole gas thing set up so quickly?
translation: 你是怎么这么快把瓦斯充满整个楼层的？

original: That's a very good question! Actually, I didn't come up with it. The systems were already set up to pump the gas when I first arrived here.
translation: 问得好！其实不是我弄的。我刚到这里的时候，空气循环系统就已经在排放瓦斯了。

original: I believe the scientists were in the process of attempting to ignite the gas just as we're about to do. And by we, I mean you, of course.
translation: 看来这些科学家在我们来之前就已经要准备点燃瓦斯了。当然，现在这任务就交给你了。

original: Where did these plants come from?
translation: 这些植物都从哪里来的？

original: From what I've been able to determine, the scientists here managed to breed them by combining traits from two distinct plant species.
translation: 根据我的推断，它们由这里的科学家通过杂交两个不同的品种，综合它们的特性制造而成。

original: The resulting hybrid proved to be more adaptable than expected, however, and soon became a threat to humans.
translation: 但是，培育出来的杂交种的适应性远超预期，很快就对人类产生了威胁。

original: It's sad, really. All those wonderful minds, undone by their own irresponsibility.
translation: 真是悲哀。这些无比聪明的人最终被自己的轻率给毁灭了。

original: Did you say there'd be a blast?
translation: 你刚才是不是说——会引起爆炸？

original: Oh yes, I imagine there'll be quite an explosion when the gas gets set off. Fire will probably expand throughout the entire level in mere moments.
translation: 是的，我想瓦斯引燃之后应该会发生不小的爆炸。火焰可能会迅速蔓延到整个楼层。

original: [Attack] The bad news is I'm here to relieve you of your life.
translation: [攻击] 坏消息是，我解放你的方式是要彻底消灭你。

original: What- What are you doing?
translation: 你——你要干什么？

original: [Attack] I'm going to get you in trouble for blowing up the monorail.
translation: [攻击] 我要让你成为列车被炸毁的替罪羊。

original: What? Like hell you are.
translation: 什么？说什么鬼话呢。

original: <Pull Pin> I just pulled the pin out of somebody's grenade.
translation: <拉开保险栓> 我刚才拉开了某人的手雷保险栓。

original: Man, I can't wait to see the look on his face!
translation: 天啊，老兄，我简直等不及要看那人的表情了！

original: Where is Private Crenshaw's footlocker?
translation: 列兵克伦肖的脚柜在什么地方？

original: It's in the main concourse. That's the building just across the skybridge. There's a barracks area that'll be behind you on the left when you enter.
translation: 在主厅。过了天桥后看到的那栋建筑就是了。进去以后，你的左后方就是营区。

original: His stuff will be at the foot of one of the beds.
translation: 他的东西应该就放在床脚边。

original: Where can I find Private Crenshaw again?
translation: 再问一下，我在哪能找到列兵克伦肖？

original: He's stationed just inside the south wall of the base. Should be on patrol, if he isn't screwing around.
translation: 他就在基地这一侧的南墙下站岗。如果他没去别处鬼混的话，应该正在巡逻。

original: You're not telling me something. You couldn't have forgotten the whole massacre.
translation: 你说的这些都没用。你不可能把整个屠杀的经过全都忘了吧。

original: It's like I tell Major Dhatri. Best not to look under a rock, if you don't really want to know what's there.
translation: 就像我跟达特里少校说的，如果你不想知道石头下面有什么，那最好就不要掀开它。

original: Could be that NCR found some blood on me, and none of it mine. Could be that a few of those Khans didn't die from NCR bullets.
translation: 也许，当时NCR发现我身上血迹斑斑，但那些都不是我的血。也许有些大汗帮的人并没有被NCR的子弹直接打死。

original: I had scores of my own to settle... deeper ones than NCR ever had. Don't bother asking who they were with.
translation: 当时，我自己也有一笔帐要算……那是比NCR还要重的血海深仇。你也别费力去问他们当时站在哪一边了。

original: So your name... it comes from Bitter Springs.
translation: 所以你的名字……是源自苦泉。

original: You're not fully grown 'til you've taken a beat-down. Everybody gathers round and hits you until you're damn near dead.
translation: 大汗帮里有个规矩，只有经历过一顿杀威拳，你才算长大成人。也就是所有人把你围在中间，将你揍个半死。

original: After that - if you haven't begged for mercy - you get to choose a new name. One you'll use for the rest of your life.
translation: 在那之后，如果你还没求饶，你就有资格挑选一个新名字。这个名字将会陪伴你终身。

original: When NCR slaughtered the Khans at Bitter Springs, I hadn't got my beat-down yet. I was still too young.
translation: 当NCR血洗苦泉的大汗帮时，我还没接受过杀威拳的洗礼。我当时太小了。

original: Way I see it, Bitter Springs was my beat-down. So afterward... I gave myself a name. It's all I've got from the Khans, and it's all I ever want.
translation: 在我看来，苦泉事件就是我的成人礼。后来……我就给自己取了这个名字。这就是大汗帮所给我的一切，也正是我一直想要的。

original: Tell me about what happened to them at Bitter Springs.
translation: 和我说说当时苦泉的情况吧。

original: It was a massacre. That's what a lot of NCR folk will tell you. Most of them feel plenty bad about what happened.
translation: 大屠杀。很多NCR的人都会这么告诉你。大部分人对于当时发生的一切都难以释怀。

original: But I was there. Saw it myself. I don't care what anybody says. The Khans asked for Bitter Springs. They wouldn't leave the NCR be.
translation: 但我那天也在现场。我亲眼目睹了整个经过。我不在乎别人说什么，苦泉的事就是大汗帮自找的。谁叫他们不让NCR安生。

original: My damn parents, too. They were just as bad as the rest.
translation: 我那该死的父母也是。他们跟其他人一样坏。

original: I didn't mean to offend. You don't have to tell me, if you'd rather not.
translation: 我无意冒犯。如果你不愿意告诉我也无妨。

original: [SUCCEEDED] It's a Khan name. You know... the "Great Khans." That's what my parents were.
translation: [成功] 这是大汗帮的名字。你知道……就是那个"大汗帮。"我父母都是大汗帮的人。

original: I figured I grew up around the bastards... they owed me a name, after all they put me through.
translation: 我是和一帮王八羔子一起长大的……他们让我受了这么多苦，多少欠我一个名字。

original: Your father is your commanding officer? Is that allowed?
translation: 你们的指挥官是你父亲？这种事符合规定？

original: Yeah, look... he's not my real father. He just looked after me for a while.
translation: 是的，其实……他不是我亲生父亲。他只是照顾了我一段时间。

original: It's a long story. And I'd get tired of talking before it was through.
translation: 这件事可说来话长。我是没耐心全部讲完。

original: Not too friendly, are you?
translation: 你好像不太友好啊。

original: You really want to talk to somebody, try 10 of Spades. He's always got plenty to say.
translation: 你想和人聊天，去找黑桃十吧。他总是很有话说。

original: Me, I'm here to do my job. For now, that job is shootin' Fiends.
translation: 我呢，只是来执行任务的。就目前来说，我的任务是干死那些恶魔帮。

original: The law is the law. I'm done doing business with you.
translation: 犯法就是犯法，我和你的关系结束了。

original: Now see, that's just downright unfriendly of you. I just can't let you go shooting your mouth off to Boyd now can I?
translation: 瞧瞧，你翻脸比翻书还快。我怎么能就这样放你去找博伊德告状呢？

original: Lying bastard. I want cut in on this action.
translation: 你说谎。我要你给我提成。

original: Bullshit. If you're moving drugs, I'm going to have to report you.
translation: 放屁，如果你偷运毒品，我就举报你。

original: All right. I guess I believe you.
translation: 好吧，我相信你了。

original: You're getting too close, shamus!
translation: 你知道得太多了，奸贼！

original: This is where your trail runs cold.
translation: 你的调查到此为止了。

original: How long have you been a bounty hunter?
translation: 你做赏金猎人多久了？

original: Oh, shit, I don't know. Got to be at least a month. Longer than I last at most jobs.
translation: 哦，见鬼，我忘了。起码有一个月了吧。比我以前干的那些工作要久多了。

original: Why does Dhatri owe you caps?
translation: 达特里为何欠你钱？

original: Because I killed a couple of marks for him, that's why. You ever hear of Jackson? Or Night Terror?
translation: 因为我为他杀了一大批通缉犯，却还是两手空空。你听说过杰克逊吗？或是夜魔？

original: I found this in Dermot's room. <Show her Dermot's ledger.>
translation: 我在德莫特的房间里找到了这个。<给她看德莫特的账簿。>

original: I'll take a look, just to see what sort of shit they were into.
translation: 给我瞧一眼，就看看他们到底在搞什么鬼名堂。

original: What?... Those bastards! Selling folks off to the Fiends? Selling children - to Cook-Cook...?
translation: 什么？……那些混蛋！贩卖人口给恶魔帮？把儿童卖给——大厨库克…？

original: I've seen enough. You did everyone a service. Take these. Might help if you get in a jam.
translation: 我看不下去了。你为大家做了件好事。这些东西你收下吧。遇到麻烦时也许用得到。

original: I found this in Dermot's room. <Show her Dermot's ledger.>
translation: 我在德莫特房间里找到了这个。<给她看德莫特的账簿。>

original: I got a little turned around. Where can I find your boss?
translation: 我有点绕晕了。我上哪能找到你们的老大？

original: Can you make it worth my while?
translation: 你们要怎么报答我呢？

original: I don't know. Carter told me about some password he hacked out of a computer. I could give it to you, if you help us out.
translation: 我不知道。卡特把他破解的那台电脑密码告诉了我，如果你救我们出去，我就把密码给你。

original: Give me the password he found, and I'll help you escape.
translation: 把他找到的密码告诉我，我就帮你们逃走。

original: [FAILED] Help us first, then we'll give you the password, and don't think about killing me. It's all in my head.
translation: [失败] 你先救我们，我们才能再给你密码。杀了我也没用，密码都在我脑子里。

original: If I help you escape, will you give me the password he found?
translation: 如果我帮你们逃走，你能把他找到的密码告诉我吗？

original: Yeah, it's yours if you help us out of here.
translation: 当然，只要你把我们救出去，密码就告诉你。

original: A gang called the Scorpions murdered him. A man named Anderson witnessed it.
translation: 一伙自称毒蝎帮的暴徒杀了他。另外还有一个叫安德森的人，他目睹了整个经过。

original: Shit. That's why you don't go wandering off looking for some call girl on the Strip without telling somebody first.
translation: 见鬼，你看看，这就是擅自去长街招妓却不提前打招呼的下场。

original: Anderson. Is that the Followers of the Apocalypse Anderson?
translation: 安德森。是天启追随者的安德森？他以前有和我们共事过，他还说了什么？

original: He was killed by a man named Anderson he caught stealing water from the NCR.
translation: 他被一个叫安德森的人杀了。那个人从NCR偷水的时候被他抓住。

original: Anderson. I've heard of him, if it's the same guy. Water nerd from the Followers of the Apocalypse. Used to handle some of the operations for OSI.
translation: 安德森，要是没记错，我认得他。他是天启追随者的人，书呆子一个。曾经在科工部主持过一些项目。

original: I don't know what to think about the Followers. The things they do... hard to say if they're helping or hurting sometimes. Especially in Freeside.
translation: 我真的不知道该怎么看待天启追随者。他们做的事……有时候很难说究竟是在帮忙还是在添乱，尤其是在自由城的问题上。

original: I'll have to send some people out there to make sure we don't lose any more water. That stuff's like gold out here.
translation: 我会派些人过去，确保我们的淡水不会再流失。它对我们可是如金子一般珍贵。

original: But you. I owe you for this. You saved me a lot of work. And I'm sure Corporal White's family will be grateful to at least get some closure.
translation: 但你，我欠你一个人情。你让我省了不少力气，怀特下士的家人至少也能得到些许慰藉。

original: The MPs keep a bunch of junk around that's confiscated off of people who decide to screw with us.
translation: 宪兵队存了不少从捣乱分子手中收缴来的垃圾。

original: I haven't really sorted through it, but go ahead and see if there's anything you can use in there.
translation: 我还没详细做过整理，但你可以去看看，如果有什么需要，就尽管拿去吧。

original: We keep it in a trunk across the hall, by the prison cells.
translation: 我们把它放在大厅后面的一个箱子里了，就在牢房边上。

original: Isaac has me out looking for metal so they can do the first shipment.
translation: 艾萨克说，我必须先找些废铁来，他们才能开始准备第一批货。

original: Well what the hell are you doing here? Get your ass out and find that metal. Don't come back until the job is done!
translation: 哦，那你还在这儿干什么？快给我滚出去收集废铁。活没干完就别回来 !

original: <Draw Weapon> You're a dead man.
translation: <掏出武器> 你死定了。

original: Whoa! Hold on a minute, buddy...
translation: 哇哦！等一下，伙计……

original: Whoa! Hold on a minute, lady...
translation: 哇哦！等一下，伙计……

original: Has your research here turned up anything interesting?
translation: 你发现什么有意思的东西了吗？

original: A few things here and there, but a lot of the data has been corrupted, and all of the live samples have been contaminated by the spore plants.
translation: 是有一些，但是不少资料已经损坏了，而且所有活着的样本都被孢子植物感染了。

original: One interesting thing I found is that one of the chemicals secreted by the spore plants serves as a mild stimulant when ingested by humans.
translation: 另外我还发现一件有趣的事——孢子植物的一种分泌物被人类摄入后，会起到轻微的兴奋剂效果。

original: As far as I can tell, it has no side effects or addictive properties, aside from the inherent psychological ones, of course.
translation: 到目前为止，我还没发现它具有任何副作用或成瘾性。当然啦，要剔除那些已经发神经的样本。

original: Now that I think of it, there was a Cpl. Farber back at McCarran who'd probably be interested in it. There's a sample of it around here somewhere.
translation: 哦，对了。在麦卡伦营地有一位法伯下士，他可能会对这个感兴趣。样本的话这附近就有一个。

original: Nice to meet you.
translation: 很高兴见到你。

original: A pleasure to meet you, madam. What may I do for you?
translation: 很高兴见到你，女士。我能为你做些什么？

original: Nothing today. Goodbye.
translation: 今天没什么事情。再见。

original: I'm here to buy out Cassidy Caravans for the Crimson Caravan Company.
translation: 我是来代表深红商队公司收购盖西迪商队的。

original: Okay! Sold!
translation: 好的！成交！

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Bye.
translation: 拜。

original: Actually, I'm supposed to be getting a body out of there.
translation: 实际上，我是受人之托，要去那里给人收尸。

original: I'm looking for ways to make myself useful.
translation: 我正想着怎么才能帮你们呢。

original: If that's so, how about you look into repairing the solar arrays on the roof of the generator building?
translation: 那样的话，你去试试把发电机房顶上的太阳能电池板修好怎么样？

original: Nothing too complicated about it, but it's a long ways to walk my old bones, and there's been that ant problem over near there.
translation: 事情本身不复杂，可我这把老骨头走不了太远的路，而且那边还在闹蚂蚁。

original: You can't miss the array. It's on top of the generator building smack dab in the middle of Nellis between the two runways.
translation: 太阳能板很好找。就在内利斯基地两条跑道中间那座发电机房的楼顶。

original: Tell me again what I need to do.
translation: 再说一遍我需要做什么。

original: I wish you'd paid attention the first time! All you need to do is attach the deployable ballast to the plane.
translation: 我真希望你第一次的时候有认真听讲！你要做的是把可展开式浮袋装到飞机上。

original: Some of my robots will carry a remote activation station out to the shore. Attach the ballast, hit a button, and they'll handle the rest.
translation: 我的机器人会把一个遥控启动器带去湖边。给飞机装上浮袋，按下按钮，剩下的事情就交给机器人去做吧。

original: Where is the bomber located?
translation: 轰炸机的位置在哪？

original: I told you, at the bottom of Lake Mead! I'll make sure the location is displayed on your Pip-Boy map.
translation: 我跟你说了，就在米德湖底！我会把地点标记在你的哔哔小子上。

original: Where is the bomber located?
translation: 轰炸机的位置在哪？

original: It's at the bottom of Lake Mead. I'll mark its location on your Pip-Boy map.
translation: 就在米德湖底。我会把地点标记在你的哔哔小子上。

original: Just take all of it.
translation: 都拿走吧。

original: Hey, thanks!
translation: 嘿，谢了 !

original: He's doing well. I'll come back when I have some more information.
translation: 他近况很好。再有其他消息我会回来告诉你的。

original: Okay, talk to you soon.
translation: 好吧，回头再聊。

original: I'm not sure. Let me think about it and I'll come back to you.
translation: 我不知道。我考虑考虑再回来告诉你。

original: Okay, let me know when you have an idea.
translation: 好吧，想出办法了再跟我说。

original: <Lie> You have permission. They know you're coming.
translation: <撒谎> 你可以通过，他们知道你会来。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Really? Thank you so much! I'll get going right away.
translation: [成功] 真的？太谢谢你了！我马上出发。

original: He's a special sort of guy - perfect for a special sort of gal.
translation: 他是个很特别的小伙，对一位很特别的姑娘来说，简直是绝配。

original: Ooh, I've just got to meet him! Is there any way the Boomers would let me visit Nellis?
translation: 哦，我要去见他！有什么办法能让大炮族放我进内利斯吗？

original: He's nice, maybe a little naive. Seems convinced you're the love of his life.
translation: 挺好的，虽说有些孩子气。他似乎早就对你情有独钟了。

original: Really? That's so sweet!
translation: 真的吗？太棒了！

original: I'd love to go meet him. Is there any way the Boomers would let me visit Nellis?
translation: 我真想见见他。有没有什么办法能让大炮族放我进内利斯基地？

original: Oh, I almost forgot. Take off the hood.
translation: 还真忘了。把罩子摘下来吧。

original: How else are we supposed to get back, genius?
translation: 那我们该怎么回去啊，天才？

original: East? You moron! That'll take us days out of our way.
translation: 往东？你傻了？这得多走好几天路程呢。

original: I'm glad you made it out here. You're even more stunning up close than you were at a distance.
translation: 很高兴你能来。虽然远看也很美，但近了看，你可更加显得迷人了。

original: Sounds like you're a little disappointed in your troops.
translation: 听起来你对你的士兵有些失望。

original: Disappointed? We call 'em the Misfits for a reason. They're undisciplined, lazy, and they have absolutely no esprit de corps.
translation: 失望？大家管他们叫后进生，这个绰号可不是白叫的。他们目无纪律、慵懒涣散，而且丝毫没有团队精神。

original: The squad leader's got some promise, kid named Mags, but as for the rest... I don't see much hope.
translation: 那个叫玛格丝的人是他们的队长，还算有点潜力。至于其他人嘛……我不抱多大期望。

original: I'm going to make them shape up if it kills me, though. Or them, for that matter.
translation: 就算把我累死，也得把这队伍整出点样子来。否则到时候，死的就是他们。

original: Sgt. McCredie asked me to talk to you about getting your squad in shape.
translation: 麦克雷迪军士派我来和你商量该怎么整顿你的小队。

original: He did, huh? Well, good luck with that. You'd have an easier time teaching radroaches to march in formation.
translation: 他真这么说的？嚯，那可祝你好运咯。这比训练蟑螂齐步走还难。

original: Hoo-hoo! Hot damn, it's gonna be a party in the camp tonight!
translation: 呜——呼！太屌了，今晚要在营地里开派对！

original: I got you the stuff.
translation: 我拿到你要的东西了。

original: Yo, I'll tell you what this squad needs. A healthy dose of angry juice.
translation: 哟，我告诉你这小队真正需要什么。他们需要来针兴奋剂。

original: That seems highly illogical. What reason would he have for doing that?
translation: 这感觉很不合逻辑啊。他这么做有什么理由呢？

original: To me? Well, I'll tell you what I think this squad needs: a little more basic human niceness.
translation: 你问我？我告诉你这小队真正需要什么：他们需要一点点人情味。

original: It helped, but we've still got a grenade range inspection to pass.
translation: 有点帮助，但我们还必须通过手雷投掷考试。

original: So, did the shooting range practice take care of things?
translation: 打靶射击这招管用了吗？

original: Yeah, what about it? I told you, we need marksmanship and explosive handling improvements.
translation: 怎么样？我跟你说过，我们需要射击以及爆破练习。

original: So, about those improvements...
translation: 关于整顿队伍这件事...

original: Like I said, you get the juice, we'll cut loose.
translation: 我说了，只要你搞到药，我们天王老子都不怕。

original: About getting the squad's readiness reports up...
translation: 关于提高队伍成绩这件事...

original: And what do you propose?
translation: 那你有什么主意？

original: Going back to those squad improvements, I had an idea.
translation: 关于提高小队作战能力这方面，我倒有个点子。

original: You did? Does that mean you're going to help?
translation: 是吗？那么说你愿意帮忙了？

original: I thought about what you said about basic human niceness.
translation: 我想了想你所说的人情味这件事。

original: Can you tell me anything about Camp Golf?
translation: 你对高尔夫营地有什么了解？

original: What do you want to know? Whole place used to be some kinda rich bastard resort, back before the war.
translation: 你想知道什么？这破地方在战争爆发前可是个给专供富佬们使用的度假胜地。

original: Now the Rangers use the old resort, and we grunts get to live in tents. Fucking typical.
translation: 现在那些旧宅子都给游骑兵占去了，而我们这些兵卒子就只能睡帐篷。真他妈可以。

original: What's a Master-At-Arms?
translation: 警卫长是什么职务？

original: I oversee the security of the Nellis homeland, from the coordination of its defense to the training and fitness of its population.
translation: 我负责内利斯的安保工作，除了协调防卫体系，还要训练居民们的体格。

original: All right. Lead the way.
translation: 好。带路吧。

original: Follow close - and mind your behavior.
translation: 跟紧了——还有，注意你的举止。

original: I hear you've got dynamite. It would help us beat the Powder Gangers.
translation: 我听说你这儿有炸药。那玩意可以帮我们痛打炸药帮。

original: What are you going to do?
translation: 你们打算怎么办？

original: Some of the others, like Sunny, will probably stand up for Ringo if he asks for help, which he hasn't.
translation: 我觉得如果林戈向我们求助，那其他一些人，比如桑妮，可能会帮助他，但他到现在也没有向我们开口。

original: Personally, I hope he sneaks out of town one night and takes the Powder Gangers with him.
translation: 就我个人而言，我倒是希望他能找一天晚上偷偷溜出镇子，把炸药帮的人都引走。

original: Where is Ringo now?
translation: 林戈现在在哪？

original: He's holed up at the abandoned gas station up the hill.
translation: 他藏在小丘上的废弃加油站里。

original: I overheard your argument. What was that all about?
translation: 我听到你们吵架了。怎么回事？

original: Looks like our little town got itself dragged into the middle of something we don't want anything to do with.
translation: 看来我们的这个小镇已经被卷进了一场人人都避之不及的风波里。

original: About a week ago, this trader, Ringo, comes into town. Survivor of an attack, he says. Bad men after him, needs a place to hide.
translation: 大概一周前，有个叫林戈的商人来到镇上。他说被人袭击了，有坏人在追他，需要找个地方躲一躲。

original: We figured he was just in shock, so we gave him a place to lie low. We didn't actually expect anyone to come after him.
translation: 我们觉得他可能是吓坏了，所以就给他安排了个地方藏身。没想到还真有人追着他来了。

original: Why are the Powder Gangers out to get you?
translation: 为什么炸药帮要找你？

original: My caravan was on the return trip from California and heading back to the company branch in New Vegas when we got jumped.
translation: 我的商队在从加州返回新维加斯分部的途中遭遇了伏击。

original: Not even a "drop your weapons and hands up" before the bullets started flying. We put up a good fight, but there was too many of them.
translation: 连句"放下武器，举起手来"都没有，子弹就开始乱飞。我们打得不错，但他们人太多了。

original: I took a few of the bandits down before I ran, so I figure their friends are out for revenge.
translation: 我逃跑以前放倒了好几个掠夺者，所以他们的朋友估计是想来报复我吧。

original: What do you know about the situation with the Powder Gangers?
translation: 关于炸药帮与镇子的纠纷你都知道些什么？

original: If Ringo doesn't head out on his own, I think we should hand him over. The town shouldn't get itself mixed into the problem.
translation: 如果林戈不主动离开的话，我觉得我们应该把他交出去。这个镇子真的经不起折腾了。

original: Don't mistake that for coward talk, though. We're a town of survivors. We'll fight tooth and nail if pushed, but we don't go looking for trouble.
translation: 不过你可别误会，我们并不是软弱。这镇上的人也都是经历过风雨的，迫不得已的话我们会反抗到底，我们只是不想惹麻烦。

original: I'm going to help Ringo take on the Powder Gangers. I might need your help.
translation: 我要帮助林戈对付炸药帮。可能需要你帮忙。

original: It's odd that Cobb wasn't able to find Ringo. The town's not that big.
translation: 科布没能找到林戈也够奇怪的。镇子又不大。

original: Cobb hasn't exactly been looking for Ringo too hard - I think he's afraid that Ringo will ambush him, which is probably true.
translation: 科布根本就没去找林戈——我觉得他应该是害怕林戈偷袭他，这是非常有可能的。

original: How many Powder Gangers are out there?
translation: 外面总共有多少炸药帮的人？

original: I need medical treatment.
translation: 我需要医疗用品。

original: Seeing as you're a friend of ours, I suppose we could trade for what you need.
translation: 看在你是朋友的份上，我们可以互通有无。

original: I'm afraid medications are in short supply. Maybe you should seek medical treatment away from Nellis.
translation: 恐怕我们也缺乏医疗用品。也许你应该去内利斯之外的地方看看。

original: <Lie> Yep, power on, ants dead, all good.
translation: <撒谎> 对，来电了，蚂蚁死了，一切都好了。

original: Mother Pearl said you have a "bug problem?"
translation: 珀尔妈妈说你需要"处理虫害？"

original: Long story short, the power failed a few days ago because giant ants have tunneled into the generator room and set up a nest.
translation: 长话短说吧，前几天停电就是因为有巨型蚂蚁爬进了发电机房，还在那儿建了个蚂蚁窝。

original: I led a team down to exterminate them, but there were... so many of them. We lost: Two killed, three wounded.
translation: 我领了一队人马想去消灭它们，但是……蚂蚁数量太多了。我们死了两个，伤了三个。

original: Personally, I think it's more than a savage can handle, but if you want to kill those ants and switch the power back on, feel free.
translation: 就我个人老说，我觉得你一个野蛮人根本处理不了这种事，但如果你真的愿意消灭蚂蚁，恢复供电，我也没理由拦着你。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You have to keep in mind that you're our first contact with the outside world since I was barely a woman.
translation: [成功] 你必须要记住，自打我成人以来，你是我们接触到的第一个外来访客。

original: Seclusion has kept us safe, but the world around us is changing. Neon lights in the distance, patrolling robots, soldiers...
translation: 与世隔绝令我们得到了安全，可我们周围的世界却在不停变化。远方的霓虹灯光，巡逻的机器人，还有士兵们……

original: My youngers think our guns can keep out the world, but I think we need to let it in, just a little, or become its victim.
translation: 我的后辈认为我们的大炮能把世界拒之门外，但我觉得我们还是应当开放，哪怕只有一点点，否则我们就会变成时代的牺牲品。

original: You're that little bit of the world, child. Welcome to Nellis.
translation: 而你，就是那溜进来的那一点点世界，孩子。欢迎来到内利斯。

original: How can we trust each other if you're going to be keeping secrets?
translation: 你要这样什么都不说，我们怎么相信彼此？

original: <Lie> I'm sorry Lindsay. Mister Cuddles is dead.
translation: <撒谎> 对不起，林赛。抱抱先生死了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] No! Not Mister Cuddles!
translation: [成功] 不！抱抱先生不会死的！

original: Okay, I'll look for him.
translation: 好的，我会去找他的。

original: Any ideas how to get to the bottom of Lake Mead without drowning?
translation: 有没有什么办法能潜到湖底还不被淹死？

original: Might try holding your breath. If that doesn't sound good enough, talk to Jack. He was working on a rebreather once.
translation: 试试憋气咯。如果不行，那就去找杰克吧。他之前在研究一种呼吸器。

original: That sounds really creepy, Loyal.
translation: 这词儿用的有些诡异啊，罗亚尔。

original: Ain't nothing creepy about it. It's a term of respect!
translation: 什么诡异。这是表示尊重！

original: <Lie> She was so excited to see you, she wouldn't wait.
translation: <撒谎> 她太想见你了，一分钟都等不下去。

original: [FAILED] Then why didn't you stop her? You could've tackled her or something! You knew how much she meant to me!
translation: [失败] 那你为什么不阻止她？你为什么不拖住她，或者想点别的办法！你明明知道她对我有多重要！

original: Just - just go away!
translation: 你——你走开！

original: <Lie> It's a tragedy. She loved you so much, she risked it all.
translation: <撒谎> 这是一场悲剧。她那么爱你，冒了那么大的危险。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, my sweet blameless Red! Curse the walls of Nellis! Curse our guns and isolation! Her blood is on our hands!
translation: [成功] 噢，我无辜的爱人啊！该死的内利斯之墙！该死的大炮和隔离带！是我们害死了她！

original: Only if we stop shelling everyone who comes close will some good come from this tragedy. If you'll excuse me...
translation: 如果我们能停止炮击靠近的行人，悲剧就不会重演了。抱歉，请让我静一静……

original: I told her how to get through the artillery barrage.
translation: 我告诉她怎么穿过炮火隔离带了。

original: Wow, that seems dangerous, but if you really think it's safe, I'll trust you. You did make it here, after all.
translation: 哇，这有点危险啊，不过如果你觉得没问题，我也相信你。毕竟你都自己经历过了。

original: I've seen her, but we haven't talked about you yet.
translation: 我见过她了，不过还没有谈到你。

original: What are you waiting for? I've been losing sleep... wonder what she'll say!
translation: 你还在等什么？我成天在猜她的心思，害我都睡不着觉了 !

original: Tell me about her.
translation: 跟我说说她。

original: Does Goodsprings get many visitors?
translation: 清泉镇的外来者多吗？

original: Mostly traders looking to buy Bighorner meat and hides. The traders are the main reason the general store manages to stay in business.
translation: 大部分是来买大角羊肉和皮的商人。也正是因为这些商人，杂货店才能经营得下去。

original: Most travelers heading south on the I-15 just push on towards Primm unless they're in desperate need of supplies.
translation: 除非是物资短缺，否则绝大多数的旅行者都会沿着15号公路直接往南去普瑞姆。

original: What other towns are nearby?
translation: 附近还有其他镇子吗？

original: Southeast of here is Primm - can't miss it, since it has the giant old rollercoaster right in the middle of town. The NCR's got an outpost there.
translation: 东南方是普瑞姆——镇子的正中央有一个巨大的过山车，非常显眼。NCR在那里设了个前哨。

original: If you follow the road north, you'll eventually hit Sloan and Quarry Junction. They mine rocks or something, but I heard they got troubles lately.
translation: 如果你沿着路往北走，最终会抵达斯隆和采石场。他们好像在那儿挖石头，但我听说他们最近遇到了一点麻烦。

original: I wouldn't head that direction if I were you, though. Got critters up there that don't take kindly to getting shot.
translation: 如果我是你的话，我可不会往那边走。那附近游荡的生物都不是善茬。

original: Let's talk about the areas around Goodsprings.
translation: 我们说说清泉镇周边的地方。

original: Sure. What do you want to know?
translation: 当然，你想知道什么 ?

original: Now, the threat of legal action forces me to say that Nuka-Cola is a swell beverage, but sometimes people just wanted something different, you know?
translation: 我不想惹官司，我承认核子可乐是一种时髦的饮料，但老喝一种东西，人们总会腻的，你说对吧？

original: Looooong ago, people didn't really have many choices when it came to soft drinks. It was either water, or Nuka-Cola.
translation: 在很——久以前，人们能喝到的软饮料是非常少的，要么喝白水，要么就是核子可乐。

original: Wahoo, you did it pardner! Bully for you! Ol' Festus knew you could do it. I suppose you'll be wanting that prize now.
translation: 哇哦，你做到了，朋友！你真可牛！老费斯特斯就知道你能行。我猜你是想要奖品了。

original: Well then, hold onto your hat, because it's a doozy. Not many people have heard the true story behind Sunset Sarsaparilla. It's a right honor.
translation: 那好吧，可要把帽子摁紧咯，因为我要揭晓一个惊天大秘密。并非所有人都知道夕阳沙士背后的故事。这可是无上的荣耀。

original: And now, without further ado, your prize - The Legend of the Star...
translation: 好了，事不宜迟，接下来就是你的奖品——星星的传说……

original: Looooong ago, people didn't have a heap of choices when it came to soft drinks. It was either water, or Nuka-Cola.
translation: 在很——久以前，人们能喝到的软饮料是非常少的，要么喝白水，要么就是核子可乐。

original: Now, the threat of legal action forces me to say that Nuka-Cola is a swell beverage, but sometimes people just wanted something different, you know?
translation: 我不想惹官司，我承认核子可乐是一种非常时髦的饮料，但老喝一种东西，人们总会腻的，你说对吧？

original: So one day a man, a saloon owner in a small town, decided to make a new type of soft drink, and asked his patrons what flavor they'd like it to be.
translation: 于是某天，有一个人，一位镇上的沙龙老板，决定制作一种新型的软饮料。他问酒吧里的顾客喜欢什么口味。

original: After getting no help from them, a stranger at the end of the bar suggested the man make a sarsaparilla flavored drink.
translation: 但客人们也想不出什么好主意，这时坐在酒吧角落里的一位陌生人发话了，他建议老板做一款沙士口味的饮料。

original: The stranger said he would happily share his family's recipe for the drink, on one condition.
translation: 陌生人说，只要肯答应他的一个条件，他就把自己的祖传饮料配方送给这位老板。

original: The condition being that the stranger would be allowed to sample a bottle whenever he liked, to ensure the recipe was being followed to the letter.
translation: 而条件就是陌生人可以随时对饮料进行抽样，以确保饮料完全依照配方制作。

original: The man happily agreed, thinking the drink would make him rich, and the stranger promised to meet him by sundown the next day.
translation: 老板欢天喜地的答应了，他觉得这饮料一定能让他发大财。于是他和陌生人约定，在次日的傍晚时分见面。

original: The next morning, the sheriff stopped by and reported that the stranger's body was found on the side of the town road. He'd been killed by bandits.
translation: 第二天早晨，治安官却在小镇路边发现了这个陌生人的尸体。他是被强盗杀死的。

original: The man, cursing his luck, closed the saloon early that day, just as the sun began to set.
translation: 沙龙老板咒骂自己运气太差，那天太阳还未下山，他就早早关门打烊了。

original: But after he had locked the doors, he turned around to find an unfamiliar bottle on the bar, with a note beneath it.
translation: 可就在他关上门的时候，他转身发现酒吧里有一个从未见过的小瓶。瓶子上贴了封信。

original: The note was sealed with blue wax in the shape of a star. Opening it, the man found it contained a recipe for a sarsaparilla-flavored drink.
translation: 信的背后有块星形的蓝色封蜡。打开信后，他发现信上写的正是沙士饮料的配方。

original: Sampling the bottle's contents and finding it singularly delicious, the man gave silent thanks to his mysterious benefactor, wherever he was.
translation: 老板尝了一口瓶子里的东西，发现味道异常可口。他默默地感谢了那位神秘的恩人，虽然不知道他在哪里。

original: Being an honorable man, the saloon owner paid for the stranger's funeral, thinking it was the least he could do to repay him.
translation: 作为一个义重如山的男人，沙龙老板为陌生人举行了盛大的葬礼。他认为这是唯一能报答他的方式。

original: The saloon owner went on to become rich selling the new drink, and to this day some bottles of Sunset Sarsaparilla have a blue star under their caps.
translation: 很快，沙龙老板就靠着这种新型饮料飞黄腾达。时至今日，仍然有少数夕阳沙士的瓶盖背面印着蓝色的星星。

original: Some say the saloon owner ordered it done, in honor of the stranger. Others say it's the stranger, sampling the bottles like he promised.
translation: 有人说，这是老板为了纪念陌生人而特意制作的。也有人说，这是陌生人留下的，因为他还遵守着自己的诺言，在对饮料进行抽样。

original: And that's the Legend of the Star. Hope you enjoyed it, and hope you continue enjoying Sunset Sarsaparilla!
translation: 这就是星星的传说。希望你能喜欢，同时也希望你能继续享用夕阳沙士！

original: <Deposit your Sunset Sarsaparilla Stars in the slot.>
translation: <将你的夕阳沙士星标放进槽中。>

original: Lucky Horseshoes is played with cards numbered two through ten and aces, which have a value of one.
translation: 幸运马蹄铁使用的牌是从2到10，外加一张A，算作1点。

original: You and ol' Festus will take turns drawing cards. Each time we draw a card, we add it to our total, trying to hit the magic number of twenty one.
translation: 你和老费斯特斯轮流抽牌。每抽一张，就把牌上数字相加，争取牌的总点数接近21。

original: If either of us draws a card that brings our total up to the same number as the other, it pushes the other player's total up one.
translation: 如果某个人抽牌后，两边点数一样，那另一个玩家的总点数就要加一。

original: When this happens, it's called Lucky Horseshoes! Ol' Festus thought of the name himself, I'll have you know.
translation: 这种情况就称作幸运马蹄铁！告诉你吧，这名字可是老费斯特斯自己起的。

original: When one of us is closer to twenty one and the other can't get any closer, either by going over or because he or she held, the closer player wins.
translation: 如果我们俩中有一个人的点数更接近21，而另一个人由于不再叫牌或者爆点，已经无法再往下加了，那接近21点的那个人就算赢。

original: Ol' Festus likes the game because there are no ties in Lucky Horseshoes. If someone's sitting pretty on twenty one, Lady Luck can still bump 'em off!
translation: 老费斯特斯喜欢这规则的原因是幸运马蹄铁中不存在平局。即便某人正好是21点，幸运女神也可以踢掉他！

original: But enough jawing. By now you're as eager as I am to get tossing.
translation: 说得够多了。现在你应该也迫不及待，想来试一把了吧。

original: How do I play?
translation: 我要怎么玩？

original: Let's go.
translation: 咱们走吧。

original: Oh, Easy Pete came through with the dynamite. Here's your supply. I really hope I don't blow myself up.
translation: 哦，轻松皮特送来了一些炸药。分给你一点吧。希望我不会把自己炸飞。

original: I'll be set up near the store. Let's hope that the gang doesn't manage to make it that far.
translation: 我会守在商店附近。希望他们不会打到这里来。

original: I'm just passing through.
translation: 我只是路过。

original: I'm just passing through.
translation: 我只是路过。

original: I'm just passing through.
translation: 我只是路过。

original: [Offer Radioactive Gum] Does La Fantoma need some power gum?
translation: [给辐射口香糖] 夜魔侠要不要来点超级口香糖？

original: [Offer Chems] You know what will help you box better? Psycho. Would you like some?
translation: [给药品] 想知道怎样才能变得更厉害吗？这儿有一些疯狂药，你想来一点吗 ?

original: [Offer Radioactive Gum] I hear dinosaurs like gum.
translation: [给辐射口香糖] 我听说恐龙喜欢口香糖。

original: [Offer Radioactive Gum] Here you go kid, gum is fun!
translation: [给辐射口香糖] 这个送你，小孩，口香糖可好吃了！

original: [Offer Toy Rocket] I believe La Fantoma could use a rocket toy to enhance her flight.
translation: 我觉得夜魔侠可以用玩具火箭来增加她的飞行能力。

original: [Offer Toy Rocket] Mission control, you can't fly without a rocket. Here, take this toy rocket.
translation: 控制中心，没有火箭你不能飞，这个玩具火箭送给你。

original: [Offer Toy Dinosaur] Woah there, Red-Brick, why don't you box with this dinosaur toy?
translation: [送玩具恐龙] 哇，红发小子，这个玩具恐龙送你玩儿怎么样。 ?

original: [Offer Toy Rocket] I found this rocket toy you can have.
translation: [给玩具火箭] 这个玩具火箭送给你。

original: A rocket! Yay! Vrooom!
translation: 火箭，耶！ 呼-姆 !

original: [Offer Radioactive Gum] Hey kid, I have some gum here. It is good for you!
translation: [给辐射口香糖] 嘿，小鬼，我有口香糖，要不要尝尝？

original: What say I help you take over this town?
translation: 我帮你占了这所镇子怎么样？

original: What the hell for? Just farmers and ranchers out here. Not much worth stealing.
translation: 图个什么呢？这里就只有农夫和农场工人。值得偷的东西都没几件。

original: Didn't you already ask me about this? What the hell for - this place is worthless.
translation: 你不是问过我了吗？图个什么呢——这地方连鸡都不拉屎。

original: Exhale before you fire. Squeeze the trigger, don't jerk it.
translation: 在你开火前，要先呼气，轻叩扳机，不要太用力。

original: [FAILED] I'm really not sure how this works.
translation: [失败] 我觉得这个方法不太可能有用。

original: You're never going to hit anything shooting in one direction. Fire wildly!
translation: 光朝一个方向开枪是永远打不中东西的。射击时要狂野一点！

original: Ah, a job well done is its own reward. Good riddance to this rubbish.
translation: 啊，能把活干完就是最好的奖赏。这些垃圾总算清扫干净了。

original: Get the troops lined up. I'll help you with it.
translation: 让部队集合，我来帮你。

original: After the help you gave us at the shooting range, we'll take any advice you've got. I'll line them up.
translation: 你对我们的射击指导相当管用，我们愿意听从你的任何建议。我这就去整队。

original: I have 10 spare missiles.
translation: 我有10发导弹可以给你。

original: Good work.
translation: 干得好。

original: I have 5 spare missiles.
translation: 我有5发导弹可以给你。

original: Thanks. Those'll last us a day.
translation: 谢谢。够我们用一天了。

original: I have 1 spare missile.
translation: 我有1发导弹可以给你。

original: It's better than nothing.
translation: 有总比没有好。

original: Here's three doses of RadAway.
translation: 这是3袋辐特宁。

original: Hold still. This'll burn for a moment.
translation: 忍着点，可能会感觉有些烫。

original: All right. Here's two doses of Fixer.
translation: 好吧，这是2剂瘾头解。

original: You're going to feel a little pinch.
translation: 可能会有点疼。

original: Here are two Stimpaks.
translation: 给你2个治疗针。

original: This'll make you feel better.
translation: 这会让你感觉好点。

original: Here's two doses of RadAway.
translation: 这是2袋辐特宁。

original: Hold still. This'll burn for a moment.
translation: 忍着点，可能会感觉有些烫。

original: All right. Here's three doses of Fixer.
translation: 好吧，这是三剂瘾头解。

original: You're going to feel a little pinch.
translation: 可能会有点疼。

original: I'm suffering from radiation sickness.
translation: 我正饱受辐射病之苦。

original: I can help you in exchange for Stimpaks.
translation: 我可以帮你，只要你愿意拿几个治疗针来换。

original: I can help you in exchange for Stimpaks.
translation: 我可以帮你，只要你愿意拿几个治疗针来换。

original: I need help with an addiction.
translation: 我想解除上瘾症状。

original: I can unburden you of that, in exchange for doses of RadAway.
translation: 我可以帮你解除，但需要你拿几剂辐特宁来换。

original: I can unburden you of that, in exchange for doses of RadAway.
translation: 我可以帮你解除，但需要你拿几剂辐特宁来换。

original: I have wounds that need mending.
translation: 我有伤口需要治疗。

original: I can patch you up in exchange for doses of Fixer.
translation: 我可以帮你包扎伤口，但需要你拿几剂瘾头解做交换。

original: I can patch you up in exchange for doses of Fixer.
translation: 我可以帮你包扎伤口，但需要你拿几剂瘾头解做交换。

original: I'm pleased that you listened to the entire story! Perhaps there are details you'd like to know more about? Let me know.
translation: 谢谢你能听完我们的整段历史！也许你还想知道更多的细节？请告诉我。

original: I repaired the solar arrays.
translation: 我把太阳能电池板修好了。

original: Well, how about that! I'll have to check out your handiwork.
translation: 啊，真的吗！我得亲自去看看你的杰作。

original: And here I thought we had them running as best we could before they broke down again. Thanks for getting those sorted for me.
translation: 我还以为在这次损坏以前，我们已经把它们的工作效率调整到最佳状态了。谢谢你帮我解决了这些问题。

original: I fixed the arrays and improved their efficiency a bit too.
translation: 我修好了太阳能电池板，还略微提高了它们的效率。

original: Well, how about that! Turns out you aren't completely useless, working with your hands.
translation: 啊，真的吗！这么说你也不是一无是处，还是有点技术的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Of course. You been through a lot. Ain't much, but these'll do you right if the pain flares up.
translation: [成功] 当然。你受苦了。虽然不多，但如果你的疼痛加剧，这些至少会让你好受点。

original: Isn't it customary for a doctor to prescribe follow-up medication?
translation: 对医生来说，把后续用药先开出来不是很正常吗？

original: Well, I already told you I came from a vault. After that, I was a traveling doctor for a spell.
translation: 好吧，我告诉过你了，我是从避难所来的。离开避难所后，我当了一段时间的游医。

original: Seemed like a good idea at the time. Most folks out here ain't educated, so people with medical know-how are hard to come by.
translation: 当时这份营生还不错。因为这儿大多数人从来没受过什么教育，更别提懂医术了。

original: Found that I could help a lot of people with what I knew, and that was all right with me.
translation: 我发现我所学的知识能帮助很多人，感觉还挺好的。

original: Eventually, I went back and married my childhood sweetheart and that was the end of my traveling days. Didn't miss it none then. Still don't.
translation: 后来，我回去和我的青梅竹马结了婚，游医的日子也结束了。我一点也不怀念那段时光。一点也不。

original: Tell me about yourself, Doc.
translation: 介绍一下你自己吧，医生。

original: That'd be Victor. Curious fella. He's sort of odd. And I don't just mean 'cause he's a robot. I couldn't tell you much about him.
translation: 那就是维克多，奇怪的家伙，是那种怪人。不光因为他是个机器人我才这么说。关于他更多的事我也说不上来了。

original: He's real friendly, don't get me wrong. You just get the sense that ain't the whole picture. Just a feeling.
translation: 你别误会，他非常友好。但我总觉得他没那么简单。就是有种感觉。

original: Keeps to himself, mostly. You want to know more about him, you'll have to ask him yourself. He has a shack on the southern edge of town.
translation: 大部分时间他都独来独往。如果你想了解他的情况，可以自己去问他。他在镇子的南边有个棚屋。

original: Who was it that rescued me?
translation: 救我的人是谁？

original: Yeah, you've been a real bundle of laughs.
translation: 是的，你们就是一群笑话。

original: Yeah, right. Bitch.
translation: 是，没错，婊子。

original: Yeah, right. Dick.
translation: 是，很对，傻逼。

original: I guess you could start the engines underwater and hop it up onto shore...
translation: 我猜如果你在水下发动引擎，它就会直接跳出水面……

original: [FAILED] I'm not a mechanic, but after 300 years I don't think those engines would start up.
translation: [失败] 虽然我不是机械师，不过我觉得，都过了300年了，那些引擎不太可能发动得了。

original: But a little radiation didn't keep your people away!
translation: 但是一点点辐射并没有把你的人吓跑！

original: That's right! Our Geiger counter indicates that the base was radioactive, but not dangerously so. Enough time has passed.
translation: 对的！我们的盖格计数器显示这个基地确实还存在辐射，但已经没那么危险了。毕竟时间已经过了足够久。

original: I'm looking to make myself useful. Who needs help around here?
translation: 我希望能为你们做点事。这里有谁需要帮忙吗？

original: Gosh, there's a lot of folks. Argyll's our doctor - he could use help tending to any injured we got.
translation: 哎哟，要帮忙的人可多了去了。阿盖尔是我们的医生——他需要有人帮他照料伤员。

original: Another time, maybe.
translation: 也许下次吧。

original: If you're interested in knowing more about us, it seems like you'd be pretty amazed by our mural. Is there something else?
