original: He said we needed to be punished for what we did, not all of us, but some of us. And then he gives everyone a fucking lottery ticket...
translation: 他说我们必须为自己的所作所为接受惩罚，但不是所有人，而是一部分人。然后他就给每个人都发了一张彩票……

original: Hey, thanks, Frank. Go to hell.
translation: 嘿，多谢了，弗兰克。去死吧。

original: Be calm. I am a friend of the Legion.
translation: 冷静点。我是军团的朋友。

original: Very well. You may proceed.
translation: 很好，你可以过去了。

original: However, be warned. Aggressive acts against us will earn you a place on a cross.
translation: 不过还是要警告你。只要对我们有一丝冒犯，你都会被钉上十字架。

original: What's the best way for me to use your skills?
translation: 我该如何最大限度地发挥你的长处？

original: Give me a rifle and a clear line of sight, and I'll start picking them off before they've even seen me.
translation: 给我一把步枪，找一个视野开阔的地方，我会在敌人看见我之前就送他们上西天。

original: Didn't have much hand-to-hand training, so our chances are better if you keep the enemy out of my face.
translation: 我没怎么接受过近身格斗训练，所以肉搏就免了，别让敌人靠近我。

original: I'm trained as a spotter, too. If you're looking through a scope, I could find your targets for you.
translation: 我也接受过观察员的训练。如果你用瞄准镜的话，我可以为你找到目标。

original: I need you to stop the violence against NCR citizens in Freeside.
translation: 我想请你出面阻止自由城里针对NCR市民的暴力事件。

original: So, I'm supposed to just start giving in to the demands of random strangers that come in here, huh? I don't think so.
translation: 是不是但凡有个陌生人到我面前求我帮忙，我都得答应？我可不这么想。

original: You want something from me, you're gonna have to earn it. And it just so happens that I've got a few things I need taken care of. So what do you say?
translation: 既然你有求于我，就要先赢得我的赏识。碰巧，我手头有许多事情需要处理。不知你意下如何啊？

original: I'd love to help you, but it seems I can't even prevent my own friends from getting killed. I'm sorry as can be, but I can't help you.
translation: 我很想帮你，但似乎我连我自己的朋友都保护不了。所以很抱歉，我帮不了你。

original: I found a Legion sniper on the roof of the tower.
translation: 我在塔楼上发现了一个军团的狙击手。

original: Damnit! I can't believe the Legion actually got someone past our security. Good job catching him.
translation: 该死！难以置信，军团居然真的把沙子掺了进来。还好你逮到他了。

original: I'll have a security team sweep the area to see if the Legion has any more surprises for us.
translation: 我会派出安保小组搜查整个区域，看看军团是不是还给我们准备了什么别的惊喜。

original: I'm also canceling the President's speech. We'll have a security team get him out of here right away. But let's not relax until he's safe.
translation: 同时我也会取消总统的演讲。我们马上派人护送他离开，在他安全撤离之前，绝对不能放松警惕。

original: Something's wrong with my cyber-dog. I was told to come to you.
translation: 我的生化狗出了问题。有人让我来找你。

original: It's neural degradation. Bio med gel can only preserve a living brain for so long, so you'll need to find a replacement.
translation: 神经退化。人工生命凝胶只能维持大脑活动一段时间。你需要找到替代品。

original: I haven't left Jacobstown in years, but there was one woman in Novac... Gibson? I remember her living with a pack of hounds.
translation: 这几年我都没有出过镇子，但是在诺瓦克，有一个老太婆……吉布森？我记得她和一群猎狗住在一起。

original: Aside from her, I know that the Fiends and Caesar's Legion fight alongside dogs. There could be viable specimens among them, if you can get to them.
translation: 除了她以外，我还知道恶魔帮和凯撒军团也喜欢带着狗作战。他们或许有活体样本，就看你能不能找到了。

original: I don't see him with you. Bring him to me and I'll take a look. Otherwise, I'll just be guessing.
translation: 我没看你带着它啊。把它带来让我看看。否则，我也只能瞎猜了。

original: <Speech Options>
translation: <口才选项>

original: You are in charge of this operation. That sounds like a suicide mission, but our orders are to take commands from you.
translation: 你是这场战斗的指挥官。虽然我觉得这样做根本就是在送死，但我们还是得服从命令。

original: Unit, let's move out!
translation: 士兵们，我们出发！

original: You have superior firepower. You can overwhelm them if you push the advance on them.
translation: 你们拥有优势火力。只要大举向前，就能完全压制住他们。

original: I'd like to know about you.
translation: 我想了解你。

original: Was part of a Super Mutant army, ran a town, walked the wasteland with a tribal. Now I'm here.
translation: 我曾经在超级变种人军队里当过兵，做过镇长，还率着族人穿越过废土。后来，我就到了这里。

original: You can't really enjoy living here. Take 50 caps and get out of here.
translation: 你也不想呆在这里吧。拿上50个瓶盖，走吧。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Heh. More than I could make in a week shaking down these assholes anyways.
translation: [成功] 哈。这比我敲诈那帮混蛋一个礼拜赚到的钱还多呢。

original: All right, fellas. Let's get out of this shit hole.
translation: 好了，各位。我们离开这个鬼地方。

original: You look capable of defending yourself.
translation: 看起来你还挺能保护自己的。

original: What can you tell me about North Vegas?
translation: 有关北维加斯的情况，你能透露一些吗 ?

original: NCR whores?
translation: NCR妓女？

original: You heard me. We don't like those stiff-back, clean-hand little pussies. New Vegas belongs to the people.
translation: 你刚才也听到了。我们不喜欢那些一脸道貌岸然、浑身白白净净的娘娘腔。新维加斯是属于人民的。

original: The NCR's just a corrupt and bloated monster, no better than any other Wasteland crawler. We make this land wealthy, and we ain't giving it up.
translation: NCR就是个堕落臃肿的怪兽，跟废土上的其他爬虫没什么两样。这片土地的财富是我们创造的，我们绝不会将它拱手让给别人。

original: I'm looking for Alice Hostetler.
translation: 我在找爱丽丝·霍斯泰特勒。

original: Alice... Oh yeah. I've seen her around here much too often as of late. I reckon she's been hanging out with Andy and his crew.
translation: 爱丽丝……哦，对。我最近还经常见到她来着。估计她是和安迪以及他手下在一块儿吧。

original: You look capable of defending yourself.
translation: 你好像能保护自己啊。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You've got a sharp eye on you. I take it you like guns, huh? Question is, can you handle more than just a weapon...
translation: [成功] 你的眼神挺犀利的。我猜你对枪械挺有研究，对吧？不过问题是，你的研究只限于武器吗……

original: I see you can take care of yourself. Your revolver's trigger shines like silver.
translation: 我看得出来，你是有两下子。你的左轮扳机已经磨得闪闪发光了。

original: Relax, I only want to ask you some questions.
translation: 放松点，我只是想问你一些问题。

original: And I only asked first... I'll try one more time before I find out the hard way. Where you come from, and where you going?
translation: 先提问的人是我……在我动手之前，最后问你一次，你究竟从哪儿来，要去哪里？

original: <Lie> I just thought Andy should know about Mrs. Hostetler waiting outside for him, shotgun in hand.
translation: <撒谎] 我只是想告诉安迪，霍斯泰特勒夫人正拿着霰弹枪在外面等他。

original: <Lie> I just thought Andy should know about Mrs. Hostetler waiting outside for him, shotgun in hand.
translation: <撒谎] 我只是想告诉安迪，霍斯泰特勒夫人正拿着霰弹枪在外面等他。

original: I just want to talk to Alice or Andy.
translation: 我只是想和爱丽丝或者安迪谈一谈。

original: Maybe they don't wanna talk to you. Maybe they ain't here anymore. Maybe you ask too many questions, stranger.
translation: 也许他们根本就不想和你谈。也许他们根本不在这儿。我看你是问得太多了，陌生人。

original: This is our turf. Don't even try to snoop around or I'll fucking kill you right here, right now.
translation: 这是我们的地盘。别四处乱跑，否则我他妈现在就杀了你。

original: I'm looking for Alice Hostetler and Andy.
translation: 我在找爱丽丝·霍斯泰特勒和安迪。

original: Maybe they don't wanna talk to you. Maybe they ain't here anymore. Maybe you ask too many questions, stranger.
translation: 也许他们根本就不想和你谈。也许他们根本不在这儿。我看你是问得太多了，陌生人。

original: This is our turf. Don't even try to snoop around or I'll fucking kill you right here, right now.
translation: 这是我们的地盘。别四处乱跑，否则我他妈现在就杀了你。

original: I just want to talk to Alice or Andy.
translation: 我只是想和爱丽丝或者安迪谈一谈。

original: This is our turf. Don't even try to snoop around or I'll fucking kill you right here, right now.
translation: 这是我们的地盘。别四处乱跑，否则我他妈现在就杀了你。

original: I'm looking for Andy or Alice so we could talk.
translation: 我想找安迪或者爱丽丝谈谈。

original: I'm ready to fight Lupa.
translation: 我准备好和鲁帕战斗了。

original: You sure? Last chance to back out.
translation: 你确定？要反悔还来得及。

original: I'm ready to fight Lupa now.
translation: 我准备好和鲁帕战斗了。

original: All right. You've been a good dog, Lupa. Die well, girl.
translation: 好的。你一直都是条好狗，鲁帕。愿你死得其所，老姑娘。

original: I could use Lupa's brain to fix my cyber-dog.
translation: 我可以用鲁帕的脑子来修好我的电子狗。

original: Cyber-dog? Like the ones I've seen up in Denver? I know what you're talking about, and it would make Lupa immortal in a way.
translation: 电子狗？和我在丹佛看到的一模一样吗？我明白你的意思，那会让鲁帕在某种意义上获得永生。

original: You have an interesting name.
translation: 你的名字很有趣。

original: Thank you. I change names and jobs every decade or so, just to keep things interesting. I picked "Calamity" this time because it sounded nice.
translation: 谢谢。我每隔十年左右就要换一次名字和工作，好让生活不那么单调乏味。我之所以选"阿难"是因为我觉得这名字很中听。

original: Never really done much science stuff 'til now. I'm pretty good at it, or so Doctor Henry tells me.
translation: 我以前都没做过什么科学研究。但我很有天赋，至少亨利医生是这么说的。

original: Does anyone other than Super Mutants come up this way?
translation: 除了超级变种人，还会有其他人来到这里吗？

original: Prospectors looking for salvage, usually. They always run when they see the mutants.
translation: 拾荒者经常会到这儿来找宝贝。不过他们总是一看见我们就溜得没影儿了。

original: The Great Khans come this way once in a while, but they keep their distance. I think they're mostly keeping an eye on us.
translation: 大汗帮的队伍偶尔也会出现，但他们始终都与我们保持着距离。我想他们应该是在监视我们。

original: What do you do here?
translation: 你在这儿是做什么的？

original: Most of the time, I'm Doctor Henry's research assistant. We're looking into ways to cure the, uh...
translation: 大多数时候，我都是亨利医生的研究助理。我们正在努力寻找解药，呃……

original: I'm also handy with tools, and once in awhile I venture down into the valley to trade the Bighorner hides and meat for supplies.
translation: 我很擅长使用工具，时不时会带些角牛皮和肉去山谷里和人交换日常用品。

original: Tell me about this area of New Vegas.
translation: 告诉我有关新维加斯的情况。

original: Folks call this East Vegas, but I don't care much for names.
translation: 人们把这里叫做东维加斯，但我对名字并不怎么在意。

original: The east side gets a lot of merchant and gambler traffic. We're safer here than in North Vegas or Westside, though we've got to put up with the NCR.
translation: 东区的商业和赌博业较为发达。我们这里比北维加斯和西区都要安全，不过得忍受NCR的统治。

original: What's that about knowing how to handle more than just a weapon?
translation: 你说的只局限于武器是什么意思？

original: I mean you've got to know yourself before you can truly know the gun.
translation: 我的意思是，你得先了解自己，才能真正了解你的枪。

original: So, let's see it, stranger. Do you know yourself?
translation: 那么，想想吧，陌生人。你了解你自己吗？

original: What do you want to know?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: I want you to head to Red Rock Canyon, north of here. Find Papa Khan and ask him if he'd allow the Powder Gangers to join up.
translation: 我要你前往红岩峡谷，就在这里的北边。找到父汗，问他是否会允许炸药帮加入。

original: <Lie> I've no idea what you're talking about.
translation: <撒谎>我不知道你在说什么。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I've got my eye on you. Get the fuck off my turf.
translation: [成功] 嗯……我会盯着你的。滚出我的地盘。

original: Anything you can help me with?
translation: 你能帮我什么忙吗？

original: Well, I have a bomb here that can be put on the vertibird that will detonate at a certain altitude, but it's a little unstable and dangerous.
translation: 我这里有个炸弹，你可以把它装到飞鸟里，这个炸弹在到达一定高度之后就会爆炸，不过它有点不太稳定，很危险。

original: Okay, go ahead. I'll wait for you.
translation: 好的，去吧。我会等你的。

original: Yeah, okay... I'll shoot the lock off the door and then... and... Argh, dammit!
translation: 好的……我会一枪把门锁嘣开……然后……呃，该死 !

original: ... I can't do it, I can't. She deserves it, and worse, but I can't hurt my own mother!
translation: ……不行，我做不到。虽然她罪有应得，可我还是无法对自己的母亲下手！

original: They care for you, in their own way.
translation: 他们只是在用自己的方式关心你啊。

original: Do they? Look at my mother. All she cares for is a patch of bare dirt where nothing green will ever grow to feed us.
translation: 关心我？看看我母亲，她关心的只有家里那一亩破荒地，上面一点绿都没有，根本无法养活我们。

original: My father? A trading business that he'll never own, risking his neck every day against wastelanders and cut-throat "merchants."
translation: 而我父亲呢？永远在为别人做生意，还要成天冒着生命危险，和废土流民以及那些雁过拔毛的"商人们"打交道。

original: And I'm supposed to be part of those dreams? What about my dreams, stranger? What about me?
translation: 我就应该这样屈从于他们的梦想吗？那我的梦想呢，陌生人？我怎么办？

original: Do you have the money?
translation: 你拿到钱了吗？

original: She's guarding it, I know she is!
translation: 她守着呢，我知道的！

original: She locked the bedroom door - like that's going to stop me. I was... I've got a gun, I'm going to make her give it to me!
translation: 她把卧室的门锁上了，以为这样就能拦住我。我……我有枪，我会让她交出来的！

original: Alice, Andy's just using you to get the money.
translation: 爱丽丝，安迪只是利用你在赚钱而已。

original: What are you talking about? Andy wants to help me leave this hole... doesn't he?
translation: 你、你说什么？安迪想要帮助我离开这鬼地方……不是吗？

original: I just want to talk, that's all.
translation: 我只是想说说话。

original: [FAILED] I'm not a stupid little girl anymore, you can't talk me out of this!
translation: [失败] 我已经不再是个傻姑娘了，你休想糊弄我！

original: Give me your gun, Alice.
translation: 把枪给我，爱丽丝。

original: Fine. Take it. But what the hell am I supposed to do now?
translation: 好吧，给你。但我到底现在该干什么？

original: How did you kill that thing?
translation: 你是怎么干掉那东西的？

original: With my bare hands. I would have shot it, but I was cleaning my gun when they swarmed the camp.
translation: 赤手空拳。我本该用枪的，可那些东西溜进营地时，我刚好就在擦拭我的枪。

original: The ugly bastard knocked me down and started dragging me down into these caves. I managed to get my knife out and get a good throw into its back.
translation: 这个丑八怪把我击倒在地，还想将我拖回洞里。我好不容易拔出匕首，奋力一投，正好命中它的背部。

original: Once he was on the ground, all it took was a bit of choking and punching to finish him off.
translation: 等他一倒地，我就立马扑上去掐住脖子，一顿乱拳结果了他。

original: <Use Doctor Bag to heal his leg> This should help fix up your leg.
translation: <用医生的诊疗包治疗他的腿> 这应该有助于治好你的腿。

original: Thanks a lot, doc. I think I should be able to walk out of here, now.
translation: 谢谢你，医生。看起来我现在至少能走出这里了。

original: I don't want to risk running into a pack of those freaks alone, though. Could you escort me out of here?
translation: 但我可不想独自一人扎进怪物堆里，你能护送我出去么？

original: You're free to leave. The way up is clear.
translation: 你可以离开了。上去的路已经安全了。

original: Great, I'll start heading back to California now. I'm not about to let myself get killed by future NCR incompetence.
translation: 太好了，我现在要动身回加州了。我可不想因为NCR的无能而白白丢了性命。

original: We need to clear the caves first.
translation: 我们首先需要肃清洞里的怪物。

original: Are you crazy? No way in hell am I going deeper into those caves.
translation: 你疯了吗？打死我也不会再往洞里多走一步的。

original: You haven't seen what they did to the other troopers, and I'd rather not find out why they took all of the bodies.
translation: 你没看见那些怪物是怎么对待其他士兵的，我真不想知道他们最后的下场。

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right, you have a point. They were good men and deserved better.
translation: [成功] 好吧，你说的有道理。他们都是好人，不该落得这样的下场。

original: I can't guarantee I'll be much help against their numbers, but I'll do what I can. Chances are we won't get out of here alive anyway.
translation: 它们数量众多，我不能保证自己能发挥多少作用，但我会尽我所能的。反正我们也有可能出不去。

original: If we don't clear the caves, your friends' deaths were for nothing. Can you live with that?
translation: 如果我们不肃清那些怪物，那你的朋友们就白死了。你能活得安心吗？

original: [FAILED] Hey, I'm all for being a hero when the time is right, but there are at least 12 of those bastards lurking around in here.
translation: [失败] 嘿，要我做英雄没问题，但也得找准时机啊。洞里至少还盘踞着12头怪物呢。

original: I'd rather not join my buddies any time soon.
translation: 我可不想这么快就去跟我死去的兄弟们作伴。

original: More people are going to die if we don't do something.
translation: 如果我们什么都不做，那会有更多的人丧生的。

original: Don't start just yet. I'll be back.
translation: 先别开始。我过一阵子再回来。

original: Oh, all right.
translation: 哦，好吧。

original: Go ahead and start the tests.
translation: 可以了，开始测试吧。

original: Very well. Please stand back - I don't want any erroneous readings. You're welcome to stay and observe if you want, though.
translation: 很好。请往后站——我可不希望读数受到干扰。不过，如果你愿意，也可以在一旁观看。

original: Wait, Lily's not in position yet. Talk to me again once she's settled in.
translation: 等等，莉莉还没有就位。等她到位以后再告诉我。

original: I'm looking into the Nightstalker mutation. Want to come along with me?
translation: 我在寻找夜行兽的变种。你想和我一起来吗？

original: Oh no, dearie, three makes a crowd.
translation: 哦，不，亲爱的，三个人太多了。

original: Oooh, those Nightstalkers, always killing my Bighorners! It'll be nice to give them a piece of my mind!
translation: 哦，那些夜行兽，总是残害我们的大角牛！我早就想给他们一点颜色看看了！

original: Grab the money and run far away.
translation: 带上钱，然后远走高飞吧。

original: You really think I care about the money? I just... no, no, no!
translation: 你以为我的真的在乎钱？我只是……不，不，不！

original: You should get out of here and never come back.
translation: 你应该离开，再也不要回来。

original: You're right, there's no place for me here. Just... just tell them I'm sorry, and they won't have to worry about me, ever again.
translation: 你是对的，这里没有我的容身之地。只是……请你转告他们，我对不起他们，以后不用再为我担心了。

original: Trent Bascom says he's not getting his full allotment of water.
translation: 特伦特·巴斯科姆说用来浇灌农田的水量不够。

original: The Office of Science and Industry has carefully calculated the amount of water needed for these crops. The whole thing is handled by computer.
translation: 科工部已经仔细计算过庄稼所需的水量了。它们完全是由计算机控制的。

original: Besides, most of these crops look fine to me. If the farmers can't handle the job, they shouldn't have signed up in the first place.
translation: 而且，我看大部分的庄稼长势也还不错。如果那些农民干不好这活，那他们当初就不该接手。

original: If there really is a problem, they can take it up with Lieutenant Boyd at McCarran. Farming isn't my department.
translation: 就算真有问题，他们也该去找麦卡伦营地的博伊德中尉。种田的事不归我管。

original: What happens if Keene leaves?
translation: 如果基恩走了会发生什么？

original: That happens, there's a good chance other Nightkin will follow. It'll make it hard to get a cure to them.
translation: 如果他走了，其他夜行族也可能会随他而去。如此一来，要找到解药就会变得更加困难。

original: Worse, if Keene and the Nightkin tear up the Mojave hunting for Stealth Boys, people are gonna get killed.
translation: 更糟的是，如果基恩与夜行族为了寻找隐身小子而不惜在莫哈维掘地三尺，那一定有不少人会遭殃的。

original: Most humans can't tell the difference between mutants. Might come here looking for payback.
translation: 大多数人类都分辨不出变种人之间的差别。他们很有可能会来找我们报仇。

original: I'm looking for Corporal White. I was told that he'd spoken to you.
translation: 我在找怀特下士。我听说他曾经和你说过话。

original: Yes, he said he was looking into the water shortage, but I haven't heard back from him. Got the feeling he wasn't here in any official way.
translation: 是的。他说他正在调查缺水的问题，但至今没有回音。我有种预感，他很有可能已经被调走了。

original: White was talking to me about computer stuff and water delivery schedules through the pipes, but I'm just a farmer. Tech stuff is beyond me.
translation: 怀特和我说了什么计算机控制还有通过管道定时供水之类的事情，但我只是一个农民。技术问题我一窍不通。

original: The last person I saw him talking to was Lieutenant Romanowski. Romanowski's around here somewhere. Sorry I couldn't be more helpful.
translation: 我最后一次看到他时，他正在和罗曼诺夫斯基中尉说话。罗曼诺夫斯基应该就在这农地里。抱歉，我也只能帮你到这里了。

original: Are you from California?
translation: 你从加利福尼亚来？

original: Born and raised. Things back in California are better than they've ever been, according to my grandpa.
translation: 那是生我养我的地方。按我爷爷的说法，如今的加州比过去好得多了。

original: The Raiders are mostly gone now and it's easy enough to get a job at one of the mills or farms. But now there's taxes and laws and other things.
translation: 想在矿山或者农场找个工作非常容易，因为掠夺者已经几乎销声匿迹了。不过却多了税费啊，规章制度啊之类的东西。

original: The NCR keeps things safe and orderly, but it's all very boring. So, I came out east towards the frontier.
translation: NCR虽然让一切都变得井然有序，可就是太无聊了。所以，我就想到东部边境来看看。

original: You don't look like a quarry worker.
translation: 你看起来不像是采石工人。

original: Oh, I'm not. I'm making my way to New Vegas. They say anything goes there, and best of all, the NCR can't mess it up for you.
translation: 噢，我本来就不是。我要去新维加斯，路过这里。他们说好东西都在那儿，而且最棒的是，在那儿NCR管不着你。

original: I'll get there eventually. I've heard that you can't even get into the Strip unless you're rich.
translation: 我总归是要去那里的。咳咳…我听说，除非你身家万贯，否则连长街都进不去。

original: I fixed Snuffles' leg.
translation: 我治好了鼻涕虫的腿。

original: I'd noticed Snuffles limping, but I didn't realize the problem was that serious. Thanks - that beast helps keep spirits up around here.
translation: 我注意到鼻涕虫一瘸一拐的，但没想到到问题这么严重。谢谢了——那头小畜生能帮着振奋人心。

original: You don't get paid in caps?
translation: 你们的工资不是用瓶盖结的？

original: Nope. The NCR's been trying to switch over to using paper money, just like in the Pre-War days. Trouble is that the exchange rates ain't exactly fair.
translation: 不是。NCR一直都想改用纸币，就像战前那样。可问题是汇率太低了。

original: For example, a hundred bucks in NCR money is valued at roughly half that in caps around here. Seems like a rotten deal for us, but work is work.
translation: 比如说，一百块的大钞在这里就只值差不多50个瓶盖。感觉我们吃了大亏，但工作还是得做。

original: What's a dragline?
translation: 挖掘机是什么？

original: It's a big machine which moves rocks around, piles at a time. It's Pre-War tech, so you need to thump it once in a while to keep it running.
translation: 一种挖石头的大机器，一次能挖一大堆。不过都是战前技术了，你得时不时地捶它两下才能正常工作。

original: I could take care of your Deathclaw problem.
translation: 我可以帮你解决死亡爪问题。

original: Have you ever seen a Deathclaw? They're taller than a man and far, far stronger and faster. And, there's a whole pack of them out there.
translation: 你见过死亡爪吗？它们比人高，比人壮，动作迅速。更何况，采石场里面住的可是一家子。

original: You'd have to be the meanest, toughest, roughest bastard in the wasteland to have any chance against them, and I don't think that's you.
translation: 只有废土上最狡猾、最残暴、最野蛮的混蛋才有本事制服它们，我不认为你是那种人。

original: You'd need to take out the pack leaders - the Mother Deathclaw and the Deathclaw Alpha Male. Kill 'em, and the pack will scatter. Pretty tough job.
translation: 你得擒贼先擒王——干掉哺崽的死亡爪和雄性头领。它们一死，其他自然会作鸟兽散。这任务可不简单。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: If you insist on going north, don't be expecting a rescue when you get into trouble.
translation: 如果你坚持要往北走，遇到麻烦了可没人去救你。

original: I'm familiar with explosives. Give it here.
translation: 我很懂炸药，给我吧。

original: I'm familiar with explosives. Give it here.
translation: 我很懂炸药，给我吧。

original: Give me the security details.
translation: 告诉我安保布置的细节。

original: Security is going to be tight. Rangers are stationed all around the observation deck where Kimball is going to give his speech.
translation: 安保工作布置得很严密。游骑兵在金博尔发表演讲的地点周围全都设置了岗哨。

original: Security is led by a Ranger Grant. He's a pretty rough guy who's seen a lot of combat. It's best if you steer clear of him.
translation: 警备工作由一个叫格兰特的游骑兵负责，他可是个硬骨头，非常能打，可以的话最好避开他。

original: The crowd consists of troopers and a few select civilians who were lucky enough to bribe their way in. They shouldn't cause much trouble for you.
translation: 现场的观众主要由士兵和少数选出来的平民组成，应该不会给你造成什么麻烦。

original: Finally, there's the additional security that Kimball will be bringing with him. I wasn't able to find out much on that.
translation: 最后，金博尔身边肯定还布置了其他安保力量，但我不清楚到底是什么。

original: If I had more time in their computers I could've accessed the full duty roster and guard deployment. Maybe you'll have better luck.
translation: 如果再给我点时间入侵他们的电脑，搞不好就能弄到最终的值勤名单和安保方案。可能你的运气会比我好点。

original: Tell me about Kimball's schedule.
translation: 告诉我金博尔的行程。

original: The President is scheduled to arrive sometime in the afternoon. It's going to be a short visit to boost morale for the NCR troops.
translation: 按照行程，他下午才到。整个视察的时间很短，他只是来鼓舞一下士气的。

original: He's going to arrive, give a speech, and then leave. No meet and greet, no questions, just a quick in and out.
translation: 他抵达后会发表演讲，然后就离开。没有任何会见，也不回答问题，差不多是来了就走。

original: They're probably afraid something is going to happen. For good reason.
translation: 他们大概是怕出事，这么安排倒也在情理之中。

original: I wasn't able to find a final itinerary for his visit, but if you can find one, you can get more details on what's going to happen.
translation: 我实在是搞不到他们最后敲定的行程表，但如果你能自己搞到一份，就可以掌握更多信息了。

original: How are we getting into the Dam?
translation: 我们该怎么进入水坝？

original: I have some disguises for us. I've already got mine. A wealthy Brahmin Baron who bribed his way into seeing the President.
translation: 我已经给咱们准备好了伪装。我会装扮成一个富有的双头牛大亨，花钱打通关系，就为了见总统一面。

original: As for you, I have a NCR trooper uniform that I acquired. It'll fool most of the troopers and civilians, but it probably won't fool the rangers.
translation: 至于你，我搞到了一套NCR突击兵的制服。这玩意足够糊弄大部分突击兵和平民，但恐怕骗不过游骑兵。

original: Do you have any suggestions about the assassination?
translation: 关于这次刺杀行动，你有什么建议吗？

original: Suggestions, eh? I'd suggest you play to your strengths. There's probably plenty of ways to kill Kimball, just find one that works best for you.
translation: 建议啊？我建议你发挥专长。有很多方法可以干掉金博尔，你只要用你最擅长的方式就可以了。

original: We'll have a few hours before he arrives. You should look around and see if you can find anything that you can use.
translation: 还有几个小时他才会到。你应该先去看看周围有没有可以利用的东西。

original: Just be careful. You don't want to cause a scene before Kimball even shows up.
translation: 不过小心点，金博尔还没来，你可别打草惊蛇。

original: Let's get moving.
translation: 我们出发吧。

original: You're the boss.
translation: 听你的。

original: I'll be in the crowd. Do whatever you need to do, then find me before Kimball arrives.
translation: 我会混进观众里。做好准备，在金博尔抵达之前来找我。

original: Here's your disguise. This'll get you past most of the NCR there, but watch out for the rangers. Odds are this won't fool them.
translation: 这是你的伪装，足够骗过NCR的士兵和平民了，但是小心游骑兵，他们可不吃这一套。

original: I'll meet you there. Good luck.
translation: 我会在那里跟你碰头。祝你好运。

original: What sort of information do you have?
translation: 你都有些什么情报？

original: I've been spying in the dam for quite a while now. I've gathered quite a bit of information from various sources.
translation: 我监视水坝已经有一段时间了，从各个渠道收集到了不少情报。

original: Of course I have a plan.
translation: 我当然有计划。

original: Prepared already. I like it. There's no need to give me the details, it is probably best that way.
translation: 看样子你是有备而来，我喜欢。没必要告诉我细节，这样最好。

original: Even though you already have a plan, I may have some information that you might find useful.
translation: 即使你已经有计划了，我的情报对你也还是有点用的。

original: Hand over the necklace, thief.
translation: 把项链交出来，小贼。

original: Fat chance of that. What are you going to do if I don't?
translation: 想得美。我不交你又能怎么样？

original: Let's just say I'll leave just enough of you left for the dogs to fight over.
translation: 这么说吧，我会留你个全尸，让那些野狗为你打架。

original: H-here. You can have the damn necklace. Just leave me alone!
translation: 拿——拿去。这该死的项链归你了。饶了我吧！

original: Pretty sure, yeah. It's really nice, isn't it? Have you ever seen caps with pretty blue stars on them like these?
translation: 非常确定。它真的很漂亮，不是吗？你见过这种上面有漂亮蓝色星星的瓶盖吗？

original: Are you sure that necklace is yours?
translation: 你确定那条项链就是你的？

original: About those chemical supplies...
translation: 那些药……

original: Still got 'em. You ready to pay up?
translation: 当然还在。钱准备好了吗？

original: You were already paid in advance.
translation: 货款不是预付了吗。

original: Yeah, and as it turns out, the advance wasn't enough. The price has gone up. That's just how it goes.
translation: 没错，不过现在这个形势，预付款不够。涨价了。就是这么回事。

original: A friend in Sloan told me to come to you about some chemical supplies.
translation: 一个在斯隆的朋友让我来找你搞点药。

original: You trying to get me busted? Keep your damn voice down - Lieutenant Hayes already has his eye on me.
translation: 你想害我进班房吗？妈的小声点——海耶斯中尉已经盯上我了。

original: Look, I already told Chomps that the NCR's getting suspicious of all these "misplaced" supplies. Bigger risk means bigger cost - 300 caps bigger.
translation: 听着，我跟托姆斯说过了，NCR已经开始对这些"失踪"的物资起疑了。风险高了，成本自然就上去了——你得再多给300瓶盖。

original: Keep your damn voice down. Even though Lieutenant Hayes got himself killed recently, somebody else might be watching me.
translation: 你他妈小声点。就算海耶斯中尉已经死了，也会有其它人盯着我的。

original: Look, I already told Chomps the NCR's getting suspicious of all these "misplaced" supplies. Bigger risk means bigger cost - 300 caps bigger.
translation: 听着，我跟托姆斯说过了，NCR已经开始对这些"失踪"的物资起疑了。风险高了，成本自然就上去了——你得再多给300瓶盖。

original: Where can I find the rest of the Great Khans?
translation: 我在哪可以找到大汗帮的其他人？

original: Our main camp is up in Red Rock Canyon, but we don't allow just anyone to come in.
translation: 我们的大本营在红岩峡谷，不过那地方未经允许不得入内。

original: The NCR can't touch us there - too many places for us to ambush them. We see their scouts poking around once in a while, but they keep their distance.
translation: 在那儿，NCR奈何不了我们——地形对我们有利，想伏击他们很容易。我们偶尔会看到他们的斥候在周围晃悠，但都离得很远。

original: Got it. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 明白了。我们谈点别的。

original: Like what?
translation: 比如说？

original: No angle. I just want to help.
translation: 什么也不为。我就是喜欢帮助别人。

original: I was expecting a shipment of chemicals. It's usually in a suitcase dropped off in one of the big machines up here.
translation: 我在等一批化学原料。它们通常会被装在手提箱里，藏在附近的某座大型机械底下。

original: Because of the Deathclaws, I have to assume the suitcase is still in Sloan. Snoop around the place and get it for me.
translation: 由于死亡爪的缘故，我估计箱子目前还在斯隆。去那儿找找看，把箱子交给我。

original: I'm looking for some Great Khans who stole something from me in Goodsprings.
translation: 我在找大汗帮的人，他们在清泉镇偷了我的东西。

original: The only Khans this far into NCR territory is me and my crew, and I didn't steal squat from you.
translation: 我和我的手下是目前唯一潜入NCR领地内的大汗帮成员，我可没偷你什么东西。

original: Besides, even if some of my gang did steal from you, I wouldn't rat them out. Loyalty actually means something to the Great Khans.
translation: 另外，即便我的人真偷了你的东西，我也不会把他们供出来的。对大汗帮来说，忠诚是很重要的。

original: As far as I know, it's just me and my crew out here, and if it really was Great Khans who mugged you, they didn't come this way. I'd have seen them.
translation: 据我所知，这附近就只有我和我的手下，如果真有大汗帮的人劫了你的道，他们也没走这边。否则我早就看到他们了。

original: How's it going?
translation: 进展如何？

original: <whuff>
translation: <喘气>

original: Will the White Glove Society ally with Caesar now?
translation: 白手套社团可以和军团结盟了吗？

original: I should think so, but it would be up to Marjorie.
translation: 我没有问题，但这得玛乔里说了算。

original: I have, however, told her how instrumental you were in revolutionizing our cuisine. And she knows what we stand to gain from a ruler who supports it.
translation: 当然，我已经对她说明了你在这次菜式革新中所起的作用。同时她也清楚，如果能有一位统治者支持这项改革，那对我们必然大有好处。

original: Have a word with her, see what she says. I daresay she'll be more receptive with these new developments.
translation: 去跟她谈谈吧，看她怎么说。经过这次事件的洗礼，我相信她会接受的。

original: Caesar wishes to extend your society an offer of alliance with his Legion.
translation: 凯撒希望你们的社团能通过与他的军团结盟来发展壮大。

original: Looking to elevate his social status, is he?
translation: 他想提升自己的社会地位，是吗？

original: I'll admit, I could see benefits to living under his rule. Certain... transgressions he'd be willing to overlook.
translation: 必须承认，做他的臣民当确实会给我们带来一些好处。也许他能对某些……违反公序良俗的行为视而不见。

original: But that's neither here nor there, I'm afraid. Marjorie won't have it, as long as she fails to see the wisdom of my perspective.
translation: 不过事情恐怕没这么简单。玛乔里她根本领悟不到我的观点是有多么富有远见，她不会接受的。

original: What do you know about the President's visit?
translation: 关于总统来视察的事，你都知道些什么？

original: He's coming to give a big fancy speech to all of us troops stationed here at the dam.
translation: 他是来给我们这些驻守在水坝的士兵演讲的。

original: I'm pretty excited. He seems like such a nice guy and I get to meet him.
translation: 我很兴奋。他看起来人不错，我很想见见他。

original: He's giving me a medal. I don't know why though. I'm just doing my job like all the other guys. I'm still excited though.
translation: 他要给我授勋，虽然我不知道为什么。我只是像其他士兵一样做好本职工作罢了。但我还是很激动。

original: I can't believe someone killed President Kimball. He was such a nice guy, why would anyone want to hurt him?
translation: 真不敢相信有人杀了金博尔总统。他那么好的一个人，为什么要害他？

original: What are your responsibilities now?
translation: 你现在负责什么？

original: Man, what aren't my responsibilities? Dam overflow, dam underflow. Dam leakage. Sometimes the dam gets too big and I have to shrink it down.
translation: 伙计，你应该问，还有什么是我不负责的？这水坝一会儿溢流，一会儿露底，一会儿又破堤。反正每次它一发脾气，我就得想法子哄好它。

original: People come to me to resolve their disputes with my wisdom.
translation: 大家都需要我的智慧来帮助他们裁定争端。

original: Like, hey Fantastic, who gets to keep this doodad we found? Or, yo, Fantastic, when will you accept that you're the father of my child? It's crazy.
translation: 比如，嘿，珍世邦，我们发现的这个小玩意该归谁呀？或者，哟，珍世邦，你什么时候才能宣布你是我孩子的爸爸呀？真是太疯狂了。

original: He was hurting you?
translation: 他伤害你了？

original: Ever since he lost his job a few years back he hasn't been the same. He took a switch to us for the tiniest things.
translation: 自从几年前他丢了工作后，他就像变了个人似的。哪怕一点小事，他都会对我们大打出手。

original: We were trying to get away when the Legion showed up. I'm glad he ran off like a coward, but slavery wasn't the kind of escape I was looking for.
translation: 军团出现后，我们便开始逃难。我很高兴他像懦夫一样消失得无影无踪，但成为奴隶可不是我们想要的归宿。

original: <Lie> Do you mean the helmet I just threw off the dam?
translation: <撒谎] 你是说我刚从水坝扔下去的那个头盔？

original: The Omertas? No thanks.
translation: 黑手党？还是算了吧。

original: I don't want to kill off the entire Brotherhood.
translation: 我不想把兄弟会赶尽杀绝。

original: Don't tell me you've fallen for the stories of noble paladins on crusade, preserving mankind's technology in a benighted age? Dross!
translation: 别告诉我你信了他们那套鬼话，高尚的圣骑士们在黑暗时代守护着人类科技？根本一派胡言！

original: In any case... this is an employer - employee relationship. I've given you an assignment, and the directions are clear.
translation: 不管怎么说…我们是雇佣关系。我已经给你安排了任务，并且目标很明确。

original: <Questions>
translation: <问题>

original: Same stuff. Any NCR weapons, computer parts, or radio parts.
translation: 差不多的东西。任何NCR武器，电脑配件或者无线电配件。

original: I'll need more than that. Keep looking.
translation: 这么点可不够。继续搜。

original: Alright, thanks for the help. Time to die loser.
translation: 好吧，谢谢你的帮助。死吧，废物。

original: <Questions>
translation: <问题>

original: There's gotta be more than that, keep looking.
translation: 肯定不止这些，继续搜。

original: Alright, we can move now. Here's the key to the Fire Station.
translation: 很好，现在我们可以继续前进了。这是消防局的钥匙。

original: <Questions>
translation: <问题>

original: Yeah, I am. What of it?
translation: 对，是的。怎么了？

original: <Questions>
translation: <问题>

original: Are you sure about that?
translation: 你确定？

original: Let's hear it.
translation: 不妨说来听听。

original: How did you meet Doctor Henry?
translation: 你是怎么遇到亨利医生的？

original: He and I had joined up with the same caravan. Add in a lot of whiskey, and, well, let's just say we got to know each other.
translation: 我们在同一个商队里认识的。当时还喝了不少威士忌，然后，呵，这么说吧，反正我们俩算是混熟了。

original: Let's talk about Rey's brain.
translation: 我们来谈谈雷伊的脑子吧。

original: Like I said before, give me 700 caps and Rey's brain is yours.
translation: 就像我之前说的，给我700瓶盖，雷伊的脑子就是你的了。

original: Never mind.
translation: 没事。

original: All right, then.
translation: 好吧，那。

original: I don't have the caps with me right now.
translation: 我身上现在没有那么多瓶盖。

original: No worries. I'll hold onto these parts for you.
translation: 没关系。我会先帮你留着的。

original: 250 caps it is. Here you go.
translation: 250瓶盖，给你。

original: Pleasure doing business with you.
translation: 很高兴和你做生意。

original: 500 caps it is. Here you go.
translation: 500瓶盖，给你吧。

original: Pleasure doing business with you.
translation: 很高兴和你做生意。

original: < Speech - 50 >
[SUCCEEDED] Ha! Yes, you are quite the smoothtalker. What the hell - 250 it is.
translation: [成功] 哈！嘴皮子还挺利索。行吧——就250瓶盖。

original: But you're going to cut the price to 250 because I'm just that charming, right?
translation: 可是您看我这迷人的样子，怎么着也该把价钱降到250瓶盖吧？

original: [FAILED] Oh, you're charming in your own way, I suppose. Not budging on the price for those parts, though.
translation: [失败] 哦，那是你自个儿觉得。可惜对我出的价钱没有半点影响。

original: How about a discount? I'm a nice person.
translation: 给打个折怎么样？我可是个好人。

original: < Barter - 50 >
[SUCCEEDED] Eh, fair enough. It's not like anyone's ever wanted to buy them before. 250 caps it is.
translation: [成功] 呃，好吧。我也觉得不会有人愿意买这东西。就250瓶盖吧。

original: 250 caps. Unless you think you'll find another buyer soon for such specialized parts?
translation: 250瓶盖。要我说，其他人根本就不会对这种专用零件感兴趣。

original: [FAILED] Oh, I don't know about that. Lots of folks travel by on their way to New Vegas.
translation: [失败］我可不这么想。从这儿去新维加斯的人可多着呢。

original: You should cut down the price. It's not like anyone will probably buy them.
translation: 你应该把价钱降低点。不太可能会有人买这玩意儿。

original: About those thrust control modules...
translation: 关于那些推进力控制模块……

original: Still got 'em. 250 caps and they're yours.
translation: 还在这儿呢。250瓶盖，我就出手。

original: Still got them. 500 caps and they're yours.
translation: 还在这儿呢。500瓶盖，我就出手。

original: Do you have any thrust control modules from REPCONN in stock?
translation: 你这儿有没有瑞普康的推进力控制模块？

original: As it so happens, I do have some thrust modules, but they're expensive. 500 caps worth of expensive.
translation: 真是巧了，我手头刚好有些推进力模块，不过它们很贵。要500个瓶盖。

original: Did you ever salvage containers of radioactive material from REPCONN?
translation: 你有没有在瑞普康捡到过一些装有放射性物质的容器？

original: Doctor Henry sent me. I need a new brain for my cyber-dog.
translation: 亨利医生让我来的。我需要给我的机械狗装个新的大脑。

original: Doctor Henry? Now there's a name I haven't heard in years. Hard to believe he's still alive.
translation: 亨利医生？我已经好几年没听到这个名字了，真不敢相信他还活着。

original: As for your request, it's, uh, a bit ghoulish if you ask me, but Rey is pretty old and I'll probably have to put him down soon enough.
translation: 至于你的要求，呃，要我说有点残忍，不过雷伊已经相当老了，也许过不了多久我就得让他安乐死了。

original: As for the price for this favor, 700 caps sounds about right. Rey's like family, and I've got other dogs to take care of.
translation: 看在这份关系上，我就收700瓶盖吧。雷伊就像是我的家人，而且我还有其他的狗要照顾。

original: An attractive woman like yourself all alone? Maybe you and I could work out some kind of trade...
translation: 像你这么迷人的女人竟然是独自一人吗？或许我们可以做笔交易……

original: I know I'm not young and pretty any more, but I appreciate the thought all the same. Here, take the parts, you flatterer.
translation: 我早已风华不再了，不过我还是要谢谢你的赞赏。给你，你这个马屁精。

original: It'll be more fun if we keep it a mystery. Besides, I'm more interested in you.
translation: 要是你能保密就更有趣了，另外，我对你更感兴趣。

original: You're right. I'm sorry. That imbecile in the next room has me on edge. I used to be more fun.
translation: 你说得对，抱歉，隔壁那个傻瓜搞得我焦头烂额。我本来是个有趣的人。

original: I'm still passionate about my work though. Otherwise I wouldn't be here.
translation: 但我依然热爱这份工作。不然我也不会待在这儿了。

original: I'm in the Followers of the Apocalypse. How about you?
translation: 我是天启追随者的成员，你呢 ?

original: How about you and I come to another arrangement. It'll be worth it - trust me.
translation: 咱们再商量一下吧，用别的方式如何？保证不会让你亏的，相信我。

original: Well, it's been awhile. All right, let's do this.
translation: 嗯，我也有段时间没做过这事了。好吧，就照你说的吧。

original: You mentioned someone named Festus. Who's that?
translation: 你提到了一个叫费斯特斯的人，是谁？

original: It's said that the treasure is guarded by a man named Festus, and he's the one who asks for the blue-star caps.
translation: 传说宝藏由一个名叫费斯特斯的人把守，是他号召人们去收集蓝星瓶盖的。

original: It's also said he's been around since the war, standing a lonely vigil, waiting for someone to come and take the treasure off his hands.
translation: 还有种说法，他从战前一直活到现在，始终在孤独地等待着，希望有人能从他手里接过宝藏。

original: That'd make him pretty damn old, but I've met a few people in my travels who claimed they actually met him, and they weren't the lying type either.
translation: 如果这是真的，那他应该已经相当老了。不过我曾经在旅途中遇到过一些自称见过他的人，他们也不像是在撒谎。

original: What do you do here?
translation: 你在这儿是做什么的？

original: The Followers of the Apocalypse aren't just interested in research. We care for our fellow man and do everything we can to help humanity.
translation: 天启追随者并非只做研究。我们也同样关心同胞的命运，始终在尽我们所能帮助全人类。

original: Here in Freeside, we provide food and medical services for those in need. We also have organized reconstruction efforts.
translation: 我们在自由城为有需要的人提供食物和医疗服务。我们也致力于本地区的重建工作。

original: With the help of Bill Ronte, we were able to install a water pump just west of here, but the Kings quickly took control of the pump.
translation: 在比尔·郎特的帮助下, 我们在西边安装了一台水泵，但它现在被猫王帮的人强占了。

original: Simple. I turned him in.
translation: 很简单。我把他供出去了。

original: I knew I shouldn't have trusted you! You're going to pay for that!
translation: 我就知道不该相信你！你会付出代价的！

original: All right. I'll have him brought in for questioning.
translation: 好的，我会把他带来审问。

original: Chomps Lewis, the foreman at Sloan, was also involved.
translation: 托姆斯·路易斯是斯隆的工头，他也参与了。

original: Thank you, that was very helpful. I don't think I'll need those books after all.
translation: 多谢你的帮助。看来我已经不需要这些书了。

original: Who did this to you?
translation: 谁把你搞成这样的？

original: Unh... Legion caught me. Said this... was the penalty for drug runners. Please... let me down.
translation: 呃…军团抓住了我。说是要处决…走私毒品的人。请…放我下来。

original: What do you think of the Great Khans?
translation: 你觉得大汗帮怎么样？

original: [FAILED] Alas, my first loyalty is to Caesar, and a soldier cannot have two masters.
translation: [失败] 唉，可我已发誓永远效忠凯撒，忠臣不事二主。

original: I've been wondering why you don't petition the Khans for membership as a show of allegiance.
translation: 我在想，你为什么不申请成为大汗帮的一员，以显示你的忠诚呢？

original: Regis says I should talk to you about speaking against the Great Khans' alliance with Caesar.
translation: 雷吉斯说我应该找你商量反对大汗帮和凯撒结盟。

original: You can ask, but why would I do that? Karl's told me all about the life in the Legion! He says I've got all the makings of a speculatore.
translation: 随你怎么说吧，我干嘛要听你的？卡尔已经向我描述了军团的生活！他说我拥有成为军团特工的潜质！

original: I've been told you're someone I should talk to about stopping the Khans' alliance with Caesar.
translation: 有人告诉我想要阻止大汗帮和凯撒结盟，就得来找你。

original: Don't worry, Jack and I have talked it over. We'll talk up the idea of breaking the alliance.
translation: 别担心，杰克和我已经讨论过了。我们该商量一下如何破坏他们的结盟。

original: So, about the alliance with Caesar's Legion...
translation: 那么，关于与凯撒军团结盟的事情...

original: Anders got back a little while before you did, he told me what happened. If that's how the Legion treats my people, I don't want any part of them.
translation: 安德斯比你早回来了一会，他把事情都告诉我了。如果军团真的那样对待我的族人，那我绝对不想跟他们扯上任何关系。

original: So, about the alliance with Caesar's Legion...
translation: 那么，关于与凯撒军团结盟的事情...

original: Hey, it's not like I'm super-attached to working with Caesar or anything, but if it'll stop his patrols from harassing my runners, I'm all for it.
translation: 嘿，我也不是非得和凯撒合作不可，但如果这样能阻止他的部队继续骚扰我的走私商，那我肯定同意。

original: I'm here to ask you to publicly oppose Papa Khan's alliance with Caesar.
translation: 我希望你能公开反对父汗和凯撒结盟。

original: Oh, it's cool, man. Diane passed me the haps on that fandango with Anders. I got your back.
translation: 哦，没事的，伙计。黛安跟我说了安德斯的事情了。我支持你。

original: Oh, it's cool, man, I got your back.
translation: 哦，没事的，伙计。我支持你。

original: Huh? Look, man, me and Diane, we don't dig on that politics stuff, savvy? We just make the product and make it get to a good home.
translation: 啊？你听着，伙计，黛安和我都不喜欢政治，晓得不？我们不过是想靠手艺吃饭，找个好买家。

original: Sure, Caesar's a drag, but as long as we got each other, we don't care who the top dogs roll with.
translation: 当然，凯撒是很麻烦，但只要我们俩能在一起，我才不管咱们老爷子跟谁一块儿混呢。

original: Oh, it's cool, kitten. Diane passed me the haps on that fandango with Anders. I got your back.
translation: 哦，没事的，小猫咪。黛安跟我说了安德斯的事情了。我支持你。

original: Oh, it's cool, kitty cat, I got your back.
translation: 哦，没事的，小猫咪。我支持你。

original: Huh? Look, kitty cat, me and Diane, we don't dig on that politics stuff, savvy? We just make the product and make it get to a good home.
translation: 啊？你听着，小猫咪，黛安和我都不喜欢政治，晓得不？我们不过是想靠手艺吃饭，找个好买家。

original: Sure, Caesar's a drag, but as long as we got each other, we don't care who the top dogs roll with.
translation: 当然，凯撒是很麻烦，但只要我们俩能在一起，我才不管咱们老爷子跟谁一块儿混呢。

original: I heard you try to convince Papa Khan not to join with Caesar's Legion. I'd like to talk to you about that for a moment.
translation: 我听说你想尝试说服父汗别和凯撒结盟。我想和你聊聊这件事。

original: What do you want to know?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: I'd like to talk more about the Great Khans' alliance with Caesar.
translation: 我想再了解一些关于大汗和凯撒结盟的事。

original: You should look at this. It's Karl's journal, and it's very revealing of his true opinions.
translation: 你应该看看这个。这是卡尔的日记，里面记载着他的真实想法。

original: Let me see that... "filthy savages? Probably have to decimate the lot of them?" Are these the words of our "friend," Caesar?
translation: 让我看看…"肮脏的野蛮人？也许应该把他们赶尽杀绝？"这是我们的"朋友"凯撒该说的话吗？

original: Great Khans! Drive Caesar's dog out of our camp! If he's too slow to flee, kill him!
translation: 大汗帮的子民们！把凯撒的走狗赶出我们的营地！如果他跑慢了，就送他归西！

original: Pretty please?
translation: 拜托……？

original: Okay, just this once. Make it quick though, I don't want to get in trouble for this.
translation: 好吧，就这一次。动作麻利点，我可不想因为这事惹上麻烦。

original: <Questions>
translation: <问题>

original: Who is Private Edwards?
translation: 列兵爱德华兹是谁？

original: I guess this is it. Not much air left now. Minutes, maybe. And this is what I have to show for it.
translation: 看来我是走到头了。已经没剩下多少空气了，可能也就几分钟。所以我得抓紧时间。

original: I guess the joke's <gasps air> on me. Prolly shouldn't have killed... all those people. Prolly shoulda stayed at home... and taken care of my ma.
translation: 想想真是笑话。我不该杀……那么多人的。我真该留在家里……好好照顾我妈。

original: She... always used to say people who... murder and steal... die bad in the end. Said they...
translation: 她…以前常说那些…杀人犯和小偷…最后都不得好死。说他们……

original: Sure I'll do it.
translation: 好吧，我会去做的。

original: Thank you. Could you bring me their dog tags? Some of the troopers should still be wearing them.
translation: 谢谢。你能把他们的狗牌也带回来么？一些士兵应该还戴着狗牌。

original: I'll give you some caps for each one you bring back to me. There's an old rifle in it for you if you can bring me at least 10.
translation: 我会按你取回的狗牌数量付给你瓶盖的。如果你能给我至少10个狗牌，那这把老式步枪也归你。

original: Oh and take these radiation supplies. You'll need them.
translation: 哦，还有，拿着这些辐射药品。你会需要它们的。

original: I'm gonna need more than that if you want my help.
translation: 既然你想请我帮忙，那你的报酬可得再丰厚些。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I can't offer much more aside from some extra ammo.
translation: [成功] 除了再给你些弹药，我真的什么都拿不出来了。

original: How did they get into the camp?
translation: 他们是怎么进入营地的？

original: I don't know, unfortunately. There may be clues somewhere inside the camp, but I'm not about to run in there to find out.
translation: 很遗憾，我不知道。营地里可能会有线索，但我总不可能再冲进去找吧。

original: How did you survive?
translation: 那你是怎么活下来的？

original: I was out on patrol at the time so I wasn't in the camp when it happened.
translation: 我去外面巡逻了，出事的时候不在营地。

original: There were a few others with me after it happened, including some of my superiors.
translation: 原本我身边还有其他一些人也活下来了，包括我的几名上司。

original: Between radiation poisoning and attacks by the Legion they all died out.
translation: 后来他们全都死于辐射病和军团的袭击。

original: Is there somewhere else he can go?
translation: 他有没有别的地方可以去？

original: There's a Ranger station north of here that has a few Ghouls running it. Maybe they'll take him in.
translation: 北边有个游骑兵驻站，由尸鬼在负责。也许那儿会接纳他。

original: But he isn't feral.
translation: 可他并不狂暴啊。

original: Doesn't mean he isn't suffering, or that he won't go feral eventually.
translation: 这又不代表他没有遭罪，也不等于他最终不会变狂暴。

original: There may be a battle in the near future at the Hoover Dam. Can you offer any assistance?
translation: 可能要不了多久胡佛水坝就会打仗了，你能帮忙吗 ?

original: Of course, my child. After all that you have done for us we would love to help you in the upcoming battle.
translation: 当然，我的孩子。你为我们做了那么多，我们很乐意在接下来的战斗里帮助你。

original: After all the training in virtual reality, the young ones would relish an opportunity to put their skills to battle. We'll be there when you need us.
translation: 在虚拟环境中训练了那么久，这些年轻人终于有机会在实战中检验训练成果了。只要你需要，我们随叫随到。

original: You're with the Legion?
translation: 你支持军团？

original: Shh. You feel that? That's the winds of change, baby, and Fantastic's riding them with his magical angel wings.
translation: 嘘。你发现啦？宝贝，现在风向变啦，而我珍世邦，就是那个呼呼扇风的天使啊。

original: They saw the shit I did for the NCR, how I carried them on my back, brought the fire to the heathens. I wasn't gonna help them but they begged.
translation: 他们发现了我在NCR背后捅刀子，耍阴谋，让那些异教徒不得安生。不过除非他们跪着求我，否则我是不会帮他们的。

original: Well, somebody begged. Couldn't say who for sure. It's all a blur, you know? Chems, man. What a trip.
translation: 话说起来，还是有人求了的。当然我不能透露姓名。实在爽透了，那些药品，伙计。太美妙了。

original: Do you see much action against the NCR?
translation: 你经常与NCR交战吗？

original: As much as their cowardice will allow. The Profligates avoid open battle, but on good days we find one of their patrols.
translation: 只要一有机会，我们就会和那群鼠辈交手。这些荒淫之人从来不敢硬碰硬，但运气好的话，我们可以逮到他们的巡逻队。

original: Their landmines have caused us more trouble than their marksmanship - which is lacking.
translation: 他们的地雷造成的威胁比他们的枪法还大一些，可惜他们没多少地雷。

original: We're all fine here, thank you. How are you?
translation: 我们很好，谢了，你呢？

original: Quit goofing off and clear the channel. I'll be damned if the President dies on my watch because you were screwing around.
translation: 别吊儿郎当的，保持频道通畅，要是你瞎捣乱，害得总统在我执勤的时候挂了，那我就惨了。

original: Any way I can help?
translation: 有什么我能帮忙的？

original: Help? No, look, I apprec... You know, what, yes, I could use the help. And you look like you can handle yourself.
translation: 帮忙？不，谢……好吧，是的，我是需要点帮助，而且看样子你确实能帮得上忙。

original: I need to get the caravans moving again, that means clearing a path north. There's too much crawling the asphalt up the road to allow it.
translation: 我需要滞留在这里的商队尽快启程，为此需要清理一下北边的道路，那里路上的“杂物”太多了。

original: I need to get the caravans moving again, that means clearing a path north. There's too much crawling the asphalt up the road to allow it.
translation: 我需要滞留在这里的商队尽快启程，为此需要清理一下北边的道路，那里路上的“杂物”太多了。

original: It's either him or the wasteland.
translation: 要么去找他，要么就去废土。

original: I think I'll take my chances with the wasteland.
translation: 我想我还是去废土碰碰运气吧。

original: I heard Ranger Station Echo up north is manned by other Ghouls.
translation: 我听说北边的游骑兵驻站艾柯是尸鬼在管事。

original: There's a Ranger Station run by Ghouls? Finally, I feel like I have a place to go. Thanks for your help.
translation: 有个尸鬼管理的游骑兵驻站？我想我终于有地方可去了。谢谢你。

original: Maybe First Sergeant Astor will let you join him?
translation: 没准阿斯特士官长会接纳你？

original: Are you sure he'll be okay with it? Not everyone is crazy about Ghouls.
translation: 你确定他会同意？不是每个人都对尸鬼抱着友好态度的。

original: There are plenty of places out in the wasteland.
translation: 废土上多的是地方。

original: You know what? Why the hell not. There are plenty of places out there to explore, and I'm kinda tired of being stuck in this house.
translation: 没错，说得太对了。外面的世界有那么多地方可以探索，一直呆在这房子里，我都要憋死了。

original: Actually, let's talk about something else.
translation: 实际上，我还有个问题。

original: Okay.
translation: OK。

original: Can I ask you something else?
translation: 我能再问你一些问题吗？

original: Is that the only thing you're afraid of?
translation: 你怕的就是那个？

original: Radscorpions. Fuckers creep the hell out of me. I'm not going outside while they're still crawling around.
translation: 还有辐射蝎——操，这帮东西吓死我了。只要外面还有辐射蝎，我就绝对不会出去。

original: Can you tell me what happened here?
translation: 你能告诉我这里发生什么了吗？

original: I don't really know the details of it, it all happened too quickly. I remember being hit by a blast of energy.
translation: 我不太清楚详情，一切都发生得太快。我只记得自己被冲击波掀翻了。

original: Next thing I know, I wake up like... like this. I've been staying in this house ever since.
translation: 不知过了多久，我才醒过来……就发现自己变成了这副摸样。之后我一直都呆在这个屋子里。

original: I don't know much about what's going on outside, aside from the creatures that moved in since then.
translation: 我不太清楚外面的情况，只知道有不少生物跑了进来。

original: Actually, I have another question.
translation: 实际上，我还有个问题。

original: Can I have your dog tag?
translation: 能把你的狗牌给我吗？

original: Sorry, I'm not about to give it up. It's the only thing I have left that reminds me of who I was.
translation: 抱歉，不行。这是唯一还能让我记得自己身份的东西。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Later.
translation: 回见。

original: Stealth field is stable, and the readings are clean. Gamma wave activity is... zero? Odd, but everything looks right.
translation: 隐形力场目前稳定，读数正常。伽玛波放射性是…零？虽然有点奇怪，但是其他一切正常。

original: The stealth field is unstable and scrambling things. The reading says gamma wave activity is zero, but that can't possibly be right.
translation: 隐形力场不稳定，发生了扰动。读数显示伽玛波放射性是零，但是这不可能啊。

original: Gamma wave activity is... zero? That can't be right. Must be a result of the interference.
translation: 伽玛波放射性是…零？不对，肯定是受到干扰了。

original: I should be going.
translation: 我要走了。

original: I'm not asking you to do this. I'm telling you.
translation: 我可不是请求你。我是在命令你。

original: Now take the Platinum Chip, go down to that bunker or whatever it is, and destroy whatever gizmo-happy Brahmin shit you find. Now get to it. Vale.
translation: 把白金筹码带上，杀进那个什么地堡，把你能看到的会动的玩意统统给我消灭掉。现在就去。 快。

original: I'm not asking you to do this. I'm telling you.
translation: 我可不是请求你。我是在命令你。

original: Now take the Platinum Chip, go down to that bunker or whatever it is, and destroy whatever gizmo-happy Brahmin shit you find.
translation: 把白金筹码带上，杀进那个什么地堡，把你能看到的会动的玩意统统给我消灭掉。现在就去。

original: And just in case you're thinking of slipping away, now that you've finally got that Platinum Chip in your hands?
translation: 顺便提醒你一句，免得你耍花招，现在既然白金筹码应该已经在你手上了……

original: Go ahead, try that. And I'll have you hunted down, and your head mounted on a pole. Now get to it. Vale.
translation: 如果你想溜的话，大可试试。我一定会把你逮住，将你的脑袋插在杆子上。现在去吧。快。

original: I'll kill President Kimball for you.
translation: 我会为你杀了金博尔总统。

original: That's what I like to hear.
translation: 这才像话嘛。

original: One of my Frumentarii has set up camp near Hoover Dam. His name is Cato Hostilius.
translation: 我的一名特务官已经在胡佛水坝附近扎了营。他的名字叫加图·荷提留斯。

original: Go to him. He'll have further instructions.
translation: 去找他。他会给你更多指示的。

original: Is it really necessary to destroy the Brotherhood?
translation: 真的有必要消灭兄弟会吗？

original: If I say the Brotherhood should be destroyed, it's necessary.
translation: 既然我下令要消灭兄弟会，那当然就有必要。

original: My Legion can win a fight against the Brotherhood of Steel, but it would be costly. Your job is to make sure there's no Brotherhood for us to fight.
translation: 虽然我的军团也能打赢钢铁兄弟会，但代价应该会很惨重。你的任务就是要确保我们不必与兄弟会交手。

original: I'll see what I can work out with the White Glove Society.
translation: 我看看我能不能和他们商量出个结果来。

original: The leader of the tribe is a woman named Marjorie. My understanding is that she strongly opposes a reversion to cannibalism.
translation: 他们的首领是一个叫玛乔里的女人。据我所知，她坚决反对食人行为。

original: If she's intractable, you might find Mortimer, her second-in-command, more flexible.
translation: 如果你说不动她，可以去找她的副手莫蒂默，他比较谈得来。

original: You don't need to look outward, mighty Khan. Your tribe is proud and strong - claim your own glory!
translation: 尊贵的大汗，你不需要再犹豫了。你的部落骄傲又强大——去夺取属于你们自己的荣耀吧！

original: [SUCCEEDED] Well spoken, traveler. Well spoken indeed. Perhaps it's time to find our own destiny unburdened by the past.
translation: [成功] 说得好，旅行者。说得太好了。也许是时候抛弃过去的束缚，追寻我们自己的命运了。

original: We'll begin readying the camp to move. As soon as Caesar makes his move, we'll depart. We will make ourselves strong again, and we shall conquer!
translation: 我们马上准备迁移营地。一旦凯撒有所动作，我们就启程。我们必将迎来复兴，我们终将征服一切！

original: Great Khans! Drive Caesar's dog out of our camp! If he's too slow to flee, kill him!
translation: 大汗帮的儿女们！把凯撒的走狗赶出我们的营地！如果他走慢了，就送他归西！

original: [SUCCEEDED] Well spoken, traveler. Well spoken indeed. Perhaps it's time to find our own destiny unburdened by the past.
translation: [成功] 说得好，旅行者。说得太好了。也许是时候抛弃过去的束缚，追寻我们自己的命运了。

original: We'll begin readying the camp to move. As soon as Caesar makes his move, we'll depart. We will make ourselves strong again, and we shall conquer!
translation: 我们马上准备迁移营地。一旦凯撒有所动作，我们就启程。我们必将迎来复兴，我们终将征服一切！

original: But you won't have each other. The Legion will kill you and sell Diane into slavery as a prostitute.
translation: 但你们可当不成爱人了。军团会杀了你，再把黛安当成妓女卖给奴隶贩子。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Dude! What a total haul! No way that's copasheshy. Yeah, okay, me and Diane got your back. No sweat.
translation: [成功] 哥们！这太可怕了！绝对不能那样。很好,你赢了，我和黛安会支持你，没问题。

original: What about Melissa?
translation: 那梅利莎呢？

original: Ah, Melissa. She's a bit of a dreamer. Last time she was in camp, Karl filled her head with stories of serving the Legion as a speculatore.
translation: 啊，梅利莎。她有点爱幻想。上次她在营地的时候，卡尔可是给她灌输不少故事，要她为军团当什么侦察兵。

original: Personally, I've never seen a woman in Legionnaire's armor, so I have my doubts.
translation: 就我个人来说，我还从没见到有女人穿过军团制服，所以我很怀疑他说的话。

original: So what do I do?
translation: 那我该怎么办？

original: Papa can be a stubborn man, but he's not a tyrant. He listens to his tribe, and to four voices in particular: me, Jack, Diane, and Melissa.
translation: 老爷子虽然固执，但他并非独断专行。他会聆听部落里族人们的意见，尤其是四个人：我， 杰克，黛安和梅利莎。

original: If you can convince all of us that allying with Caesar is a bad idea, you might be able to sway him.
translation: 只有让我们四个相信跟凯撒结盟并不明智，才有可能让他动摇。

original: What is it you had in mind?
translation: 你想干什么？

original: You want to convince Papa not to ally with Caesar, right? Trust me, you'll get nowhere just talking to him about it.
translation: 你想说服老爷子放弃跟凯撒结盟，对吧？相信我，光用嘴皮子说是讨不到好果子的。

original: He's fixated on restoring the glory of the Great Khans, and he sees Caesar as the path to that restoration.
translation: 他一心想要重现大汗帮往日的辉煌，把凯撒视为达成目标的跳板。

original: Sounds good.
translation: 听起来不错。

original: Well, I'm glad I have your approval.
translation: {哎呀，多谢夸奖了。

original: I have access, right?
translation: 我能进去，对吧？

original: Not a chance. Only the necessary personnel have authorization.
translation: 没门，只有得到授权的人才行。

original: I'm going to need access everywhere.
translation: 我需要前往各处的通行许可。

original: Alright, I'll give you full access.
translation: 好吧，我授权你可以在各处通行。

original: So what's the plan for today?
translation: 那今天的计划是什么？

original: The plan is to get through today without the shit hitting the fan.
translation: 计划就是平安撑过今天，别出什么岔子。

original: So I'll be overseeing the security team personally and keeping in constant contact with people over the radio.
translation: 我会亲自指挥安保小组，并且通过无线电与所有人保持联系。

original: It's a good bet that the Legion is going to try something today so we have to be prepared for anything.
translation: 军团今天很有可能会采取行动，所以我们要做好万全的准备。

original: We'll do whatever it takes to get the President through this visit in one piece.
translation: 不惜一切代价，保证总统之行顺利结束。

original: What can I do to help?
translation: 我怎样才能帮忙？

original: Someone like you... I'm just glad to have you on board. Do whatever you can. Security sweeps, talk to people, keep an eye out.
translation: 你这样的人……只能说欢迎你帮忙了。巡逻、盘查、警戒，能做什么就做什么吧。

original: Keep an eye on the crowd and keep an eye out for anything suspicious. Other than that, just stay out of the way.
translation: 留心观众和一切可疑的地方，除此之外，不要妨碍我们正常工作。

original: Do you have any leads on possible security threats?
translation: 你觉得哪里还可能存在安全隐患？

original: The Legion will definitely try something, but we don't have any solid leads yet.
translation: 军团肯定会搞点动静出来的，只是不知道会怎么搞。

original: I'd almost expect something direct from them, but given the circumstances there's a possibility of something more subtle, like sabotage.
translation: 我倒是希望他们能直接动手，但看现在这个情况，估计他们更可能在背地里耍阴谋。

original: But since we don't have anything solid, we'll just have to keep our eyes out for anything out of the ordinary.
translation: 不过既然没什么头绪，我们也只能多留意一些不寻常的情况了。

original: Possible security threats... there was a new guy allowed to help with security at the last minute. Other than that, we don't have any solid leads.
translation: 可能的安全隐患……刚才倒是有个新人被派过来帮忙。除此之外就没什么可疑的了。

original: Do you have a detailed schedule for the visit?
translation: 你有这次访问的详细时间表吗？

original: I have a full itinerary here. Here you go.
translation: 我这份有完整的行程表，给你。

original: The President arrives, gives a speech, and then leaves. That's all someone like you needs to know.
translation: 总统到场，发表演讲，然后离开。你这样的人只需要知道这些。

original: Can I use my weapons during the President's visit?
translation: 总统视察期间我能使用武器吗？

original: We trust you, so you're free to have your weapons. Just don't do anything too crazy and we'll back you up.
translation: 我们信任你，所以你可以留着武器，不过别干傻事，不然我们就得收拾你了。

original: You'll be allowed to carry your weapons, but they must remain holstered.
translation: 你可以带着武器，不过只能带着，不准拔出来。

original: If you pull them out, my men will shoot you. Understand?
translation: 敢掏家伙的话，我的人就会立马毙了你。明白了？

original: Before I take care of them, can I ask you about your dog tag?
translation: 在我料理他们之前，能问问你狗牌的事么？

original: What do you want to know?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: What's the history of the camp?
translation: 营地都有些什么历史？

original: I know that this place was originally a mining town before the NCR took it over. I think they mined gold before the war.
translation: 我知道在NCR占领以前，这地方原本是个矿镇。他们战前应该是在这里开矿。

original: Sorry I don't know much more than that.
translation: 抱歉，我就只知道这些。

original: Astor has agreed to let you join him.
translation: 阿斯特已经同意你加入了。

original: Maybe now I can get my old life back, or at least most of it.
translation: 也许我可以过回以前的生活了，至少是大部分吧。

original: It's not much, but I want you to have this.
translation: 我知道这些礼物不算多，但还是希望你能收下。谢谢你的帮忙。

original: I've already reverted the White Glove Society back to cannibalism.
translation: 我已经帮助白手套社团恢复了食人传统。

original: All right, that's a start. But now you have to convince them to support my Legion.
translation: 很好，但只是个开端。你现在必须说服他们支持我的军团。

original: Tell them they'll be allowed to continue practicing their dietary habits without interruption. They can eat a portion of what they conquer.
translation: 告诉他们，他们可以继续保留这一嗜好。只要是征服的敌人，我可以分一部分给他们尽情享用。

original: Do you have any dealings with New Vegas?
translation: 你和新维加斯有任何生意来往吗？

original: Not really. Heard it's paradise in the wasteland. Never been there myself, doubt they'd let a mutant in.
translation: 没有。听说那儿是废土的天堂。我从没去过那个地方，估计他们也不会放一个变种人进去。

original: Amazes me people would come from all over the wastes to throw away everything they've got in that town.
translation: 让我不可思议的是，那地方居然会吸引来自四面八方的人们，让他们心甘情愿地把自己的满身家当全都砸到里头。

original: Because you know they'd come up lacking?
translation: 因为你知道他们都是纸老虎？

original: [FAILED] Win? I wasn't aware we were competing.
translation: [失败] 赢？我可不觉得我们是在比赛。

original: Well spoken. You win this round.
translation: 说得好。这次算你赢了。

original: But surely a warrior in service of glorious Caesar is the equal of any tribe's finest?
translation: 一个为凯撒的荣耀而战的勇士，放在任何部落里不都是数一数二的？

original: [FAILED] You insult our host, where I wouldn't dare to. You might want to watch that talk around Papa Khan.
translation: [失败] 你好大的胆子，居然敢侮辱我们的东道主。不知道这话传到父汗耳边会怎么样。

original: Wow, you're not worthy to join a scruffy tribe of has-been desert raiders? You must suck.
translation: 哇哦，那你连加入这个由掠夺者组成的部落都不够格？你可真是垃圾。

original: Let's get this over with then.
translation: 那我们赶紧搞定吧。

original: Well spoken.
translation: 说得好。

original: Karl sends his regards.
translation: 卡尔向你表示问候。

original: You don't give up, do you?
translation: 你怎么就学不会消停呢？

original: You've been a persistent annoyance, and I had hoped to avoid this, but it seems I have no choice but to deal with you myself.
translation: 你一直在坏我们的好事。我本以为可以不必动刀子，但看来我已经别无选择，只能亲手除掉你了。

original: My dog here doesn't like you.
translation: 我的狗不喜欢你。

original: Well that's too bad. I'm just here to enjoy the show so if you don't mind...
translation: 那太糟了。我就是来观礼的，如果你不介意的话……

original: <Raise arms> Boogedy boogedy boo!
translation: <举起双臂>啵哔~啵哔~咻 !

original: What are you working on?
translation: 你在研究什么？

original: The Nightkin have varying degrees of mental instability due to their addiction to Stealth Boy use. I've been trying to come up with a cure.
translation: 由于长期依赖隐身小子，夜行族都患有不同程度的精神失常。我一直在寻找治愈的方法。

original: I'm currently investigating the local Nightstalker population since they seem to have developed a natural stealth field.
translation: 目前我正在调查本地的夜行兽种群，因为它们似乎进化出了一种天然的隐形力场。

original: I've also gotten my hands on a working Stealth Boy Mark II prototype, but that experiment is riskier. I'd rather not pursue that research just yet.
translation: 我手头倒是有一台II型隐身小子的原型机，但实验的风险太大。我暂时还不打算用它来做研究。

original: What's the story with Keene?
translation: 基恩到底是个怎样的人？

original: Smart, charismatic. One hell of a mean streak. Doesn't care for humans. Prefers fighting them to talking.
translation: 他很聪明，能说会道，心眼却很坏。丝毫不在乎人类。宁可与他们开战也不愿好好商量。

original: He's got a lot of pull with Nightkin, though. He talks, they listen. Was hoping he could draw other Nightkin to Jacobstown.
translation: 但他在夜行族内部很有影响力。凡是他说的话，他们全都听。我本来还希望他能多招徕些夜行族到雅各布斯镇来。

original: Keene is saner than most, but I know he's thinking of going his own way again. He's aggressive, impatient. Can't stand sitting around.
translation: 基恩比多数人都要理智，但我知道他又要开始独断专行了。他太好战，又没耐心。肯定坐不住。

original: Groodalicious. That ought to rake in the caps. What do I owe you?
translation: 美呆了。这下可要发大财了。你要什么样的报答？

original: Sure, what have you got?
translation: 当然，你还有什么事？

original: With Anders out of commission for so long, we're shorthanded on runners, and some backlogs have piled up.
translation: 由于安德斯脱岗太久，我们人手紧缺，积压了很多待办事项。

original: We've got an associate in the Crimson Caravan Trading Company who distributes for us in Outer Vegas. He's been after us for a new shipment.
translation: 我们在深红商队贸易公司有个线人，他负责维加斯外围的买卖。最近他一直在追着我们要新一批货。

original: You up for something challenging?
translation: 你想做点有挑战的事么？

original: I've got a shipment of Jet and Psycho that needs to be delivered to Motor-Runner at Vault 3.
translation: 我有一批杰特和疯狂药，需要有人运给3号避难所的轰鸣恶煞。

original: What do you have for sale?
translation: 你这儿都卖些什么？

original: Oh, you're buying? Tell you what, since you've been acting all, well, random lately, how about a discount? Might calm you down.
translation: 哦，你要买？这么着吧，看你最近似乎挺，呃，瞎胡闹的，我就给你打个折怎么样？或许能让你冷静点。

original: I know a few recipes for chems you might want. I could teach you.
translation: 我倒是知道几种药品的配方。我可以教你。

original: Right on. What have you got?
translation: 好极了。你都会什么？

original: I'm looking to make a few caps. Got any work for me?
translation: 我想挣点外快，有什么工作吗？

original: Hmm... you look like you could handle yourself in a fix. All right, I'll tell you what. Anders, one of my best runners, is overdue to report back.
translation: 嗯……看起来你有两下子。好吧，我告诉你，安德斯，我最好的走私商之一，没有按时回来报告。

original: If you can find out what happened to him, I'll give you some real work.
translation: 如果你能查明白他到底出了什么事，我会给你些像样的工作。

original: And you didn't even get skinned alive. I'm impressed. Here's your payment.
translation: 你竟然毫发无伤地回来了。真令人惊讶。这是你的报酬。

original: I finished the Vault 3 run.
translation: 我完成了3号避难所的生意。

original: Yeah, you did good finding him. Okay, if you want a little work, I think I can find you something.
translation: 嗯，你干的不错。好的，如果你想要工作的话，我可以帮你找一些来。

original: Now that Anders is back, how about that work?
translation: 既然安德斯回来了，说好给我的工作呢？

original: Okay, if you want a little work, I think I can find you something.
translation: 好的，如果你想要工作的话，我可以帮你找一些来。

original: Any new jobs for me?
translation: 有什么新工作给我吗？

original: Not right at the moment, but you could talk to Jack - he's always looking for new recipes.
translation: 暂时没有，不过你可以去找杰克——他一直都在寻找新的配方。

original: Any new jobs for me?
translation: 有什么新工作给我吗？

original: I know who they are, but I don't care about their agenda.
translation: 我知道他们是谁，但我不关心他们的计划。

original: They're usually harmless unless you use advanced technology around them.
translation: 他们通常是很少伤害人，除非你在他们附近使用高科技。

original: Well, that shouldn't be a problem for me. I can't afford anything like that.
translation: 那这对我来说不是什么问题。我可用不起高科技。

original: Anything I can do to help around here?
translation: 这附近有什么我能帮忙的吗？

original: More than you already have? Might want to ask around, but truth is, you've already helped out a lot in the short time you've been here.
translation: 你还没帮够？那你在附近再问问吧，但老实说，这几天你已经帮了我们不少忙了。

original: I suppose you could talk to Ghost, up on top of the barracks - uh, Ranger Ghost. Something about trouble in Nipton, maybe.
translation: 我觉得你可以去和幽灵谈一谈，就在营房的屋顶上——呃，我是指那个叫幽灵的游骑兵，据说尼普顿出事了。

original: Help? Oh, well... you could speak to Ranger Jackson. He might have something for you.
translation: 帮忙？哦，好吧……你可以去和游骑兵杰克森谈谈，他可能会有差事给你。

original: He sort of runs things around here, mostly ends up sending reports back West that aren't filled with the best news.
translation: 他算是这儿的负责人，不过大部分时间往西部发回的都是坏消息。

original: I need repairs.
translation: 我需要修理。

original: All right then... just sign here, here, and... here.
translation: 好吧……这儿，这儿还有这儿……签个字就好。

original: Have you considered joining the Great Khans?
translation: 你考虑过加入大汗帮吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I hadn't thought of that. Would you be willing to talk to them on our behalf?
translation: [成功] 我没想过。你愿意代表我们去和他们谈谈吗？

original: I'm still working on it. May I ask you some questions?
translation: 我还在努力。我能问你几个问题吗 ?

original: The Khans will accept you as long as you pass the initiation rite.
translation: 只要你通过入会仪式，大汗帮就会接受你。

original: Well, that's a hell of a lot better than going back to prison.
translation: 好吧，这总比回他妈的监狱强。

original: I'll do it.
translation: 我会干的。

original: Thanks. Take this keycard - I tried hacking the locking mechanisms on the doors, but it seems the only way in is with one of these.
translation: 谢谢。拿着这张门禁卡——我尝试过破解门锁系统，不过似乎唯一能让人进出的办法就是门禁卡。

original: Yes. You can join them, but he says you would all still have to pass the initiation rite.
translation: 是的。你们可以加入了，不过他说你们都还是需要通过入会仪式。

original: I'd rather not, but fair enough. We'll do it.
translation: 我不是很愿意，但也行吧。我们会照做的。

original: Tell me about the Super Mutants.
translation: 跟我说说超级变种人。

original: Tell me about the Super Mutants.
translation: 跟我说说超级变种人。

original: Tell me about the Super Mutants.
translation: 跟我说说超级变种人。

original: Tell me about the Super Mutants.
translation: 跟我说说超级变种人。

original: Tell me about the Super Mutants.
translation: 跟我说说超级变种人。

original: Tell me about the area outside the vault.
translation: 跟我说说避难所之外的区域。

original: It's a fucking deathtrap around here. Fiends swarm all over Vault 3 in the east, and there are fucking Deathclaws south of that, at Quarry Junction.
translation: 这地区真他妈的危险。恶魔帮占据了东边的3号避难所，南边的采石场枢纽全是他妈的死亡爪。

original: If you're looking for humans, the Khans are north of us, and there's an NCR base at McCarran, past Vault 3. Supposedly there are muties to the southeast.
translation: 如果你要找人类的话，我们的北边是大汗帮，过了3号避难所有个NCR基地在麦卡伦机场。我估计东南边还有变种人。

original: Tell me about the prison break.
translation: 跟我说说越狱的事。

original: A beautiful thing. Saved a little blast powder here, hid a makeshift weapon there, and one day I orchestrated a little symphony for the NCR.
translation: 美好的回忆。我私藏了一些火药，外加几把土制武器。后来有一天，我就用它们奏了一曲交响乐，献给了伟大的NCR。

original: I can teach you to make Rocket.
translation: 我可以教你做速效杰特。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Right on, let's have it!
translation: [成功] 很好，我们开始吧！

original: [FAILED] Cool. Maybe later.
translation: [失败] 行啊。下次吧。

original: I was thinking Rocket, but now I'm not so sure.
translation: 我本来想教你做速效杰特的，但现在我犹豫了。

original: I can teach you to make Party-Time Mentats.
translation: 我可以教你做派对用曼他特。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Right on, let's have it!
translation: [成功] 很好，我们开始吧！

original: [FAILED] Cool. Maybe later.
translation: [失败] 行啊。下次吧。

original: I was thinking Party-Time Mentats, but now I'm not so sure.
translation: 我本来想教你做派对用曼他特的，但现在我犹豫了。

original: I can teach you to make Slasher.
translation: 我可以教你做狂暴针。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Right on, let's have it!
translation: [成功] 很好，我们开始吧！

original: [FAILED] Cool. Maybe later.
translation: [失败] 行啊。下次吧。

original: I was thinking Slasher, but now I'm not so sure.
translation: 我本来想教你做狂暴针的，但现在我犹豫了。

original: I can teach you to make Hydra.
translation: 我可以教你做九头蛇。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Right on, let's have it!
translation: [成功] 很好，我们开始吧！

original: [FAILED] Cool. Maybe later.
translation: [失败] 行啊。下次吧。

original: I was thinking Hydra, but now I'm not so sure.
translation: 我本来想教你做九头蛇的，但现在我犹豫了。

original: I can teach you to make Super Stimpaks.
translation: 我可以教你做超级治疗针。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Right on, let's have it!
translation: [成功] 很好，我们开始吧！

original: [FAILED] Cool. Maybe later.
translation: [失败] 行啊。下次吧。

original: I was thinking Super Stimpaks, but now I'm not so sure.
translation: 我本来想教你做超级治疗针的，但现在我犹豫了。

original: Medical supplies are always scarce, and they don't kill the buyer as often. Think of the profits!
translation: 医疗物资永远都短缺，他们也不会没事和买家过不去。想想这其中的利润吧！

original: [SUCCEEDED] You've got a point. Selling meds to the locals could be a pretty nice side gig. All right, I'll tell Jack to give it a try.
translation: [成功] 还真让你说到点子上了。把医疗用品卖给本地人确实是个好主意。很好，我会告诉杰克试一下的。

original: But think of all the people who overdose on Jet and Psycho. It's bad for your karma.
translation: 但想想那些滥用杰特和疯狂药的人吧。你好歹也给自己积点德呀。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Whoa... you're right. I should start a side project making meds to keep my aura clean.
translation: [成功] 呃……你说得对。我应该搞个另外的项目，制造一些治疗用的药品，免得将来遭报应。

original: Where exactly are we going?
translation: 我们到底要去哪？

original: We're gonna check out the police and fire stations. They were the buildings used most by the NCR, so they're our best chance at good shit.
translation: 我们要去检查一下警察局和消防局。NCR以前经常使用这两栋建筑，所以能在里面找到东西的概率也最高。

original: I found the keys on one of the trooper corpses.
translation: 我在一个游骑兵的尸体上了发现了这串钥匙。

original: Okay. I'll be back.
translation: 好的。我会回来的。

original: Just go, already.
translation: 快去吧。

original: I'll check it out.
translation: 我会查出来的。

original: Yeah, you do that.
translation: 是啊，是这样。

original: Who is your employer?
translation: 你的雇主是谁？

original: Some caravan company, Crimson something or other. Some old broad said they were looking to expand their business, be more competitive or some shit.
translation: 某个商队公司，是叫深红还是什么来着。有个老家伙宣称要拓展业务范围，提升竞争力……还是什么狗屁来着。

original: I don't really care, so long as I get paid.
translation: 反正只要我能拿到钱，别的关我屁事。

original: Maybe I can help?
translation: 没准我能帮忙？

original: Look, if you really want to help, either get the fuck out of our way or hack that damn computer over there.
translation: 如果你真想帮忙的话，要么就他妈给我滚，要么就黑了那台该死的电脑。

original: What is this initiation?
translation: 入盟仪式是什么意思？

original: Everybody has to do it. Well, everybody who wants to be a Khan, anyways. They toss you into the ring there and beat on you for a solid minute.
translation: 每个人都要过这一关。呃，我指的是想要加入大汗帮的人。他们会把你扔进场子里，然后让你整整挨上一分钟的打。

original: If you survive, you're in.
translation: 如果你还能喘气儿，就算通过了。

original: I took care of those geckos.
translation: 我料理了那些蜥蜴。

original: You won't get a fucking cap from me, and you're lucky I don't blow your goddamn head off.
translation: 你休想从我这拿走他妈的一个瓶盖，老子没一枪爆了你的狗头已经算你他妈走运了。

original: The whole point of killing the geckos was so that we could get at the sulfur and you've just made that a hell of a lot more difficult. Now fuck off.
translation: 让你杀蜥蜴的本义是为了进入硫磺洞，你倒好，现在我们要进去的难度更大了。赶紧给我滚蛋。

original: What's going on here?
translation: 怎么回事？

original: After you cut off access to the sulfur, Cooke left. I guess we're free to surrender to the NCR now.
translation: 你切断了通往硫磺矿的道路后，库克就走了。看来我们现在可以去向NCR投降了。

original: We're waiting on you. A lot of us are interested in joining the Khans.
translation: 我们还在等你消息呢。许多人都挺想加入大汗帮的。

original: I'd like to, but I can't take you with me right now.
translation: 本来想的，但我现在不能带你走了。

original: Aw, you really know how to make a girl feel like a stray cat.
translation: 哦，你还真是会放女生的鸽子啊。

original: But okay. My offer stands, if we run into each other again.
translation: 但没关系。如果我们以后再见面，希望还能有机会同行。

original: I killed them all.
translation: 我杀了他们。

original: God, you're not lying, are you? You really did kill them.
translation: 天啊，你不像在撒谎，对吧？你真的杀了他们。

original: In that case, this is for them.
translation: 那样的话，我要为他们报仇。

original: I found a chewed up Stealth Boy in the Nightstalker lair.
translation: 我在夜行兽的巢穴里找到了一个被咬坏的隐身小子。

original: Hmmm... there's still power, but the casing is cracked. I'm astonished that exposure to the stealth radiation could induce mutations so rapidly.
translation: 嗯……还有电，但外壳已经被咬碎了。我很惊讶，暴露在隐形力场中的生物居然会如此迅速地发生变异。

original: More importantly, this explains why my research into this group of Nightstalkers hasn't come up with a cure for the Nightkin.
translation: 更重要的是，这也解释了为何我针对本地夜行兽种群所做的研究始终未能得到理想的结果。

original: There's only one avenue left for me - I need to run the Mark II test on Lily. It's the only way.
translation: 如此一来，就只剩一条路可走了——我要在莉莉身上测试II型原型机。这是唯一的方法。

original: Hmmm... there's still power, but the casing is cracked. I'm astonished that exposure to the stealth radiation could induce mutations so rapidly.
translation: 嗯……还有电，但外壳已经被咬碎了。我很惊讶，暴露在隐形力场中的生物居然会如此快地发生变异。

original: More importantly, this explains why my research into this group of Nightstalkers hasn't come up with a cure for the Nightkin.
translation: 更重要的是，这也解释了为何我针对本地夜行兽种群所做的研究始终未能得到理想的结果。

original: I did have a test in mind using Lily, but since she's dead, that's no longer a possibility. Regrettable. Anyway, you've done all you can.
translation: 我本想对莉莉做个测试，可她已经死了，测试也就无从谈起。真是令人遗憾。不管怎样，你已经尽力了。

original: Can you tell me anything about this Platinum Chip?
translation: 你能告诉我有关白金筹码的事吗？

original: <Go to sleep.>
translation: <睡觉。>

original: Zzzz...
translation: 呼噜噜...

original: <Kill Benny in his sleep.>
translation: <趁本尼睡觉时杀掉他.>

original: Huh...? Hnngk!
translation: 唔……？啊呃！

original: Hundreds of Securitrons. All of them upgraded now, just like Mr. House wants.
translation: 里头有成千上万的安保机器人，我已经遵照豪斯先生的吩咐，将它们全都升级了。

original: So all this time the old man had an entire army on lay-away? Clever player.
translation: 所以那老家伙始终藏着一支军队啊？果真是高手。

original: Just imagine the look on Baldie's face when those Securitrons come pouring out on judgment day! I'd pay to have that bronzed!
translation: 想想这些机器人如潮水般涌出来时，那老秃子脸上会是什么表情吧！要能铸成铜像，花多少钱我都愿意！

original: So all you gotta do is talk to Yes Man, figure out how to set things in motion.
translation: 你现在要做的就是跟好好先生仔细商量，计划如何将这一切付诸行动。

original: Make Vegas a town I woulda been proud of, baby. Let it swing.
translation: 让维加斯成为一个令我自豪的城市吧，宝贝。让它天翻地覆吧！

original: He gave me the Platinum Chip.
translation: 他把白金筹码给了我。

original: Sure, Baldie wants you to go down there in the bunker and destroy whatever Mr. House stashed there.
translation: 嗯，秃子希望你下地堡，然后把豪斯先生藏在那儿的东西全都毁掉。

original: Oh, you don't want to do that, baby. Whatever's down in that bunker is the key to the city called Vegas. So here's what you do...
translation: 你一定会后悔的，宝贝。地堡里的东西可是维加斯通往繁荣的关键啊。所以接下来你应该这样做……

original: You go down there and you use the Chip to do whatever Mr. House woulda wanted you to do. And when you get back to the Strip, you find Yes Man.
translation: 你就进入地堡，照着豪斯先生的指示使用筹码。等你回到长街以后，再去找好好先生。

original: I made it so that cat can't help but be helpful, dig?
translation: 它是我制造的，一定会帮你的，明白了吗？

original: Looks like you played past your abilities.
translation: 看起来你玩脱了。

original: Didn't leave me much choice when you showed up. Like I said, you forced my hand.
translation: 谁让你突然冒出来呢，我也没办法。正如我说，是你逼我的。

original: Hand over the Platinum Chip, maybe you live.
translation: 你交出白金筹码，或许还能活命。

original: Can't do that, baby. The Chip, it's... special. But savor this, baby...
translation: 这可不行，宝贝。那筹码，它……很特别。但说到这，宝贝……

original: I can comp you the Presidential - best suite in the house. After what you been through, you deserve a taste of the VIP lifestyle.
translation: 我可以给你提供一间总统套房——这里最豪华的房间。遭了这么大的罪，你应该好好享受VIP的待遇。

original: Give me a moment or two to catch my breath and knock back a few cocktails, and I'll swing by for a meet and greet.
translation: 给我点时间去喘口气，灌两杯鸡尾酒，我待会再去房间里找你，咱俩好好叙叙旧。

original: I'll clue you in, guaranteed - every question answered. This can be the start of a beautiful friendship.
translation: 我会把一切都和你说明白的，我保证，所有问题我都能解答。说不定还能开启一段美好的友谊呢。

original: Mr. House wants the Platinum Chip. Hand it over.
translation: 豪斯先生需要那个白金筹码。交出来。

original: You don't wanna do that, baby - not without hearing what I got to say first.
translation: 你不会这么做的，宝贝——先听我把话说完吧。

original: Pass the time thinking over your mistakes. <Final decision.>
translation: 好好想想你犯过的错误吧。<最后决定。>

original: You sick, vindictive fuck!
translation: 你这个毫无人性的王八蛋！

original: Tell me about the Three Families.
translation: 跟我聊聊三大家族的事吧。

original: Set it up right, and the Families will roll with your caper. You might have to do some convincing.
translation: 只要方法得当，三大家族都会助你一臂之力。不过你可能需要先赢取他们的信任。

original: Why shouldn't Mr. House run Vegas?
translation: 为什么不让豪斯先生统治维加斯呢？

original: Mr. House hides Vegas under his skirt when the bombs fall a thousand years ago, so it belongs to him? Forever? You buy that?
translation: 豪斯先生认为一千年前核弹落下来的时候是他保卫了维加斯，所以维加斯就属于他了，永远属于他？你能接受吗？

original: Baby, every boss has a line to explain why he's special, why everyone's gotta do what he says. You're just figuring that out?
translation: 宝贝，但凡是老大，总会有一套自我标榜的说辞，为的就是让大家都听他的。明白吗？

original: Vegas gotta swing, baby, gotta have pizzazz. Respect where due, but that old man is square to the core.
translation: 维加斯必须要有活力，宝贝，必须要有自己的气派。尊敬归尊敬，但那老家伙实在是迂腐到骨子里了。

original: Okay, I'll take care of him.
translation: 好，我会干掉他的。

original: Thanks for your support. I'll make sure the NCR Emergency radio is up and running. Go kill those bastards.
translation: 谢谢你的支援。我会确保NCR紧急无线电正常运转。去杀了那些杂种吧。

original: What opportunity is that?
translation: 什么良机？

original: We now have a chance to take the fight to those bastards on their home turf.
translation: 我们现在有机会直接冲进那些狗杂种的窝里把他们干掉。
