translation: 我在NCR当过六个月的医疗兵，所以我不是一个真正的"医生"。不过，我受过的医疗训练仍然比这里的其他人要多。

original: It also gives me an excuse to stay out of any raiding parties. The gang can't lose its only doctor now, can it?
translation: 所以我也有借口不必和他们一块儿去打劫了，帮会里总不能没有医生，对吧？

original: I need a doctor.
translation: 我需要一个医生。

original: I've seen worse.
translation: 还不算太糟。

original: Life can be pretty rough sometimes.
translation: 生活不易啊。

original: The fact that you're still on your feet is... surprising.
translation: 你居然还能站着……真令人惊讶。

original: What are the most dangerous places in the Wasteland?
translation: 废土最危险的地方在哪里？

original: Hell, it's all dangerous. Know why? Because you can't trust anything that stands on two legs.
translation: 妈的，哪里都危险。知道为什么吗？因为所有长着两条腿的东西都不可信。

original: If you're looking for real trouble, head straight into the mountains. Men don't walk up there, for good reasons, kid.
translation: 你要是真想跟自己过不去，那就往山里走吧。人类是不会到那儿去的，理由很充分，孩子。

original: If you're looking for real trouble, head straight into the mountains. Men don't walk up there, for good reasons, kid.
translation: 你要是真想跟自己过不去，那就往山里走吧。人类是不会到那儿去的，理由很充分，孩子。

original: Chavez has been dealt with. You won't see him around here anymore.
translation: 查韦兹已经完蛋了，你再也不会看见他了。

original: I'm happy you cleared that up for me, but we've got another situation to worry about. There's a merchant hanging around near the prison.
translation: 很高兴你帮我除掉了那个杂种，但又出了个状况，监狱附近有个商人在晃悠。

original: Something feels funny about him, and I want you to deal with him. Shake him down if he's legit, but if not, take him out.
translation: 感觉这人有点可笑，你去和他打个交道。如果他是干合法生意的，就勒索他一把，如果他另有目的，就做了他。

original: Okay, I need some answers, now. These guys just barged in here and said they were under orders to keep me here until you arrived.
translation: 好了，我需要个说法。这帮人刚刚突然闯进来，说他们接到命令，让我必须留在原地，等你过来。

original: I'm about five seconds away from telling my men to take 'em down, so speak fast.
translation: 如果你再晚来五秒钟，我就要命令手下把他们干掉了。所以你有话快说。

original: Ambassador Crocker said to come see you about the situation with the Kings in Freeside.
translation: 克罗克大使叫我来协助你处理一下自由城猫王帮的事。

original: Its X-25 gatling laser, produced to spec by Glastinghouse, Inc., is deadly against soft targets at medium range...
translation: 它配备了由伽马镜屋有限公司制造的X-25激光多管机枪，能对中等距离的普通目标给予致命打击……

original: All of this, you probably already knew...
translation: 这一切，你可能早就知道了……

original: Freeside's problems are too big for you to have much impact.
translation: 自由城的问题已经太严重了，很难再有改变了。

original: Oh yeah, I heard some new things that you might find interesting. I'm going to have to start charging 100 caps per tip, though.
translation: 哦，对了，我又打听到一些消息，也许你会感兴趣。不过每条情报我要收你100个瓶盖。

original: After all, I have to save up for my ticket out of here, right? So how about it? Want a tip?
translation: 毕竟，我总得存点钱，才能买张票离开这里，对吧？怎么样？要情报吗 ?

original: Now you'll get some respect. You should give some hell to the people that used to push you around.
translation: 应该让自己先出人头地。然后找到当初那些对你无礼的人，把他们狠狠教训一顿。

original: Yeah... yeah, that's a good idea. They'll learn that they shouldn't have messed with me. Just wait till they get what's coming to them!
translation: 是啊……是啊，这是个好主意。一定要让他们悔不当初。那些人就等着遭报应吧！

original: What do I do when I'm at the train?
translation: 我上了火车以后该怎么做？

original: Put the bomb in one of the vents inside the train on the back wall, towards the joint that connects the cars. Arm it, and get out of there.
translation: 把炸弹安到车厢尾部连接处的一座通风口里。启动炸弹，然后下车走人。

original: I've also left some bomb ingredients in with the explosives. You are to take those to the footlocker of Private Crenshaw.
translation: 我还留了些制作炸弹的原料，就和炸弹放在一起。你可以把那些东西丢进列兵克伦肖的脚柜。

original: Crenshaw's a problem child. Lots of run-ins with his superiors. It'll be easy for them to believe he's working for the Legion.
translation: 克伦肖是个问题儿童，曾多次顶撞上司。所以他们很容易就会相信他是军团的卧底。

original: I'm trying to get to the Strip. Know anything that could help me out?
translation: 我想去长街。你能不能给我指条明路？

original: You're looking to get past those tin cans at the gate, right? They let people by all the time, if they've got the caps.
translation: 你是想绕过那些把守大门的铁皮罐头吧？其实只要你有瓶盖，他们是不会阻拦你的。

original: But if you're not rich, and I can tell you ain't, the King might be able to help you out, provided he likes you.
translation: 可如果你很穷——我也看得出你穷——也许猫王可以帮你，但前提是他得喜欢你。

original: Tell me about Dermot, your partner.
translation: 和我说说你搭档德莫特。

original: What do you even mean? He's Dermot.
translation: 你什么意思？他可是德莫特。

original: Dermot knows how to work salvage better than any man I ever met. Doesn't go asking questions all day, neither.
translation: 德莫特比我遇到过的任何人都懂得收拾废品。他也不会整天问问题。

original: I know what you and your partner have been up to - I got the evidence from your rooms.
translation: 我知道你和你搭档在做肮脏的勾当，我在你的房间找到了证据。

original: You're right about that. Saint James! Got a thief here!
translation: 你说对了。圣詹姆斯！这儿有个贼 !

original: <200 caps> Let's do it.
translation: <200瓶盖>来吧。

original: Oh, we will, sugar. We will.
translation: 喔，当然，宝贝。当然。

original: I'll do my best to live up to my last performance.
translation: 我会尽量表现得和上次一样好的。

original: How much for your services?
translation: 你的服务要多少钱？

original: A pittance, sugar - and I'll leave you without a care in the world.
translation: 用不了几个钱的，帅哥。我会让你乐不思蜀的。

original: Same price as before, sugar, and the same fun, too.
translation: 和以前一样，帅哥，乐趣不减哦。

original: Sounds like life in the Legion is tough.
translation: 听起来你在军团的日子过得很艰难。

original: You don't know much about the Legion, do you? Women are like money, given as rewards, breeding stock. Liking boys is bad for the economy.
translation: 事实上营地内外都很艰难。女人的情况更糟。她们就像货币，是用来赏赐的奖品。 好比育种的牲口。

original: Honestly, as long as men meet obligations and the child count, "friendships" are a sight more equal than the level of most Legion husbands and wives.
translation: 说实话，只要男人有责任感，知道照顾孩子，就连"友谊"都比大多数军团夫妻的关系都要平等。

original: I hear you were a slave of Caesar's Legion.
translation: 我听说你以前是凯撒军团的一个奴隶。

original: What Marco said is true. The Legion attacked my village when I was 16.
translation: 马可没说错。军团在我十六岁那年劫掠了我的村庄。

original: My parents were killed as examples. The rest of us, chained and dragged to some kind of camp. A Centurion there chose me as his tent servant.
translation: 我的父母成了杀鸡儆猴的牺牲品。而我们剩下的人则被拖枷带锁送到了一个营地。有个百夫长挑了我去他的营帐里当仆人。

original: He was handsome, and gentle, most of the time. Said it was our secret, and he'd protect me. Gave me little gifts, stupid things.
translation: 他很英俊，多数时候也很温柔。他说这是我们两人之间的秘密，他会保护我。还经常送给我些小礼物之类的。

original: But Caesar punishes homosexuality with death, and we nearly got caught, and there were suspicions. So when he took me out into the desert...
translation: 但凯撒对同性恋严惩不贷，我们差点被逮到，周围的人也起了疑心。后来他就带着我逃进了沙漠……

original: Well, I knew he was going to get rid of me. So I kicked him where it counts and I ran. And then swam. And ran some more. Wound up here.
translation: 呵，我知道他其实是想除掉我，于是我一脚踢中他的要害，然后撒腿就跑。我游了好远，又拼命地跑。之后就到了这儿。

original: Baby, who I am doesn't matter. I'll be anybody you need me to be. It's better that way, you'll see.
translation: 宝贝，我是谁无关紧要，只要你喜欢，我可以是任何身份。这样更好，你会明白的。

original: Tell me about yourself.
translation: 和我说说你自己吧。

original: I'm just a fantasy come to life. But you already knew that.
translation: 我只是个传说罢了。不过你已经知道了。

original: Tell me about yourself.
translation: 和我说说你自己吧。

original: No thanks.
translation: 不了，谢谢。

original: Fine by me. You the one missing out on all the exciting details.
translation: 无所谓，反正错过精彩部分的人是你。

original: <300 caps> Here's your money.
translation: <300瓶盖> 这是给你的钱。

original: Get ready, honey. I'm going to make it good for you.
translation: 准备好了，甜心。我会让你飘飘欲仙的。

original: Let me help you slip into something a little more comfortable.
translation: 让我来教你怎样会更舒服一些吧。

original: I'm going to make your toes curl, baby.
translation: 我会让你激情难耐的，宝贝。

original: So get on the bed already. I got something to show you.
translation: 乖乖躺到床上去吧，我来给你展示一番。

original: How much does it cost to hire you?
translation: 和你睡一晚需要多少钱？

original: It's worth every cap, baby. I'll do things to you you didn't even think was possible, and leave you feeling like everything's right in the world.
translation: 我保证你能值回票价，宝贝。哪怕你觉得不可能的事，我也能做，我会让你觉得世间万物是如此畅快。

original: I'm not surprised. Whip out your caps and away we go.
translation: 不出我所料。把瓶盖掏出来，咱们就办正事。

original: I'd like your services.
translation: 我想要你的服务。

original: Wouldn't you make more money working on the Strip?
translation: 你难道不想去长街工作，多赚些钱？

original: I got my start at the Gomorrah. Good money, but I saw how those Omertas hook girls on free Jet or Med-X - then start charging.
translation: 我开始在蛾摩拉干过，收入不错，但我发现黑手党会利用免费的杰特和吗啡引诱那些女孩，再开始向她们收钱。

original: Slavery through a needle is what that is. I earn less out here, but I keep more.
translation: 在潜移默化中奴役她们，这就是蛾摩拉的阴谋。我虽然在这里挣得少，但我存的多。

original: Tell me about yourself.
translation: 和我说说你自己吧。

original: I'm called Sweetie because I'm the sweetest piece you'll ever find anywhere outside of the Strip.
translation: 我叫小甜甜，因为我是你在长街外能找到的最甜美的女人。其实只要我愿意，我完全可以留在赌场里工作。

original: Take a look at this ledger I found in Dermot's room.
translation: 你看看我在德莫特的房间里找到的这个账本吧。

original: I'll take a look, but you better have a good reason for asking me to violate his privacy.
translation: 我会看的，但你最好能给我一个充分点的理由，这可是在侵犯他人的隐私啊。

original: What?... Those bastards! Selling folks off to the Fiends? Selling children - to Cook-Cook...?
translation: 什么？……那些混蛋！居然把人卖给恶魔帮？把孩子卖给——大厨库克？

original: I've seen enough. They're done for, both of them.
translation: 我看不下去了。他们完了，他们俩都完了。

original: You might be interested to know that I killed a Fiend named Cook-Cook.
translation: 我杀掉了恶魔帮一个叫大厨库克的，你应该会感兴趣吧。

original: I'm interested in learning more about Dermot and Saint James.
translation: 我有兴趣多了解一些德莫特和圣詹姆斯的事。

original: They don't look like much, but they earn a pretty good living by selling scrap and salvage.
translation: 他们虽然看起来并不富裕，但靠着卖破烂倒是过得挺不错。

original: Dermot saves his money. Saint James spends his on Sweetie. A good customer, that one.
translation: 德莫特会存钱。圣詹姆斯则把钱都花在了小甜甜身上。那家伙是个不错的主顾。

original: Tell me about Sweetie.
translation: 跟我说说小甜甜。

original: Oh, I know everything - how she smells, how she tastes, how it feels to slip her on and wiggle.
translation: 哦，我对她可是了如指掌——她的味道，还有骑在她身上扭动时的感觉。

original: Damn fine woman, but damn expensive, too. Just ask Saint James - he spends near every cap he gets on Sweetie's sweets.
translation: 这女人真不错，就是太贵了。你去问问圣詹姆斯吧，他几乎把所有瓶盖都用来睡小甜甜了。

original: Tell me about Dermot.
translation: 和我说说德莫特。

original: Roughneck prospector is all I hear, good at what he does. Been renting a room here for a year or so - nothing special.
translation: 我听说他是个捡破烂的大老粗，不过他能力很强。在这儿租了个房间，差不多有一年了，没什么特别的地方。

original: What do you know about Dermot and Saint James?
translation: 对于德莫特和圣詹姆斯，你都知道些什么？

original: Those boys been living here a while now. They sell salvage and do all right. I never been with either of them.
translation: 那两个年轻人在这儿住了有一段日子了。他们靠卖破烂为生，过得还行。我从没和他们睡过。

original: That Saint James is all over Sweetie every time he rustles up the caps to afford her. She says he's peculiar, but who isn't?
translation: 圣詹姆斯老缠着小甜甜，赚到的那点钱全花在了她身上。她说他是独一无二的，但谁不是呢 ?

original: Is this apartment building yours?
translation: 这幢楼是你的？

original: Yep, for years now. Guess I should be calling it Casa Marco or something, but I haven't changed the signs.
translation: 是啊，已经有几年了。我想应该把它改名叫卡萨·马可才对，但我还没来得及换招牌。

original: Folks who can't pay their way onto the Strip need a place to stay, too. And when Pretty Sarah set her whores up here, the Casa went full-service.
translation: 就算没有钱进长街，人们也需要一个地方落脚。美人萨拉把她手下的妓女带进来后，这里的生意一下就兴隆了起来。

original: <75 caps> What the hell. Let's do it.
translation: <75瓶盖> 豁出去了。咱们来吧。

original: You won't notice anything once the lights are out, hon. The places that count are still firm enough...
translation: 只要灯一黑，你就一点感觉也没有了，亲爱的。我那几个地方可还中用着呢。

original: Well, don't just stand there. I ain't getting any younger.
translation: 那就别傻站着了。我又不会变年轻。

original: I'd like your services.
translation: 我想要你的服务。

original: Best prices around so long as you don't try putting anything someplace it was never intended. How's that sound?
translation: 我开的价钱最低，只要你不把自己的小玩意钻到不该钻的地方去就行。怎么样？

original: I had questions about your tenants.
translation: 对你的房客我有些问题要问。

original: Like who?
translation: 比如谁？

original: How would you feel about becoming Primm's new sheriff?
translation: 你对成为普瑞姆的新任治安官有什么想法？

original: My terms are the same. A pardon from the NCR and the freedom to do the job any way I see fit.
translation: 我的条件没有变。得到NCR的赦免，以及赋予我在工作上便利行事的权力。

original: [Continue]
translation: [继续]

original: But once they were in, they were stuck there. Oliver's troopers were entrenched and wouldn't give a foot.
translation: 可一上水坝，他们就动弹不得了。奥利弗的部队始终坚守阵地，一步都不退让。

original: That's when we ordered the rangers and 1st Recon sharpshooters to start picking off veteran Legion officers from a high ridge west of the dam.
translation: 就在这时，我们命令游骑兵和第一侦察营的狙击手从水坝西岸的山脊上开始狙杀军团的精锐军官。

original: That only lasted about a minute before Graham ordered the back ranks to push through to the front and rush the ridge.
translation: 仅仅过了一分钟，格雷厄姆就命令后队越过前队向山脊冲锋。

original: Why are the rangers here?
translation: 为什么游骑兵会出现在这里？

original: There's a lot of answers to that question, but it started with the Ranger Unification Treaty. We weren't always the only show in town.
translation: 这个问题有很多答案，但一切都源于《游骑兵联合条约》。要知道这里除了我们还有其他人呢。

original: Nevada had its own posse, the Desert Rangers. They fought Caesar even farther east, out in Arizona.
translation: 内华达原本有自己的地方武装——沙漠游骑兵。他们原先在东边深入亚利桑那的地区与凯撒作战。但战况不是很顺利。

original: Years back, we met with the Desert Rangers at Mojave Outpost and agreed to help them against Caesar if they would join the NCR.
translation: 几年前，我们在莫哈维前哨战与沙漠游骑兵会师，并答应只要他们同意加入NCR，我们就与他们一道对抗凯撒。

original: Why do they call Lanius the Monster of the East?
translation: 他们为什么管拉尼厄斯叫做“东方之兽”？

original: Oh, the usual reasons. People say he's enormous, carries a big sword, chops people's heads off. That's not what makes him a good commander, though.
translation: 哦，没什么好奇怪的。人们说他是个大块头，背着一把大剑，专砍人头。不过，光靠这些可当不了好指挥官。

original: Folks say he came from a heck of a tough tribe, took Caesar a long time to conquer. It was thanks to Lanius.
translation: 据说他来自一个骁勇善战的部落，正是由于当时拉尼厄斯一夫当关，凯撒花了很长时间才将其征服。

original: But once Caesar broke him, he was born again. He'll go anywhere and do anything to win. Legion says he can smell weakness.
translation: 但自从他被凯撒打败以后，就像变了个人似的。为了取胜，他可以不择手段。军团的人说，他能嗅出敌人的弱点。

original: Once he finds out where an army's vulnerable, he'll go to it like a dog for the throat.
translation: 一旦他发现了一支部队的软肋，就会像疯狗一样扑向敌人的喉咙。

original: Is Moore in charge of all the NCR troopers out here?
translation: 这儿的所有NCR突击兵都归莫尔管吗？

original: No, and thanks to General Oliver for that. Colonel Hsu is at McCarran. Most of the New Vegas troopers are under his command.
translation: 不，这得感谢奥利弗将军。在麦卡伦营地还有一位许上校。大部分新维加斯的部队都归他指挥。

original: He's more sympathetic to the locals than Moore. Now that the Fiends aren't giving him grief, we should see more troopers assigned to the front lines.
translation: 对当地人来说，他比莫尔更好打交道。既然恶魔帮已经玩完了，那应该会有更多的士兵被部署到前线来。

original: Good work on that, by the way. Hope you got good bounties out of it.
translation: 顺便说一句，你干得不错。希望他们能好好犒赏你。

original: Colonel Moore's "way"?
translation: 莫尔上校的"做派"？

original: The colonel is an effective commander - one of the best - but she sharpened her claws on the Vipers and the old Jackals.
translation: 上校是一名优秀的指挥官，也是位难得的将才，可她习惯对付的都是毒蛇帮和豺狗帮之类的掠夺者。

original: Did four tours against the Brotherhood, too. She used to be a ranger until an injury took her out of action. Happens to a lot of us, unfortunately.
translation: 她也曾四次在对抗兄弟会的部队中服役。当过游骑兵，却因负伤而被迫退役。很可惜，我们中不少人都是这样。

original: She's better at making graves than making friends. Bring in Moore and the earth will be razed. Fields will be salted.
translation: 她取人性命的本事要比和人谈判厉害得多。要是把莫尔招来，那这里准会寸草不生，生灵涂炭。

original: Tell me about General Oliver.
translation: 和我说说奥利弗将军吧。

original: Oh, well... now, you'll have to excuse me. The general and I don't always see eye to eye on things.
translation: 哦，好吧……恕我冒昧，将军和我时常意见相左。

original: Maybe it's best that I just say he's a trooper, through and through. The man will not give up an inch for anything, least of all to the Legion.
translation: 这么说吧，他是个军人，彻头彻尾的军人。无论任何事情，他都寸步不让，更别说是军团了。

original: Doesn't matter. Your time's up, Hanlon.
translation: 无所谓。你的大限到了，汉隆。

original: Well, you got that right.
translation: 好吧，这你倒说对了。

original: You've convinced me. Your secret is safe.
translation: 你说服了我，我不会泄露你的秘密的。

original: I don't know if you're working for Caesar or if desperation's made me a heck of a lot more persuasive. Either way, this is the right thing to do.
translation: 我不知道究竟是因为你在为凯撒卖命，还是因为走投无路的人说话更有分量。总之，你这么做是对的。

original: Now, I trust we're done discussing this. I'm going to step through that door and pretend like we never had this talk.
translation: 那么，我想咱们应该是商量完了。我打算从那道门出去，咱们就当这场谈话从未发生过吧。

original: Caesar is sick. Like... really sick. He could drop any day.
translation: 凯撒病了…病得很重。他随时都可能死掉。

original: Caesar's sick. He won't live long. The Legion will fall apart a few years after he's gone.
translation: 凯撒病了。他活不了多久。只要他一死，军团用不了几年就会分崩离析。

original: Caesar's dead. The Legion can't hold itself together for five years, much less ten.
translation: 凯撒已经死了。军团在五年内就将分崩离析，不用十年。

original: It's a gamble either way. Even with Caesar gone, we still might not outlast the Legion. I suppose that's a risk I'll have to take.
translation: 怎么说这都是场赌博。就算凯撒死了，也不见得我们就能比军团撑得更久。不过现在看来我们必须冒这个险了。

original: For our sake, I hope you're right. I guess that I should thank you for bringing me to my senses. So... thanks.
translation: 看在大伙的份上，我希望你是对的。也许我得感谢你让我重新恢复了理智……谢谢。

original: Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm going to walk out that door and pretend we never had this talk.
translation: 现在，如果你不介意的话，我打算出去转转，咱们就当这场谈话从未发生过吧。

original: What will you do if I don't turn you in?
translation: 如果我不告发你，你会干什么？

original: Oliver can't stand that rangers got credit for victory at Hoover. Whatever I recommend, he does the opposite. I said I wanted us on the ridge.
translation: 奥利弗无法忍受游骑兵抢走了他们在水坝一战中的功劳。所以每次我建议他往东，他就偏要往西。我建议他们驻守在山脊上。

original: He put them right on the western part of the dam itself. We don't have enough firepower to hold that spot.
translation: 可他却非要将军队部署到水坝的西面。我们在那个位置没有足够的火力进行防守。

original: If the troopers fall back, and they will, the rangers will advance to cover Oliver's retreat. We lose the dam, Oliver and the senate are ruined.
translation: 如果部队撤退——他们准要这么做——那游骑兵就得去掩护奥利弗撤退。那样水坝就得失守，奥利弗和参议院就完了。

original: Aren't you fighting for the people of New Vegas?
translation: 你们难道不是在为了新维加斯的人们而战吗？

original: We're fighting on their behalf, but Mr. House and the Families are stringing us up, inch by inch.
translation: 我们是在为他们而战，但豪斯先生和那些家族正在一步步地把我们逼上绝路。

original: They'll drain us dry while we fight and die over this dam. We offered them sanctuary in NCR territory before, but they won't listen.
translation: 我们为了这座水坝流血牺牲，他们却想把我们一点点耗光。我们原本在NCR的领地内为他们提供了安置点，可他们就是不去。

original: Troopers and rangers have been dying here for more than five years while the Families sit pretty behind that... damned wall.
translation: 突击兵和游骑兵在这里拼了五年多的命，而这帮家族就那么悠闲地躲在…那该死的高墙后面。

original: Do you ever stop talking?
translation: 你能闭上嘴吗？

original: I didn't realize you were in such a hurry.
translation: 没想到你这么着急。

original: I get so used to sitting in this chair and listening to radio reports, sometimes I forget people are getting ready for war out there.
translation: 我已经习惯坐在这把椅子里听广播，有时连下面的人在准备打仗的事都忘得一干二净。

original: How is NCR doing?
translation: NCR现在情况如何？

original: It's no secret we've had better campaigns. Holding this whole length of river isn't easy.
translation: 这场仗已经打得有些力不从心了，这并不是秘密。守住一整条河并不容易。

original: We're stretched thin and the Long 15 just keeps getting longer. Slow to get supplies. Slower to get reinforcements.
translation: 我们分兵太多，战线拉得太广，感觉15号公路每天都在变长。补给缓慢。增援更慢。

original: NCR's senate has got funds tied up at the Boneyard and President Kimball ordered our most experienced rangers to chase ghosts down at Baja.
translation: NCR参议院将拨款全扣在了埋骨地，而金博尔总统却把我们最有经验的游骑兵调去下加州半岛守空城。

original: < Speech 30 >
[SUCCEEDED] All right. Pickings were getting slim around here anyway.
translation: [成功] 好吧，反正这周围也没多少油水了。

original: Eddie's just going to keep chasing you. Quit while you're ahead... and alive.
translation: 埃迪不会放过你的，趁你还活着……见好就收吧。

original: < Cock your head and grin. >
translation: <歪着头笑。>

original: Run!
translation: 跑！

original: <Keep holdout weapons> Sure, here you go.
translation: <留下藏匿的武器> 当然，给你。

original: Let's finish this, then.
translation: 那咱们就做个了断罢。

original: Avenge Caesar!
translation: 为凯撒复仇！

original: < Medicine 50 >
[FAILED] It's obvious you know as little about medicine as I do. Spare me your excuses.
translation: [失败] 很明显你和我一样对医学一窍不通。别找借口了。

original: There was, uh, internal bleeding and lesions and other problems.
translation: 呃，他有内出血和器官衰竭等其他问题。

original: < Speech 50 >
[FAILED] Save your excuses.
translation: [失败] 少给我编借口。

original: Hey, it totally wasn't my fault that he died. He was old.
translation: 嘿，他死了可不是我的错。他毕竟年纪大了。

original: What? You think this is my fault?
translation: 什么？你觉得这是我的错？

original: His head exploded, idiot. Of course it's your fault. Avenge Caesar!
translation: 他的头都炸开了，白痴。当然是你的错。为凯撒复仇！

original: What do you know about Legate Lanius?
translation: 关于特使拉尼厄斯你知道些什么？

original: The Legate is not a man to be crossed, especially if you're a woman. That's all I'll talk about it.
translation: 副帅可千万不能招惹，如果你还是个女人的话就更不能了。我只能说这么多。

original: I did all I could to save him.
translation: 我已经尽力了。

original: Yet you failed, and you must pay.
translation: 但你失败了，你必须付出代价。

original: <Lie> I did all I could to save him.
translation: <撒谎> 我已经尽力了。

original: Yet you failed, and you must pay.
translation: 但你失败了，你必须付出代价。

original: Friend or not, no one is allowed in here. Move along!
translation: 不管你是不是朋友，都不许你进去。快走！

original: It's okay I'm a friend.
translation: 别紧张，我是你们的朋友。

original: All right, but make it quick.
translation: 好吧，动作快点。

original: <Lie> I've been ordered to get something for Colonel Moore, let me in.
translation: <撒谎] 我是受命前来为莫尔上校拿些东西的，让我进去。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Damn it all to hell! Let's go!
translation: 见鬼！我们走！

original: <Lie> Colonel Moore is in trouble! She needs help now!
translation: <撒谎> 莫尔上校有麻烦了！她现在需要帮助！

original: [FAILED] Our instructions were pretty clear. Now you better get your ass out of here.
translation: 我们已经说的非常明白了。你最好赶紧离开。

original: Don't you have anything better to do right now than guard this door?
translation: 难道你除了守着这扇门之外没更重要的事做了吗？

original: Tell me about the Burned Man.
translation: 跟我说说浴火者的事。

original: The Burned Man was Caesar's advisor and general when the Legion was originally formed. The Burned Man led us to a disastrous defeat at the Dam.
translation: 浴火者是凯撒在军团建立之初任命的顾问和将军。正是他导致了我们在胡佛水坝的惨败。

original: On Caesar's orders, the Burned Man was covered in pitch by the Praetorian Guard, lit on fire, and cast into the Grand Canyon.
translation: 之后，依照凯撒的旨意，浴火者被禁卫军浑身浇满沥青，点燃后扔进了大峡谷。

original: Caesar has forbidden us from ever speaking his true name again, and so we simply refer to him as the Burned Man.
translation: 凯撒严禁我们再提他的本名，因此我们只好称他为浴火者。

original: Tell me about the Legate.
translation: 和我说说特使吧。

original: He's the best the Legion has to offer, or so the Legionaries say. Brute of a man, wears a fancy metal mask into battle.
translation: 他是全军团最厉害的勇士，大家都这么说。人中猛兽，每次打仗，都戴着一副华丽的铁面具冲锋陷阵。

original: He killed one of my pack Brahmin simply because it was in his way. I knew better than to complain about it, though.
translation: 有一次，我的驮货双头牛因为挡了他的道，就直接被他给宰了。我毕竟知道好歹，也只能忍气吞声。

original: It took some doing, but I convinced the White Glove Society to support Caesar's Legion.
translation: 虽然费了些功夫，不过我已经说服了白手套社团支持凯撒军团。

original: You did? That's... well, that's an unusual approach!
translation: 你说服了他们？还真是……不按常理出牌啊！

original: But I know it makes sense somehow if you're the one doing it! The problem is me!
translation: 不过既然你这么做，那就肯定有它的道理！看来问题出在我！

original: The White Glove Society needed a little help getting back to basics, that's all.
translation: 白手套社团需要设立一下底线，我已经帮他们搞定了。就这样。

original: That's great news! I wish I could visit their casino! They have a refined sense of taste!
translation: 真是个好消息！看来有时间得拜访一下他们的赌场！他们的品味很独特！

original: I spoke to Marjorie and Mortimer. I say leave the White Glove Society alone.
translation: 我已经和玛乔里以及莫蒂默谈过了。白手套社团就不用再管了。

original: Say no more, say no more... if you say they're good, they're good!
translation: 不用说了，不用说了……只要你说好，那就是好！

original: I helped the Omertas perfect their plan to slaughter everyone on the Strip.
translation: 我帮助黑手党完善了他们的计划，长街上的人都要遭殃了。

original: You'd think it'd be bad for the Strip but... I guess it must be good!
translation: 这么做似乎对长街会不大好……不过，我想计划肯定棒极了！

original: Yeah - take the Strip down a notch or two, right? That'll show it! Okay!
translation: 是啊，让长街变得萧条一点，对吗？来看看结果如何吧！没问题！

original: What do you know about the White Glove Society?
translation: 你对白手套社团有多少了解？

original: Don't hurry on my account! I'm the one with the flexible schedule.
translation: 不用着急！我们的时间表还是很灵活的。

original: I'll let you know when I'm done evaluating the White Glove Society.
translation: 等我去和白手套社团打完交道再来找你。

original: Tell me what you know about the Great Khans.
translation: 跟我讲讲大汗帮吧。

original: They were one of the tribes the Three Families pushed out of Vegas! A whole bunch got killed!
translation: 他们就是在三大家族占领维加斯时被赶出去的！那时候死了好多人！

original: So they settled at Bitter Springs, but they kept being so obnoxious, the NCR had to kill a whole bunch more of them!
translation: 后来，他们在苦泉定居了下来，可这些家伙仍时刻想着复仇，逼得NCR最后只能痛下杀手！

original: So then they settled at Red Rock Canyon! There's just no getting rid of them!
translation: 后来他们就迁徙到了红岩峡谷！这些人就是死不绝！

original: How have the Khans been kicked around?
translation: 大汗帮是怎么四海漂泊的？

original: Let's talk about the tribes I should "get to know."
translation: 让我们谈谈那些势力吧。

original: Please go on!
translation: 请继续！

original: That's one down, four to go.
translation: 你已经确定了一个，还有四个。

original: That's two down, three to go.
translation: 有两个了，还剩下三个。

original: That's three down, two to go.
translation: 有三个了，还剩下两个。

original: That's four down, just one to go.
translation: 有四个了，就剩最后一个。

original: Anything else I can help with?
translation: 还有什么我能帮忙的吗？

original: Which tribes should I "get to know"?
translation: 我应该"去了解"哪一支势力呢？

original: There's a bunch! Some of them you've already met - like the Chairmen, for instance!
translation: 那可多了去了！不过有些你应该已经认识了，比如说董事会！

original: I think you should visit the other families on the Strip, the Omertas and the White Glove Society, so you know what makes them tick!
translation: 我觉得你还应该去和长街上的其他一些势力打打交道，包括黑手党，还有白手套社团！这样你才能知道他们是干什么的！

original: And there are some important groups farther from the Strip, too, like the Boomers, the Great Khans, and the Brotherhood of Steel!
translation: 另外，长街以外的地区也有几支力量不容小视，比如大炮族，大汗帮，以及钢铁兄弟会！

original: What evidence do you have that Mr. House will make a move?
translation: 你有什么证据表明豪斯先生会有所行动？

original: We've had reported sightings of Mr. House's Securitrons spying on both NCR and Legion forces.
translation: 我们收到目击报告说豪斯先生的电子保安正在同时刺探NCR和军团的情报。

original: Also, given a recent analysis of the sightings, we now estimate that Mr. House has at least four times as many Securitrons as previously assumed.
translation: 另外，根据最新的分析，我们断定豪斯先生现有的电子保安数量至少是此前估计的四倍。

original: He wouldn't show his hand like that if he weren't prepared to move. And neither the NCR or Legion can spare the troops to investigate.
translation: 如果他不准备行动的话，是不会这样亮出肌肉的。而且不管是NCR还是军团都匀不出人手去做详细的调查。

original: Which is why I'm sending you. Any other questions?
translation: 这就是我打算派你去的原因。还有其他问题吗？

original: Sounds like you miss it.
translation: 听起来你很怀念那段时光。

original: I do, sometimes. There are days I'd give anything to be out in the open air, planting explosives and laying down covering fire.
translation: 是的，有时候是很怀念。那段日子，我成天都巴不得到外面去，忙着埋炸药，给战友掩护射击。

original: But here I am, stuck in the same stale office day after day, while other people get to do the actual fighting.
translation: 现在呢，别人在战场上真刀真枪搏杀的时候，我却只能日复一日地呆坐在陈腐的办公室里。

original: But enough reminiscing. Do you have other questions?
translation: 不过怀旧到此为止。你还有其他问题吗？

original: What can you tell me about Hoover Dam?
translation: 能跟我说说胡佛大坝的事吗？

original: It's a position of some strategic importance to the NCR, providing power and water as it does.
translation: 它对NCR来说有巨大的战略价值。胡佛大坝向西输送的电力足够点亮所有的城市和定居点。

original: It's moderately defensible, with a single point of entry on the east side. To get to the power plants below, the enemy has to cross the entire top.
translation: 它只在东侧有一个入口，非常适合防守。想到达下面的电机房，敌人们必须穿过大坝顶层。

original: The Legion's tried to cross the water on a few occasions, but slow-moving boats make easy targets for sharpshooters.
translation: 军团曾经试图从水面发动进攻，但缓慢移动的船只全都成了狙击手们的活靶子。

original: Yeah, let's play again.
translation: 好啊，再来。

original: Okay, hope you're ready to lose.
translation: 准备好迎接失败了么？

original: Dammit, I thought I had you there. Let's play again.
translation: 该死，我还以为我赢定了。再来！

original: Want to play a hand of Caravan?
translation: 来一把商队牌？

original: A fellow enthusiast, huh? That's great! Let's play.
translation: 你也爱玩牌？太好了，来吧！

original: Sure. Old No-bark is always looking to play. Not for entertainment, mind you, but because if you look at the cards right you can know the future.
translation: 没问题。老疯嘴可是很喜欢商队牌的。要知道，这可不是单纯的消遣，只要你能看出这些牌的门道，你就能预知未来。

original: What happened to the Legion?
translation: 军团出了什么事？

original: With their leader dead, the rest of their army retreated to the east. We've sent scouts to track them, but that's it.
translation: 他们的头领死了，残兵退回了东部。我们已经派出斥候去追踪他们，但也仅此而已。

original: We don't have the forces or supplies necessary to chase them down. More's the pity.
translation: 我们没有足够的军队和补给去歼灭残敌。真是太遗憾了。

original: Still, I've sent a few skilled men out to make sure their journey is "eventful". It should be a long time before they even think of returning.
translation: 不过我还是派了几个能干的人，去给他们的归途增添一些"小插曲"。等他们下次再想来这里，应该是很久以后的事了。

original: Do you have any work for me?
translation: 你有什么工作需要我做吗？

original: I'm afraid I'm going to have to disappoint you. There's much to be done, but nothing for someone with your skills.
translation: 恐怕我要让你失望了。是有很多工作需要做，但都不值得你亲自出马。

original: You should take some time off. You've earned it.
translation: 你应该去休个假。这是你应得的。

original: How have things been since the battle?
translation: 战斗结束以来的情况如何？

original: Surprisingly good. Our forces have managed to secure the region with little resistance, and trade should soon reach an all-time high.
translation: 出奇的好。我们的军队没遇到什么抵抗就占领了这个地区，贸易总额应该很快就会创新高。

original: The brass was particularly surprised by the lack of domestic threats in the area. They were prepared to spend months pacifying known troublemakers.
translation: 长官们反而对这个地区的安全状况感到很惊讶。他们原本还打算花几个月的时间来清理那些刺头。

original: When they found those threats absent, they turned to the man in charge of the area, but Hsu being Hsu, he denied having anything to do with it.
translation: 后来他们发现找不到威胁，就去找了这个地区的负责人问话，但许上校就是许上校，他死活都不承认和这事有关联。

original: So now the men have to answer to Brigadier General Moore, and both they and I have you to thank for it.
translation: 所以现在，我的士兵都得称呼我为莫尔准将了，而我们所有人都要感谢你。

original: We made a good team. I hope we can work together again in the future.
translation: 我们合作得很愉快。我希望将来还能继续合作。

original: The Chip was supposed to activate an army of Securitrons at the Fort, but I blew it up.
translation: 那筹码本来是用来启动城堡里的一支机器人部队的，不过我已经把它炸掉了。

original: You... blew it up? That's just funny, because that... army... seems like the secret weapon that was the whole point of... you know?
translation: 你……炸了它？真有趣，因为那支……部队……似乎才是这整个计划最关键的秘密武器……你知道吗？

original: I really admire how you stack the odds against yourself! Yeah, make things challenging!
translation: 你还真是会给自己出难题啊！对，这下可就更有挑战性了！

original: It's great. Really. Yeah. So, anyway...
translation: 棒极了，真的。没错，那么……

original: The Platinum Chip upgrades the Securitrons - and there's a whole army of them under the Fort.
translation: 白金筹码升级了所有的电子保安——而要塞下面藏着的机器人数量堪比一支大军。

original: Really? An army of Securitrons - upgraded, no less? What a development!
translation: 真的？一整支电子保安大军——还都是升了级的？真是了不起的进展！

original: An army like that should be enough to defend Vegas from - I'm gonna say anybody!
translation: 我敢说，这样的军队足以击退所有胆敢入侵维加斯的敌人了！

original: I don't have the Platinum Chip. Maybe it's on Benny's corpse.
translation: 我手头没有白金筹码，也许在本尼的尸体上。

original: Hmm. You should probably check on that, huh?
translation: 噢。那你干嘛不再去找找呢？

original: I hope that didn't sound condscending. I didn't mean to be!
translation: 希望我的口气不会吓着你。我没别的意思！

original: You sure you don't know anything?
translation: 你确定你什么都不知道？

original: I gotta go.
translation: 是的。我得走了。

original: Any chance you could help me get into Saint James' room?
translation: 你有办法能帮我进入圣詹姆斯的房间吗？

original: I do have his spare key, but I'm not sure if he'd like it if I let you in there. Saint James can be a little crazy sometimes.
translation: 我倒是有他的备用钥匙，但他如果知道是我放你进去的，肯定会不高兴的。圣詹姆斯发起疯来也挺可怕的。

original: Part of my plan involves automated security for the region.
translation: 我计划的其中一环，就是将本地的防卫力量全部机械化。

original: That is somewhat reassuring, but we still don't have the resources to care for the entire Mojave by ourselves.
translation: 这倒是有助于维护治安，但我们手头的资源依然无法顾及整个莫哈维地区。

original: We already experience regular supply shortages. Opening our door to the entire region... I don't see how this could ever work.
translation: 我们经常遭遇物资短缺的问题。如果向整个地区都敞开大门……我不知道这该如何办到。

original: I think the Followers should support an Independent Vegas through the coming battle at the dam.
translation: 我认为天启追随者应该在接下来的大坝决战中支持维加斯独立。

original: I'm sure you have your reasons, but we are much too busy to waste our time on those selfish bastards.
translation: 我知道你有自己的理由，可我们很忙，没空在那些自私的混蛋身上浪费时间。

original: Even if we wanted to, we don't have the resources to handle such a monumental task right now.
translation: 即便我们想帮，也没有足够的资源来完成如此艰巨的任务。

original: Unless you can handle our supply shortages, the best we can do is scrape by here in Freeside.
translation: 除非你能解决我们的物资短缺问题，否则我们最多也只能在自由城这里摇旗呐喊。

original: I think the Followers should support NCR in the coming battle at the dam.
translation: 我认为天启追随者应该在接下来的大坝决战中支持NCR。

original: I'm sure you have your reasons, but we are much too busy to waste our time on those selfish bastards.
translation: 我知道你有自己的理由，可我们很忙，没空在那些自私的混蛋身上浪费时间。

original: Even if we wanted to, we don't have the resources to handle such a monumental task right now.
translation: 即便我们想帮，也没有足够的资源来完成如此艰巨的任务。

original: Unless you can handle our supply shortages, the best we can do is scrape by here in Freeside.
translation: 除非你能解决我们的物资短缺问题，否则我们最多也只能在自由城这里摇旗呐喊。

original: Why should we support the NCR? Their continual operational incompetence gets their soldiers killed, and they hold a monopoly on water in the Mojave.
translation: 我们为什么要支持NCR？他们指挥不力，总是让自己的士兵白白送命，还垄断了莫哈维的水资源。

original: Sure, let me take a look at those magazines.
translation: 当然，让我看下那些杂志吧。

original: What does it mean to join the Followers of the Apocalypse?
translation: 天启追随者的理念是什么？

original: Our aim is to gradually shape a better, brighter future for the wasteland.
translation: 我们的目标是为废土打造一个美好光明的未来。

original: We seek to heal the planet through efforts not unlike the medicine and education we offer here in the Old Mormon Fort.
translation: 我们希望通过医疗和教育来逐步改善生活环境，就像我们在旧摩门要塞做的一样。

original: All we ask is members and those seeking aid do their best to help those in need when the opportunity arises.
translation: 我们唯一的要求，就是希望我们的成员和那些寻求帮助的人，能够在他人有难时伸出援手。

original: Yes! I'll join.
translation: 好啊！我加入。

original: Excellent! The Followers' mission will be better served with someone like yourself traveling around the Mojave.
translation: 好极了！有你这样时常在莫哈维沙漠旅行的人帮忙，天启追随者必将如虎添翼。

original: As a representative of the Followers, I present you with your very own Lab Coat. Wear it well, and may it aid our cause.
translation: 我谨代表天启追随者向你赠送一件专属的实验室外套。希望你能好好珍惜，并为我们的事业做出积极的贡献。

original: Also, before I forget, here's a key to a safehouse you can use to rest if you happen to be in the area. I'll just mark it on your map.
translation: 还有，差点忘了，这把钥匙可以打开我们的一间安全屋，如果你恰巧经过那附近，可以到里头休息。我会在地图上标记出它的地点。

original: 50 caps or I walk.
translation: 50个瓶盖，否则免谈。

original: I'll give you whatever you want, just hurry!
translation: 你要什么都行，快啊！

original: Rangers, this is the chief. I know I can ramble on sometimes, but I need you to listen close for the next minute or so. I've got some bad news.
translation: 游骑兵们，我是军士长。我知道有时候我有点唠叨，但接下来的几分钟，请你们竖起耳朵听好。我有一个坏消息要宣布。

original: I messed up. Made a mistake. I thought I could help us get out of here, but... it didn't work out.
translation: 我错了。我犯了一个重大的错误。我原以为能帮助大家离开这里，但是…我失败了。

original: Rangers get injured all the time. It's part of the job. But if you lose a few fingers, get a bad break, that's it. You step down.
translation: 只要当游骑兵就会受伤。大家干这行的，也自有分寸。可你要是断了指头，或者身体的哪一截成了麻花，那就该解甲归田了。

original: We rely on each other too much to let our infirmities become a liability. A ranger knows when it's time. Only I didn't.
translation: 我们同生共死，谁都不想因为伤病而变成他人的累赘。游骑兵应该懂得见好就收的道理，可我却忘了。

original: Somewhere along the way, something broke inside me. I couldn't find us a way out of this desert. I wrestled with it, and it took me down a dark road.
translation: 一路走来，我迷失了。我找不到和大家一起走出这片沙漠的方法。我奋力挣扎，却在这条漆黑的道路上越陷越深。

original: I wish I could explain it to you. The old chief's finally at a loss for words.
translation: 我希望能把一切都向你们解释清楚。但这一次，你们的老士官长终究无话可说了。

original: Send me all the Legion you can. I'll be waiting for them.
translation: 把军团的人都送来和我做伴吧。我在地狱里等着他们。

original: <250 caps needed> I can't meet your price right now.
translation: <需要250个瓶盖> 我现在没有这么多。

original: You'd say no to a guy like me? And here I thought you were special...
translation: 你居然拒绝我这样的男人？我还以为你有多特别呢……

original: Oh, don't you dare play that game with me. Fine, here's the key since it's so important to you.
translation: 哦，别和我玩这种游戏。好吧，既然这钥匙对你这么重要，那就给你。别说你是从哪儿拿到的。

original: Is that what you guys do, pretend to be this guy?
translation: 所以你们也在模仿那个人吗？

original: Somethin' like that, yeah. There were some working tapes here when we first got here, so we know what he sounded like.
translation: 对，差不多吧。我们刚来的时候，这里还有些可以使用的磁带，所以我们能听到他的声音。

original: Sadly, they stopped working a few years back, so I sold them to a junk merchant who was passing through, otherwise I'd play some for you.
translation: 可惜，几年前磁带坏了，我把它们卖给了路过的垃圾商人，不然我还可以放给你听听。

original: All the outfits you see my guys wearing around were originally found in here, too. Along with more hair gel than you can shake a stick at.
translation: 我手下穿的制服也都是从这里找到的。同时我们还发现了数不清的发胶。

original: If this was a school, what was taught here?
translation: 如果这以前是个学校，那这里教些什么？

original: As far as we can tell, the guy that built this place was considered the coolest of the cool, and taught other people how to be more like him.
translation: 据我们所知，这地方的建造者是一个酷到没边的家伙，他建这里的主要目的就是教别人如何像他一样酷。

original: People would come all around to learn how to sing, dance, dress, and even speak the way he did.
translation: 人们从四面八方慕名而来，学习如何唱歌，跳舞，穿衣，甚至学他的说话方式。

original: This building is... interesting. What do you know about it?
translation: 这栋房子…很有意思。你知道它的历史吗？

original: Near as I can tell, it was some sort of religious institution.
translation: 据我推断，这里以前应该是一处宗教场所。

original: Oh, I know it says "school" out front, but everything in here seemed to be related to the worship of some guy from back in the day.
translation: 哦，我知道它的外墙上写着"学校"，但种种迹象表明，这个地方过去曾被用来崇拜某个人。

original: People used to come here to learn about him, to dress like him, move like him. To be him. If that's not worship, I don't know what is.
translation: 人们会到这里专门学习他的穿着打扮和行为举止。尽力模仿他。如果这不是崇拜，那我不知道这该叫什么。

original: You said something about a bunker at the Fort?
translation: 你提到过城堡里有一座地下工厂？

original: Right, it's one of two locations on Mr. House's network with non-standard hardware.
translation: 没错，在豪斯的网络中，有两处地方运用了非常规的硬件设备，其中一处就是那里。

original: My guess is it has a reader that can decode the chip, and who knows what else? Maybe a giant robot or something!
translation: 我猜那个设备应该就是能够读取筹码数据的东西，不过谁知道它是什么呢？搞不好是台大型机器人呢！

original: There's a bounty out on Powder Gangers?
translation: 居然有人在悬赏炸药帮的人吗？

original: No, but there ought to be. I'm just taking the initiative, is all.
translation: 不，但我觉得真该下个悬赏令。我只是带头提出个倡议，就这样。

original: Is there anything else I should do before the battle?
translation: 战斗开始之前我还有什么必须做的吗？

original: Well, some of Mr. House's projections predict a "moderate probability of civil instability subsequent to the NCR being driven from the Vegas region."
translation: 其实，豪斯先生的估测中还有一项，就是认为"NCR有较大的可能因民众矛盾激化而被赶出维加斯。"

original: One of the "mitigating contingencies" he planned was to enlist the Followers to provide increased medical aid throughout the region.
translation: 他提出的"调解方案"之一，就是让天启追随者为整个地区提供更多的医疗服务。

original: Just seems like it might help keep things stable when we go independent. Not that I know what I'm talking about!
translation: 我觉得这个方案也可以帮助我们在独立后维护稳定。不过我也不是很清楚！

original: There is victory in wisdom, Legate.
translation: 有一种胜利叫睿智，特使。

original: Know that I shall return East. I shall not remain there forever. On that day, the strength of the Bear shall be tested.
translation: 我会回东部去的，但我绝不会一辈子龟缩在那儿。总有一天，我会与巨熊来场真正的较量。

original: If the West is one day filled with ones such as you, perhaps it shall be a worthy fight, indeed.
translation: 如果有一天，西部都是你这样的人。那么，也许我们才真正值得一战。

original: I suspect the Bear will surprise you in ways... in ways I can't even describe.
translation: 我敢打赌那头巨熊会给你们一个惊喜的……虽然我也不知会怎样。

original: I have faith. Trade helped us survive the Great War, it will do so again.
translation: 我有信心。是贸易让我们在核战后的世界得以幸存，这次，它也能拯救我们。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hnh. Then when I return, woman of the West... we shall see if your belief will withstand the blades of the Legion.
translation: [成功] 哼。那等我回来时，西部的女人……看看你的信念是否能帮你挡住军团的利刃吧。

original: Where you see death, I see change - and I see it as a strength.
translation: 你只看到了死亡，而我却看到了改变——我认为这才是真正的力量。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hnh. My coming would have saved you, set your people free in ways they cannot see.
translation: [成功] 哼。只有我的到来才能拯救你们，让你们的人民获得自由。这种自由他们是察觉不到的。

original: War would have tested them. Broken the weak with its violence, yet allowing the strong to arise.
translation: 战争将考验他们，武力可以淘汰所有的弱者，唯有真正的强者才能留下。

original: Violence gave you that strength, awakened you - I can see it upon your face, where two bullets left their mark.
translation: 是武力赋予了你力量，令你觉醒——你脸上的那两条弹痕恰好印证了这一点。

original: You know you can't supply all the West any more than the Republic can.
translation: 你心里清楚，你们不可能比共和国更有能力去补给整条西部战线。

original: Look, you haven't thought the economics of this through, all right?
translation: 听着，难道你就没搞清楚这其中的利弊吗？

original: [FAILED] Enough.
translation: [失败] 够了。

original: So you, uh, think military strength is enough, even without supplies?
translation: 所以说你，呃，觉得军队的战斗力已经足够了，连补给都不需要？

original: [FAILED] Your reliance on comfort... it rots you from the inside. You are in need of the teachings the Legion will bring to your people.
translation: [失败] 你们就是喜欢坐享其成……这迟早是要栽跟头的。你们需要军团给你们的人民好好上一课。

original: [Karma] Why don't you fight me yourself if you've got the spine for it, shithead.
translation: [业力] 既然你那么有本事，干嘛不来和我单挑呢，臭屎壳子？

original: [SUCCEEDED] The West's treatment of bitches such as you is their weakness. But... by my honor, I shall face you alone, as you request.
translation: [成功] 西部居然能让你这种荡妇如此逍遥，实在是教化不严。不过……为了我的荣誉，我会尊重你的请求，与你单独决斗。

original: Woman of the West... you will learn your place - in my tent, and again, when you beg for release on the edge of my blade.
translation: 你们这些西部娘们……等我把你拖回营帐，让你俯在刀尖上向我求饶时，我会好好让你明白自己的地位的。

original: <Bluff> If you're such a "Terror" of the East, call off your dogs and face me one on one.
translation: <恐吓> 要是你在东部真有那么所向披靡，那就叫你的手下让开，我们单挑。

original: [SUCCEEDED] The West's treatment of bitches such as you is their weakness. But... by my honor, I shall face you alone, as you request.
translation: [成功] 西部居然能让你这种荡妇如此逍遥，实在是教化不严。不过……为了我的荣誉，我会尊重你的请求，与你单独决斗。

original: Woman of the West... you will learn your place - in my tent, and again, when you beg for release on the edge of my blade.
translation: 你们这些西部娘们……等我把你拖回营帐，让你俯在刀尖上向我求饶时，我会好好让你明白自己的地位的。

original: I will await that day, Legate Lanius.
translation: 我等着那一天，拉尼厄斯特使。

original: Perhaps it is unfortunate Vulpes was not here to hear your words... something tells me you would prove more than his match.
translation: 可惜沃尔普斯不能亲耳听到你说这种话了……我有种感觉，你比他要强得多。

original: <Bluff> That strength... other Legates didn't see it either, until it was too late.
translation: 他们很厉害……其他特使一开始也都胸有成竹，等发现已经来不及了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] We did take the towers easier than expected. I cannot believe even the Republic would overlook such an opening in their defenses.
translation: [成功] 我们确实没花多少力气就夺下了进水塔。我也不明白共和国为什么会在防线上留下这么一大个漏洞。

original: Yet we are at the throat of the Great Bear. Victory is at hand.
translation: 不过我们已经将刀刺入了巨熊的喉咙。胜利在望了。

original: <Bluff> The position of your veterans, using the Dam's intake towers - all as expected.
translation: 你那些精兵的位置，还有你们利用大坝进水塔来进攻的手段——都正如我们的预料。

original: <Bluff> But... history has shown defeat is assured. Uh, yours, that is.
translation: 可是……历史会证明失败是必然的……呃，我是说你们。

original: Maybe you're willing to listen to reason.
translation: 也许咱们可以讲讲道理。

original: I see you fight with words, like all beneath the flag of the Bear. Let us hope your skill with weapons proves greater.
translation: 你和狗熊旗下的那些渣滓没什么两样，都是满嘴的花言巧语。还是看看你在战场上能有多大的能耐吧。

original: Time for you to die, Mr. House.
translation: 你的死期到了，豪斯先生。

original: May there be... a hell... for you... a Tartarus... bleak, unending...
translation: 愿你……下地狱……昏暗、无尽的……冥界……

original: What do you think you're going to do? Fight your way up to the penthouse and assassinate me?
translation: 你想搞什么名堂？一路杀到顶楼来干掉我吗？

original: <Lie> It matters - what honor is to be had in defeating a potentially superior foe with lies?
translation: <撒谎> 当然重要，胜之不武又有何荣耀可言呢？

original: <Confirmed Bachelor>
translation: <确认独身>

original: I never put much thought into the well-being my clients got out of my services. I suppose they only get as much as I put into it.
translation: 我倒没想过自己的服务能给客人带来什么变化。我以为他们只能得到生理上的满足。

original: Tell Garret I'd be happy to start at the Wrangler immediately. This should be a nice change of pace from retirement.
translation: 告诉加勒特，我愿意尽快去酒吧上班。这份工作可以好好调整一下我退休以来的生活节奏。

original: Ben, you give your clients a precious respite from the ills of the world.
translation: 本, 你可以让你的客人暂时忘却现实的残酷。

original: <Black Widow>
translation: <黑寡妇>

original: I never put much thought into the well-being my clients got out of my services. I suppose they only get as much as I put into it.
translation: 我倒没想过自己的服务能给客人带来什么变化。我以为他们只能得到生理上的满足。

original: Tell Garret I'd be happy to start at the Wrangler immediately. This should be a nice change of pace from retirement.
translation: 告诉加勒特，我愿意尽快去酒吧上班。这份工作可以好好调整一下我退休以来的生活节奏。

original: Ben, you give your clients a precious respite from the ills of the world.
translation: 本，你可以让你的客人暂时忘却现实的残酷。

original: <Speech>
translation: <口才>

original: [SUCCEEDED] You know what? You're right. I looked at the whole thing from the wrong angle.
translation: [成功] 我感觉你说的对。我之前看待这事的态度确实有问题。

original: I suppose I could be a loving muse to some, while simply relieve stress and tension in others. Thanks for that insight.
translation: 我可以扮演他们理想中的伴侣，同时帮助其他人排解紧张与压力。谢谢你的见解。

original: Tell Garret I'd be happy to start at the Wrangler immediately. This should be a nice change of pace from retirement.
translation: 告诉加勒特，我愿意尽快去酒吧上班。这份工作可以好好调整一下我退休以来的生活节奏。

original: You're a beacon of light in some people's depressing existence! Your work is art!
translation: 你就是某些人生命中的希望之光！你的工作就是艺术！

original: Old Ben has the experience and skill you need.
translation: 老本的经验和技术能满足你的要求。

original: I've heard some stories of that old guy. I'm amazed he's still alive with how much he's been through.
translation: 我听说过那个老家伙的事迹。真没想到他经历了那么多事居然还能活着。

original: If the stories are true, he'll be a valuable commodity here at the Wrangler. I appreciate the find.
translation: 如果那些传说是真的话，那他对原子牛仔可是一笔非常宝贵的财富，能找到他真是太好了。

original: Looks like that gives us a full roster of new ass to sell. Good work - enjoy the bonus.
translation: 看来我们又能推出不少新花样了。干得好，这笔奖金拿去吧。

original: I've heard some stories of that old guy. I'm amazed he's still alive with how much he's been through.
translation: 我听说过那个老家伙的事迹。真没想到他经历了那么多事居然还能活着。

original: If the stories are true, he'll be a valuable commodity here at the Wrangler. I appreciate the find.
translation: 如果那些传说是真的话，那他对原子牛仔可是一笔非常宝贵的财富，能找到他真是太好了。

original: Looks like that gives us a full roster of new ass to sell. Good work - enjoy the bonus.
translation: 看来我们又能推出不少新花样了。干得好，这笔奖金拿去吧。

original: I've heard some stories of that old guy. I'm amazed he's still alive with how much he's been through.
translation: 我听说过那个老家伙的事迹。真没想到他经历了那么多事居然还能活着。

original: If the stories are true, he'll be a valuable commodity here at the Wrangler. I appreciate the find.
translation: 如果那些传说是真的话，那他对原子牛仔可是一笔非常宝贵的财富，能找到他真是太好了。

original: I've heard some stories of that old guy. I'm amazed he's still alive with how much he's been through.
translation: 我听说过那个老家伙的事迹。真没想到他经历了那么多事居然还能活着。

original: If the stories are true, he'll be a valuable commodity here at the Wrangler. I appreciate the find.
translation: 如果那些传说是真的话，那他对原子牛仔可是一笔非常宝贵的财富，能找到他真是太好了。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Gun for hire?
translation: 雇佣兵？

original: When I quit the escort job, I had enough money to buy a pistol belt and some other gear.
translation: 辞去伴游的工作后，我就拿出积蓄，买了武器装备。

original: Bodyguards make a good, honest living, and I had the wits and physical build to handle most thugs.
translation: 当保镖挣钱，心里踏实，我的体型和智商也足以应付绝大多数坏人。

original: After saving a few tourists from trouble, I got a reputation for being a stand-up guy again, and after a decade managed to save up enough to retire.
translation: 在帮助一些游客摆脱麻烦后，我又成了人们眼里的一条好汉。后来十年，我存够了养老钱，就退休了。

original: What happened?
translation: 怎么了？

original: Well, being a suave young guy, I chatted up the ladies from time to time, and one of the manager's girls started to take a liking to me.
translation: 那时候我年轻英俊，经常和姑娘们谈天说地，有个经理的女人看上了我。

original: I never touched the woman, but the jealous prick decided it was my time to go. He framed me by saying I'd stolen from the casino.
translation: 虽然我从没碰过那姑娘，但那小子还是出于嫉妒把我赶走了。他诬陷我，说我偷了赌场的东西。

original: Sure enough, a few grand was missing from the casino vault. I have to assume the bastard stole the funds and figured I was a convenient fall guy.
translation: 结果赌场的金库果真丢失了几千块钱。我想肯定是那混蛋偷了之后栽赃到我头上的。

original: Butcher? How did you get into that?
translation: 屠夫？你怎么会干这个勾当？

original: My father ran a butcher shop here in town, but business went downhill when another vendor started selling this strange meat at half our prices.
translation: 我父亲曾在镇上开过一间屠宰场，可后来有个商人卖起了来路不明的肉，价格只有我们的一半，我们的生意从此一落千丈。

original: How would you like to work for the Garrets?
translation: 有兴趣为加勒特家族工作吗？

original: I'm retired, but life has been a bit dull without some kind of action. What's the job?
translation: 虽然我已经退休了，但人活着不找点事做还真是无聊。什么工作？

original: How do you like the new job?
translation: 新工作还适应吗？

original: It is a dream come true. Santiago never thought he could work in such a wonderous den of vice and iniquity.
translation: 简直就像美梦成真，圣地亚哥从没想到能在这么好的地方工作。

original: Can't do a worse job than the Republic, that's for sure.
translation: 反正肯定不会比共和国做得更糟。

original: Hell. Can't believe we got suckered by a slip of a woman. Should've watched the flank while Caesar's best were making all that noise.
translation: 该死。真不敢相信我们被一个女人摆了一道。在凯撒的精锐吸引我们注意力的时候，我们居然没留心侧翼。

original: How about I ask these robots to fuck you and your entire battalion with a rocket barrage?
translation: 我让这些机器人用密集火箭弹把你和你的人全操翻怎么样？

original: Do you know what you're doing? Making a nation - like you think you're doing, ain't like chowing down on a pile of Fancy Lad Snack Cakes.
translation: 你知道你在做什么吗？你想建立一个国家，这可不像吃俏男孩夹心蛋糕那么简单。

original: Think you got the guts to carve out a frontier? Build towns, protect the roads, run supplies, train troops?
translation: 你有本事划定边界吗？建设城镇，保护道路，运送物资，训练军队，你想过没有 ?

original: We were to normal Super Mutants what they were to humans, and they were told to defer to us in all things.
translation: 我们之于超级变种人，就像他们之于普通人类。而且他们被创造出来就是为了服从于我们。

original: Which is why all Super Mutants should do what you say, right?
translation: 也就是说所有超级变种人都应完全服从于你，对么？

original: My guess is that it has something to do with the fact that every mutant in the State of Utobitha has been give explicit orders regarding security.
translation: 我认为是这样的：乌托比萨境内的变种人都无一例外都肩负着重要任务，这任务无外乎就是保卫这里的安全。

original: I'd like to hear about the Garret Twins.
translation: 我想了解一下加勒特双胞胎。

original: Them twins run the Atomic Wrangler, the only working casino here in Freeside. It's become pretty much the place to go around these parts.
translation: 这对双胞胎经营着原子牛仔酒吧，那是自由城唯一的赌场，也是这附近最值得去的地方。

original: Give it a whirl when you've got some time. Now, was there anyone else you wanted to know about?
translation: 如果你有空，可以去那儿碰碰运气。好了，你还有想打听的人吗 ?

original: What is there to do in Freeside?
translation: 自由城有什么好玩的地方吗？

original: Aside from this place, there's the Atomic Wrangler just up the street. Women, gambling, booze, you name it, they got you covered.
translation: 除了这里以外，街那头还有一间原子牛仔酒吧。女人，赌博，酒，无论你要什么，他们那儿都有。

original: If you're more of a prude, the Followers run a mission out of the Old Mormon Fort up toward the north gate. Great place if you're hurt, I guess.
translation: 如果你放不开的话，北门那里还有个天启追随者开设的旧摩门要塞据点。你要是受伤了，我觉得那儿会是个好去处。

original: If you like things dangerous, just past the Wrangler is the Silver Rush, where the Van Graff family peddles their weapons.
translation: 如果你喜欢刺激，过了牛仔酒吧就是银色冲击，范格拉夫家族在那里出售军火。

original: Their stuff is outrageously priced, but if you want to shoot something hi-tech, that's the best game in town.
translation: 他们的东西特别贵，但你要是喜欢高科技武器的话，去那里是最好的选择。

original: Actually, I've got a better idea. Make the new hire tell her. You'll do that for me, won't you?
translation: 其实，我有个更好的点子。让新来的人去告诉她。干脆就派你好了，怎么样？

original: Hey, I've seen you before around our place. You've really fallen on hard times if you're working for these clowns.
translation: 嘿，我好像以前在帮会门口见过你。你居然沦落到给这帮小丑卖命了啊。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I suppose it's all right, if there's no other choice.
translation: [成功] 那就听你的吧，我也没有别的选择。

original: I'm sure you're a man of your word, sir, but we still need to pat you down. No exceptions.
translation: 我知道您一言九鼎，先生，但是我们必须检查您的物品。没有例外。

original: Certainly, sir. We need to pat you down for weapons first.
translation: 当然了，先生。我们要先解除你的武器。

original: Now hold on here, I'm not packing any heat. Ain't my word good enough for you?
translation: 等等，我确实没带枪啊。难道我的话你还不信么？

original: The reason we need to hold on to it is because it's very technical. Very.
translation: 我们必须守住它，因为它的技术含量很高。非常高。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hmmm. Well... Vegas burns brighter than most cities West of the Divide, and that glitter has its appeal.
translation: [成功] 嗯。好吧……维加斯比大裂谷西部的绝大多数城市都先进，也能满足我们的需要。

original: Not sure that's going to mend fences with folks back West, though. But...
translation: 虽然不知道这样能不能修补我们与西部父老乡亲之间的关系。但是……

original: There are... technologies in Vegas we may be able to provide to NCR. Not all, but some.
translation: 我们在维加斯有一些……技术可以提供给NCR。全给是不可能的，但可以分一点给你们。

original: The reason we need to hold on to it is because it's very technical. Very.
translation: 我们必须守住它，因为它的技术含量很高。非常高。

original: [FAILED] That kind of fence-sitting is exactly what makes me think we can make use of the... improvements here. Without you.
translation: [失败] 好吧，就是因为你们这种模棱两可的态度，我觉得还是干脆抛弃你，直接利用这里的……先进设施算了。

original: Well, I guess we can talk some more, if it'll settle things.
translation: 好吧，既然能解决问题，咱们不妨再多商量一下。

original: [SUCCEEDED] True, guess I'm a little too used to seeing Securitrons in Vegas to think they'd turn and be bad news - and I know how bad they can get.
translation: [成功] 确实，大概我是有点太习惯在维加斯看到电子保安了，没想到它们的出现会变成坏事——我也明白它们的本事。

original: <Bluff> The fact you're talking with me says a lot about your willingness to fight.
translation: <恐吓> 你愿意和我谈判，其实已经说明你内心并不想开战。

original: Look, you've got two choices - leave, or fight.
translation: 听着，你有两个选择——要么离开，要么咱们就开打。

original: I think you're cashed out enough that my chances are pretty good. And like I said, I'm not leaving the Dam now the Legion's been broken.
translation: 我想刚才你的话已经确实证明了我的胜算很大。而且我也说了，军团已经溃不成军，我是不会离开大坝的。

original: <Attack> Actually, nothing of the sort. We've come to exterminate you.
translation: <攻击> 其实，没那回事。我们就是来消灭你的。

original: Figured as much. Come on, you sons of bitches, we're ready.
translation: 不出所料。来吧，小杂种们，我们准备好了。

original: Look, either you're going to leave, or you're going to fight. So decide.
translation: 听着，要么你们自己走人，要么你们就从我的尸体上跨过去。自己选吧。

original: I think you're cashed out enough to know my chances are pretty good. And like I said, I'm not leaving the Dam now the Legion's been broken.
translation: 我想你刚才的话已经确实证明了我的胜算很大。而且我也说了，军团已经溃不成军，我是不会放弃大坝的。

original: Um, well, I'm sure if I ask them they'll be on board.
translation: 呃，好吧，我是说如果叫他们帮忙的话，他们肯定会帮的。

original: [FAILED] I think they blew their load here today with their fireworks... they'll prefer targets closer to home.
translation: [失败] 不，我觉得他们就只会点几根爆竹而已……何况他们更喜欢离家近的目标。

original: Even if you fixed the generators, hacking the code won't be easy.
translation: 就算你修好了发电机，破译密码也不是件简单的事。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Fucking Pre-War RobCo pieces of shit...
translation: [成功] 操他妈的罗伯科战前狗屎科技……

original: Even if you fix it, you couldn't re-program the power grid, the systems are fried.
translation: 就算你修好了，你也不可能重新设定电网，整个系统现在一团糟。

original: You think these robots are all the forces I have?
translation: 你以为我就只有这么点机器人吗？

original: Right now, that's all that's standing there - well, except for the corpses. So that's your plan, hold the Dam here all by your lonesome?
translation: 就目前来说，你的部队全都在大坝上——好吧，除了残骸。所以这就是你的计划？独自一人坚守大坝？

original: Because the Generator's destroyed, the Dam is useless to you.
translation: 因为发电机组已经被毁了，大坝对你来说也没用了。

original: Lot of Pre-War factories and tech lying around the Mojave, our engineers'll get it running again, no matter how much damage you've done down there.
translation: 莫哈维散落着很多战前工厂和科技，不论你造成了多大的伤害，我们的工程师都会让它们再次运转起来的。

original: I'm going to rest for a bit, if you don't mind.
translation: 如果你不介意的话，我想休息一会。

original: Kind of curious how this is going to pan out in the long run... but I guess history'll tell us in its own sweet time.
translation: 我不知道今后会怎样……但我想历史终究会给我们一个答案的。

original: Sometimes I wonder if NCR wouldn't lose the whole West if they weren't sitting on it.
translation: 有时候我会想，要是NCR不把西部攥得那么紧，也就不至于丢掉它了。

original: Look. The NCR isn't everyone here, and it definitely ain't you.
translation: 听着。这儿并非所有人都是NCR，比如你就不是。

original: It's filled with people that take action and don't wait for someone to say what's right and wrong and make sure the proper form's filled out.
translation: 这个国家充斥着不问青红皂白就动手的莽夫，以及不分是非对错只知道按部就班的庸人。

original: When there's an example of that kind of success... that can shake things up enough so the good that came with the intention shines through.
translation: 只有当成功的榜样出现时……情况才有可能好转，怀有理想的仁人志士就能脱颖而出。

original: I couldn't have done it alone, and I appreciate the assist along the way.
translation: 我一个人肯定做不到的，感谢你们一直以来的帮助。

original: Least we could do. And seeing those shits of Caesar kicking dirt as they ran - did my heart good, let me tell you.
translation: 我们做的并不多。而且看见凯撒的走狗屁滚尿流——这么跟你说吧，非常爽。

original: Might see some recruitment number rise, build some morale out in the Mojave long enough for NCR to find its feet again.
translation: 今后会有更多的人应征入伍，莫哈维地区的士气也将大幅提升，NCR终于能恢复元气了。

original: All due to you - again, you have my thanks. And all the West, too, once they pass it over the radio... after signing the right release forms.
translation: 这一切都多亏了你——再次感谢你。等到无线电将这个消息传播出去，整个西部也将感谢你…… 当然，播不播还是得先征得上面同意。

original: It was my duty, General - I was glad to help out.
translation: 这是我的职责，将军——很高兴能做出贡献。

original: And we're glad to have you - and whether you're a soldier of the Republic or not, you're it in my eyes.
translation: 我们也很高兴有你帮忙——不管你是不是共和国的士兵，在我眼里，你都是共和国的卫士。

original: Sometimes the Republic gets lost along the way while it's trying to follow its instincts... but when soldiers like you come along...
translation: 有时候，共和国会失去该有的理智，因此迷失方向……但只要有你这样的战士出现……

original: It helps them get back on track, and does it by example. And what you've done here today, that's going to keep us going for a while.
translation: 借助榜样的力量，它就能重回正轨。你今天所做的一切，将令我们在未来一段时间内受益匪浅。

original: Did you say NCR whores, before?
translation: 你之前提到，NCR妓女？

original: A woman named Emily asked me to bug one of your data terminals.
translation: 一个叫艾米莉的女人请我破解你的数据终端。

original: Yes, I know. It was detected immediately and deactivated... let's see... 39.735 seconds after you planted it.
translation: 是的，我当然知道。我马上就发现，并将它拆除了……大概就在……你放置它的39.735秒之后。

original: You thought I wouldn't notice?
translation: 你以为我注意不到？

original: I should let you know that I planted a surveillance device on one of your data terminals.
translation: 我应该让你知道，我在你的一台数据终端上安置了监控设备。

original: What did I tell you about trying to make off with that gear?
translation: 我有没有跟你说过不要动那件装备的歪脑筋？

original: I could use some help out here!
translation: 我这里需要支援！

original: We're going to have to search you first.
translation: 我们必须先搜你的身。

original: Fine by me.
translation: 我没问题。

original: I'd pay very close attention to what she has to say, as well as any official papers she hands over for your perusal.
translation: 我建议你仔细听清楚她说的每一句话，也请认真阅读她递交给你的每一份文件。

original: The General's "accident" was unfortunate... with Kimball dead, the angry Californian public could've used an alternate scapegoat to pillory...
translation: 发生在将军身上的"事故"实在太不幸了……金博尔已死，愤怒的加州公众肯定会想找个替罪羊的……

original: General Oliver will try to make good on his threats, and he'll find support among citizens outraged by Kimball's assassination...
translation: 奥利弗会想办法挽回名誉，金博尔总统遇刺后，他会借机利用民愤取得多数人的支持……

original: The odds of the Californian public supporting a full-scale re-invasion, however, are slight. My Securitrons could beat them, anyway.
translation: 不过加州公众支持发动大规模二次侵略的可能性还是很低的。反正，我的机器人肯定会打败他们。

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我们说点别的吧。

original: Oh, well, if you change your mind let me know. I have some parts here I can use to upgrade his armor if you leave it with me for a bit.
translation: 噢，要是你改主意了就告诉我。我们这儿有些零件，可以升级它的装甲，只要你让它在我身边待一阵子就行。

original: Is there another way to get Mr. House's data?
translation: 还有别的办法能弄到豪斯先生的数据吗？

original: I already told you, I don't want to talk about it.
translation: 我已经告诉过你了，我不想谈论这些。

original: What do I do?
translation: 我应该做什么？

original: You'll need to locate it on three different terminals in this area in one minute. Any longer and it'll jump, and you'll have to start all over.
translation: 你需要在一分钟内将三台被病毒寄生的主机找出来。时间一久它就会转移，那样就只好重来了。

original: Locating the virus would probably be nearly impossible, but the pompous little bastard that wrote it made things a little easier for us.
translation: 本来寻找病毒几乎是不可能的，不过编写它的那个小混蛋太自以为是，倒帮了我们很大的忙。

original: Normally, terminals infected by the virus just display gibberish, but we found that terminals the virus moved to had some real data passed to them.
translation: 一般而言，受感染的主机都会显示乱码，但我们发现凡是病毒转移后的主机，都会生成一些实际数据。

original: We were able to decrypt the data and discovered that it was just messages from the virus's writer, taunting his victims.
translation: 我们破译了这些数据，发现那是病毒作者留下的，用来嘲讽受害者。

original: When you find terminals with those messages, lock them down and move on. Find three of them before the virus jumps, and we'll wipe the damn thing.
translation: 如果你遇到这样的信息，就立刻把该台终端隔离。只要能在病毒转移前找到三台主机，我们就能消灭这该死的玩意了。

original: What do I need to do?
translation: 我需要做什么？

original: Something wrong?
translation: 出问题了？

original: Yeah, I'm in charge of keeping this data system up and running, but accessing it is a little, ah, touch and go at the moment.
translation: 是啊，我主要负责数据系统的运作，不过目前进入系统似乎遇到了点，呃，麻烦。

original: What's going on around here?
translation: 这儿怎么了？

original: Well, crops aren't doing so well. I'm thinking it might be something in the water.
translation: 嗯，庄稼长势不大好。我在想会不会是供水出了问题。

original: The pump station is pretty run down. You could go take a look around the place, see if you find anything strange going on. What do you say?
translation: 泵站已经完全停转了，你去那儿调查一下，看看究竟出了什么异常。怎么样 ?

original: Come on. Let's get out of here.
translation: 来吧。我们离开这里。

original: Good idea.
translation: 好主意。

original: Okay, you can have ED-E for a little bit.
translation: 好的，您可以带走ED-E。

original: I'm trying to help Torres find a missing laser pistol. Have you seen it around?
translation: 我正在帮托雷斯找他丢掉的激光手枪。你有在看到吗？

original: No, no idea. Sorry.
translation: 不，没有。抱歉。

original: This is Veronica, formerly of the Brotherhood of Steel. She's interested in joining your cause.
translation: 这是维罗尼卡，前钢铁兄弟会成员。她很有兴趣加入你们的事业。

original: The Brotherhood? Well, this is unusual, I must say. But very welcome.
translation: 兄弟会？好吧，不得不说，这有点不寻常呀。不过呢，非常欢迎。

original: There's certainly a lot we could learn from your technological expertise.
translation: 显然，你的技术专长对我们大有裨益。

original: Doctor Schiller usually handles placement, and he won't be back until tomorrow. If you could come back then, we can see about your assignment.
translation: 人事调配一般是席勒医生负责的，他要明天才回来。如果你能到时再来一趟，我们就能给你分配工作了。

original: Arcade asked me to find you. I'm reuniting the Remnants, and they'll need your piloting skills.
translation: 阿卡德让我来找你。我正在召集英克雷旧部，他们需要你的飞行技术。

original: Told you everything about us, did he? Well, it's been a while since I've had my hands on the controls of a vertibird.
translation: 他把我的故事都告诉你了，是吗？哦，我已经很久没有摸过飞鸟的控制杆了。

original: There's a chance I could crash us in the middle of Lake Mead - that place seems to attract aircraft, for some reason.
translation: 没准我会带着大家一头栽进米德湖呢——那地方不知为什么，总有飞机往里掉。

original: But, if I get one more chance to fly, count me in. I'll be there. My part of the pass phrase is "Dear."
translation: 但是，如果能有机会再飞任务，那算我一个。我会去的。我的密码是"亲爱的"。

original: Is there a health inspector bothering you?
translation: 是不是有个卫生稽查员搞得你心烦？

original: Ah, it's nothing. You just looked like the health inspector who stopped through for the yearly inspection a couple of weeks back.
translation: 啊，那倒没有。我只是觉得你和几个礼拜前来这儿做年度考核的卫生稽查员长得挺像。

original: I was hoping I wouldn't have to wait another 11 months to see his crooked ass to get my caps back. Ah well, anything I can get you?
translation: 我真巴不得那个贪赃枉法的混蛋早点现身，好让我能把钱讨回来，不必再等11个月。啊，得了，你想吃什么？

original: You didn't think to tell anyone about this?
translation: 你不想告诉别人这些吗？

original: Yeah, strange as it sounds, I figured that bad mouthing one of the Strip's most powerful people wasn't a good idea.
translation: 是的。尽管听起来有些奇怪，但是对一个长街里最有权势的家伙说三道四，实在不大明智。

original: The only reason why I'm telling you any of this is because he's gone now.
translation: 我现在之所以把告诉你，只是因为他已经不在了。

original: Did Benny say why he had the Securitron?
translation: 本尼说过他是从哪儿弄到这个电子保安的吗？

original: He sure didn't. Benny was pretty tight-lipped and cryptic about the thing, but he did let me poke around in it for a while.
translation: 他当然没说。本尼口风很紧，对这件事也是讳莫如深。不过他还是让我稍微检查了一下那台机器人。

original: I wound up helping Benny a lot more than he helped me. Once he had access to the Securitron's memory banks, he kicked me out of the Tops.
translation: 可惜我帮了本尼的忙，却没得到什么好报。他获取那个机器人的存储器后，就把我踢出了九重天。

original: Big surprise, right? I should have seen that coming.
translation: 真是个大惊喜啊，对不对？其实我早该料到的。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: See you when I see you.
translation: 再见。

original: What's the big deal?
translation: 这有什么大不了的？

original: [FAILED] Just drop it, okay?
translation: [失败] 别再说了，行吗？

original: Hey, I risked a lot to get you that data feed.
translation: 嘿，我可是冒了很大的险才帮你搞到那个数据源的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] True. All right. The first try was a little less "professional". Someone important on the Strip had access to some of House's technology.
translation: [成功]说的对。好吧，第一次尝试有点不够"专业"。某个长街里有头有脸的人物已经掌握了豪斯的部分技术。

original: Specifically, a Securitron. And more specifically, the "someone" was Benny. I know, I know... he shot you in the head and everything.
translation: 确切地说，那项技术指的是一个电子保安。而那个大人物，其实就是本尼。我知道，我知道……是他朝你脑袋上开了一枪，让你吃了那么多苦头。

original: But this was a while ago. I knew he was sleazy, but I didn't realize he was so cold-blooded.
translation: 不过这都是很久之前的事了。我过去总觉得他很卑鄙，没想过他竟然还这么冷血。

original: I work against the NCR as much as I work for them. This is no different.
translation: 我可以为NCR卖命，也可以给NCR捣乱。没什么区别。

original: So you help them at the Dam only to screw them over big time later? All right, I'll go along with this, then. I hope I don't regret it.
translation: 所以你在大坝上帮他们，只是为了将来可以更狠地涮他们？好吧，这条件我同意。希望我不会为此后悔。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: This was a minor refueling station for vertibirds. It seemed an appropriate place to stash our equipment if we ever needed it.
translation: 这地方以前是个小型飞鸟加油站。看起来很适合当做我们的装备补给点。

original: I'm surprised this place hasn't fallen apart. When I put it into standby mode, I expected to return to it within a few years, not decades.
translation: 我很惊讶这地方居然还没塌。当年我把这里设成待机模式的时候，还以为几年内就能回来。没想到这一走就是几十年。

original: Can I join the Followers?
translation: 我能加入天启追随者吗？

original: Possibly, but I'd be the wrong person to ask. You'll need to speak to Dr. Schiller, who's on an errand at one of our other stations.
translation: 应该没问题，不过我说了也不算。你应该去找席勒医生，他正在我们的另一个驻站处理些事情。

original: He should be back tomorrow.
translation: 他应该明天就会回来。

original: Are you always here?
translation: 你一直都在这吗？

original: I'm usually here a few days out of the week. Mostly to keep the fridge stocked. Plus it's nice to get away from it all every now and then.
translation: 通常我一周只有几天在这儿。主要是补充冰箱里的存货。另外，偶尔到这儿休息一下也挺好的。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Vale.
translation: 再见。

original: Why are you here?
translation: 你怎么在这儿？

original: I like to check up on things from time to time. I can't let this place fall apart, now, can I?
translation: 我喜欢时不时就到各地检查一次。总不能让这里出问题吧 ?

original: Since you're here, I can offer you some medical supplies. I can't give you everything I have, but I can give you a few things.
translation: 既然你来了，我可以提供你一点医药补给。虽然不能全都给你，但分一部分还是没问题的。

original: Somebody's asking for a boot in their fusebox.
translation: 有人明明店小还嫌客大呢。

original: Explosives.
translation: 爆炸物。

original: Cateye.
translation: 猫眼。

original: Who was this Father Elijah to you?
translation: 以利亚对你来说是什么人？

original: I would say he was my tutor, but that doesn't cover it.
translation: 我把他当成我的导师，但还不止于此。

original: After my parents passed, he looked after me. The whole Brotherhood brought me up, really, but he made sure of it.
translation: 我父母去世后，他就一直照顾我。是兄弟会把我拉扯大的没错，但这都要归功于他的领导。

original: I never had a grandfather - not that I knew, anyway - but Elijah was in some ways what I'd imagine a grandfather to be.
translation: 我没有祖父——反正我也不认识他——但以利亚在某些方面确实很符合我心中祖父的形象。

original: Radiation supplies.
translation: 抗辐射补给。

original: Here you go.
translation: 就是这样。

original: Getting sucker punched by Benny happens to the best of us.
translation: 被本尼暗算，咱俩都遭遇过。

original: Good point.
translation: 说得好。

original: Alcohol is the only way Benny could ever get any action from a smart girl like you.
translation: 像你这样聪明的女孩，我看本尼一定得你灌醉才能下手吧。

original: That's sweet of you to say, even if it isn't true.
translation: 你的嘴真甜，可惜这不是真的。

original: Don't be so hard on yourself. Life would be dull if it weren't for all the little mistakes.
translation: 别和自己过不去。人有失手，马有失蹄，谁能不犯点小错误呢。

original: I take it you're speaking from experience.
translation: 看来这是你的经验之谈。

original: You're right though. He's gone now, so I'm not going to let it bother me anymore. Thanks.
translation: 不过你说得对。反正他也不在了，所以我也没必要再拿这件事跟自己过不去了。谢谢。

original: Tell me again about Benny's Securitron.
translation: 再和我说说本尼的机器人吧。

original: Not much to tell. Benny had one of Mr. House's Securitrons, deactivated, and wanted it switched back on.
translation: 没什么可说的。本尼搞到了一台豪斯先生的电子保安，想要重新启动它。

original: He had heard I was interested in Mr. House's technology so he hit me up... so to speak.
translation: 刚好他听说我也对豪斯先生的技术感兴趣，就叫了我来帮忙……可以这么说吧。

original: You can't seriously think they're the same Mr. House.
translation: 他们该不会是同一个豪斯先生吧。

original: Maybe not. Maybe the new guy is just a clever raider chief with knowledge of history.
translation: 或许不是。或许新冒出来的这家伙只是由一个聪明又通晓历史的掠夺者头子假扮的。

original: Maybe he just left instructions for his robots to carry out in his name.
translation: 或许他给机器人留下了指令，让他们以他的名义行事。

original: Or maybe Robert House uploaded his brain pattern into a computer and rules to this day, a godless, soulless machine-god!
translation: 抑或许罗伯特·豪斯把他的大脑上传到了一台电脑里，以此来维持自己的统治。一个无视神明、没有灵魂的机械之神！

original: Maybe the whole thing's a crazy coincidence. Who knows?
translation: 更或许整个事件只是一起惊人的巧合。谁知道呢？

original: I'm looking for the man who shot me: he wears a checkered coat and carries a shiny pistol. Seen him?
translation: 我在找那个向我开枪的人：他穿着一件方格外套，拎着一支锃亮的手枪。见过他吗？

original: Sure, boss. I saw lots of guys like that while I was held prisoner by an insane Super Mutant in an isolated mountain fortress. Can you narrow it down?
translation: 当然，老大。我被疯狂的超级变种人关在与世隔绝的山中要塞时，也见过不少那样的家伙。您能稍微缩小一点范围吗 ?

original: Benny, huh? Sorry, boss, doesn't ring a bell. Then again, my brain isn't as sharp as it used to be.
translation: 本尼，嗯？抱歉，老板，没什么印象。看来我的脑袋不像过去那么灵光了。

original: Do you know anything about a goon named Benny? Wears a checkered coat, carries a big pistol?
translation: 你认识一个叫本尼的家伙吗？穿着件格子西装，拿着一把硕大的手枪？

original: I left everything when I left Mexico: my home, my family, my name - even my face. I know it's surprising, boss, but I wasn't always this handsome.
translation: 当我离开墨西哥的时候，我抛弃了一切——我的故乡，我的家庭，我的名字——甚至是长相。我知道这有点离谱，老大，但我不是一直都这么帅的。

original: As far as the world knows, I was Miguel, and I was okay with that. I headed north for a while, and ended up in Tucson - not Two-Sun, by the way.
translation: 很长一段时间内，我都在用米格尔这个假名。我无所谓了。我向北走了一段时间，在图森停了下来——那时还不叫双阳城。

original: Things were good there. Well, maybe not good, but better than Mexico City, anyways. I found myself a little shack and started fixing things.
translation: 那里一切都好。怎么说呢，也不算太好，但总比墨西哥城要强。我在那儿找了个窝，并且开始经营修理生意。

original: I grew up in a place called Hidalgo Ranch just outside Mexico City. It wasn't much, just a bit of a farm with a house for three generations of Tejadas.
translation: 我出生在墨西哥城外一个叫做希达戈牧场的地方。地方不大，整个农场只有一间老屋，三代特哈达家族的人都住在那里。

original: I wasn't the best-behaved kid. I was quick with my hands, with a pistol or a wrench, and I wasn't afraid to get into fights over it.
translation: 我算不上家中最乖的孩子。我身手不错，善用扳手和手枪，而且我也不惧怕用它们来打架。

original: I never killed anybody, but I had my share of run-ins with the police. Mostly my family kept me in line.
translation: 我从未杀过人，但我也和警察对抗过几次。我的家人对我管教还是挺严的。

original: This was before the war. We were far enough away from Mexico City when the bombs fell that we missed the worst of it - but things got bad quick.
translation: 那都是战前的事了。我们离墨西哥城足够远，所以没有被核弹的爆炸波及——但糟糕的事情很快接踵而至。

original: How come your last name isn't Van Graff?
translation: 为什么你的姓不是范·格拉夫？

original: Unlike most of my brothers and sisters, Mama didn't get sick of my father and get rid of him. He died right before I was born.
translation: 和其他兄弟姐妹不同，我妈并不讨厌我爸，也没有甩掉他。他在我出生前就死了。

original: Mama had liked him so much, she made us use his last name. Said he deserved that much at least, since he never got to meet me or nothin'.
translation: 我妈妈十分爱他，让我跟他姓。她说，既然你都没跟他见过面，那至少也该跟他姓。

original: You again? How'd you find me here?
translation: 又是你？你怎么发现我的？

original: I am the greatest of Caesar's Frumentarii. It was not a challenge to find you. Nor is this my first visit to the Strip.
translation: 我是凯撒手下最出色的密探。要找到你并不困难，而且这也不是我第一次来长街。

original: <Lie> I was hoping you'd want to take down the NCR, since that's the plan.
translation: <撒谎>我希望你能帮我击垮NCR，这就是我的计划。

original: Where is he now?
translation: 他现在在哪里？

original: I don't know. Last time anyone saw him was in the battle at HELIOS One. I wasn't there.
translation: 我不知道。他最后一次现身是在保卫太阳神一号的战斗中。我当时不在那里。

original: He gave orders to hold the plant until it could be reactivated. But he ran out of time. The NCR overran it. Everyone thought he was dead.
translation: 他下令坚守设施，直到其重新启动。可他没能争取到足够的时间。NCR最终占领了电站。大家都以为他死了。

original: But I got a note from him at a comm station. That's... how he liked to talk, even to me. He wasn't good at face-to-face.
translation: 但我在一个通讯站发现了他留下的笔记。他……喜欢用那种方式交流，甚至和我谈话时也是如此。他不善于与人当面说话。

original: Are you talking about Andy, or yourself?
translation: 你是在说安迪，还是在说你自己？

original: A little bit of both, I guess.
translation: 我想，两者都有一点吧。

original: He didn't have to give it up, he's just scared he doesn't have what it takes anymore.
translation: 不是他愿意前功尽弃，而是他害怕自己已经雄风不再了。

original: Maybe, but what if he really doesn't have it?
translation: 也许是的，可万一他真的已经没能力了呢？

original: I don't believe that. You must have some skills.
translation: 我不相信，你会的肯定不止这两招。

original: How can I make the best use of your skills?
translation: 你究竟有哪些得意的本领？

original: Felt good to put the old vaquero outfit on again. I feel a lot sharper with a pistol now. I still wouldn't put these old bones on the front lines.
translation: 能再穿上这牧马人套装，感觉可真好。只要再给我一把手枪，我马上就能精神起来。就是我这把老骨头在近身时依然帮不上忙。

original: I can also do maintenance work on your stuff - I don't have the supplies for a real repair job, but I can keep your gear working longer.
translation: 我还可以帮你保养装备——虽说没有正经工具，只能治标不治本，但好歹能让你的装备再多坚持一会儿。

original: But how did Tabitha find you in the first place?
translation: 但是塔比瑟一开始是怎么找到你的？

original: Ah, it's stupid, boss. I used to listen to the radio broadcasts, just to pass the time.
translation: 啊，这事挺丢人的，老大。我以前经常听广播，喜欢拿它来消磨时间。

original: Well, one day the signal stopped, so I figured I'd try to find the transmitter. I'm a pretty good repairman, or I was before my eyes started to go.
translation: 有一天信号突然断了，我就琢磨着要去把发射台修好。我是个不错的修理工，至少在我老花眼之前是。

original: Anyway, I found Black Mountain and offered my services, but Tabitha decided I was useful enough to keep around. Permanently.
translation: 不管怎样，我找上了黑山，修好了电台，可塔比瑟却觉得我太有用，于是就把我留下了。永远地留下。

original: How'd you end up at Black Mountain?
translation: 你怎么跑到黑山去的？

original: Well, boss, when a giant, insane Super Mutant asks you to stay put, you do what you're told. Well, maybe you don't, but I'm just a broke down old man.
translation: 哦，老大，换成是你，有个体型硕大的超级变种人疯子成天把你扣着，你不也得乖乖就范？哦，也许你还能反抗，可我的年纪实在太大，不中用了。

original: Where are you from?
translation: 你从哪里来？

original: I was born just outside Mexico City. My family had a little ranch there. After they died, I took my little sister, my Rafaela, to Mexico City.
translation: 我生在墨西哥城外。我的父母经营了一个小农场。他们去世后，我带着我的小妹妹，我的拉法拉,来到了墨西哥城。

original: She died there, so I moved on. I came across an old Petro-Chico refinery, found "Miguel's" jumpsuit, and decided to hang up the guns for good.
translation: 她死在那里，所以我离开了。我偶然来到了老佩特罗-奇科炼油厂，发现了"米格尔"的连身衣，于是我决定就此封枪。

original: I headed up into Tucson and lived there as Old Miguel for a while. Things were okay, then they got bad, and I headed west to the Mojave.
translation: 我来到图森，以老米格尔的身份在那里生活了一阵子。起初情况还好，后来出了点事，我就向西来到了莫哈维。

original: And that, boss, is all she wrote.
translation: 老大，就是这些了。

original: And so the Courier's road came to an end... for now.
translation: 就这样，废土邮差的旅程…暂时告一段落。

original: In the new world of the Mojave Wasteland, fighting continued, blood was spilled, and many lived and died - just as they had in the Old World.
translation: 迎来新生的莫哈维废土，依旧纷争不止，流血不断，有人生，也有人死——与旧日的世界殊无二致。

original: Because war... war never changes.
translation: 因为战争……战争永远不会改变。

original: And so the Courier who had cheated death in the cemetery outside Goodsprings cheated death once again, and the Mojave Wasteland was forever changed.
translation: 就这样，在清泉镇的墓地中死而复生的邮差，又一次骗过了死神，并彻底改变了莫哈维废土。

original: After the death of Chief Hanlon, the power of NCR's Rangers was broken for years.
translation: 军士长汉隆死后，NCR游骑兵也就此一蹶不振。
