original: Well, I think that's a fine idea. I'll give you a good flat rate, and you can stay as long as you like. Least until the busy season comes. Sound good?
translation: 哎呀，我想到个好提议。我给你出一个超低的价钱，你想住多久住多久。至少可以住到旺季来临。怎么样？

original: You would establish a foothold in the region and be one step closer to rebuilding the Mojave.
translation: 你可以在这里设立一个据点，这样就离重建莫哈维又进了一步。

original: I think I see now what you intend to set in motion.
translation: 我想我明白你的意图了。

original: If this plan will bring us one step closer to revitalizing the region, you can count on our support.
translation: 如果这个计划能帮助我们重振整个地区的话，那我们完全支持你。

original: So long as you keep us supplied, we will stay in the Mojave to provide care and education for those in need.
translation: 不过前提是你必须保证我们的物资供应，这样我们才能在莫哈维站稳脚跟，为有需要的人提供医疗和教育。

original: Why don't you come with me?
translation: 你为什么不和我一起走呢？

original: I can't leave now. Caesar has gained too much ground. I need to be here in case the NCR fails to hold Hoover Dam.
translation: 我现在不能走。凯撒已经占了不少地方了。我得待在这儿，以防胡佛水坝失守。

original: No offense intended, but why should I go anywhere with you?
translation: 恕我冒昧，但为什么我要跟着你？

original: Look out, behind you! <Pistol Whip Carlyle>
translation: 小心，在你背后！<用枪托击打卡莱尔>

original: Huh? Hey, I think you dropped your gun there. Here. Here you go. Just don't point it at me, okay?
translation: 嗯？嘿，好像你的枪掉了。给你，拿好。别用它指着我，行吗？

original: I'm paranoid now, and even though you clearly don't know how to hold that thing, it'd be one less thing for me to worry about. Thanks.
translation: 我的神经已经够紧张的了。虽然你明显不懂得怎么握枪，但我还是希望这玩意不会伤到我。谢了。

original: Maybe my weak and flimsy hands can massage that out for you. <Apply Sleeper Hold>
translation: 也许用我柔软白嫩的手给你按按摩。<按压颈部>

original: What happens if I hang around one of your camps?
translation: 如果我出现在你们的营地里会怎么样？

original: Then we'll have to make you leave by force. Your own fault, you understand.
translation: 那我们就只好用武力驱赶了。这可是你自己的错。

original: I'll keep that in mind.
translation: 我会记住的。

original: See ya.
translation: 再见。

original: <Speech Options>
translation: <口才选项>

original: [SUCCEEDED] Well, you look to be a trustworthy sort. Okay, I'll tell you what I know.
translation: [成功] 好吧，你看起来还算可靠。好的，我会告诉你我知道的事情。

original: You can tell me or you can rot in here.
translation: 要么告诉我，要么就烂在这里吧。

original: Can you tell me about the people who passed through town now?
translation: 你能和我说说最近路过这个小镇的那些人吗？

original: Indeed I do good sir, and I would be thrilled to share that information with you as soon as I am released from captivity.
translation: 当然可以了，我的好先生，只要你把我救出去，我会很乐意把这些信息告诉你的。

original: I hear you may have information on some Khans that came through here with a guy in a checkered suit.
translation: 我听说你曾经见过几个路过的大汗帮，他们中有个穿格子西装的家伙。

original: My good lady, I believe I may have some information that would prove useful.
translation: 我的好女士，我相信我知道的情报会对你大有帮助。

original: If you would just untie my hands I'd be more than happy to share that information I have with you.
translation: 如果你能为我松绑，我会很乐意把它告诉你。

original: I hear you may have information on some Khans that came through here with a guy in a checkered suit.
translation: 我听说你曾经见过几个路过的大汗帮，他们中有个穿格子西装的家伙。

original: I'm in quite a state here. If you help me with my bonds I'll be more than happy to tell you anything, and everything about those Khans.
translation: 我现在身处危险境地。如果你给我松绑，我可以把所有情报都告诉你，包括那几个大汗帮的去向。

original: Ahh yes, my memory is much clearer now that I am free from my bondage.
translation: 啊，是的，自从松了绑以后，我的记忆就变得清晰了不少。

original: I was sku... er, performing recon, gathering information on some of the Powder Gangers, when some Great Khans arrived with your friend in the suit.
translation: 我在藏……呃，执行侦察任务，收集炸药帮情报的时候，遇到了几个大汗帮的人，同行的还有你那位西装革履的朋友。

original: They were talking about some delivery they took from a courier, I assume that was you.
translation: 当时他们在谈论从某个邮差身上弄到的一批货，我想那个邮差就是你吧。

original: They said they'd be heading through Nipton to Novac to meet a contact there.
translation: 他们还说会经过尼普顿到诺瓦克去，在那里跟某人碰头。

original: Can you tell me about the man in the checkered suit who came through here?
translation: 你能和我讲讲那个路过这里的穿格子西装的男人吗？

original: Tabitha! You naughty, naughty girl! Leo remembers what you did!
translation: 塔比瑟！你这个调皮的丫头！利奥可记得你干的好事！

original: Anything you can say to her, you can say to me.
translation: 把你想跟她说的话都告诉我吧。

original: You don't want us chatting, trust me. As for the girl - I just want to talk to her.
translation: 你不会想和我聊天的，相信我。那个姑娘，我只想找她谈谈罢了。

original: And if you can't bring her here, then you're no use to me - or Gloria. So if you want to cause trouble in here over nothing, then go on - try.
translation: 如果你不能把她带来，那你对我或者格罗莉亚就没有任何价值。如果你想在这儿惹麻烦，那可以啊，随你。

original: Raise that gun, and I'll kill everyone in here.
translation: 你要是敢举枪，你们一个都活不了。

original: You know what, I think you mean that. All right... maybe...
translation: 我觉得你是认真的。好吧……也许……

original: The Legion marched over the Hoover Dam with the help of one who was as brutal and merciless as the worst of them: The Courier.
translation: 军团的铁蹄踏过了胡佛大坝，助他们完成这一暴行的，正是与军团同流合污，集凶残和无情于一身的邮差。

original: Caesar honored her with a golden coin, minted in celebration of her contributions and distributed throughout the wasteland.
translation: 凯撒特意为她铸造了一枚金币，以表彰她的卓越功勋，并在废土全境发行。

original: I'm not actually armed.
translation: 其实我身上没带武器。

original: Oh, and a friendly word of advice: if you happen to "stumble across" any weapons during your stay here, well... just don't wear them openly. You dig?
translation: 喔，顺便给你一句忠告：就算你在这儿不小心"摸到"一两件武器，也别……公开拿出来，明白吗？

original: Now that we got that little business out of the way, what can I do to make your Tops experience the tops?
translation: 这样咱们就算例行完公事了，不知您还有什么问题，能让我为您的九重天之行增光添彩的？

original: What about Primm Slim? Could he be sheriff?
translation: 普瑞姆·斯利姆怎么样？他可以做警长么？

original: Well I guess I never thought of that. I guess he could be sheriff, if you think he could be reprogrammed for it.
translation: 我从来没想过。他应该是可以做警长的，不过你得先重新编写他的程序。

original: Well I reckon he could be a sheriff if you have the skills to reprogram him.
translation: 如果你可以重新给他编一套程序，那么我觉得他应该可以胜任警长。

original: Do you think Primm Slim could be sheriff?
translation: 你觉得普瑞姆·斯利姆能做警长么？

original: You're the luckiest player I've ever seen. Keep up the good work in here.
translation: 你是我见过的运气最好的玩家。继续加油吧。

original: Ted's been kidnapped. He's here in the hotel.
translation: 泰德被绑架了。他就在这个酒店里。

original: He's here? Bless you, I thought he was a goner for sure.
translation: 他就在这里？上帝保佑你，我还以为他已经完蛋了。

original: Listen, you do what you gotta do to find him. I'd send my men with you but I'm worried they'd kill Ted if we got close.
translation: 听着，不管你用什么办法，一定要找到他。我本来想派人跟着你的，但我担心如果我们打草惊蛇，他们会杀了泰德。

original: Reckon you might need one of these. Take it. Just don't wave it around here where they might take it from you.
translation: 估计这东西你能用得上。拿着吧，不过没事别掏出来显摆，否则可能会被他们没收。

original: Why is the NCR interested in this desert?
translation: 为什么NCR对这片沙漠感兴趣？

original: Well, it's no secret. Our interest here is twofold.
translation: 这不是什么秘密。我们的对这里感兴趣的原因有两个。

original: First, we want to remain in control of Hoover Dam. It supplies the Republic with power, and is a source of fresh water.
translation: 首先，我们想要控制胡佛水坝。它不但为共和国提供电力，也是一个洁净的水源。

original: Second, we want to prevent the Legion from advancing across the Colorado River and endangering the home states.
translation: 其次，我们要阻止军团跨过科罗拉多河，威胁我们的领土。

original: What's the New California Republic?
translation: 新加州共和国是什么？

original: An odd combination.
translation: 一个奇怪的组合。

original: REPCONN went through some rough times. When their rocket business was shaky, Mr. House purchased the company.
translation: 瑞普康当时遇到了危机。他们的火箭在市场上遭到冷遇，于是豪斯先生就趁机收购了这家公司。

original: It didn't take long for him to repurpose their plasma technology for a government weapon contract.
translation: 没过多久，他就与政府签订了武器开发协议，重启了公司在等离子领域的研究。

original: Ugh. Well, if you're going to be like that then never mind.
translation: 啊。既然你那么想，那就算了。

original: Things are bad around here. I'd like to make a difference, and I'd like you to help me.
translation: 这儿的情况太糟了，我想做出些改变，希望你能帮我。

original: Hmm. That seems appropriately resolute and yet vague. I'll give you the benefit of the doubt and go with you, but let me be clear about something.
translation: 嗯。语气很坚定但似乎又有点含糊。我就姑且相信你，跟你走，不过我得先声明一件事情。

original: If you plan to help Caesar's Legion, this is going to be a brief relationship.
translation: 如果你打算去帮助凯撒军团，那我们的友谊就到此为止。

original: I may not have all the answers for how to fix Freeside's problems, but Caesar taking control isn't part of the solution. Fair?
translation: 虽然我也没什么好办法能解决自由城当下的问题，但我也绝不会同意让凯撒占领这里。可以吗？

original: The NCR oppression around here would disappear if the Legion took control. I could use your help.
translation: 一旦军团控制了这里，NCR就不会再压迫这里的人民了。我需要你的帮助。

original: Only because everyone would be conscripted or enslaved. And the people who are unfit for military service or slavery would be put down. Swell plan.
translation: 所有人都要服兵役或劳役。任何反对兵役或劳役的人都会遭到镇压。雄伟的计划。

original: Yes, a veritable Pax Romana for post-nuclear America. My political beliefs are a bit more progressive than outright fascism, so I'll pass. Thanks.
translation: 没错，这就是名副其实的罗马式和平，专为核战后的美国所设计。可惜我的政治理念要比纯粹的法西斯主义更为进步，所以我不会参与的。谢谢。

original: If New Vegas can remain independent, I'm going to find a way to do it. I could use your help.
translation: 如果新维加斯真的能保持独立，我愿意会为此奋斗终生。我需要你的帮助。

original: If that's really what you're trying to do, I'll go with you.
translation: 假如这就是你奋斗的目标，那我愿意跟着你干。

original: Things are hectic around here, but it won't mean anything if NCR or the Legion take control. I'm sure the Followers can manage without me.
translation: 尽管这儿工作繁忙，可要是让NCR或者军团占领了这里，那我们的所有努力也就白费了。我相信天启追随者就算少了我也可以应付得来。

original: Just don't try to help the Legion, and we shouldn't have any problems. Sound good?
translation: 只要你不去帮军团的忙，我就没意见。可以吗？

original: I'm trying to help Mr. House keep New Vegas independent.
translation: 我在帮助豪斯先生保持新维加斯的独立。

original: That's funny. Mr. House doesn't want to keep New Vegas independent. He just wants to keep the NCR and Caesar's Legion from pushing him around.
translation: 真有趣。豪斯先生并不想让新维加斯保持独立。他只是不想受NCR和凯撒的摆布。

original: He must be pretty convincing if he's roped you into helping him, but you can count me out.
translation: 他能让你心甘情愿替他卖命，说明他口才不错，可惜我不吃你这一套。

original: The NCR needs help against the Legion before Caesar moves on the dam. We could use your skills.
translation: 为了阻止凯撒进军水坝，NCR需要团结一切可以利用的力量，你的能力会派上用场的。

original: The NCR had a chance to use the Followers' skills before, but being imperialists mattered more to them. No thanks.
translation: NCR不是没机会得到天启追随者的支持，可惜他们骨子里的沙文主义却更胜一筹。不，谢了。

original: The Elder tasked me with contacting several scouts out in the waste.
translation: 长老让我去和几个身在外面的侦察兵取得联系。

original: That's a sensible notion. Your familiarity with the nearby terrain makes you perfect as a liaison.
translation: 这个决策还算明智。毕竟你对这附近的地形很熟悉，让你去再合适不过。

original: I've been trying to get the Elder to send out scouts for years, and he's always been resistant to the idea. Said they'd be a vulnerability.
translation: 这些年我一直在鼓动长老派遣侦察兵，可他就是不乐意，还说什么他们容易受到攻击。

original: I wonder what changed his mind.
translation: 我很好奇他是怎么改变主意的。

original: Just give the details.
translation: 告诉我细节。

original: The items I'll need to keep the system running are a differential pressure controller, a reverse pulse cleaner, and several HEPA cartridge filters.
translation: 要维持系统运作，我需要一个压差控制器，一个超声波清洁器，还有一些HEPA20型过滤器。

original: At present, my best guess for finding the items would be to search any of the old vaults in the area.
translation: 目前看来，最有可能找到这些东西的地方就是遍布这附近的旧避难所了。

original: Those vaults were usually built much like these military bunkers, even using the same contractors in their constructions at times.
translation: 那些避难所都盖得像军用碉堡似的，承建商还都是同一批人。

original: I'll mark the vaults' locations on your map. Best of luck to you.
translation: 我会在你的地图上标记出各大避难所的位置。祝你好运。

original: One of the datastore entries mentioned the Chain That Binds. What is that, exactly?
translation: 数据库中有一条提到了“忠如锁链”，那是什么意思？

original: That's an old, old principle that's been around since the Brotherhood was founded. It basically means that you have to obey a superior officer.
translation: 那是自兄弟会成立起就存在的一条古老准则。大意是你必须绝对服从上级的命令。

original: It's pretty much common sense, but it gets invoked a lot when people get pissy about following orders.
translation: 这也算是常识了。可总有人不肯听命令，于是这句话经常会被一再搬出来。

original: If you're curious, I'll give you access to the datastore entry on it. You'd probably be the first to read it in years, if not decades.
translation: 如果你好奇的话，我可以给你查阅相关数据的权限。估计你也是这几年来、甚至几十年来第一个读到它的人了。

original: I convinced him that staying here was more dangerous than moving on.
translation: 我告诉他呆在这里反而更加危险。

original: Yes, you exploited his fear of Powder Gangers very effectively. The collar includes a microphone, you see. Part of the test.
translation: 是的，你成功利用了他对炸药帮的恐惧。看到没，项圈上有麦克风。这是测试的一部分。

original: He'll keep his distance, setting ambushes, never suspecting that these bunkers house something far more dangerous to him than criminals. Well-played.
translation: 他会离开那里，设下埋伏，但他绝不会想到这些地堡里的东西居然会比那伙罪犯更加危险。做得好。

original: No, not really.
translation: 并没有。

original: The desert can play tricks on a man's mind. Don't let it bother you much.
translation: 沙漠会迷了你的心窍，千万别中计。

original: You have to get out of here.
translation: 你必须离开这儿。

original: Now why would I do that? You see some Powder Gangers on the approach or something?
translation: 为什么？你看见炸药帮的人了？

original: [SUCCEEDED] You've seen that with your own two eyes?
translation: [成功] 你亲眼见过吗？

original: Goddamn, I knew Cooke's gang passed through these parts 'bout that frequently, but I didn't know they holed up here.
translation: 该死，我知道库克的手下经常在附近出没，没想到他们居然在这儿安营扎寨了。

original: Be a rude awakening, to find fifteen of those merciless bastards looking down at me snoozing on my bedroll!
translation: 天知道我会不会哪天一醒来，就发现十五个混蛋正站在铺盖边上盯着我打呼噜呢！

original: Yep, I'd be better off setting up an ambush along one of their routes to catch stragglers. Thanks for the information. You may've saved my life.
translation: 很好，看来我得在路边设个埋伏，逮几个落单的家伙问个清楚。多谢你的情报，也算救了我一命。

original: <Lie> Powder Gangers use these bunkers as hideouts once or twice a month.
translation: <撒谎> 炸药帮每个月偶尔有一两次会躲进这些地堡里藏身。

original: Nothing, I swear.
translation: 没什么，我发誓。

original: Didn't look like nothing to me. Draw!
translation: 这可不像没什么。快说！

original: [SUCCEEDED] I've been trying to get that damn thing working for days, and you think you fixed it in a few minutes? Let me see that.
translation: [成功] 我花了几天时间都没能把这玩意弄好，你说你几分钟就能搞定？我倒要瞧瞧。

original: <Lie> I just fixed it.
translation: <撒谎> 我刚刚把它修好了。

original: [FAILED] The hell you did. I know enough about electronics to know that what you were doing wasn't fixing it.
translation: [失败] 胡说。我好歹懂些电路常识，很清楚你根本就不是在修理。

original: So I'll give you one more chance to tell me what you were doing.
translation: 我再给你一次机会，告诉我你到底做了什么。

original: <Lie> I just fixed it.
translation: <撒谎> 我刚刚把它修好了。

original: You just had to go messing with my radio again, didn't you?
translation: HVRangerRadioDestroyed

original: What are Powder Gangers?
translation: 炸药帮是什么人？

original: Criminal scum that've infested this region, attacking caravans and regular folk just passing through.
translation: 一群成天骚扰这片地区的人渣，时常袭击过往的商队和平民。

original: The dangerous ones are roamers, though there's another group that mostly stays put, over at the prison southwest of here.
translation: 这些危险的家伙飘无定所，但目前他们有一大帮人就据守在西南边的监狱里。

original: So far the brass haven't mustered up enough men to take the prison back. Long overdue if you ask me. But I'm just one man.
translation: 到现在上级都没有凑齐足够的人手把监狱夺回来。要我说，他们早就该行动了。可惜，我一个人也派不上什么用场。

original: Would you like to come with me? I could use someone skilled in medicine.
translation: 能跟我走吗？我需要一个会医疗技能的人。

original: You've helped the Followers, but your reputation isn't exactly spotless. How do I know you're not going to lose it out there?
translation: 你虽然帮助过天启追随者，但你在名誉上还是有些污点。我怎么知道你会不会走上歪路呢？

original: Here's my proposition. If you want to work together to help the people around here, I'll lend a hand. If you start acting like a crazy waster...
translation: 我提个条件吧。如果你愿意与我合作帮助这里的人，我可以和你走。但如果你开始像个废土流氓那样耍泼的话……

original: Where did you get your medical training?
translation: 你在哪接受的医学培训？

original: The Followers taught me everything I know about medicine. Despite our humble abode here in New Vegas, we have great facilities back in the NCR.
translation: 我的医学知识都是天启追随者传授的。尽管新维加斯这边条件简陋，但在NCR我们还是有不少设备投入。

original: We may have overextended ourselves by setting up camp in Freeside, but the people here need help from someone. If not us, who?
translation: 也许我们在自由城设立营地是有些过头了，但这里的人们需要帮助。如果我们不做，还有谁来做呢 ?

original: I'd like you to come with me.
translation: 我希望你能和我一起走。

original: You have quite the menagerie at your disposal. If you can get the posse down to "small gang" size, I'll happily go with you.
translation: 你身边还真是个动物园啊。如果你能把你的队伍规模减小一些，我会很乐意跟你一起走。

original: As the old saying goes, two's company, but three's a small army. Okay, I'm paraphrasing a bit, but you get the idea.
translation: 俗话说，二人作伴，三人添乱。好啦，我是改了几个字，可你懂我的意思。

original: What are you talking about?
translation: 你在说什么？

original: I wasn't always with the Followers, or with the NCR.
translation: 我过去并不是天启追随者或NCR的一员。

original: My late father was an officer in a group called the Enclave, a remnant of America's Pre-War government.
translation: 家父曾经是英克雷的一名军官，而英克雷是美国战前政府的残余。

original: Memories being short around here, not a whole lot of people remember them. But they did bad things. Terrorized communities, kidnapped people.
translation: 在这个连回忆都没剩下多少的地方，记得他们的人并不多。但他们干了不少坏事。恐吓群众，绑架百姓。

original: Eventually, someone stopped them. I was born a few years later at a military base on the coast, a place called Navarro.
translation: 最后，有人阻止了他们的暴行。几年后，我在海岸边一个军事基地里出生了，一个叫做纳瓦罗的地方。

original: Sure.
translation: 当然。

original: Any day now, Caesar's going to try to march across Hoover Dam and kick NCR out of the Mojave.
translation: 凯撒随时都有可能大举进攻胡佛水坝，把NCR赶出莫哈维。

original: We're getting caught up in something important out here. Hell, after how you handled Benny, you're practically right in the middle of all this.
translation: 我们算是碰上大事了。该死，都因为你料理了本尼，你现在已经被推到风口浪尖上了。

original: I know I'm just along for the ride, but it's made me think about the past, and how I might be able to help out.
translation: 我知道我也不过是凑个热闹，但这不禁让我反思过去，也许当初我还能想办法挽回。

original: I've taken care of the Van Graffs.
translation: 我已经摆平了范格拉夫家族。

original: Well done. This is a small step in the right direction, but it's damn good to move forward again. Now, I believe congratulations are in order.
translation: 很好，虽然只是一小步，但起码我们是有所动作了。我必须要向你表示祝贺。

original: It is my honor to bestow upon you the title of Paladin of the Brotherhood, for your meritorious service in its name.
translation: 鉴于你为兄弟会所做的贡献，我很荣幸地授予你兄弟会圣骑士称号。

original: Normally, there'd be a ceremony and such, but everyone is too busy at the moment for such frivolity.
translation: 通常还要举行个仪式，但现在大家都忙得不可开交，实在是顾不得这些繁文缛节。

original: I can give you this, however. Your very own suit of power armor. We can't spare our best, but I had the knights assemble this one for your use.
translation: 不过，我还是要把这个交给你。你的专属动力装甲。虽然性能不算卓越，但为了能适合你，骑士们还是动了一番脑筋的。

original: Which reminds me, you don't even know how to use these, do you?
translation: 我想起来了，你压根还不知道怎么用，对吧？

original: Yes, what is the task?
translation: 是，什么任务？

original: Back when we were stationed at HELIOS, our scouts reported that a group was establishing itself in the area as a distributor of Pre-War weapons.
translation: 当年我们还驻扎在太阳神电站的时候，斥候曾报告说附近有一伙人在贩卖战前武器。

original: Our Elder at the time, Elijah, was too concerned with getting HELIOS running and fending off the NCR, so he ordered us to leave them alone.
translation: 当时我们的长老以利亚一心扑在太阳神电站上，成天想着如何让它运转，如何防止它落入NCR手中，所以他才命令我们不要理睬。

original: It's time that we correct that oversight, and show this region that the Brotherhood is still a force to be reckoned with.
translation: 我们必须纠正这个错误，让人知道兄弟会的力量依然不容小觑。

original: I want you to visit these weapons dealers, this Van Graff family, and make an example of them. Leave no one alive.
translation: 我希望你去拜访一下这个所谓的范格拉夫家族，拿他们开刀。不要留活口。

original: When the job is done, report back and I'll arrange for a team to clean up the site and retrieve the weapons.
translation: 事成之后再来向我复命。我会派小队前去清理尸体，回收武器。

original: Is there anything else for me to do?
translation: 还有什么事需要我帮忙的吗？

original: No, your role in this is done. The rest is up to us. There is much more for me to do to make the transition as smooth as possible.
translation: 不。你扮演的角色就到此为止了，剩下的交给我们吧。想要顺利地完成这次换届，我还有很多事要做呢。

original: Come back in a few days, and I should be firmly installed as Elder.
translation: 过几天再回来吧，估计那时候，我已经荣登长老之位了。

original: How do you know so much about this, again?
translation: 你怎么知道这些的？我再问一次。

original: Stop thinking so much. Thanks.
translation: 别多想了。谢谢。

original: I installed the device up at Black Mountain, as instructed.
translation: 我已经依照你的吩咐在黑山顶上装了发射器。

original: Yes, we've already started receiving telemetry from it. This will be a great help in our future efforts, and I thank you.
translation: 是的，我们已经接收到遥测信号了。这对我们今后的工作大有裨益，谢谢你。

original: Now then, it is my great honor to bestow upon you the title of Paladin of the Brotherhood, for meritorious service above and beyond the call of duty.
translation: 现在，我很荣幸地授予你兄弟会圣骑士的称号，以表彰你的卓越贡献，以及从中体现出的忠诚。

original: I'm afraid a formal ceremony was out of the question given our current state, but I hope this will make up for it.
translation: 恐怕以我们目前的条件，没有办法为你举行正规的晋升仪式，不过希望这件东西能够弥补你的遗憾。

original: I had the knights refurbish a suit of our power armor for your use. It's one of the earlier models, but it should serve you well.
translation: 我让骑士们为你修整了一套动力装甲。这套的型号有些旧，不过性能依旧良好。

original: Now, I suppose I'm going to have to show you how to use it, aren't I?
translation: 那么，要我说明一下它该如何使用吗？

original: Yes, what is the task?
translation: 好的，任务是？

original: As one of our patrols discovered, the mutants just to the northeast have become strangely violent in the years we were secluded.
translation: 我们的巡逻队发现，东北方的变种人在我们隐居的这几年里变得异常凶猛。

original: However, this turn of events could also be an opportunity. We mostly left the equipment of the communications array there alone, out of respect.
translation: 不过，这也可以视为契机。为了以防万一，我们曾将一整套通讯设备单独留在了那里。

original: As the inhabitants have now proven themselves hostile, no more respect will be accorded them, making their equipment fair game.
translation: 既然那里的居民已经不再友好，也就没必要对它们礼貌了。我们打算重新启用这套设备。

original: I want you to head up to the summit of Black Mountain and install this remote signal transmitter in one of their consoles.
translation: 我要你前往黑山山顶，在他们的控制台里装一个遥控信号发射机。

original: It will allow us to tap into the radar and other detection systems running there, assuming they're still operational.
translation: 如此一来，只要那里的雷达与探测系统还能正常运转，我们就能和它们进行连接。

original: If we're going to operate on the surface again, it would be nice to do so with as much information at our fingertips as possible. Good luck.
translation: 如果我们想重新在废土上有所作为，就必须尽量地搜集可用的情报。祝你好运。

original: Any work around here?
translation: 这里有什么工作要做吗？

original: Nothing I know of, but if you've come from the North, means you can travel freer than most around here.
translation: 据我所知，没什么事。但如果你是从北边来的，那你应该比这儿的其他人要自由一些。

original: Might check the Barracks, someone might need you to hoof it somewhere. Just be careful if you go up on the roof - got a sniper watching the road.
translation: 你可以去营房看看，可能有人需要你跑个腿什么的。你上房顶的时候注意点——我们有个狙击手在盯着大路呢。

original: If your gear's in need of repair, HQ's also worth checking out - talk to Major Knight, he can help. Provided you got a pen and plenty of ink.
translation: 如果你有需要修理的装备，就去指挥部看看——跟奈特少校说，他能帮你。只要你有笔和墨水。

original: Tell me about the lockdown.
translation: 和我聊聊有关封锁的事情吧。

original: It's a protective measure that was enacted after our defeat at HELIOS. The NCR was hot on our heels, and we wouldn't have survived another encounter.
translation: 自从在太阳神一号电站遭遇溃败以后，我们就不得不采取这样的防卫措施。NCR死咬着我们不放，如果再和他们遭遇，我们必死无疑。

original: It was decided that we would stay quiet for a time, heal the wounded, and try to come up with a new strategy.
translation: 我们决定暂时养精蓄锐，待伤员恢复好以后，再另做打算。

original: However, after we had fully recuperated, our first scouting measures showed that the NCR's presence in this region had only increased in our absence.
translation: 可当我们恢复了元气，开始外出侦察的时候，却发现在我们封锁的这段时间内，NCR在此区域的实力已经大幅增加了。

original: There are now more than five times the number of NCR troops in the area as when we fought them, and we have half the number we did at HELIOS.
translation: 如今NCR的兵力已足足是过去的五倍，而我们和太阳神电站时相比只剩下一半的人手。

original: And so the lockdown has been extended. To go outside would be the death of us all.
translation: 因此我们只能延长封锁期。贸然出击就是死路一条。

original: I thought you were interested in preserving life.
translation: 我以为你喜欢救人性命呢。

original: I know I shouldn't place one life below another, but in Caesar's case, I'll make an exception.
translation: 我知道对待生命不该分孰高孰低，但在凯撒身上嘛，我想破次例。

original: The whole "slavery and cultural annihilation" stance he's adopted is a bit repugnant to me.
translation: 他那一套"奴隶制和文化灭绝"论让我有些厌恶。

original: Though I guess what I think never really mattered much to you, did it?
translation: 不过依我看，我的想法对你来说也根本无所谓，对吧？

original: You didn't tell me your name.
translation: 你还没告诉我你的名字呢。

original: Oh - Knight. You must not be from around here. If so... it doesn't do to get too friendly.
translation: 噢——奈特。你不是本地人吧，如果不是的话……那咱俩可能就无法成为好朋友了。

original: What?
translation: 什么？

original: Just need something for the log book, keeping tabs on traffic through the Outpost... although mostly just in, not out these days.
translation: 只是做个记录，看看到底有谁经过这个哨站……不过现在都是有进无出了。

original: If you're looking for the commanding officer, he's in the back. Although... he's got a lot on his plate, so if you speak with him... keep it short.
translation: 如果你要找指挥官，他就在后面。不过……他非常忙，如果你有话要跟他说……尽量简短一些。

original: Also, if you need any gear checked, we can get you up and running again... once you fill out the work orders, and sign for the parts, of course.
translation: 还有，如果你需要检修装备，我们也可以帮你简单处理……只要你填完这些工作报表，然后再在这部分签字。

original: What do you have for trade?
translation: 你都有些什么货？

original: For you? Hmm. I'm not sure I want to be seen dealing with you... but if you're willing to pay a little extra...
translation: 你？我可不想和你扯上什么关系……但你要是愿意多掏两个子儿……

original: You've certainly done your part.
translation: 该做的你都做了。

original: I've been wondering about Daisy and the others for so long, I still haven't figured out what I should do.
translation: 我一直对黛西和其他人心存芥蒂，我还是不明白究竟应该怎么做。

original: I mean, I'm not like them. I was born at Navarro and my father served with them, but I wasn't really part of the Enclave.
translation: 我是说，我和他们不一样。我出生在纳瓦罗，我父亲和他们是战友，但我本人并不是英克雷的一员。

original: It seems presumptuous of me to think I could join the fight, even if this is a cause worth fighting for.
translation: 即便确实值得一战，亲自上前线对我而言似乎也太过冒失了。

original: Because I know when fighting breaks out at the dam, all hell is going to break loose in Freeside. They're going to need every doctor they can get.
translation: 因为我知道一旦战斗在大坝打响，自由城就会变作人间地狱。到时候最缺的就是医生。

original: That's their story, Arcade, not yours.
translation: 那是他们的往事，阿卡德，不是你的。

original: It seems pointless to do all of that without a goal.
translation: 如果没有追求，感觉做这些也没啥意义。

original: I'm sure Henry has goals. He was just more concerned with the "how" than the "why" of things. Being in the Enclave didn't really mean much to him.
translation: 我敢肯定亨利是有所追求的。比起"为什么"，他更关心"怎么做"。是否为英克雷效劳，对他来说根本无关紧要。

original: I guess I'm lucky that I'm part of the Followers. Helping people as a doctor is important, but with the Followers, it feels different.
translation: 我觉得能成为天启追随者的一分子真的很幸运。以医生的身份助人固然重要，但和这些同仁们一道奋斗，感觉又不同了。

original: It feels like we're working toward something more important. That's more than the sum of the good deeds that we do.
translation: 仿佛我们正在朝着一个更加崇高的目标而努力。甚至比我们做过的所有事情加起来还要崇高。

original: Some people can't stop reliving their glory days.
translation: 有些人就是无法忘怀过去的光辉岁月。

original: Not much glory in the Enclave. Most of her old comrades are long gone.
translation: 在英克雷的日子也不那么光辉。她的大部分老战友都去世很久了。

original: I know life as a salvager can't compare to being a vertibird pilot but... at least it's a life. That has to count for something.
translation: 我知道捡破烂的日子比不上当飞鸟驾驶员……但至少那是人生。人生决非毫无意义。

original: It was an important part of her life. Why shouldn't she enjoy it?
translation: 那是她生命中很重要的一部分。为什么她不该好好享受呢？

original: As screwed up as it sounds, at least she was a part of something. Granted, it was something... admittedly, pretty bad, but it was something.
translation: 虽然听起来有些令人不齿，但至少她曾经有个归属。对她而言，当然有意义……诚然，不是啥好事，可还是有意义啊。

original: If you spent the first half of your life flying Enclave troopers in a vertibird, I suppose picking over Pre-War rocket parts doesn't quite compare.
translation: 如果你上半辈子都在开着飞鸟运送英克雷士兵，而下半辈子就只能捡捡火箭弹碎片，那种心理落差是可想而知的。

original: What? Are you serious? I've got to see that!
translation: 什么？你说真的？我要去看看！

original: Where would I find a diagnostic scanning module?
translation: 我在哪里可以找到诊断扫描模块？

original: It's been said that the Auto-Docs were standard equipment in the underground Vaults where mankind survived when the bombs fell centuries ago.
translation: 据说自动医生是避难所的标准配备，数百年前人类曾在那里躲避核战争。

original: You can search the Vaults, but every Auto-Doc my Legion has run across has been stripped for parts long before we found it.
translation: 你可以去这些避难所里找找，不过军团以前也搜索过，所有的自动医生早就被拆得精光了。

original: Some of my scouts did report an abandoned Vault near Nellis Air Force Base. Overrun by Ghouls, they said.
translation: 倒是曾经有探子报告，在内利斯空军基地附近有一座避难所。但已经被尸鬼控制了。

original: Maybe the infestation has been there long enough to keep scavengers out. Why don't you go and see?
translation: 也许长期的感染已经令拾荒者不敢靠近了。你干嘛不亲自去那里看看呢？

original: He's standing right outside your tent.
translation: 他就站在你的帐篷外。

original: I'll have my guards take him captive. If he cures my condition, I'll see to it that your reward is several times his value.
translation: 我会命守卫把他抓来的。如果他能治好我的病，我可以保证，你所获得的报酬要远比他的身价高出数倍。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Then go find some proper Surgical Tools. The medication from a Doctor's Bag might come in handy, too.
translation: [成功] 那去找手术工具吧。医生手提箱的用品应该挺管用的。

original: I'll make sure you're allowed to bring the necessary medications into the camp. Hurry back. I don't know how long I've got.
translation: 我会准许你把必要的医疗器材带进营地。快去，我不知道自己还能坚持多久。

original: It's a simple procedure... as brain surgeries go.
translation: 程序很简单…就如脑部手术一样。

original: [Medicine options]
translation: [医学选项]

original: [SUCCEEDED] I don't- I don't know... There have been a couple...
translation: [成功] 我不知道…已经好几次了……

original: You just experienced an Absence Seizure. Was this the first time?
translation: 你刚才失神了，这是头一次吗？

original: What about the White Glove Society?
translation: 白手套怎么办？

original: I was saying that I'd planned to ask you to forge an alliance with them, but you've killed their leaders.
translation: 我原本的意思是让你去和他们结盟，结果你却把他们的头领给杀了。

original: By the time the White Gloves sort themselves out, the battle for Hoover Dam will have come and gone. So, on to the next matter at hand...
translation: 等到白手套恢复元气，估计胡佛大坝的战斗早就结束了。算了，我们还是说下一件事吧……

original: [FAILED] Fuck off.
translation: [失败] 滚开。

original: You don't look so good.
translation: 你好像不大对头。

original: Who is this Legatus you mention?
translation: 你提到的这个特使是谁？

original: Legatus Lanius, Monster of the East! Quite a man, if man he be.
translation: 特使拉尼厄斯，东方之兽！真正的男子汉，甚至这个词都不足以形容他。

original: Caesar prides himself on selecting the right tool to overcome each new obstacle. In Lanius, he found his hammer.
translation: 凯撒最引以为傲的是用人，他总能选出正确的工具来克服新障碍。而拉尼厄斯，就是他找到的一把铁锤。

original: He's never been defeated in battle. 14 tribes have laid down arms at his boots. Another five, rendered extinct.
translation: 他从未吃过败仗。有14个部落臣服在他的脚下，另外5个不愿投降的都已经化为了尘埃。

original: His latest campaign in the wilds of the Utah has concluded, and he is en route. When he arrives, your doom arrives with him.
translation: 他刚刚结束犹他州的战役，正在赶来的路上。等他一到，你们的末日也将接踵而至。

original: Tell me about Caesar.
translation: 跟我说说凯撒的事。

original: What can be said? He's a man of towering intellect, the founder of the Legion, conquerer of 86 tribes.
translation: 有什么好说的？他智力超群，是军团的创建者，征服了86个部落。

original: Caesar is the salvation of mankind, his Legion the rebirth of civilization in a benighted age.
translation: 凯撒是人类的救星，他的军团象征着文明在这个黑暗时代的重生。

original: Don't worry, you'll know him well when you serve him. Or you'll be dead.
translation: 别担心，等你服侍他的时候，自然会了解他。不了解的人是会有性命之忧的。

original: How can I serve the Legion?
translation: 我该如何为军团效力？

original: You bear the Mark of Caesar. That makes you special.
translation: 你带着凯撒的印记。看来你不同寻常。

original: Do whatever Caesar tells you to do. And whenever the opportunity presents, strike at the Profligates. Pile body upon body.
translation: 你要遵照凯撒的命令行事。并且一有机会，就攻击荒淫之人，让他们尸横遍野。

original: I admire the purity of the Legion's justice.
translation: 军团的正义如此纯粹，令我钦慕。

original: You're unusually bright for a Profligate. Well done.
translation: 你居然如此开窍，作为一名荒淫之人真有些不同寻常。很好。

original: Now go, and teach what you've learned here. There will be more lessons in the days ahead.
translation: 你可以走了，把在这里看到的一切告诉其他人吧。在未来的日子里，你们还会学到更多。

original: Sounds like they got what was coming to them.
translation: 听起来他们罪有应得。

original: It has a stark beauty, doesn't it? I'm glad you can appreciate it.
translation: 这显然是一种质朴的美，不是吗？我很高兴你能欣赏它。

original: Now go, and teach the Mojave Outpost what you've learned here. There will be more lessons in the days ahead.
translation: 你可以走了，把在这里看到的一切告诉莫哈维前哨的人吧。在未来的日子里，你们还会学到更多。

original: Yes, they did. As will all the rest of you, in due time.
translation: 对，确实如此。你们其他人迟早也会这样。

original: Now go, and teach them what you learned here. There will be more lessons in the days ahead.
translation: 你可以走了，把在这里看到的一切告诉其他人吧。在未来的日子里，你们还会学到更多。

original: You captured everyone?
translation: 你抓住了所有人？

original: Yes, and herded them to the center of town. I told them their sins, the foremost being disloyalty.
translation: 是的。我把他们驱赶到镇中心，宣布他们的罪状，第一条就是不忠。

original: I told them that when the Legionaries are disloyal, some are punished, the others made to watch. And I announced the lottery.
translation: 我告诉他们，军团士兵如果不忠，其中一部分人会受到惩罚，而另外的人则必须看着。接着，我宣布开始抽奖。

original: Each clutched his ticket, hoping it would set him free. Each did nothing, even when "loved ones" were dragged away to be killed.
translation: 每个人都紧紧抓着自己的彩票，希望能靠它获得自由。就算"深爱的人"被拖出去处死，他们也无动于衷。

original: What exactly happened here?
translation: 这里到底出了什么事？

original: Nipton was a wicked place, debased and corrupt. It served all comers, so long as they paid.
translation: 尼普顿是个邪恶的地方，腐败又堕落。只要付钱，它会向任何人敞开大门。

original: Profligate troops, Powder Gangers - or men of the Legion. The people here didn't care. It was a town of whores.
translation: 无论荒淫之人的部队，炸药帮，还是我这样的军团士兵——这里的人都不在乎。他们就是一群娼妓。

original: For a pittance, the great Vulpes Inculta inveigled this town to lead those it had sheltered into a trap.
translation: 不久前，沃尔普斯·因库塔欺骗了镇上的人，将整个镇子诱入了全套。

original: Only when it was sprung did they realize they were caught inside it, too. I only wish Vulpes had lived to see the scheme come to fruition.
translation: 若不是他亲自点破，镇民们还不知道自己已经成为瓮中之鳖。我真希望沃尔普斯能活着看到计划实现。

original: Tell me about Caesar's Legion.
translation: 跟我说说凯撒军团的事。

original: The Legion is civilization reborn. Our culture is based on virtues such as martial excellence, loyalty, and justice.
translation: 军团象征着文明的重生。我们的文化植根于尚武、忠诚和正义之类美德之上。

original: But you'll learn all there is to know in due time. Legatus Lanius, Monster of the East, will soon arrive to command Caesar's troops in battle.
translation: 不过这些还是留着你以后慢慢学习吧。特使拉尼厄斯，东方之兽，很快就要来指挥凯撒的部队作战了。

original: The Dam will fall, and the rest of the Profligate west will soon follow.
translation: 大坝必将落入我们手中，西部其他的荒淫之人也会随之灭亡。

original: What "lessons" did you teach here?
translation: 你给了他们什么"教训"？

original: Where to begin? That they are weak, and we are strong? This much was known already.
translation: 从哪开始说呢？他们很弱，我们很强？这个已经是众所周知的了。

original: But the depths of their moral sickness, their dissolution? Nipton serves as the perfect object lesson.
translation: 但说起他们的劣根性，吃里扒外？尼普顿就是个很好的例子。

original: Where to begin? That you are weak, and we are strong? This much was known already.
translation: 从哪开始说呢？他们很弱，我们很强？这个已经是众所周知的了。

original: But the depths of your moral sickness, your dissolution? Nipton serves as the perfect object lesson.
translation: 但说起他们的劣根性，吃里扒外？尼普顿就是个很好的例子。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: I am Gabban, of Caesar's Legion. I serve my master as one of his Frumentarii.
translation: 我是加本，隶属凯撒军团。我以军团特工的身份为我的主人效命。

original: We Frumentarii are soldiers of a different stripe, capable in battle, but skilled as infiltrators and agents as well.
translation: 我们特工和其他军士不同，虽然我们一样骁勇善战，但最擅长的还是渗透和谍报。

original: I'm going to wear your head like you wear that dog's.
translation: 我会拿你的脑袋当帽子戴，就像你戴着狗头一样。

original: Legionaries - we have a problem!
translation: 将士们——我们这儿遇到了点问题！

original: He's all yours.
translation: 他归你处置了。

original: It will be done.
translation: 没问题。

original: I've brought a doctor, Arcade Gannon, who can take care of Caesar. He's outside.
translation: 我带来了一个叫阿卡德·甘农的医生，他可以照顾凯撒。他就在外面。

original: Very well. I'll have him seized and brought to Caesar as his personal physician.
translation: 很好。我会把他抓来给凯撒当私人医生。

original: So shall I have him seized or not?
translation: 我要不要去把他绑过来？

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Yes, goodbye.
translation: 好的。再见。

original: So tell me, did you really think I'd be stupid enough to fall for this again? One of my men saw you go in and out of the Kings' place.
translation: 我说，你真以为我会蠢到再一次中你的计吗？我的人可是亲眼看到你从猫王帮的老窝里走出来了！

original: As much as I hate to lose a customer, it's just unavoidable sometimes.
translation: 虽然我也不想失去一个主顾，但有时候情况特殊，只好委屈你了。

original: Here's the chip.
translation: 芯片在这里。

original: The guard in the weather station will return the Chip to you when you're ready for Caesar's mission. Otherwise, we can return to Cottonwood Cove.
translation: 如果你准备好执行凯撒交待的任务了，气象站里的守卫会还给你芯片。否则，我们也可以返回棉白杨湾。

original: Here you go.
translation: 给你。

original: You're free to leave. The guard in the weather station will return the Chip to you when you're ready for Caesar's mission.
translation: 你可以离开了。等你准备好执行凯撒交待的任务了，气象站的守卫就会把芯片还给你。

original: Yes. Return what you took from me.
translation: 是的，把东西还给我。

original: Done.
translation: 完成。

original: The password is "The better part of valor."
translation: 密码是"谨慎即大勇"。

original: [You hear static.]
translation: [你听到了静电的声音]

original: We were getting a little worried. Where's your partner? No, on second thought, don't tell me.
translation: 我们都有些担心。你的同伴呢？不，算了，你还是别告诉我了。

original: Give your report to the Elder, then have the doc look you over. Oh, and welcome back.
translation: 去向长老报告吧，再去找个医生给你看看。哦，还有，欢迎回来。

original: The password is "And to dare to do it."
translation: 密码是"坚毅果敢"。

original: [You hear static.]
translation: [你听到了静电的声音]

original: We were getting a little worried. Where's your partner? No, on second thought, don't tell me.
translation: 我们都有些担心。你的同伴呢？不，算了，你还是别告诉我了。

original: Give your report to the Elder, then have the doc look you over. Oh, and welcome back.
translation: 去向长老报告吧，再找个医生来给你看看。哦，还有，欢迎回来。

original: Seems like you pop up everywhere, Victor.
translation: 维克多，你真是无处不在啊。

original: Aw shucks, pardner. I suppose it can't hurt to let you in on my little secret!
translation: 噢，该死，朋友。不过让你知道我的小秘密也没什么不妥。

original: Old Victor wouldn't be much use stuck inside just one Securitron! No, I can move from one to another with the snap of a finger!
translation: 老维克才不会永远呆在同一台电子保安里头呢！相反，我只要动几下手指头，就能从一台机器跳到另一台机器里去！

original: Pretty nice trick, ain't it? Just don't ask me how I do it, because I don't know!
translation: 这把戏不错吧？别问我是怎么做到的，因为我自己也不知道！

original: <Keep holdout weapons> Sure, I agree to disarm.
translation: <留下藏匿的武器> 当然了，我同意解除武装。

original: <Give Sammy the key from Canyon Runner>
translation: <把从峡谷行者那里得来的钥匙交给萨米>

original: Freedom? I don't know where we'll get a new start, but any place is better than rotting with the Legion or Frank.
translation: 我自由了？不知道我们接下来该去哪里，但去哪儿都比和军团或者弗兰克呆在一块儿要强。

original: <Speech more money>
translation: <要求加钱>

original: [SUCCEEDED] Alright. 50/50 it is, but you better bring back all of the caps. If we hear you crossed us, the next bounty hunter will be coming for you.
translation: [成功] 好吧。五五分，但你最好能把所有的瓶盖都收回来。要是让我们知道你在耍我们，那下个赏金猎人的目标就是你的脑袋。

original: Hey, I'm doing all of the work here. 50/50 and I'm game.
translation: 嘿，所有的活儿可都是我一个人干哪。你得给我五五分账。

original: [FAILED] Who the hell do you think you're talking to? Keep talking like that and your ass is going to be in the gutter. 25%. Take it or leave it.
translation: [失败] 你知道自己在和谁说话吗？再用这种口气和我讨价还价，小心我捅爆你的屁眼。25%，不能更多了。

original: Twenty-five percent?! Fifty-fifty, or I walk.
translation: 才25%？五五开，否则免谈。

original: <Barter>
translation: <砍价>

original: [SUCCEEDED] All right. 50/50 it is, but you better bring back all of the caps.
translation: [成功] 好吧。五五分，但你最好能把所有的瓶盖都收回来。

original: If we hear you crossed us, the next bounty hunter will be coming for you.
translation: 要是让我们知道你在耍我们，那下个赏金猎人的目标就是你的脑袋。

original: This kind of work costs time and money. 50/50 would cover my expenses.
translation: 这个活吃力又不讨好。必须五五分成，我才能接受。

original: [FAILED] Who the hell do you think you're talking to? Keep talking like that and your ass is going to be in the gutter. 25%. Take it or leave it.
translation: [失败] 你知道自己在和谁说话吗？再用这种口气和我讨价还价，小心我捅爆你的屁眼。25%，不能更多了。

original: Are you crazy?! I'll be walking all over the place looking for these people.
translation: 你疯了吗？为了找那几个家伙，我得把整个镇子都翻个遍。

original: I don't think either of us can fully understand what he and the tribes have gone through.
translation: 我觉得也许我们并不能真正理解他和部落所经历过的苦难。

original: A fair point, but from the perspective of someone west of the Colorado, the man is clearly out of his mind.
translation: 说得在理，但作为一个从亚利桑那东部过来的人，我可以告诉你，他绝对是疯了。

original: Maybe he didn't intend for things to wind up this way, but that doesn't mean he needs to perpetuate this bizarre anachronistic myth.
translation: 或许他当初没料到会是这样的结果，但并不意味着他可以继续去兜售一个早该被丢进历史垃圾堆中的神话。

original: And it doesn't mean that we should sit by and nod our heads at every absurd faux-Roman casus belli he can dream up.
translation: 也不意味着我们可以容忍他效仿古罗马编出各种荒谬的开战理由，还在一旁拍手叫好。

original: He's a tyrant. The bad kind. And there's no way we're letting him take Hoover Dam.
translation: 他是个暴君，一个残忍无道的恶魔。我们绝不能让他占领胡佛水坝。

original: He's a madman. What did you expect?
translation: 他是个疯子。你还期望什么？

original: Well, yeah! Right. What did I expect? The man's a megalomaniac. He acts like this is some pre-ordained cycle we're returning to.
translation: 是，对！没错。我干嘛要有所期望呢？这个男人就是个自大狂。他所做的一切不过是在将我们拖入历史的轮回。

original: Of all the people who could learn from our past mistakes, he goes and throws all of our knowledge off a cliff.
translation: 明明该从过去的错误中吸取教训，他却反过来将人类千百年来积累的知识统统抛下悬崖。

original: Instead of trying to learn from the past, he re-creates it, runs back over the same old barren ground.
translation: 他不但没有正视历史，反而企图重蹈覆辙，将人们重新带回到蛮荒时代。

original: He seemed pretty smart to me.
translation: 在我看来，他是个十足的聪明人。

original: Being "smart" doesn't matter if you're insane. Everything makes sense to Caesar because he's twisted everything to his world view.
translation: 如果你脑子不正常，再聪明也没用。凯撒之所以觉得自己是正道，是因为他在用扭曲的眼光看待这个世界。

original: He's Caesar reincarnated, the NCR is the corrupt Roman senate. I wouldn't be surprised if he thought the Colorado River were the new Rubicon.
translation: 他觉得自己是凯撒再世，而NCR就是那腐朽不堪的罗马元老院。如果他将科罗拉多河当成卢比孔河，我也不会感到意外。

original: He abdicates responsibility to a myth of historical inevitability. But he's not Caesar. This isn't Rome. And he isn't going to get away with this.
translation: 他如此坚信自己的神话，将一切都归咎于历史的必然。但他不是凯撒。这儿也不是罗马。而他更是难逃罪责。

original: That was just talk. It's not the same for you.
translation: 不过是说说罢了。对你来说可不一样。

original: No, I think it is the same for me. Maybe for a different reason, but... you can't hold on to a past you've never had.
translation: 不，我想对我来说是一样的。虽然也许原因不同，可……你总不能执拗于一个根本不存在的过去吧。

original: For better or worse, I am not my father. I never had a life with the Enclave, and it would be silly for me to try to start one now.
translation: 再怎么说，我也不是我父亲。我从未加入过英克雷，再去假扮他们也未免太过愚蠢。

original: I'll stay with you until the Legion moves on the dam, but once the attack starts, I'm going to have to go to back to Freeside. It's where I belong.
translation: 我会跟着你到军团进攻大坝为止，一旦战斗打响，我就要返回自由城。那里才是我的归宿。

original: I need to take care of something, but I'll see you soon enough. Thanks for all of your help. It means a lot to me.
translation: 我还有些事要处理，不过我们很快会再见面的。谢谢你的帮助，对我真的意义非凡。

original: You aren't like the others, Arcade. You're still young. It's up to you to decide who you want to be.
translation: 你和他们不一样，阿卡德。你还年轻。你可以自己决定自己的前途。

original: True enough. Maybe I can't fill my father's shoes. I wouldn't even know how.
translation: 这是实话。看来我也无法继承家父的衣钵。我甚至都不知道该怎么做。

original: But if following in his footsteps for a while means I can do some good out here, I'll do my best.
translation: 但如果我能追随他的脚步，做一些善事的话，我还是会尽力而为的。

original: I need to go do something. I won't be gone long, but I'll catch up with you later. Thanks for your help with the others. It means a lot to me.
translation: 我还有事要处理。我不会去太久，过一阵就回来。谢谢你帮助了他们，对我而言真的意义非凡。

original: Is the Enclave's treatment by the Brotherhood influencing your opinion?
translation: 兄弟会对待英克雷的态度影响了你的看法吗？

original: Some of the old-timers like Moreno hold grudges against the Brotherhood and the NCR. I'd like to think I'm above that, but you may be right.
translation: 像莫雷诺这样的老一辈，有不少人对NCR和兄弟会积怨难消。我是根本不在意这些，但或许你说的没错。

original: I'm not going to pout and cry if you give it to the Brotherhood. I'd rather they have it than allow all that knowledge to disappear.
translation: 如果你把他交给兄弟会，我也不会撅起嘴来哭鼻子的。但我觉得将知识拿来运用还是要比封存起来好。

original: I'd just prefer that it go to an organization like the Followers, who are less likely to use it for... violent purposes.
translation: 我只是更希望它能被天启追随者这样的组织所掌握，至少不大可能会被用于……暴力。

original: Wow. That thing is definitely carrying around a bunch of Enclave intel. Adams is on the eastern seaboard of the country.
translation: 哇哦。那玩意里头肯定装了不少关于英克雷的情报。亚当斯位于东海岸。

original: Which means that little "Duraframe" sucker somehow managed to survive for over two thousand miles. Certainly lives up to its model name.
translation: 也就是说，"杜拉骨架"这个小杂种居然跨越了整整2000英里的距离。还真是名副其实。

original: What are you going to do now?
translation: 你现在要做什么？

original: Back to Old Mormon Fort, where I can do some good. We Followers may be idealistic but even I know this is going to end in blood.
translation: 返回旧摩门教要塞，至少在那儿我还能做点事情。虽然天启追随者向来有些理想主义，可即便是我，也知道今天必将血流成河。

original: Fortis fortuna adiuvat. Good luck, and good bye.
translation: （拉丁文）命运总会眷顾勇士。祝你好运，再见。

original: Thanks, I guess.
translation: 多谢了。

original: I have to admit, I did not expect that sort of response.
translation: 我得承认，我没想到你会是这种反应。

original: This is one of the last surviving suits of original-issue Tesla armor from Navarro and it was worn by my father but... yeah I guess it's no big deal.
translation: 这可是纳瓦罗仅存的几套初始型特斯拉装甲之一，我父亲曾经穿过……不过我也觉得没什么大不了的。

original: Good luck at Hoover Dam. I'll uh... be going now, I guess.
translation: 祝你在胡佛大坝能有好运气。我，呃……要走了。

original: I'm honored.
translation: 我很荣幸。

original: It's the least I could do. All I ask is that you put it to good use. This place has lived in the shadow of Caesar for long enough.
translation: 我能做的也只有这些了。我唯一的要求是好好使用它。这地方已经笼罩在凯撒的阴影之下太久了。

original: I may not be the one to help stop him here, but you are. Fortis fortuna adiuvat. Good luck, and good bye.
translation: 也许我没有办法阻止他，但你可以。（拉丁文）命运总能眷顾勇士。祝你好运，再见。

original: Fuck you man, I ain't going nowhere with you.
translation: 干你丫的，我才不跟你走呢。

original: Why don't you go cry to your wife, then - oh, that's right! She left your worthless stinking ass!
translation: 你怎么不躲到你老婆怀里哭鼻子去呢——哦，对了！她早就离开你这个窝囊废了 !

original: I spoke to Marjorie. I say leave the White Glove Society alone.
translation: 我已经和玛乔里以及莫蒂默谈过了。白手套社团就不要再管了。

original: Say no more, say no more... if you say they're good, they're good!
translation: 不用说了，不用说了……只要你说好，那就是好！

original: I spoke to Mortimer. I say leave the White Glove Society alone.
translation: 我和莫蒂默谈过了。不用再管白手套社团了。

original: Say no more, say no more... if you say they're good, they're good!
translation: 不予评论，不予评论……既然你说他们好，那就好！

original: Any idea what I should do with it?
translation: 你知道我该怎么修好它吗？

original: Not a bit. I imagine there must be some people around curious about that kind of technology.
translation: 没主意。我猜想附近会有别的人对这种技术感到好奇吧。

original: Do you mind if I try to fix it?
translation: 你不介意我试着修理一下吧？

original: You're welcome to try. It's yours if you can get it working.
translation: 请便吧。如果你能修好，它就归你处置了。

original: If I had my way I'd dump it in the scrapyard in Novac and be done with the damn thing.
translation: 不过要我说，倒不如一脚把它踹进诺瓦克的废品场，眼不见心不烦。

original: What is wrong with it?
translation: 它怎么了？

original: Hell if I know. I don't think it's serious, but my tinkering days are long gone.
translation: 鬼知道咧。我估计应该不太严重，但我已经很多年没干过修理工了。

original: I have some questions about your robot.
translation: 我对你的机器人有些疑问。

original: That beat up old thing? What do you want to know?
translation: 那个老破烂？你想知道什么？

original: Why can't you protect them?
translation: 你们为什么没能力保护他们？

original: We don't have the equipment to take out the convicts, and even if we did, we need some extra hands for backup.
translation: 我们的装备不够，没法对付那些逃犯。而且就算有了装备，我们的人手也不足。

original: You should talk to Lieutenant Hayes. He's in a tent down the road. Just stay on the west side of the overpass if you don't want to get shot.
translation: 你应该去和海耶斯中尉谈谈。他就在那头的帐篷里。最好待在高架桥的西边，否则可能会吃枪子。

original: Shouldn't you be protecting the town or something?
translation: 你们不是该去保护村子吗？

original: We'd love to, but they don't fall under NCR jurisdiction. Even if they did, we're in no shape to protect them.
translation: 我们倒想，可他们并不在NCR的管辖范围之内。就算归我们管，我们也没有能力去保护他们。

original: I've helped out around here, sending troops to Primm will fortify the NCR in the region.
translation: 我把这附近的问题都解决了，往普瑞姆派兵可以增强NCR在这一地区的防御力量。

original: I see the wisdom in that. I'll radio for a unit to head up to Primm and offer some additional support.
translation: 言之有理，我会派一支部队去普瑞姆，并且给那边提供一点额外的补给。

original: I thought you were dead.
translation: 我还以为你死了。

original: I feel really bad telling you this, but I kind of... can't die. I mean, go ahead and destroy this Securitron, get it out of your system!
translation: 其实我也不想和你说这个，但从某种程度上来说……我是死不了的。我的意思是，你大可以把这个机器人摧毁，可那样也只不过是把我赶出它的系统而已！

original: The problem is that a distributed image of my neuro-computational matrix is backed-up to the network several times a day, or when I'm threatened!
translation: 奥妙在于，我的神经运算系统有一套分布式镜像，每天都会进行多次网络备份，在我受到威胁的时候，它也会自动备份！

original: I can't help it! There's a little bit of me in every Securitron on the Strip, so if this instance gets destroyed, I just download to a new one.
translation: 我也没办法！长街上的每台安保机器人身上都嵌入了我的数据，所以即便你毁掉了眼前这台机器人，我只要再下载一组新的就可以了。

original: If I could stop it from happening, I would! I mean, your vengeance is going to feel so incomplete!
translation: 我当然不希望这样！像我现在这个样子，你就算报了仇也没有快感！

original: Is this because I didn't upgrade that army of Securitrons under Caesar's Fort?
translation: 难道是因为我没有给堡垒里的机器人部队更新装备吗？

original: Well, the problem is that's left us with enough Securitrons to drive off a weakened NCR force - probably - but not enough to keep them from coming back!
translation: 呃，问题就在于，我们手头的机器人虽然能打败一支元气大伤的NCR部队——当然这也没个准——却不能阻止他们卷土重来！

original: So what we do is take away the whole reason why they'd want to come back! Smart, huh?
translation: 所以我们得制造个理由，让他们不会再回来了！你觉得如何？

original: I know Elijah needs to be dealt with, just let me handle it.
translation: 我知道必须干掉以利亚，交给我处理就好。

original: Dog forgot himself, as did the voice that raged within him. After their passing, a new voice spoke within the mutant's shell.
translation: 狗和他体内那狂躁的声音一起忘记了自我。他们消失后，一个新的声音在这变种人的躯壳中诞生了。

original: It was difficult for the voice to remember the two it once was... there was the beast, Dog consumed by hunger...
translation: 这声音无法再回想起自己的过往…印象中曾有一只野兽，被饥饿所驱使……

original: ...and the other in reverse... the one consumed by control.
translation: …还有另一个声音…不肯放下自己的控制欲。

original: Both were driven by need for the other. The Courier brought them together, somehow, joined the two into one.
translation: 两个灵魂原本彼此互补，针锋相对。但邮差却让他们走到了一起，将他们合二为一。

original: All that happened at the Sierra Madre, was a faint memory to the new personality... like a flickering light in the clouds of the mind.
translation: 对这新的人格来说，所有关于马德雷山脉赌场的记忆…都化为了浓雾中摇曳的一束烛光。

original: The new voice did not think of the Courier again until the battle at the Divide reached his ears.
translation: 直到发生在大裂谷的那场战斗传到耳边，这个声音才想起了邮差的名字。

original: The battle between the two couriers, beneath the torn skies and the Old World flag... each bearing a message for the other.
translation: 在残破的天空下，背负着旧世界的旗帜，两位邮差展开了宿命的对决... 彼此都携带着给对方的一段口信。

original: And the mutant prayed the Courier that had saved him... had been saved in return.
translation: 于是变种人开始为那个曾经拯救过他的邮差祈祷……希望吉人自有天助。

original: Christine, her mission complete, found new purpose as the Sierra Madre's warden. She watched over it silently - by choice.
translation: 克莉丝汀完成了使命，也找到了新的人生目标，她成为了马德雷山脉赌场新的看守者。为了守护这里，她决定保持沉默。

original: Over time, the Ghost People came to see her as one of the Holograms. They would watch, silently, as she walked among them.
translation: 随着时间推移，鬼人们渐渐把她当成了全息影像。每当她从身边走过时，它们便会安静地注视着她。

original: At times, Christine thought of the Courier, who had kept Elijah's hand from her throat.
translation: 有时，克莉丝汀会想起那位邮差，正是那个人从以利亚的魔掌中解救了自己。

original: The Courier reminded her of the other courier she had met in the Big Empty, and wondered if the two had found each other at last.
translation: 而那位邮差又令她回忆起了自己曾在大山脉遇到的另一位邮差，她不禁好奇这两人是否有朝一日会相遇。

original: She did not think of them again until she heard the legends of the Divide.
translation: 她渐渐淡忘了这件事，直到有一天，她听说了发生在大裂谷的传奇。

original: The Divide, where the two messengers, the two couriers, fought beneath an ancient flag, at the edge of the world.
translation: 在裂谷中，两位邮差，两位信使，在世界的边缘，在古老的旗帜下，展开了较量。

original: I need you to go down to the manual bypass room to regulate the power.
translation: 我需要你下到配电室去，重新分配电力。

original: [Christine glances at the elevator. Her expression becomes worried, then she looks back at you, then reluctantly shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀瞥了一眼电梯，露出了担忧的神情，然后她看向你，勉强地摇了摇头。]

original: Fine. Get up and follow me.
translation: 好吧。起来跟着我。

original: All right, all right... but you already have company, so tell you what - I'll meet you at the Fountain.
translation: 好吧，好吧…但是你已经有了同伴。这样吧，我去喷泉处等你。

original: What are the Vending Machines all over town?
translation: 镇上这些自动贩卖机是干什么的？

original: Those little company stores? Sinclair's toy boxes. Put in a casino chip, get a treat, like you're some dog doing tricks.
translation: 那些内部商店？它们是辛克莱的玩具箱，只要投入赌场的筹码，你就能得到一些小奖品，就像耍把戏的狗一样。

original: Take any of the casino chips, put 'em into the machine, and you'll get something out - a snack, a cola, something to mend a tear in your shirt.
translation: 随便拿几个赌场的筹码，塞进机器里，你就可以从里面得到各种东西，比如零食、可乐、甚至缝补用的针线。

original: Sometimes you have to know exactly what to ask for, other times, there's codes for... eh, unconventional items. For emergencies.
translation: 有时你得先想清楚自己要什么，其他时候呢，为了应对紧急情况，也会有一些兑换代码，来满足特殊的……呃，需求。

original: If your collar goes off, mine goes off. It's better if we guard each other.
translation: 如果你的项圈爆炸了，我的也会爆炸，所以咱们最好合作。

original: 100 Chips for 100 Pre-War bills.
translation: 100美元战前钞票换100个筹码。

original: [You place the bills on the counter. A panel flips, taking the bills with it... and 100 Chips appear in their place.]
translation: [你把钞票放在柜台上，桌板一翻，钞票不见了…取而代之的是100个筹码。]

original: Collect Comps.
translation: 取回代金券。

original: You could have left the Sierra Madre. Left this Villa, joined your own kind.
translation: 你其实可以离开马德雷山脉赌场，离开以利亚，去找你的同类。

original: That Auto-Doc really carved you up.
translation: 那个自动医生看来把你害得不轻。

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods... slowly, then puts her hand in front her throat, closes it slowly, then points at you.]
translation: [成功] [她慢慢…点了点头，然后把手放在喉咙前，缓慢合上，又指着你]

original: Those facial scars weren't done by the Auto-Doc - the throat scar was.
translation: 你脸上的伤口和自动医生无关，但你喉咙上的伤疤是它造成的。

original: [FAILED] [She frowns, narrows her eyes, and looks at you.]
translation: [失败] [她皱起眉头，眯着眼睛看着你。]

original: <AUDIO: Needs radio filter for this, and ambient sounds outside suites after Christine has been saved and is speaking to herself.>
translation: <音频： 需要电台渗入此内， 在克里斯汀被救并且自言自语后，让周围声音适应她的声.>

original: [Christine frowns.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱了皱眉头。]

original: Oh, it wasn't me... I have no use for your neck beyond what encircles it. The lack of screams when I finally kill you... that is what I'll regret.
translation: 噢，又不是我干的…我对你的脖子没有任何兴趣，除了它上面围着的那圈玩意。要是我最后杀你的时候听不到尖叫声……那我才会感到后悔呢。

original: [Christine's eyes narrow.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起了眼睛。]

original: Don't get me wrong, that's a plus in my book.
translation: 别误会，在我看来这可是加分项呢。

original: [Christine eyes narrow to slits.]
translation: [克莉丝汀的眼睛眯成了一条线。]

original: Still, are you getting any shred of your voice healed up, or...? Like anything?
translation: 不过，你就没有想点办法治好自己的嗓子吗，还是说……？想过吗？

original: Someone wanted to cut your voice, little doll. Or they didn't finish their work, or didn't know how to.
translation: 有人想要让你变成哑巴，小娃娃。他们要么是没来得及这么做，要么就是不懂得该怎么办。

original: <AUDIO: If the player hasn't dropped Christine off at the Gala Event and she is alone at the fountain, this will be crackling silence.>
translation: <音频：如果玩家不在盛会开幕时抛下克里斯汀，并把她留在喷泉广场， 那么这将会打破宁静. >

original: <AUDIO: After Gala Event, not Act 3 yet.>
translation: <音频：在盛会开幕事件后， 还没有达到3.>

original: <AUDIO: If the player has left Christine at the Gala Event in a "good" way, this is the signal that will play.>
translation: <音频: 如果玩家在盛会开幕事件里以“好”的方式抛弃克里斯汀，就会播放这个信号。>

original: <AUDIO: If the player has left Christine at Gala Event and she hates the player, she'll bang on the doors of the elevator to be let out.>
translation: <音频： 如果玩家在盛会开幕事件里抛弃克里斯汀并让她怀恨在心， 她会通过重击电梯大门方式企图逃出去.>

original: [STATIC]
translation: [静电声]

original: I'm not going to hurt you... yet. Much. Scars tell a story, some old, some new... and the one on the throat is fresh and red.
translation: 我不会碰你的…至少现在不会。这些伤疤的背后似乎藏着不少故事，有些旧了，有些还很新…比如喉咙上的那些，还留着血丝。

original: What's this little doll? Were you carved by a craftsman, little doll, or were you mauled by a drunk who didn't know his tools?
translation: 这个小娃娃是谁？ 小娃娃，你是被工匠雕刻成这样的，还是被一个不识好歹的醉汉给弄成这样的？

original: [STATIC]
translation: [静电声]

original: Got to say this for Sinclair, he sure knew how to keep things locked down, the tight-assed prick.
translation: 不得不说，辛克莱这小子在看管宝贝方面真的很在行，不愧是个一毛不拔的铁公鸡。

original: Where the hell did everyone else go?
translation: 其他人都去哪儿了？

original: Wonder what happened to the suckers. Might have gotten taken away, like I did? Hnh.
translation: 不知道那几个傻瓜怎么样了。说不定也和我一样被抓走了？

original: Hnh. Theater's almost the same as it was.
translation: 唔。这个剧院和过去相比几乎没什么变化。

original: Not going to be performing here again, that's for sure.
translation: 我是不准备继续在这里表演了。

original: First time on stage in a hundred years, and it has to be this?
translation: 这可是我时隔百年后首次登台亮相，结果就这？

original: Need some help here... and that audience is not looking friendly.
translation: 谁帮我一把…那位观众似乎不是很安分。

original: Hope my partner fared better than I did... better not have left me high and dry, get-even's not going to be pretty.
translation: 希望我的搭档处境比我好一些…最好别让我孤立无援，否则我做鬼也不会放过那家伙。

original: That audience... better lay low, get a feel for the crowd.
translation: 那位观众…最好低调一点，考虑一下周围人的感受。

original: Good thing, someone walks in here, they're toast.
translation: 棒极了，有人进来了，他完蛋了。

original: I am out of here... well, not to the Villa, just out of the damn theater first chance I get.
translation: 我要离开这里…不是去别墅区，反正只要离开这个剧院就行。

original: This place... hasn't changed at all.
translation: 这个地方……根本就没变嘛。

original: Run from Dog? Dog knows how to hunt. Dog will find you, tear you apart.
translation: 你想摆脱狗？狗可是捕猎能手。他会找到你，把你撕成碎片。

original: That a bet you want to take? Cause I'll see that and raise you a few bullets to the skull.
translation: 你想和我赌谁的命更硬？那尽管来吧，我会用子弹在你的脑门多开几个洞的。

original: Dog's been shot before, many times. Won't stop me from catching you.
translation: 狗以前已经被射伤过很多次。区区一点疼痛是无法阻止他追杀你的。

original: Hope you've got this one under control because he's giving me a nasty itch on my trigger finger.
translation: 希望你好好管教一下这家伙，否则下次我一定会忍不住扣扳机的。

original: Didn't come all this way to get conned by some tourist.
translation: 好不容易走到这一步，绝不能栽在区区一个游客手里。

original: We'll see who's holding the cards in the end...
translation: 看看究竟是谁能笑到最后吧……

original: The joke's on you, "partners." You aren't getting to the prize without me.
translation: 你这是自作聪明，"伙计们"。没有我，你们拿不到大奖的。

original: This is a fine how do you do.
translation: 这可真是教人心寒哪。

original: Should have blown up that seat cushion right when they sat down, would've been a better end than this.
translation: 真该在那家伙坐下的时候就引爆座垫，就不会落到这个下场了。

original: Just finish the last job, Dean. It's all you've wanted, just hang in there.
translation: 把活干完，迪安。你想要的就在眼前，再坚持一会儿。

original: Keep your head down, Dean, don't let the locals see you.
translation: 保持低调，迪安，不要让当地人看到你。

original: Sinclair, you better appreciate all I do to screw you over.
translation: 辛克莱，你真该感谢我为了扳倒你所做的一切。

original: That tourist is better than most. Probably won't matter.
translation: 那个游客比大多数人都强，也可能也没啥大不了的。

original: Town's going to be filled with Ghosts when the sky lights up.
translation: 等到天亮的时候，整个镇子都会布满鬼人。

original: The linked collars is a new trick. Can't say I like it much.
translation: 把项圈连在一起倒是个新花样。但我不喜欢。

original: Waiting for the fireworks. Just like last time.
translation: 等着看烟花吧，就像上次一样。

original: Can't wait to see their faces when they find out what the lock is. Just gotta wait them out.
translation: 等他们发现门锁的情况时，不知道会是什么表情。等着看好了。

original: Place is going to be swarming with the masks when the sky lights up.
translation: 等到天亮的时候，这里的鬼人就会满大街都是了。

original: Not much time to get to the gates before they shut the door and turn folks away.
translation: 在他们关闭大门并驱散当地人之前，我们没有多少时间到达大门那里。

original: Holy Mary, Mother, and Joe - now there's a show.
translation: 我的老天啊，演出开始了。

original: All right, now - I'm out of here.
translation: 好吧，我要离开这里了。

original: If the Ghost People didn't know we were here before, they know now.
translation: 这下鬼人可就都知道我们的位置了。

original: Someone struck up the band. A band of tortured cats.
translation: 演出开始了。 简直就像是虐猫演出。

original: What kind of casino has two Grand Openings?
translation: 什么样的赌场会举办两次开业庆典？

original: This is your last hurrah, Sinclair, I promise you.
translation: 辛克莱，我向你保证，这是你最后一次欢呼了。

original: You wait, beautiful. Keep that gate open for me, Dean'll be there soon.
translation: 你等着，美人儿。给我留着门，迪安马上就来。

original: Sierra Madre, sweetheart, Dean's coming home.
translation: 马德雷，我的甜心，我回家了。

original: Stop looking at me, you idiot. I can hear your stomach growling from here. I don't like it.
translation: 别再盯着我看了，大白痴。我大老远就能听见你的肚子叫唤，我不喜欢那种声音。

original: And we're at peace, you and I, mind and instinct. Then the world will be ready for us.
translation: 只有这样，我和你，理智和本能，才能彻底达成和解。那时，我们才能共同面对这个世界。

original: Hnh. The human pulled it off.
translation: 哼。那个人类成功了。

original: Just like last time. Come on, Dog, you know the drill.
translation: 和上次一样。来吧，狗，你知道该怎么做。

original: What the Old World saw in these light shows is beyond me.
translation: 旧世界的人们为啥要举办这种灯光秀？我实在无法理解。

original: The human did it. Good.
translation: 那个人类做到了。 很好。

original: Not going down like last time - Dog, you're staying in the cage.
translation: 这次绝不能再像上次那样倒下了，狗，这次你必须待在笼子里。

original: Time to get to the gate, "friends" or no friends.
translation: 不管是不是朋友，都该到大门那儿去了。

original: Fires and speakers are going to bring the Ghost People out in full.
translation: 焰火和广播会把外边的鬼人全部引到这里的。

original: Coming for you, human... you just wait.
translation: 我来了，人类…你在那里等着就好。

original: Madre's mine.
translation: 马德雷是我的。

original: So hungry.
translation: 好饿啊。

original: Insides growling.
translation: 肚子在叫。

original: :: Mournful whining to self ::
translation: :: 自己悲泣 ::

original: Hope the voice doesn't come back. Mean. Bad.
translation: 希望那声音不要再回来了。太凶了，太糟了。

original: :: Stomach rumbling.::
translation: :: 胃不停地响着。::

original: Need to stay out of sight... can't afford to be distracted now.
translation: 不能引起注意……这个时候分心后果是会很严重的。

original: Where are lights. Dog want to see the lights.
translation: 灯光在哪里？狗想看见灯光。

original: Can't wait to see the lights.
translation: 好想马上见到灯光。

original: Got to go... Casin-oooo.
translation: 应该去...赌场。

original: Want show and lights and yelling to start.
translation: 想看灯光表演，想对着它们大叫。

original: :: Weeping. ::
:: Whimpering ::
:: Howling in frustration ::
translation: :: 沮丧地嚎叫。 ::

original: Please let me out.
translation: 请放我出去。

original: Dog is sorry, sorry, sorry.
translation: 狗知道错了，对不起，对不起。

original: What did I do?
translation: 我做错了什么？

original: Lights and fire.
translation: 灯火通明。

original: Pretty.
translation: 太美了。

original: Lots of noise.
translation: 太吵了。

original: Where is Master? Did Master make fires in the sky?
translation: 主人在哪里？天上的烟花是主人放的么？

original: :: Delighted clapping ::
translation: :: 高兴地拍手 ::

original: Nooooooooooo!
translation: 不！

original: :: Howling, frightened. ::
translation: :: 吼叫，吓坏了。 ::

original: Let me out, let me out!
translation: 放我出去，放我出去！

original: Noise hurts, noise hurts!
translation: 噪音很吵， 很吵！

original: Streets are hurting my ears!
translation: 街上的声音吵得我耳朵疼！

original: Too bright, too bright.
translation: 太亮啦，太亮啦。

original: Hurry, we're targets out here.
translation: 快一点，我们要变成活靶子了。

original: Almost inside. Finally. Then I can get rid of the baggage.
translation: 终于能进去了。接下来，我就可以抛掉这份累赘了。

original: The Sierra Madre's almost mine.
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场眼看就是我的了。

original: When this festival fires, I'm the first one in the door.
translation: 等到焰火点燃时，我要第一个跑向大门。

original: Last time I ever deal with human trash...
translation: 这是我最后一次和垃圾人类打交道了……

original: All this - if I get inside the Sierra Madre, it's all worth it. All of it.
translation: 我受了这么多苦，只要能进入马德雷山脉赌场，那它们就是值得的。

original: As soon as those collars go off... we'll settle things, yes.
translation: 一旦那些项圈爆炸…事情就解决了，对。

original: The human did it. Good.
translation: 那个人类做到了。很好。

original: Not going down like last time - Dog, you're staying in the cage.
translation: 这次绝不能再像上次那样倒下了，狗，这次你必须待在笼子里。

original: Time to get to the gate, "friends" or no friends.
translation: 不管是敌是友，都该到大门那儿去了。

original: Fires and speakers are going to bring the Ghost People out in full.
translation: 焰火和广播会把外边的鬼人全部引到这里的。

original: Coming for you, human... you just wait.
translation: 我来了，人类…你在那里等着就好。

original: Madre's mine.
translation: 马德雷是我的。

original: Hnh. The human pulled it off.
translation: 哼。那个人类成功了。

original: Just like last time. Come on, Dog, you know the drill.
translation: 和上次一样。来吧，狗，你知道该怎么做。

original: Gate won't be open for long.
translation: 大门不会开太久。

original: Need to stay out of sight... can't afford to be distracted now.
translation: 不能引起注意……这个时候分心后果是会很严重的。

original: What the Old World saw in these light shows is beyond me.
translation: 旧世界的人们为啥要举办这种灯光秀？我实在无法理解。

original: I don't remember you. Who are you?
translation: 我不记得你，你是谁 ?

original: You look like food, smell like food. Dog - hungry.
translation: 你看起来挺好吃，闻起来也挺好吃。狗……饿了。

original: Reminds me, keeps the voice out of my head. He can't talk when the pain's howling at me.
translation: 这东西可以让那声音离开我的脑子。当我疼痛难忍的时候，他也不能说话。

original: Dog is hungry. Tired of your voice... when do we eat?
translation: 狗饿了。听你说话都累了…我们什么时候吃东西？

original: When the bombs hit, this casino sealed up like an Emperor's tomb. If you don't know what that means, never mind, it means we're trapped.
translation: 核弹落下的时候，整座赌场就像皇陵一样被牢牢封上了。如果你听不懂这句话也没关系，反正我的意思是，我们现在被困住了。

original: So - get the power running to the main floor. That'll open the elevators and unlock the doors.
translation: 所以，你得想办法重启主楼的电力，这样电梯才会启动，各扇门的门锁也会解除。

original: The ones that didn't strip their gears when they locked into place, Old World junk. Shoddy workmanship.
translation: 不过也只有锁芯没断的门才能打得开，旧世界的垃圾。粗制滥造的玩意。

original: Once the power's on, then I'll tell you your next steps. Just get this part done, and then listen.
translation: 等通电之后，我会告诉你下一步怎么做。先把这件事办完，再来找我。

original: If you're wondering where your crew is, well... the casino saw them as guests. Which means they all got assigned to their floor. Just like mine.
translation: 至于你的其他队友嘛…赌场把他们当成了客人，已经将他们送往不同的楼层了。就像我一样。

original: Don't worry about them, they're of no use if you can't get the power running.
translation: 别担心他们，如果恢复不了电力，他们也没有用处。

original: All I need is you for the rest of this. Which means we just need to deal with them, one by one, and then the Vault's... ours.
translation: 剩下的事情，我只需要你一个人来做就够了。因此我们得把其他人处理掉，然后避难所就会是……我们俩的了。

original: Ha! You got the power on, excellent. You were quite a find, glad my trap in the desert caught you before time ran out.
translation: 哈！你恢复了电力，很好。你真是个不可多得的人才，幸好我在大限将至之前，用设在沙漠里的陷阱逮到了你。

original: And also glad you didn't come across this place first, might have plundered it first... can't have that. Like at HELIOS. And Hoover Dam.
translation: 也庆幸老天没有让你提前发现这个地方，否则也许会被你捷足先登……这可不行。太阳神一号和胡佛大坝就是前车之鉴。

original: All right, setting this on repeat in case you're some idiot-savant braincase and need the reminder...
translation: 好吧，为了避免你过于健忘，需要他人随时在耳边提醒，我已经把这段语音设为了循环播放……

original: So, my greedy friend, we've got some unfinished business. I'm not one to share, and there's loose ends we need to wrap up first.
translation: 那么，我这位嗜财如命的朋友，我们还有些事情没有完成。我这人并不喜欢同他人分享财富，所以首先，我们必须要收拾掉不必要的人。

original: The rest of your team is on different floors. They got assigned there, ushered there based on the casino's records as to the best "fit."
translation: 你的同伴们已经分散到别的楼层去了。赌场会根据记录将他们引导到“合适”的楼层。

original: Don't ask me how, Pre-War casino security and escort systems aren't my specialty.
translation: 别问我这是什么原理，我对战前赌场的安保和接待系统研究得并不透彻。

original: Go to each floor, and kill them. I don't need them anymore... well, now that you're here.
translation: 现在你就到各楼层去杀了他们。我已经不需要他们了…有你一个就足够了。

original: We don't need anyone... except each other. Together, we'll crack the Sierra Madre, and we can both leave this place behind.
translation: 不用太多人……只要我们俩。我们携手合作，一定能破解马德雷山脉的秘密，一起离开这里。

original: The cafe survived? How about that. Had great coffee - and one of the waitresses? Rhonda? Piece. Of. Work.
translation: 咖啡馆居然没塌？真是不得了。这儿的咖啡挺不错的。还有个女服务员，好像叫郎达？长得可俊了。

original: Breath of fresh air in here... literally. If you need to take a breather from the Cloud, this is a good spot.
translation: 这里面…居然还有新鲜空气。如果你不想再吸毒云了，倒是可以来这儿换个环境。

original: Might be a nice place to hole up for a while.
translation: 这地方不错，可以用来暂时藏身。

original: Like a toxic ashtray down here.
translation: 这里像个毒烟灰缸。

original: Find a way to get this place hopping again... would clean all the toxic gas out of Puesta del Sol.
translation: 如果能想办法让这地方重新启动…就能把日落镇里的毒气全都净化掉。

original: [Christine makes a sweeping motion of the room, does a deep inhalation, then gives a thumbs up.]
translation: [克莉丝汀环顾了房子四周，深吸了一口气，竖起了大拇指。]

original: [Christine's breathing quickens, and her eyes dart around the walls.]
translation: [克莉丝汀呼吸变得急促，她的双眼在四周的墙壁上快速扫视着。]

original: [Christine seems to be sweating heavily, and her hand is twitching slightly. She looks ready to bolt.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看起来流了很多汗，她的手轻微地抽搐着，好像时刻准备要逃。]

original: So you're going to prove it now? How?
translation: 你现在要证明？怎么证明？

original: The one who makes all the hand signs, a little tight around the corners of her mouth.
translation: 就是那个老爱打手语，嘴角有些紧绷的姑娘。

original: I put her in the Clinic, tuned her like an instrument. If she heals up, it's not going to be her voice speaking any more.
translation: 我把她扔进了诊所，然后像给乐器调弦一样，对她的声道做了手术。将来如果她伤口痊愈，她的声音也会彻底变成另一个人。

original: That is, if the Sierra Madre didn't get her. If it did... well, there's enough of Vera around for me to spend a few years piecing a book together.
translation: 当然前提她得活着。但……即便她死了，这附近有关薇拉的信息也够多了，大不了我再花个几年时间，也能拼凑出一段语音。

original: How so?
translation: 怎么做到的？

original: Sinclair was already puppy-eyed, so all I had to do was the introductions. She smiled, fluttered her eyes, showed a little leg...
translation: 辛克莱早就对她一见倾心了，我只不过是充当了牵线人。仅仅凭借她的一丝微笑，一次眨眼，再加一点春光乍泄…

original: ...and he built this whole place for her. Made her the key to his vault, like a joke, 'cause of her name. Her fake Hollywood name.
translation: …他居然就不惜代价为她修建了这整个地方。甚至还将她的声音设置成了打开避难所的钥匙，简直和玩儿似的，就因为她的名字，那个用来混迹好莱坞的假名。

original: Except Sinclair didn't know I'd been there first. I could twist her whatever direction I wanted.
translation: 只可惜辛克莱不知道我早已捷足先登，把她捏在掌心了。

original: I am out of here... well, not to the Villa, just out of the damn theater first chance I get.
translation: 我要离开这里…不是去别墅区，反正只要离开这个剧院就行。

original: Got to say this for Sinclair, he sure knew how to keep things locked down, the tight-assed prick.
translation: 不得不说，辛克莱这小子在看管宝贝方面真的很在行，不愧是个一毛不拔的铁公鸡。

original: Not going to be performing here again, that's for sure.
translation: 我以后不会在这里表演了。

original: Why don't you come with me? Whatever else you're here for, not my concern.
translation: 你为什么不和我一起走呢？不管你有什么问题，我都不关心。

original: Fine. Would hate to have carved you up any more than you are.
translation: 好吧。毕竟你都这么惨了，我也不忍心再给你多割几刀。

original: No toxins in the air in here.
translation: 这里的空气没有毒。

original: Cafe. Food place. Maybe something in kitchen?
translation: 咖啡馆。吃饭的地方。厨房里可能会有东西？

original: Like it here.
translation: 喜欢这里。

original: Air in here not burn chest.
translation: 这里的空气没有那么热了。

original: Can't wait to see their faces when they find out what the lock is. Just gotta wait them out.
translation: 等他们发现门锁的情况时，不知道会是什么表情。等着看好了。

original: Should be able to rewire them, failing that, shoot them, although that'll alert the others, they're on a linked patrol pattern.
translation: 应该可以篡改它们的程序，如果不行，用枪也可以，不过这可能会惊动其它影像，因为它们的巡逻路线是互联的。

original: If you secure that, that's all you want?
translation: 你得到它以后呢？就满足了吗？

original: No, there's one last thing I want from the Sierra Madre. Its bounty. The machines that fill its streets, its corridors.
translation: 不，马德雷山脉赌场还有一样东西我也想得到——它的物产。那些遍布大街小巷的售货机。

original: They provide, provide almost anything. Perhaps in the Pre-War era, they were commonplace, things to dismiss.
translation: 它们几乎能提供一切物资。或许在战前的年代，它们平平无奇，已经面临淘汰 。

original: Now, they are far more valuable. You know it. They helped keep you alive.
translation: 但如今，它们却拥有巨大的价值。你也看到了。它们可以为我们的生活提供保障。

original: What do you want from the Sierra Madre?
translation: 你到底想从马德雷山脉赌场这里得到什么？

original: What do I want? Weapons. Security. A citadel of my own.
translation: 我想得到什么？武器，安全。一座属于我自己的堡垒。

original: The Madre's all these things. It's a fortress, a weapon. A chance... to... "begin again."
translation: 马德雷拥有以上这一切。它既是一座要塞，也是一件武器。它给了我一个机会…一个… "从头再来"的机会。

original: Once I unlock its archives, I can carve the Mojave into any shape I choose.
translation: 一旦我揭开了它的秘密，我就可以随心所欲地改造莫哈维了。

original: Now - with the casino sleeping, it's got places closed off - won't let you go yet. We'll get there, trust me, just need to wake it up.
translation: 好了——赌场仍然在沉睡，许多地方依然封闭着，你没办法进去。不过这阻止不了我们，相信我，我们只需要将它唤醒就好。

original: You. I know you can hear me. When you die, Courier... I'll be waiting. Your grave's going to look just like this vault.
translation: 你，我知道你能听到我说话。我会等下去，等到你死的那一天……你的坟墓会和这座避难所一样。

original: So someone else with a collar placed one on me? Who?
translation: 所以是另一个同样遭遇的人给我戴上了项圈？是谁？

original: The mutant. Heh! He swallowed one of the collars... after that, he was mine. The collar wasn't even necessary.
translation: 是那个变种人。呵！他吞下了一个项圈……之后就成了我的奴隶，有没有项圈都无关紧要。

original: All his kind, they exist to be given orders. They're soldiers - simple, stupid. I ask him to fetch, and he did... even without the threat of death.
translation: 他们这个种族，从诞生之初就只懂得服从。他们是士兵——头脑简单，四肢发达。我要他去找人，他就照办了…无论那是否会威胁到自己的生命。

original: Even when I stopped speaking to him, he continued to leave the Villa, gather victims from the mantraps, out of habit.
translation: 哪怕我已经不再和他说话了，他也还是会主动离开别墅区，去各处的陷阱里搜寻猎物，这已经变成了他的习惯。

original: He must have found you in one of them. If so, he's probably forgotten - he only remembers my voice.
translation: 他应该就是这样发现你的。如果是的话，那他很可能已经忘了你…因为他只记得住我的声音。

original: He put the collar on you, dragged you here, because he doesn't know any better. It's in his nature, greedy and childlike.
translation: 是他给你戴上了项圈，把你拖到了这里。毕竟除此之外，他什么都不懂。这是他的天性，贪婪而幼稚。

original: How did you get me here?
translation: 你怎么把我弄到这里来的？

original: Everyone asks that. Should be asking how they plan on leaving.
translation: 每个人都会问这个问题。你不妨问问他们是怎么想方设法离开的。

original: It only takes putting a collar on one to begin the chain. One with a collar may chain another. And that one, another. Had traps all over the wastes.
translation: 我只是把项圈套在了一个人的脖子上，就引发了连锁反应。戴项圈的人会给其他人也套上项圈，如此周而复始，循环往复。我在废土各处都布下了陷阱。

original: The chain ends with the Super Mutant. Although with him... the collar wasn't even necessary. He only needed... guidance.
translation: 而这个反应在那个超级变种人那里结束。不过对他来说……项圈是可有可无的。他会听从一切……指示。

original: So you answered madness with madness?
translation: 所以你就用疯狂来对付疯狂？

original: When your life is tied to another's, sacrifice and cooperation - they can be conditioned, learned, and you can focus on the matter at hand.
translation: 只有当你与他人的生命紧密维系在一起时，你才能逐渐理解、逐渐学会奉献与合作，才能更加专注于手头的事务。

original: Greed can be beaten. Contained. Controlled. You know it better than anyone... or I hope you do. It doesn't matter.
translation: 贪念可以被克服，可以被压抑，被控制。你比任何人都清楚这一点…也可能你并不理解。无所谓了。

original: You're nothing more than a killer that aspires to mass murder.
translation: 你不过是一个嗜血成性的刽子手。

original: You think I'm a murderer. If I was, I'd have set off your collar long ago... the collar ensures compliance, encourages... cooperation.
translation: 你说我是刽子手，如果我是的话，你们脖子上的项圈早就爆炸了…… 项圈可以使人服从，让人们……学会合作。

original: Think about it. Would you truly have gotten into the casino without those collars? No, human nature is against us, always.
translation: 想想吧，要是没有这些项圈，你们进得了赌场的大门吗？不，人性永远会与我们作对。

original: Did you know that I had to keep adjusting the collars, keep changing the rules to make this moment possible?
translation: 你知道吗……你知道吗？我不停地调整项圈，不停地修改规则，就为了能让这一刻成为现实！

original: You're Veronica's mentor. The Elder who lost HELIOS One.
translation: 你就是维罗尼卡的导师，那个丢掉了太阳神一号的长老。

original: Veronica... she... survived HELIOS. She would. Resourceful.
translation: 维罗尼卡…她…居然没有死在太阳神一号。这也不奇怪，她一向很有本事。

original: As for "losing" HELIOS One... that was the only outcome, aside from retreat. NCR, swarming like ants over Old World relics... Hoover Dam... HELIOS...
translation: 至于你说"丢掉"……除了撤退外，似乎也就只剩这么一种结局了。NCR早已像行军蚁一样爬遍了旧世遗迹的每一个角落…胡佛大坝…太阳神……

original: I won't let those... children seize anything else. Hardin... McNamara... can't stop them... won't. So I will, with the Old World as my weapons.
translation: 我绝不会让那些…无知的孩童再夺走任何东西。哈丁…麦克纳马拉…根本阻止不了他们…也没这个胆识。所以，这件事只能交给我，而我已经将旧世界的利刃握在手中了。

original: It reminds you of being trapped in the Auto-Doc.
translation: 你想起了被自动医生抓住时的感觉。

original: [She turns to you, relieved, and nods... then she turns away, and her face crumbles. She makes motions with her fingers, then clenches her fists.]
translation: [她看向你，松了口气，点了点头... 随后她转向一边，脸耷拉了下来。她用手指做了个手势，然后握紧了拳头。]

original: All right, be ready.
translation: 很好，做好准备。

original: [She narrows her eyes, determined, and gives a last nod.]
translation: [她坚定地眯起眼，点点头。]

original: Not in a hand-holding mood right now.
translation: 我现在可没心情牵手。

original: [She frowns, then waves you away and focuses on the terminal.]
translation: [她皱皱眉，摆手叫你离开，眼神又回到了终端上。]

original: Are... are you all right? Something seems off.
translation: 你……还好吗？你好像有些不对劲。

original: [FAILED] No... no, you have it wrong. Look, it's now or never, all right? Let me open the elevator.
translation: [失败] 没… 没有，你听错了。听着，机不可失，知道吗？我这就去打开电梯。

original: What? You can make the speakers stop or something?
translation: 什么？你能让这些喇叭停下？

original: [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]
translation: [她正要点头——却停下来，指指自己，摇了摇头。]
